translation.en: Such a person may get angry at certain people or currents and he may speak against them, but the effects of his anger are very different from the effects of the anger of an ordinary person who may get angry and beat somebody up, for example. Restrain your anger.
translation.ha: A lokacin da ka yi fushi a kan wani mutum ko wata kungiya da fadin wasu maganganu, to tasirin irin wannan fushin naka da fushin da wani mutum da ba shi da irin wannan nauyi a wuyansa wanda bai wuce ya bugi wani mutum ba, ba daya ba ne.

translation.en: Things should not be done out of anger.
translation.ha: Hadiye fushi; sannan kada mu yi wani abu cikin fushi.

translation.en: Our Lord, forgive us our faults and our extravagance in our affair.
translation.ha: Ka gafarta mana zunubanmu da barnarmu a cikin al'amarinmu...(4)".

translation.en: And through "quenching the flame of hatred".
translation.ha: Da kashe wutar kiyayya.

translation.en: Everybody should try to put out this fire.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne dukkanin kokarin kowa ya zamanto wajen kashe wannan wutar ne.

translation.en: It is wrong to fuel it. This is why I constantly advise the friends - government officials and the people whose statements are reflected in the entire country or part of the country - to watch their statements and to control their tongues.
translation.ha: Dalilin da ya sanya a ko da yaushe mu ke yawan jaddadawa ga ‘yan'uwa, ga jami'an gwamnati, ga mutanen da suke da mimbarin magana, ga mutanen da ake yada maganganunsu a kasar nan ko kuma zuwa ga wani bangare na kasar nan na cewa su dinga kula da maganganu da abubuwan da za su fadi, saboda wannan lamarin ne.

translation.en: A particular statement may not only fail to extinguish the fire of discord, but it may also fuel it.
translation.ha: A wani lokaci wata magana ba ma wai ba za ta kashe wutan ba ne face ma dai za ta kunna wutar ne da kara mata karfi.

translation.en: Try to bring together and reunite those who have separated from Muslim communities. Try to bring back those who have almost drifted away. We must not let our behavior, words and actions discourage those who are partially faithful to the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Mutanen da suke tsakiyar hanya, a yi kokarin isar da su ga wajen da ya kamata. Bai kamata mu bari ayyukan mu da dabi'unmu da maganganun mu, su zamanto masu kawar da mutanen da suke tsakiyar hanya da hana su yin imani da wannan hanyar ba.

translation.en: We should improve the relationship between those who have problems with each other.
translation.ha: Kada mu raba mutanen da suke da rabin alaka da wannan tsarin da shi ba.

translation.en: When it comes to revealing things about other people, we should only reveal their good characteristics.
translation.ha: Da sasanta tsakanin mutane, idan har akwai wani sabani tsakanin mutane, to mu yi kokarin sasanta su.

translation.en: If you know about a good thing that a person or a government official has done, that is what you should reveal about him.
translation.ha: A lokacin da wani jami'i ya aikata wani aiki na kwarai, ku yi kokarin bayanin hakan.

translation.en: There are many things that can be said in this regard.
translation.ha: Mun yi maganganu da yawa dangane da wannan batun.

translation.en: What I said is only part of the dua. There were 22, 23 points in the dua and I only touched on 6, 7 of them.
translation.ha: Wannan wani bangare ne na wannan addu'ar. Batutuwa ne kimanin ashirin da biyu zuwa da uku, to a yanzu dai a takaice na yi magana ne kan guda shida daga cikinsu.

translation.en: We should ask God to "clothe us in the ornaments of the God-fearing".
translation.ha: Mu roki Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya tufatar da mu da adon muminai.

translation.en: These are some of the requirements of piety.
translation.ha: Wadannan wani bangare ne na tsoron Allah.

translation.en: This is the end of the first part of my speech.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne bangare na farko da nake son magana a kansa.

translation.en: The second part of my speech is a general assessment of the conditions of the country.
translation.ha: Bangare na biyu, wani dubi ne na gaba daya dangane da yanayin kasar nan.

translation.en: The excellent and detailed report, which was presented by the honorable President, was very informative. There were outstanding points in the report and it is very good if these points are made public so that everybody knows what efforts have been made and what services have been rendered.
translation.ha: Lalle wannan rahoto da mai girma shugaban kasa ya gabatar wani rahoto ne da ya tabo bangarori da yawa. Akwai wadansu batutuwa masu muhimmanci da suke a fili a cikin rahoton, ina ma da a ce wadannan bayanai za su isa ga kunnuwan mutane kowa ya san irin kokari da wahalar da ake sha da kuma irin hidimar da aka yi.

translation.en: I will discuss the issues of the country from a different perspective, which is very important to us.
translation.ha: To ni dai zan yi bayani ne ta wani bangare na yanayin da kasar nan take ciki, wanda hakan lamari ne mai muhimmanci a gare mu.

translation.en: Why is it important?
translation.ha: Me ya sa ya zamanto mai muhimmanci?

translation.en: Primarily because it is very important to know about general conditions of the country, where we have reached and which way we should go. These things are always important, but they are particularly important in the current situation because of the conditions of the world.
translation.ha: Da farko dai fahimtar yanayin da kasar nan take ciki da kuma inda muke, ina muka isa, ta wace hanya ya kamata mu bi, lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske, a ko da yaushe lamari ne mai muhimmanci; to amma a yau kan yana da muhimmanci sosai, mai yiyuwa ne ma ana iya cewa sakamakon irin yanayin da duniya take ciki, yana da muhimmanci ninkin ba ninkiya.

translation.en: First of all, the conditions of the region are completely unprecedented.
translation.ha: Da farko dai yanayin wannan yankin wani yanayi ne maras tamka.

translation.en: Islamic Awakening and the great event that has taken place in the region have been absolutely unprecedented from the beginning of the Revolution up until today.
translation.ha: Irin farkawa ta Musulunci da abubuwa masu girman gaske da suke faruwa a wannan yankin wani lamari ne da ba a taba ganin irin sa ba tun daga farkon nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci har zuwa yau din nan; an gudanar da abubuwa masu girma, lamari ne mai girman gaske ya faru.

translation.en: A great event has taken place. The fact that a nation like the Egyptian nation carries out such a great movement, overthrows the Egyptian regime and shouts Islamic slogans, the fact that the existence of the fake Jewish and Zionist government is threatened like this by the conditions of the region - these things are too great to fit in conventional assessments.
translation.ha: A sami wata al'umma irin al'ummar Masar ta gudanar da irin wannan yunkuri mai girman gaske, ta kifar da gwamnati, sannan kuma ta dinga daga take irin na Musulunci, ta zamanto mai yin irin wannan barazana ga haramtacciyar gwamnatin yahudawan sahyohiya dangane da yanayin wannan yankin, dukkanin wadannan wasu abubuwa ne wadanda dukkanin sharhohin da ake yi ba su kai gare shi ba; lalle lamari ne mai girman gaske.

translation.en: Well, these are the conditions and they promise very bright prospects for the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: To a irin wannan yanayi ne muka sami kanmu a ciki wanda lamari ne da ke tsara wani yanayi da fage mai ban mamaki ga Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

translation.en: And the conditions of the world are also unprecedented. The big economic crisis which has plagued western arrogant powers is an extraordinary event and we cannot afford to treat it superficially.
translation.ha: Irin matsalar tattalin arzikin da ta yi wa gwamnatocin ma'abota girman kai na kasashen yammaci sannan take ci gaba da makure su wani lamari ne mai girman gaske; sannan kuma wani lamari ne wanda ba cikin sauki haka kawai za a wuce shi ba.

translation.en: The analyses that westerners present about the economic crisis in America and certain European countries and the warnings that they sound about the future, are only part of these issues. They are not saying everything.
translation.ha: Irin wadannan sharhi da kuke ji ‘yan kasashen yammaci suna yi dangane da matsalar tattalin arzikin da Amurka da wasu kasashen yammaci suka fada ciki da kuma bayyanar da damuwarsu dangane da makomarsu, wani bangare ne na wannan lamarin; ba dukkanin komai ne suke fadi ba.

translation.en: Think tanks, backstage policy-makers and designers of global issues in powerful countries of the world - who have control over the majority of global media - do not want the dimensions of this crisis to be revealed to the people of the world, otherwise the dimensions of the crisis are far more serious than this.
translation.ha: Cibiyoyi tunani da masu tsara musu siyasa a bayan fage, masu tsara abubuwan da ke gudana a manyan kasashen duniya - wadanda a mafi yawan lokuta kafafen watsa labarai ma suna hannunsu ne - lalle ba sa son ganin al'ummomin duniya sun fahimci hakikanin matsalar da suke ciki. Don kuwa bangarorin wannan matsalar sun fi abubuwan da suke fadi.

translation.en: By Allah's favor, if there is time, I will say a few sentences in this regard at the end of my speech.
translation.ha: Idan har daga karshen magana ta akwai lokaci zan yi karin haske kan wannan lamarin, insha Allah.

translation.en: Another issue is the emergence of radical movements and terrorist campaigns in the west, particularly in Europe - from European neo-Nazis to American neocons. The previous US government was neocon. These people openly announce their radical positions.
translation.ha: Wani lamarin kuma na daban, shi ne irin yaduwar yunkurin wuce gona da iri da ayyukan ta'addanci a kasashen yammaci musamman a kasashen Turai; kama daga sabbin ‘yan Nazi na kasashen turan da sabbin ‘yan mazan jiyan Amurka wadanda su ne masu tsara wa gwamnatin Amurka da ta gabata abin da za ta yi; a fili suke fadin ra'ayinsu na wuce gona da iri.

translation.en: And then they attacked two Islamic countries.
translation.ha: Daga baya kuma sai ya kai hari kasashe biyu na musulmi.

translation.en: They had other plans as well, but God did not give them time and they were defeated.
translation.ha: Akwai wadansu abubuwan ma da suke son aikatawa, to amma dai Allah Madaukakin Sarki bai ba su dama ba inda suka sha kashi.

translation.en: Well, these are important issues.
translation.ha: To wadannan lamurra ne masu muhimmanci.

translation.en: The event that happened in Norway should not be viewed as an isolated event.
translation.ha: Wannan lamarin da ya faru a kasar Norway, bai kamata kawai mu dauke shi a matsayin wani lamari mai sauki haka kawai ba.

translation.en: In such conditions, we need to re-evaluate ourselves and see what our situation is.
translation.ha: To a irin wannan yanayin wajibi ne mu sake dubi cikin yanayinmu, mu gani a wani irin yanayi muke.

translation.en: If we fail to see these opportunities, if we fail to identify them, if we fail to use them appropriately, if we fail to use them at the right time, we will suffer losses.
translation.ha: Matukar dai ba mu kalli wannan damar da kuma fahimtarta ba, sannan kuma matukar ba mu yi aiki da ita yadda ya dace ba, haka nan kuma matukar ba mu kama hanyar neman amfanuwa da wannan damar cikin lokaci ba, to kuwa za mu cutu.

translation.en: Sometimes losing an opportunity becomes a threat in itself, a cause of backwardness.
translation.ha: A wasu lokuta shi kansa yin watsi da wata dama da aka samu shi kansa ya kan zama wata barazana, shi kansa ya kan zama wata koma baya.

translation.en: For this reason it is not a bad idea to consider the issues of the country from a general perspective.
translation.ha: A saboda haka babu matsala idan har muka yi dubi na gaba daya wa lamurran da suke faruwa a kasar nan da wannan mahanga.

translation.en: We must not deceive ourselves. We must not be biased. We have weaknesses and strengths and we need to see both of them.
translation.ha: To sai dai wajibi ne dubin da za mu yi din ya zamanto wani dubi ne da ya yi daidai da hakika; bai kamata mu yi kuskure ba da kuma cin karo da dutse ba. Mu dai muna da abubuwa masu kyau sannan kuma muna da munana; wajibi ne mu dinga kallonsu gaba daya.

translation.en: They constantly promote pessimism in the media and elsewhere.
translation.ha: A kafafen watsa labarai ma da sauran su haka lamarin yake.

translation.en: And as soon as one questions their approach, they say, "You are preventing us from telling the truth.
translation.ha: Daga lokacin da mutum ya ce me ya sa kuke fadin haka, nan take za su ce kai dai ba ka barin mu mu fadi hakikanin lamurra.

translation.en: You call it pessimism and other such things, but we just want to state the facts." No, this is bias.
translation.ha: Kana cewa hakan bakanta fuska ne da makamantan hakan; mu dai muna so ne mu fadi hakika. A'a, hakan kokarin rusa lamurra ne.

translation.en: I usually skim through 10, 20 newspapers each day.
translation.ha: Ni dai a kowace rana na kan duba kimanin jaridu goma zuwa ashirin.

translation.en: Certain newspapers publish 4, 5 headlines every day each of which is enough to fill the hearts of weak people with apprehension.
translation.ha: Wasu daga cikin wadannan jaridu a kowace rana suna da wasu kanun labarai wanda kowane guda daga cikinsu ya isa ya jijjiga zuciyar wani mutum mai rauni.

translation.en: I will not accuse anybody. But this is a fact and it is wrong.
translation.ha: Mu dai ba muna tuhumar wani ba ne, amma dai wani lamari ne na hakika, wannan kuskure ne.

translation.en: The same is true of the opposite.
translation.ha: Kishiyar hakan ma dai haka take.

translation.en: This is wrong too. It is necessary to see both negative and positive points.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a kalli bangare na rauni tare da bangare mai kyau na irin karfin da ake da shi tare.

translation.en: We need to take into consideration both what the government has managed to do and what it has failed to do.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne ya zamanto abubuwan da gwamnati ta iya aikatawa da kuma wadanda ta gagara aikatawa su zamanto tare.

translation.en: Therefore, if we want to have an appropriate evaluation of the country's conditions, we need to see both positive and negative points.
translation.ha: A saboda haka idan har muna son mu fahimci hakikanin yanayin da kasar nan take ciki, wajibi ne mu ajiye bangaren rauni da bangaren karfi su zamanto tare.

translation.en: Today I will just mention a point, but this issue requires a lot of work.
translation.ha: A yau dai zan gabatar da wani takaitaccen bayani ne kan wannan lamarin, to amma akwai bukatar a gudanar da ayyuka masu fadi a wannan bangaren.

translation.en: Positive points will show us the capacities that the country enjoys.
translation.ha: Wadannan abubuwa masu kyau za su nuna mana wata dama da kuma fagen da muke da su a wannan kasar.

translation.en: And the list of negative points will show us the priorities we should take care of.
translation.ha: Su kuwa wadannan bangarori na rauni za su nuna mana abubuwan da ya kamata mu ba su muhimmanci da kuma ayyukan da ya zama wajibi mu aikata su ne.

translation.en: If we compare these two lists, the path will become clear to us and we will realize what we should do.
translation.ha: A lokacin da muka sanya wadannan abubuwa a tare da junansu, hakan zai zamanto mai haskaka mana hanya; mu fahimci mai ya kamata mu aikata.

translation.en: I have written down 5, 6 things that are the result of the constant movement of the Islamic Republic over the past 32 years. Of course there have been ups and downs. That is to say, certain years and administrations have been good and certain other years and administrations have been less good, but generally these are the positive things that we have achieved over the past 32 years.
translation.ha: A nan dai na rubuta wasu abubuwa guda biyar zuwa shida wadanda wani yunkuri ne da aka ci gaba da yinsu tsawon shekarun wannan tsari na Jamhuriyar Musulunci tsawon wadannan shekaru talatin da biyun, kowane lokaci da irin nasa, wato wasu shekarun, wasu zamunnan, wasu gwamnatocin da kyau wasu kuma an dan bar su a baya. To sai dai a yanayi na gaba daya, a tsawon wadannan lokuta muna da wadannan abubuwa masu kyau.

translation.en: The first strength of the Islamic Republic is that it has proven its capabilities are superior to the threats. This is a very important point.
translation.ha: Batu na farko daga cikin abubuwa masu kyau da kuma irin karfi na wannan tsarin wanda kuma tsarin ya tabbatar da shi, shi ne nasara da yin galaba a kan barazana daban-daban da aka yi (wa tsarin); wannan lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: Over the past 32 years we have encountered many threats - political threats, security threats, military threats, economic threats - which were supposed to harm the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Tsawon wadannan shekaru talatin da biyu mun fuskanci barazana daban-daban - barazana ta siyasa, barazana ta tsaro, barazana ta tattalin arzikin - manufar wadannan barazanar kuwa ita ce cutar da wannan tsarin.

translation.en: Of course they wanted to overthrow the Islamic Republic, which proved to be impossible for them, so they tried to at least keep the Islamic Republic and Iran backward.
translation.ha: Na'am suna so ne su kifar da wannan gwamnati, to amma da ya ke hakan ba abu ne mai sauki a gare su ba, sai suka so dakatar da tsarin waje guda, su ciyar da kasar nan baya.

translation.en: The Islamic Republic has overcome these threats.
translation.ha: To wannan tsari dai ya yi nasara a kan dukkanin wadannan barazana.

translation.en: Some of these threats were posed directly by foreigners, such as the sanctions.
translation.ha: Wasu daga cikin wadannan abubuwa su kansu ‘yan kasashen waje ne kai tsaye suka tsara su, kamar wannan lamari na takunkumin.

translation.en: Sanctions have been there for many years, but they have been intensified in the recent years. They themselves spoke about crippling sanctions.
translation.ha: An sanya wa kasar nan takunkumi na tsawon shekara da shekaru, to sai dai a shekarun baya-bayan nan sun kara kaimi da tsananta, su da kansu suke fadin cewa takunkumi ne mai ruguzawa.

translation.en: They acted directly or used the United Nations - which was under their control - to impose these sanctions.
translation.ha: Wadannan takunkumi a wasu lokuta ta hanyar Majalisar Dinkin Duniya - wacce damar a hannunsu ta ke - wasu kuma su da kansu kai tsaye ne, lalle sun sanya mana wannan takunkumin.

translation.en: These were the threats in which foreigners were directly involved.
translation.ha: Wadannan abubuwa ne da suke da alaka da ‘yan kasashen waje, wanda suke da hannu cikinsu kai tsaye.

translation.en: There were certain other threats - such as the issue of ethnicities in the country - which were caused by domestic factors although the enemy could have used these factors to his advantage. The Islamic Republic overcame all these threats. Today different ethnicities are living together in the country in a brotherly way.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma akwai wadansu barazanar wadanda suka kunno kai sakamakon abubuwan da suka faru na cikin gida; duk da cewa makiya sun yi amfani da hakan, a matsayin misali lamarin kabilu na kasar nan. To wannan tsarin dai ya yi nasara a kan dukkanin wadannan abubuwa. A yau kabilu daban-daban na kasar nan, suna ci gaba da rayuwa tare da junansu; sannan kuma ana iya ganin yadda suke jin cewa suna tare da wannan tsari da kuma kishinsa.

translation.en: I believe this is one of the most important strengths.
translation.ha: A ra'ayina wannan daya ne daga cikin bangarorin karfi da muke da shi.

translation.en: We should pay attention to this point when enumerating the strengths of the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne mu lura da wannan lamarin a lokacin da muke lissafa bangarorin karfi na wannan tsarin.

translation.en: The Islamic Republic has been faced with the enmity of the most powerful people in the world and it has been forced to deal with constant threats single-handedly for 32 years, but it has managed to overcome all these threats. This is a very important point.
translation.ha: Wannan tsarin shi kadai din sa, ba tare da goyon baya na kasa da kasa ba sannan kuma ga makiya masu karfi na abin duniya, wacce ta fuskanci barazana daban-daban tsawon wadannan sheakru talatin da biyu, to amma ta yi galaba a kan dukkanin wadannan barazana; wannan lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: I believe this is the most important strength of the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: A ra'ayina wannan shi ne bangaren karfi na farko na wannan tsarin.

translation.en: The second strength is the trust between the people and the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Na biyu: shi ne yarda da juna dake tsakanin mutane da gwamnati.

translation.en: The clear phenomena that are in front of everybody's eyes are the cause of this trust.
translation.ha: Dalilin irin wannan yardar shi ne dai wannan lamari da yake a fili a gaban idanuwanmu.

translation.en: No, the people trust the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: A'a, mutane dai sun yarda da gwamnati.

translation.en: One proof is the election that was held two years ago in which more than 80 percent of eligible voters took part.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin abubuwan da suke tabbatar da hakan shi ne zaben da aka gudanar shekaru biyun da suka gabata (zaben shugaban kasa da aka gudanar a shekara ta 2009) inda sama da kashi tamanin cikin dari na mutanen da suke da hakkin kada kuri'a suka fito don kada kuri'unsu.

translation.en: Where in the world is there such a thing?
translation.ha: A ina ne a duniya ake samun irin wannan?

translation.en: Another proof is the two rallies that we hold every year on the 22nd of Bahman [marking the victory of the Islamic Revolution] and on Quds Day. These demonstrations are related to the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Wani misalin kuma shi ne dai wadannan jerin gwano guda biyu da ake gudanarwa a kowace shekara; wato jerin gwanon ranar 22 ga watan Bahman (don tunawa da ranar da juyin juya halin Musulunci ya yi nasara) da kuma na Ranar Kudus.

translation.en: They are not related to any particular administration or current: they belong to the Islamic Republic. Notice what the people do on these impressive occasions - in the cold weather of the 22nd of Bahman and in the month of Ramadan while they are fasting.
translation.ha: Ku duba ku ga me mutane suke yi a yayin wannan yunkuri; a lokacin tsananin sanyi na ranar ashirin da biyu ga watan Bahman, sannan kuma (ranar Kudus) a cikin watan Ramalana cikin (kishirwar) azumi; shin a lokacin da ake fama da sanyi ne ko kuma a lokacin da ake fama da tsananin zafi irin na yanzu.

translation.en: By Allah's favor, you will see again on Quds Day how impressive the people are.
translation.ha: Da yardar Allah za ku gani a ranar Kudus (ta wannan shekarar) yadda mutane za su nuna irin azamar da suke da ita.

translation.en: This is indicative of the commitment of the people and their love for the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Wannan wani lamari ne da ke nuni da irin so da kaunar da mutane suke yi wa wannan tsarin.

translation.en: Public trust in the Islamic Republic cannot be better and clearer than this.
translation.ha: Ba za a iya ganin irin wannan yarda da gwamnati sama da hakan ba.

translation.en: This presence is highly significant.
translation.ha: Wannan kasantuwa ta mutane, wata irin kasantuwa ce mai ma'anar gaske.

translation.en: Besides, in certain cases such as the Dey 9th demonstrations of the year 1388, as soon as the people felt the movement that had been started was related to the Islamic Republic and the Revolution, not to a particular person or administration, they carried out that great movement.
translation.ha: Baya ga hakan, a wasu lokuta na musamman, a matsayin misali ranar tara ga watan Dey na shekarar 1388 (30/12/2009 lokacin da mutane suka fito don nuna goyon bayan su ga tsarin Musulunci bayan da wasu masu tada fitina suka yi kokarin cin mutumcin tsarin da jagororinsa), daga lokacin da mutane suka ji cewa lalle an fara wani yunkuri na cutar da wannan tsarin da kuma juyin juya halin Musulunci, ba wai cutar da wani mutum guda ko kuma wata gwamnati ba, sai suka shigo fagen da samar da irin wannan gagarumin yunkuri.

translation.en: It was not just enthusiastic youth who stepped into the arena. Everybody came.
translation.ha: Lamarin ba wai shi ne kawai matasa masu kishi sun shigo cikin fage ba ne, kowa da kowa ne ya fito.

translation.en: The event that happened on the 9th of Dey was extraordinary and it was due to the commitment of the people to the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Abin da ya faru a ranar 9 ga watan Dey wani lamari ne mai ban mamaki; sakamakon irin kaunar da mutane suke yi wa wannan tsari ne.

translation.en: This is one of the most important strengths of the country.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin bangarorin karfi na wannan kasar shi ne wannan.

translation.en: The country has made progress under the most severe sanctions.
translation.ha: Kasar nan ta sami ci gaba ne a cikin mafi tsananin takunkumi.

translation.en: In what areas has the country made progress?
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin su shi ne a fagen ilimi da fasaha, wanda mai girma shugaban kasar ya yi ishara da hakan cikin jawabin da ya yi. Mun sami ci gaba a fagen nukiliya, mun sami ci gaba a fagen fasaha ta abubuwan rayuwa, haka nan a fagen fasahar ilimin Nano, haka nan a fagen fasahar makamashi, haka nan a fagen ilimin sararin samaniya da fagen kera na'urori, haka nan a fage mai muhimmanci na ‘ya'yan halittu, haka nan a fagen tagwaita halitta, haka nan a fagen magunguna da sauransu; dukkanin wadannan suna daga cikin ilmummuka na koli na duniya.

translation.en: All of these areas are highly sophisticated fields in the world.
translation.ha: Wasu daga cikin wadannan ilmummuka ma kasashen da suke da su ba su wuce su biyar zuwa goma ba.

translation.en: We have made progress in these areas.
translation.ha: Mun sami ci gaba a wadannan fagage.

translation.en: This was while the doors of transferring knowledge to our country were closed on us on all sides.
translation.ha: Hakan kuwa a daidai lokacin da aka rufe mana dukkanin kofofin samun irin wadannan ilmummuka ne.

translation.en: I read an article which quoted an American newspaper, published two, three days ago.
translation.ha: Ina karanta wata makala da aka nakalto daga wata jaridar kasar Amurka wacce aka buga ta cikin ‘yan kwanaki biyu zuwa ukun da suka gabata.

translation.en: The article said that Iran is an exception in nuclear technology.
translation.ha: Tana cewa Iran dai cikin lamarin nukiliya ta bambanta.

translation.en: China, Pakistan and India achieved nuclear technology with the help of other countries. But where did Iran get this technology? The article says that Iran did not get nuclear technology from a foreign country.
translation.ha: Kasar China ta sami fasahar nukiliya, amma daga ina ta samu, kasar Pakistan ta sami fasahar nukiliya, daga wa ta samu; Indiya ma ta samu, amma daga ina ta samu; Iran kuma daga ina ta samu?

translation.en: These are the things that our enemies are saying.
translation.ha: Wadannan abubuwa ne da makiyan mu suke fadi.

translation.en: The article was published in The Washington Post.
translation.ha: An buga wannan makalar ce a cikin jaridar Washington Post.

translation.en: We also made advances in building infrastructures - and you heard the statistics in this regard. There were advances in building roads, highways, dams, silos and factories and in producing important industrial products such as steel, cement and other such things.
translation.ha: Ci gaba a fagen samar da abubuwan ci gaban kasa - wato wadannan abubuwa da kuka ji su cikin rahoton da aka gabatar - a bangaren kanana da manyan hanyoyi, madatsan ruwa, rumbuna, kamfanonin kere-kere na masana'antu, karafa, siminti da sauransu.

translation.en: Creation of different infrastructures in the country and technical and engineering capabilities in different industries - these are all advances.
translation.ha: An samar da abubuwan gina kasa daban-daban, kwarewa ta fasaha a bangaren masana'antu, dukkanin wadannan ci gaba ne.

translation.en: Today our people, especially our youth, have more self-confidence than 10, 20 years ago.
translation.ha: A yau musamman matasan mu irin dogaro da kan da suke da shi ya fi na shekaru goma zuwa ashirin din da suka gabata.

translation.en: He [one of the people who spoke in the meeting] was right and I know for a fact that in scientific areas our youth are prepared to anything for which we have the necessary infrastructure in the country.
translation.ha: Lalle abin da aka fadi haka yake, ina da masaniya kan hakan; a fagen ilimi, duk wani abin da zai yi tasiri cikin gina kasar nan, to matasan mu a shirye suke su aikata shi.

translation.en: That is to say, there is nothing that our young scientists cannot do, providing we have the necessary infrastructure in the country.
translation.ha: Wato babu wani abin da za mu gaya wa matasan mu cewa lalle ku riki wannan abin su nuna cewa ba za su iya ba, da sharadin cewa ya zamanto na gina kasa ne.

translation.en: Thankfully this is our situation.
translation.ha: Alhamdu lillahi wannan shi ne irin yanayin da muke ciki.

translation.en: A wide range of construction projects have been carried out in the country. These are all advances.
translation.ha: An gudanar da ayyukan ci gaban kasa masu yawa; dukkanin wadannan ci gaba ne.

translation.en: We have had a lot of advances in these areas.
translation.ha: A wannan fagen dai mun sami ci gaba masu yawa.

translation.en: The fourth strength: international prestige.
translation.ha: Abu na hudu cikin abubuwa masu kyau da karfin da muke da shi: shi ne mutumci da daukaka ta kasa da kasa.

translation.en: I do not agree with the idea that today our international situation is bad. Not at all.
translation.ha: Ni dai ban yarda da abin da wasu suke fadi ba na cewa yanayin mu a fagen kasa da kasa yanayi ne mara kyau; ko da wasa.

translation.en: No, today our international situation is very good.
translation.ha: A'a, yanayin mu a fagen kasa da kasa yanayi ne mai kyaun gaske.

translation.en: As far as foreign policy is concerned, today the Islamic Republic has come to be recognized as a respectable, influential and prestigious country in the world.
translation.ha: A yau a cikin lamurran da suka shafi kasa da kasa ana ganin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ne a matsayin wata kasa mai girma, mai tasiri da kuma mutumci.

translation.en: This international dignity - which is the result of certain factors, including presence of the people, public resistance and clear revolutionary slogans shouted by our people and government officials - cannot be undermined by the words and actions of a certain government in a corner of the world.
translation.ha: Wannan daukaka ta kasa da kasa ta samo asali ne daga wadansu abubuwa, da suka hada da kasantuwar mutane a fage, tsayin dakan mutane, rera taken juyin juya halin Musulunci sannan da kuma hadin kai da fahimtar juna da ke tsakanin mutane da jami'an gwamnati.

translation.en: These actions have always been there.
translation.ha: Irin wannan yunkuri na su dai a ko da yaushe ya kasance yana nan.

translation.en: Some people think that if a certain arrogant government in Europe and elsewhere says makes an insulting comment about the Islamic Republic, it means the position of the Islamic Republic has been undermined in the world.
translation.ha: Wasu suna tunanin cewa idan wata kasa ma'abociyar girman kai shin a Turai ne ko kuma a wajen Turai ta fadi wata mummunar magana a kan Jamhuriyar Musulunci, shi kenan hakan yana nufin rauni da girgizar irin matsayin da Jamhuriyar Musulunci take da shi ne, ko da wasa, su din nan a duk lokacin da suka sami dama sun yi abin da za su iya.

translation.en: No, they have done these things whenever they could. They used to do such things even when we used to back down against them.
translation.ha: A wancan lokacin ma da abin bakin ciki muka nuna gazawa a gaban makiya, sun kasance suna aikata irin wadannan abubuwan da suke yi.

translation.en: It is wrong to think that it was our resistance and steadfastness that made them determined in their enmity.
translation.ha: Lamarin ba shi ne cewa a halin yanzu da muka yi tsayin daka, hakan ya sanya su tada jijiyoyin wuya.

translation.en: One day one of the European governments used to express friendship and a tendency to establish relations with Iran. The same government formed a court after the Mykonos restaurant issue and leveled accusations against high-ranking officials of the country. European governments cooperated with it and all of them withdrew their ambassadors out of Tehran.
translation.ha: Haka nan a wani lokaci a baya daya ma an samu wata daga cikin gwamnatocin kasashen Turai da take bayyanar da so da kaunarta ga Jamhuriyar Musulunci; to amma a lokacin da batun kisan gillan hotel din nan na Mykonos (da ya faru a kasar Jamus) ya taso sannan kuma aka kafa wata kotu da kuma zargin manyan jami'an kasar nan da hannu cikin hakan! Nan take kasashen turai suka goyi bayanta, suka kirayi dukkanin jakadun su daga Tehran; dukkanin wadannan abubuwan ba mu mance da su.

translation.en: They received such a strong slap from this Hussayniyyah that a long time later they were still looking for a cure.
translation.ha: Sun fuskanci gagarumar cutarwa daga wannan Husainiyar wanda sun jima suna neman hanyar magance hakan.

translation.en: They tried to give us a slap whenever they could.
translation.ha: A duk lokacin da suka sami dama, suna son cutarwa ne.

translation.en: Whenever we backed down and treated them a little leniently, they got more insolent. No, the resistance of the Islamic Republic and commitment to the slogans and principles of the Revolution have increased our dignity in the world.
translation.ha: Ko da wasa, tsayin dakan Jamhuriyar Musulunci, bayyanar da taken juyin juya halin Musulunci, bayyanar da riko da koyarwar juyin juya halin Musulunci, dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne da suka kara mana irin daukakar da muke da ita a duniya.

translation.en: Thankfully today our international prestige is very good.
translation.ha: A yau alhamdu lillahi irin matsayin da muke da shi a duniya matsayi ne mai kyaun gaske.

translation.en: Conversely, the US government - the bulling enemy which has been openly opposed to us - is the most hated government in Islamic countries.
translation.ha: A daya bangaren kuma, gwamnatin Amurka - wacce makiya ce da a fili take nuna kiyayyarta a gare mu - tana fadin cewa mutumci da matsayin Amurka a kasashen musulmi, a wannan yankin, a kowace rana sai dada faduwa suke yi.

translation.en: Of course if the people of European nations realize that their problems are caused by America and the hegemony of the Zionist regime over their policies, America's popularity will decline far more in Europe and all these actions will be mobilized against America.
translation.ha: Tabbas idan har al'ummomin kasashen Turai suka fahimci cewa matsalar da suke ciki ta samu asali ne daga Amurka da kuma irin ikon da yahudawan sahyoniya suke da shi kan siyasar kasashen su, to kuwa irin wannan kiyayya da ake yi wa Amurka sai ta karu sosai a can sannan kuma za su hada dukkanin karfin su wajen nuna kiyayya ga Amurka.

translation.en: And this is something that will happen in the not so distant future.
translation.ha: Wannan kuwa wani lamari ne da nan gaba kadan zai faru.

translation.en: Another positive point is that there is stability in the country in spite of all these plots and machinations.
translation.ha: Wani lamarin kuma wanda ya ke a fili shi ne lamarin tabbaci da kwanciyar hankali da ake da shi a kasar nan; duk kuwa da irin makirce-makirce da dasisar da ake kullawa.

translation.en: These are our strengths. Of course there are many other strong points as well: being inspirational, creating role models, undermining the power of the enemies on the international front and making the enemy despair of subduing the Revolution.
translation.ha: Dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne masu kyau da muke da su. Ko da yake ko shakka babu akwai wadansu lamurra masu kyau da dama da suka hada da karfin gwuiwa, zama abin koyi, raunin makiyan mu a fagen kasa da kasa da kuma yanke kaunar da makiya suka yi wajen cutar da juyin juya halin Musulunci.

translation.en: Our enemies have despaired of subduing the Islamic Republic in spite of the fact that their methods have grown more complex and their facilities have grown in number - in spite of the Internet, in spite of various kinds of organizations that exist in the world, in spite of the network that has dominated the world. The experiences that we have accumulated in legislation and executive work - these are also brilliant points about the country.
translation.ha: Duk kuwa da cewa hanyoyin da makiyan mu suke bi sun dada zama masu wahalar gaske, sannan kuma irin karfi da kwarewar da suke da su sun karu, abubuwa irin su wannan internet din da sauran abubuwa masu ban mamaki da suke yawo a duniyar nan a halin yanzu - to amma duk da hakan sun gaza wajen cutar da wannan juyin. Kwarewar da muka samu a fagen kafa dokoki, a wajen gudanarwa; wadannan ma suna daga cikin abubuwa masu kyau da ake da su a kasar nan.

translation.en: The population of the country is 75 million.
translation.ha: Adadin mutanen kasar nan ya kai mutane miliyan saba'in da biyar.

translation.en: Of course I would like to take this opportunity to declare that considering the resources we have, I believe our country can accommodate 150 million people.
translation.ha: Lalle ina son a wajen nan in fadi cewa; lalle ni na yi amanna da cewa da irin abubuwan da muke da su a kasar nan, kasar nan za ta iya daukan mutane miliyan dari da hamsin.

translation.en: I believe in population growth.
translation.ha: Lalle ni na yi amanna da yawan al'umma.

translation.en: If we fail to see the weak points and if we fail to identify our weaknesses, we will definitely be harmed.
translation.ha: Matukar dai muka rufe ido kan bangaren raunin da muke da shi sannan kuma muka ki fahimtar hakan, to lalle za mu sha kashi.

translation.en: We have had our own mistakes and weaknesses. We have failed to overcome some of the challenges we have faced.
translation.ha: Muna da kura-kurai, muna da rauni, mun sami nasara a kan wadansu matsaloli da kalubale; wannan wata hakika ce.

translation.en: Even in the case of the threats which are directly posed by the enemy, if are harmed, it is our own fault.
translation.ha: Kai hatta cikin wadannan barazana da makiya suke yi mana kai tsaye, to idan har mun sha kashi to hakan ya samo asali ne daga gazawar da muka nuna.

translation.en: About the Battle of Uhud, the Holy Quran says, "When a misfortune befell you, and you had certainly afflicted (the unbelievers) with twice as much, you began to say: where did this come from?
translation.ha: Dangane da lamarin yakin Uhudu, Alkur'ani mai girma yana fadin cewa: "Shin kuma a lokacin da wata masifa ta same ku, alhali kuwa kun samar da biyunta, kun ce: Daga ina wannan yake?

translation.en: Say: it is from yourselves. Surely Allah has power over all things."
translation.ha: Ka ce: Daga wurin kan ku ne....(6)".

translation.en: [The Holy Quran, 3: 165] That bitter event took place in the Battle of Uhud: the Muslims gained an early victory, but then some people forgot their missions and left their posts to collect spoils.
translation.ha: A lokacin yakin Uhudu, wannan lamari mai bakanta rai ya faru: da farko dai musulmi sun sami nasara, to amma sai wasu daga cikinsu suka yi sako-sako da aikin da aka ba su, su ka bar inda aka ajiye su suka tafi neman tara ganima.

translation.en: And the enemy managed to besiege the forces of Islam and attack them. The enemy managed to kill a number of the Muslims and defeat the Muslim army, forcing the Muslims to seek refuse in the mountains.
translation.ha: Su kuwa makiya suka sami damar ritsawa da rundunar musulmi da maye gurbin da suka bari, inda suka kashe wasu daga cikinsu, su ka sami nasara a kansu, ta yadda hakan ya tilasta wa musulmi gudu da neman mafaka a kan dutse.

translation.en: The holy life of the Prophet (s.w.a.) was put in danger and he was harmed.
translation.ha: Sakamakon hakan rayuwar Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a.) ta kasance cikin hatsari, inda aka cutar da Ma'aiki.

translation.en: Then the Muslims asked why such a thing happened while God had promised them victory.
translation.ha: Daga baya dai musulmi sun ce me ya sa hakan ta faru? Ga shi kuwa Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya yi mana alkawarin nasara.

translation.en: Allah the Exalted says that He kept His promise and gave the Muslims a victory but that it was the Muslims themselves who ruined everything.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya bayyana cewar lalle mun samar muku da nasara, alkawarin Allah dai ta cika, to amma ku da kan ku ne kuka bata lamurran.

translation.en: God says the Muslims harmed the enemy just as the enemy harmed the Muslims: "And you had certainly afflicted (the unbelievers) with twice as much." God tells them not to be surprised. After all, in a battlefield you hurt the enemy and you also get hurt.
translation.ha: Da farko dai idan har makiya sun cutar da ku, to ku ma dai ai kun cutar da makiyan "alhali kuwa kun samar da biyunta" - kada ku yi mamaki; ai a fagen yaki dai akwai cutarwa da kuma cutuwa, akwai dukkaninsu biyun.

translation.en: The Holy Quran says, "Say: it is from yourselves."
translation.ha: Daga nan sai Alkur'ani ya ke fadin cewa: "Daga wurin kan ku ne", wato daga kan ku ne, ku kanku ne kuka yi kuskure.

translation.en: The Holy Quran says that it was the Muslims themselves. It was because of their mistake. We have made mistakes in certain cases and we have failed to fulfill our responsibilities in certain cases, otherwise "Allah has power over all things".
translation.ha: Mun yi kuskure a wasu wajajen "Lalle ne, Allah, a kan dukan kome, Mai ikon yi ne(7)" - a wani wajen kuma ba mu yi abin da ya dace mu yi ba ne; a wani wajen kuma irin sanya idon da ya kamata mu yi ba mu yi ba; hakan ne suke haifar da matsaloli, wajibi ne mu lura da wadannan abubuwan.

translation.en: When people like you and I make our lives aristocratic and luxurious, the people will learn from us.
translation.ha: A lokacin da muka sanya rayuwarmu ni da ku, ta zamanto rayuwa ta almubazzaranci da jin dadi, to kuwa mutane za su koya daga wajen mu.

translation.en: Some people believe that it is necessary to avoid extravagance in life.
translation.ha: Wasu kuma sun yi amanna da cewa wajibi ne a gaza a cikin rayuwa, bai kamata a yi almubazzaranci ba, bai kamata a wuce gona da iri ba; a lokacin da suka kalli cewa ni da ku muna almubazzaranci; za su ce da kyau mu dai ba wai muna sama da wadannan ba ne, su din nan su ne shugabannin mu.

translation.en: Government officials must not turn to a life of luxury, at least as long as they are in a position of responsibility.
translation.ha: Jami'an gwamnati kan, alal akalla tsawon lokacin da suke a wannan matsayin, kada su damu da rayuwa ta jin dadi.

translation.en: Disregarding the spirit of jihad and selflessness, disregarding the enemy's cultural invasion, disregarding the fact that the enemy is lying in ambush, disregarding the enemy's infiltration into the media atmosphere of the country, neglecting our duty to preserve what belongs to the people - these are our shortcomings and weak points.
translation.ha: Gafala daga ruhin jihadi da sadaukarwa, gafala daga kokarin lalata ala'du na al'umma da makiya suke yi, gafala daga tarkon da makiya suka dana, gafala daga irin tasirin da makiya suke da shi cikin kafafen watsa labarai, nuna halin ko in kula cikin baitul mali; to wadannan laifin mu ne, wadannan bangare ne na raunin da muke da shi.

translation.en: The tendency towards tribal behaviors in political and economic arenas is among our other weaknesses.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma shigo da kabilanci cikin fagen siyasa da tattalin arziki suna daga cikin bangarorin rauni da muke da shi.

translation.en: Tribal behavior means that our criticism and approval of a person's action is not affected by the nature of his action, rather it is affected by our relationship with him: a mistake by somebody from our tribe is considered easy to ignore, but the same mistake by somebody from the opposing tribe is considered actionable.
translation.ha: Shigo da kabilanci yana nufin goyon bayan aikin da wani mutum wanda ya fito daga kabilarmu ko kuma muke da alaka da shi; mu rufe ido kan kuskuren da ya yi, to amma idan wani kuma na wata kabilar ta daban ya yi, sai mu ci gaba da bin diddigin lamarin da kuma neman hukumta shi.

translation.en: If somebody from our tribe does a good thing, his action is considered praiseworthy, but this is not true of the same action by a person from another tribe: this is tribal behavior.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma idan wani dan kabilarmu ko kuma wanda muke da alaka da shi ya aikata wani abin kirki, sai a ta yayata shi da kuma girmama shi, amma idan daga wata kabilar ce, a'a.

translation.en: This behavior is not Islamic. It is not revolutionary.
translation.ha: To wannan dai ba dabi'a ce ta Musulunci ba, ba ta juyin juya halin Musulunci ba ce.

translation.en: I do not want to say it is prevalent, but it exists.
translation.ha: Ba wai ina cewa ya kama ko ina ba ne, amma dai akwai shi.

translation.en: Many activities have been undertaken in the economic area, but the issue of employment has not been resolved yet. The issue of inflation has not been resolved. The issue of our culture of labor has not been resolved.
translation.ha: A fagen tattalin arziki ma an gudanar da ayyuka masu yawa sannan kuma masu kima; to amma dai ba a magance matsalar rashin aikin yi ba, ba a magance matsalar faduwar kudi da tsadar kayayyaki ba, ba a magance matsalar al'adar aiki ba, haka nan kuma ba a magance matsalar amfani da sa'oi na aiki ba da kyau ba.

translation.en: The culture of labor should be changed in the country so that people consider work as worship and increase the amount of work they do in a particular period of time.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne al'adar aiki a kasar nan ta zamanto ta yadda mutane za su dinga jin aiki a matsayin wata ibada ce; a dinga gudanar da kowace sa'a ta aiki cikin shauki da kuma gudanar da aikin da ya kamata a yi.

translation.en: It is necessary to work.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a yi aiki.

translation.en: Patience, gratitude, dhikr, benevolence, fairness, lack of persecution, willingness to render services - these things should be promoted in our society on a daily basis.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne hakurin mu, godiyar mu, zikirin mu, kyautatawar mu, mutumta sauran mutane, nesantar mu ga cutar da sauran mutane da kuma kaunar yin hidima ga sauran mutane a kowace rana su zamanto suna kara karfafuwa cikin mutane.

translation.en: We have shortcomings in these areas.
translation.ha: Lalle mun gaza a wannan fagen.

translation.en: The spread of the culture of extravagance and luxurious lifestyles in society and the failure to stop the tendency towards violence among certain people, are harmful.
translation.ha: Muna nuna fina-finan da su kansu wadanda suka shirya su, suna jan kunnen da kuma kaunar ganin an kawo karshen irin wannan amfani da karfi da makamai a cikin al'umma; to amma sai ga shi muna yada irin wadannan fina-finan!

translation.en: These things are harmful.
translation.ha: Wadannan abubuwa ne masu cutarwa.

translation.en: A few years ago I read in an American magazine that certain reform-minded people in America had suggested that the number of Hollywood movies which contain scenes of lust and violence should be gradually decreased and that movies about family values, innocence and noble behavior should be promoted.
translation.ha: A ‘yan shekarun da suka gabata din nan na gani cikin wata mujallar Amurka inda wani mai neman gyara a can yana ba da shawarar cewa a rage yawan irin fina-finan kamfanin Holywood wadanda suke yada zinace-zinace da amfani da karfi, sannan a dinga yada fina-finan iyali da fina-finai na mutumci.

translation.en: They are thinking of reforming their situation, and yet we are learning what they are trying to reform.
translation.ha: Su din nan suna cikin wannan tunanin, to amma sai ga shi mu din nan yanzu ne muke kokarin koya!

translation.en: One of the plots is to corrupt our young generation.
translation.ha: Rashin fada da lalacewar matasa ta hanyar da ta dace wacce kuma ta yi daidai da hankali, shi ma daya ne daga cikin matsalolin da muke fuskanta.

translation.en: So far we have not been successful in confronting this plot.
translation.ha: Mu dai har ya zuwa yanzu ba mu dau hanyar da ta dace ta fada da hakan ba kamar yadda kuma ba mu yi nasara ba.

translation.en: Ideological principles should be presented in an appropriate way - both the principles that are related to Islam and the principles that are related to the Revolution and the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Haka nan batun muggan kwayoyi na masana'antu da yada sha'awa ta jima'i da makamantan hakan. A samar da hanyar da ta dace ta akida, shin akidar Musulunci ne ko kuma wadanda suke da alaka da juyin juya halin Musulunci da tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

translation.en: As I said, strong points increase our hope and they show us our capacities. And weak points show us the priorities and what we should do. Our time is up.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda muka fadi ne, bangaren karfi da abubuwa masu kyau suna kara mana irin fatan da muke da shi ne, su kan nuna mana irin dama da fagagen da muke da su ne; su kuwa bangarorin rauni da muke da su suna nuna mana abubuwan da ya kamata mu fi ba su muhimmanci ne, wato me ya kamata mu aikata.

translation.en: I think it is almost time for adhan.
translation.ha: Dangane da lamurran da suka shafi wannan yankin kuwa; duk da cewa lokaci dai ya ja, ina ganin yanzu dai an kusan kiran salla.

translation.en: Regarding the regional issues I would briefly say that the conditions of the region are developing in the opposite direction of the policies of western powers, America and international Zionism.
translation.ha: A takaice dai ina son fadin cewa yanayin wannan yankin dai a halin yanzu kishiyar siyasar da manyan kasashen yammaci da Amurka da yahudawan sahyoniya na kasa da kasa suke son gudanarwa ne.

translation.en: They imposed sanctions on Iran, but it was they themselves who were caught in an economic crisis.
translation.ha: Sun sanya wa Iran takunkumi, to amma matsalar tattalin arziki ta ritsa da su.

translation.en: They planned - or at least, strengthened - the fitna of the year 1388 in order to overthrow the Islamic Republic, but what happened was that the systems and governments which were dependent on them started to fall one after the other.
translation.ha: Sun karfafa fitinar da ta faru a shekara ta 2009 (bayan zaben shugaban kasa) don cutar da Jamhuriyar Musulunci - ko dai su suka tsara ta ko kuma alal akalla sun goya mata baya da kuma karfafa ta - to amma sai ga shi gwamnatocin da suke a matsayin ‘yan amshin shatansu ne daya bayan daya suke faduwa ko kuma suke ta girgiza.

translation.en: According to their own luminaries, they attacked Iraq and Afghanistan in order to besiege Iran, but it was they themselves who were besieged. They are trapped in a quagmire.
translation.ha: Sun kai hari kan kasashen Iraki da Afghanistan, da nufin killace Iran - manyan su suna fadin cewa sun yi hakan ne don killace Iran, to amma kan su ne suka killace, kafafunsu sun nutse cikin laka da shiga cikin tsaka mai wuya.

translation.en: Allah the Exalted ordained that what happens should be the opposite of what they had planned and implemented against us.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya kaddara akasin abin da suka tsara kan Iran ne, sannan kuma sun gagara cimma abin da suke so.

translation.en: As I pointed out, the recent events in the region are extraordinary.
translation.ha: Dangane da wannan yankin ma dai kamar yadda na fadi abubuwan da suka faru abubuwa ne masu ban mamaki.

translation.en: Currently it is not really possible to calculate the dimensions of what is happening in Egypt, Tunisia, Yemen and some other countries.
translation.ha: A hakikanin gaskiya abubuwan da suka faru a Masar da Tunusiya da Yemen da sauran yankuna lamurra ne da a halin yanzu ba za a iya gano su ba; bangarorinsu suna da girman gaske.

translation.en: Putting Hosni Mubarak in a cage and trying him in a court of law are a very significant event. It is not just a matter of replacing one power and government with another. The issue is far more profound than this.
translation.ha: Gurfanar da wannan mara albarkar (Mubarak tsohon shugaban Masar) na kasar Masar a gaban kotu cikin keji lalle wani lamari ne da ke cike da ma'anoni masu ban mamaki. Lamarin ba wai shi ne cewa an kawar da wata gwamnati ko kuma an kawar da wani mai karfi ba ne sannan wani kuma ya maye gurbinsa ba; lalle lamarin ya fi karfin haka.

translation.en: Today the usurping Zionist regime has been besieged among countries that are motivated to confront it. The events are extraordinary.
translation.ha: A yau haramtacciyar gwamnatin yahudawan sahyoniya tana cikin tsaka mai wuya tsakanin kasashen da suke da kumajin fada da ita.

translation.en: But they have not been successful so far and thanks to the awakening of nations, they will not be successful in the future either - just as the Islamic slogans which were shouted in Egypt ruined their dreams again.
translation.ha: Ko da yake suna ta kokarin su wajen ganin sun dakatar da irin wannan farkawa da take faruwa da mai she ta aljihunsu, amma dai sun gagara kuma da yardar Allah albarkacin wannan farkawar ba za su iya ba. Kamar yadda a halin yanzu aka sake daga wannan taken a kasar Masar wanda ya daga musu hankali.

translation.en: Of course I am concerned about Libya.
translation.ha: Tabbas ni dai ina cikin damuwa dangane da abin da ke gudana a kasar Libiya.

translation.en: In Libya, the policy of the west is very cruel and cunning. They took advantage of the popular uprising. It is very important for them to create a foothold in Libya to remain there.
translation.ha: Siyasar kasashen yammaci a kasar Libiya wata siyasa ce mummuna. Sun yi mummunan amfani da yunkurin al'ummar kasar. A wajen su tabbbatar da ikonsu a kasar Libiya wani lamari ne mai muhimmanci.

translation.en: Fist, the issue of Libyan oil is important to them.
translation.ha: Da farko dai batun man fetur din kasar Libiya wanda yake da muhimmanci a wajen su.

translation.en: Third, they can have control over Egypt and Tunisia: two revolutionary countries.
translation.ha: Na uku sanya ido kan kasashen Masar da Tunusiya; kasashe biyu da aka gudanar da juyin juya hali.

translation.en: Libya is bordered by Egypt on the east and by Tunisia on the west. Moreover, from Libya they can have control over Sudan, Algeria and all other countries of the region.
translation.ha: A gabashin kasar Libiya, Masar tana nan, a yammaci kuwa ga Tunusiya; kamar yadda kuma daga wajen za su iya tabbatar da ikon su kan kasashen Sudan, Aljeriya da dukkanin kasashen wannan yankin.

translation.en: They want to create a firm foothold in Libya.
translation.ha: Suna son rusa wannan kasar ta yadda daga baya idan ba su cimma abin da suke son cimmawa ba, su biyo ta wannan hanyar wajen tabbatar da ikonsu a kasar.

translation.en: These things have to be built again.
translation.ha: Daga baya dai wajibi ne a sake gina su.

translation.en: I am concerned about the issue of Libya.
translation.ha: A saboda wannan yanayin ne na ke cikin damuwa dangnae da kasar Libiya.

translation.en: Dear God, make the holy heart of the Imam of the Age satisfied with us.
translation.ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka faranta ran mai girma Waliyul Asr da mu.

translation.en: Make our life and death serve the cause of Islam.
translation.ha: Ka sanya rayuwar mu da kuma mutuwar mu su zamanto saboda Musulunci da kuma daukaka tafarkin Musulunci.

translation.en: Leader's Message on the Occasion of Pakistan Flood - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Sakon Jagora Ga Al'ummar Musulmi Sakamakon Ambaliyar Ruwar Pakistan

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: The flood disaster in Pakistan which has caused great suffering for our Muslim brothers and sisters in that country is reaching greater proportions every day.
translation.ha: A kowace rana bangarori daban-daban na gagarumin bala'in ambaliyar ruwar da ya fada wa ‘yan'uwa musulmi maza da mata na kasar Pakistan, sai dada bayyana yake yi.

translation.en: This disaster has struck a widespread area, from north of Pakistan to the south, and it has displaced millions of people.
translation.ha: Wannan bala'i ya mamaye mafi yawa daga cikin yankunan arewa da kudancin kasar Pakistan sannan kuma ya sanya miliyoyi mutane cikin halin gudun hijra (da tsaka mai wuya).

translation.en: The large scale of this destructive tragedy has made it extremely difficult to provide aid.
translation.ha: Fadaduwar wannan bala'i mai tada hankali ya sanya hatta kai agaji ya zamanto yana fuskantar matsalolin gaske.

translation.en: The Muslim Pakistani nation is facing this great tragedy at a time when occupying and invading American forces are constantly using baseless pretexts to attack this Muslim country. Honorable Muslim nations,
translation.ha: Al'ummar musulmi na kasar Pakistan suna fuskantar wannan babbar musiba a daidai lokacin da sojojin mamaya da wuce gona da iri na Amurka suke ci gaba da wuce gona da iri kan wannan kasa ta musulmi suna masu fakewa da wasu dalilai marasa tushe.

translation.en: The extent of losses is so great that millions of our Muslim brothers and sisters are in urgent need of food, clothes and shelter. A large part of Pakistan's infrastructures has been destroyed.
translation.ha: Girman hasarar da ta faru ta kai matsayin da baya ga gagarumar bukata ta gaggawa da miliyoyin ‘yan'uwanmu maza da mata da suke da ita na abinci, tufafi da matsuguni, har ila yau kuma wani bangare mai girman gaske na kasar Pakistan ya tafi haka nan.

translation.en: Unfortunately, international organizations have not properly fulfilled their duty to render services to the grief-stricken people of Pakistan.
translation.ha: Abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa cibiyoyin kasa da kasa sun gagara sauke nauyin da ke wuyansu na isar da agaji ga mutanen da ambaliyar ruwar ta ritsa da su, lamarin da shi kansa abin bincikawa ne.

translation.en: Muslim brothers and sisters,
translation.ha: ‘Yan'uwa musulmi maza da mata

translation.en: Whatever the amount of our aid, it is only a small drop compared to the large ocean of the needs of the flood-stricken people of Pakistan. However, in this critical situation, we should rush to the aid of our grief-stricken brothers and sisters on the basis of Islamic brotherhood.
translation.ha: Komai girman irin taimakon da za mu bayar, ya yi kadan idan aka kwatanta da irin gagarumar bukatar da wadanda ambaliyar ruwar ta kasar Pakistan ta ritsa da su suke da ita, to amma a irin wannan yanayi mai hatsarin gaske, bisa la'akari da ‘yan'uwantaka ta Musulunci, wajibi ne mu yi aiki da nauyin da ke wuyanmu wajen taimaka wa wadannan ‘yan'uwa maza da mata.

translation.en: An important point which Islamic governments and international organizations should consider is that they should help the Pakistani government develop and carry out plans to deal with this tragedy, provide aid to the people, and to help cope with the immediate and long-term consequences of this tragedy.
translation.ha: Wani lamarin da ya zama wajibi gwamnatocin kasashen musulmi da cibiyoyin kasa da kasa su lura da shi da kuma ba shi muhimmanci shi ne taimakawa gwamnatin kasar Pakistan wajen yadda za a fuskanci wannan bala'i da yadda za a isar da taimako na gaggawa (da wadanda abin ya shafa), da kuma yadda za a fuskanci sakamako na yanzu da kuma na nan gaba na wannan bala'i.

translation.en: This is the case in as much as providing such large-scale relief operations is problematic for any country facing such an emergency situation.
translation.ha: Saboda ko shakka babu gudanar da ayyukan agaji irin wannan ya kan zamanto mai wahalan gaske ga kowace hukuma da ta sami kanta cikin wannan yanayi na gaggawa da isar da taimako.

translation.en: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Khamenei

translation.en: Ramdan 20, 1431
translation.ha: 20, Ramadhan, 1431

translation.en: Leader's Speech to Participants of 20th International Quran Competitions - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Mahalarta Gasar Alkur'ani Karo Na 28

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on July 5, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution to participants of the 28th International Quran Competitions in Tehran.
translation.ha: Shimfida: A ranar talata 5, Yulin 2011 ce Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da mahalarta gasar karatun Alkur'ani mai girma na kasa da kasa karo na 28 da aka gudanar a nan Tehran. Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran ya yi ne:

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: All praise belongs to Allah and greetings be upon Muhammad and his immaculate household.
translation.ha: Tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata ga (annabi) Muhammadu da Alayensa tsarkaka.

translation.en: I am very happy that Allah the Exalted let me live one more year and gave me another opportunity to attend this pleasant and enjoyable Quranic recitation.
translation.ha: Ina matukar farin ciki da alhamdu lillahi Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya ba mu damar ci gaba da wanzuwa na tsawon shekara guda da kuma samun damar halartar wannan taro mai faranta rai da kuma dadi na Alkur'ani mai girma.

translation.en: I enjoyed the way the dear brothers recited the Holy Quran.
translation.ha: Lalle na ji dadin tilawar da ‘yan'uwa masu girma suka yi.

translation.en: I ask Allah the Exalted to associate all these dear people and all of us with the Holy Quran in the hereafter.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya tayar da dukkanin wadannan ‘yan'uwa masu girma, dukkanin ku da kuma dukkanin mu da Alkur'ani; a duniya mu zamanto tare da Alkur'ani, mu rayu tare da Alkur'ani, mu numfasa da Alkur'ani haka nan kuma a lahira, a ranar tashin kiyama Alkur'ani ya zamanto mai ceton mu; kada ya zamanto mai kuka a kan mu.

translation.en: This is our wish. These international competitions show everybody that the Holy Quran is a unifying factor, the source of unity.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne fatan da muke da shi. Abin da mutum ya ke iya gani cikin wannan gasar karatun Alkur'ani ta kasa da kasa shi ne cewa Alkur'ani wani abu ne mai tattarowa, abu ne mai hada kan (al'umma) waje guda.

translation.en: One of these factors, and perhaps the most important factor, is the Holy Quran.
translation.ha: Mu musulmi muna da abubuwa masu yawa da suke hada mu waje guda, daya daga cikin su wanda kuma mai yiyuwa ya fi su muhimmanci shi ne Alkur'ani.

translation.en: All Muslim nations are humble before the Holy Quran. They want to learn lessons from the Holy Quran.
translation.ha: Dukkanin musulmi, dukkanin al'ummar musulmi sun mika kai ga Alkur'ani; suna son su dau darussa daga cikin Alkur'ani; suna son su kusata kansu da Alkur'ani.

translation.en: This is a very important opportunity.
translation.ha: Wannan wata dama ce mai muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: The enemies of Islam and the Holy Quran have tried to create a rift among Muslim nations. They have tried to divide them.
translation.ha: Makiya Musulunci da makiya Alkur'ani sun yi ta kokari wajen haifar da fitina da rarrabuwan kai tsakanin musulmi, su raba kansu, kai hatta ma a wani lokaci su sanya su fada da juna.

translation.en: This is the result of lack of attention to the Holy Quran.
translation.ha: Hakan ya samo asali ne sakamakon gafala da koyarwar Alkur'ani da aka yi ne.

translation.en: Considering the fact that all Muslim nations accept this heavenly Book - this heavenly Message, this great divine gift - is there any other means of unity which is better than the Holy Quran?
translation.ha: A lokacin da al'ummar musulmi, suka yarda da wannan saukakken littafi, wannan sako na Ubangiji, wannan kyauta ta Ubangiji mai girma, to wani abu ne ya fi hakan a matsayin hanyar hadin kai?

translation.en: All of us should benefit from this spiritual blessing. All of us should make use of this source of divine and Islamic dignity and power.
translation.ha: Wato dukkanin mu mu zauna a kan wannan tabarma ta Ubangiji; dukkanin mu mu amfana da wannan mabubbugar daukaka da karfi na Musulunci da kuma Ubangiji.

translation.en: There are two things that we have ignored. One is the fact that the Holy Quran is the means of Muslim unity.
translation.ha: Akwai gafala guda biyu da muke da su: na farko ita ce gafalar da muka yi daga cewa Alkur'ani wata hanya ce da haduwar musulmi.

translation.en: The second is faith in Quranic concepts and the promises that have been made in the Holy Quran.
translation.ha: Na biyu ita ce gafala daga yarda da ma'anonin Alkur'ani da kuma yarda da alkawarin da Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya yi mana.

translation.en: We should have faith in divine promises. If we have faith in God's promises, then the path to dignity, unity and power will be opened up before the Islamic Ummah.
translation.ha: Matukar muka yarda da alkawarin Allah, to kuwa a wannan lokacin hanyar isa ga daukaka, ga hadin kai, ga samun karfin al'ummar Musulunci za ta budu; al'ummar musulmi za su tsira daga irin ci bayan da suke fuskanta.

translation.en: One example is the verses which were recited in this meeting by the honorable Egyptian qari: "If Allah assists you, then there is none that can overcome you, and if He forsakes you, who is there then that can assist you after Him?"
translation.ha: Wannan aya da a halin yanzu wannan malami mai girma dan kasar Masar ya karanto, wato: "Idan Allah Ya taimake ku, to, babu marinjayi a gare ku" (Suratu Al Imrana 3:160), wato idan har Allah ya taimake ku, to kuwa babu wani karfi da zai yi galaba a kan ku.

translation.en: [The Holy Quran, 3: 160] If God does not assist you, who will? These are brilliant verses.
translation.ha: Kuma idan Ya yarbe ku, to, wane ne wanda ya ke taimakon ku bayanSa (Suratu Al Imrana 3:160), wato idan har Allah ya ki taimaka muku, to wa ye zai taimaka muku kuma?

translation.en: Muslim nations should wave them as a flag and put them up in front of their eyes.
translation.ha: Yana da kyau idan har al'ummomi za su rike hakan da sanya shi a gaban su.

translation.en: If Allah assists you, then there is none that can overcome you.
translation.ha: Idan Allah Ya taimake ku, to, babu marinjayi a gare ku, idan Allah ya taimake ku, babu wani karfi da zai yi galaba a kanku.

translation.en: What should we do to make God assist us?
translation.ha: To wani abu ne za mu yi Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya taimaka mana?

translation.en: This is one issue.
translation.ha: Wannan wata hanya ce.

translation.en: What should we do to benefit from God's assistance?
translation.ha: Wani abu ne za mu yi taimakon Allah ya same mu?

translation.en: The Holy Quran tells us how to do this. "O you who believe, if you help (the cause of) Allah, He will help you and make firm your feet."
translation.ha: Wannan wani abu ne da shi kansa Alkur'ani ya gaya mana shi, inda ya ce: "Idan kuka taimaki Allah, zai taimake ku" (Suratu Muhammad 47:7) "Kuma lalle, hakika, Allah Yana taimakon wanda ya ke taimakon wanda Ya ke taimakonSa (Suratu Hajj 22:40), wato idan kuka taimaki Allah, kuka taimaki addinin Allah, ku ka mike saboda Allah, to kuwa Allah zai taimake ku.

translation.en: [The Holy Quran, 22: 40] If you help God and His religion and if you rise up for the sake of God, He will assist you.
translation.ha: A duk inda wata al'umma ta mike saboda addinin Allah, ta shigo da karfinta fage, to kuwa Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai taimaka mata.

translation.en: We have practical experience in this regard.
translation.ha: Mu dai mun ga misalin hakan a tattare da mu.

translation.en: Surely Allah does not change the condition of a people until they change their own condition.
translation.ha: Mun jarraba cewa "Lalle ne, Allah ba Ya canja abin da yake ga mutane sai sun canja abin da ya ke ga zukatansu" (Suratur Ra'ad 13:11).

translation.en: [The Holy Quran, 13: 11] The Iranian nation tested this verse in action.
translation.ha: Al'ummar Iran dai sun jarraba wannan; sun tabbatar da hakan kuma a aikace.

translation.en: We made some change and Allah the Exalted changed our situation.
translation.ha: Mun samar da sauyi a cikin mu, don haka sai Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya sauya yanayin mu.

translation.en: What is surprising is that if we take one step forward, God will take ten steps for us.
translation.ha: Abin mamakin ma shi ne cewa a lokacin da muka yi taku guda, to kuwa Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya kan yi taku goma ne.

translation.en: We changed ourselves a little and God helped us a lot and changed our situation.
translation.ha: Dan motsi kadan muka yi wajen sauya kan mu, sai Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya taimaka mana, ya sauya yanayin mu.

translation.en: Today we see the same thing in the world.
translation.ha: A yau ma muna ganin hakan a duniya.

translation.en: America did not want these things to happen in Egypt.
translation.ha: Shin Amurka tana son ganin wannan abin da ya faru a Masar din ne?

translation.en: The evil Zionist front, which has influence over all western powers, did not want this to happen.
translation.ha: Shin wadannan lalatattun yahudawan sahyoniyan, wadanda suke da karfi da bakin magana cikin dukkanin masu karfi na kasashen yammaci, suna son ganin wannan abin da ya farun ne?

translation.en: But it happened.
translation.ha: To amma hakan dai ta faru.

translation.en: Why?
translation.ha: Saboda me?

translation.en: Because "If Allah assists you, then there is none that can overcome you."
translation.ha: Saboda "Idan Allah Ya taimake ku, to, babu marinjayi a gare ku".

translation.en: If God helps, all material powers will be ineffective.
translation.ha: Idan har Allah ya taimaka, to kuwa dukkanin wani karfi na duniya sai ya ja gefe.

translation.en: This is how nations should restore their dignity.
translation.ha: Ta haka ne ya kamata al'ummomi za su dawo da daukakar su.

translation.en: And to Allah belongs the might and to His Messenger and to the believers.
translation.ha: Daukaka ta Allah ce da ManzonSa da kuma muminai (Suratul Munafikun 63:8).

translation.en: [The Holy Quran, 63: 8] Dignity belongs to God.
translation.ha: Daukaka ta Allah ce.

translation.en: You exalt whoever You please and abase whoever You please. [The Holy Quran, 3: 26] He is the One who bestows dignity on people.
translation.ha: Kuma kana daukaka wanda Ka ke so, kuma Kana kaskantar da wanda Ka ke so (Suratu Al Imrana 3:26), wato shi ne ya ke bayar da daukaka.

translation.en: You should seek dignity from God.
translation.ha: A saboda haka ku nemi daukaka daga wajen Allah.

translation.en: It is necessary to become familiar with the Holy Quran.
translation.ha: To wajibi ne a fahimci Alkur'ani.

translation.en: It is necessary to have faith in the Holy Quran with all your heart. Superficial faith is not enough.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne mu yi imani da Alkur'ani da dukkanin karfi da zuciyar mu, imani na zahiri bai wadatar ba.

translation.en: Today developing this faith is easier than it used to be.
translation.ha: Yarda da hakan a yau ya fi sauki idan aka kwatanta da shekarun baya.

translation.en: Today there are so many divine signs that faith has become easier because one can see the same thing that Prophet Ibrahim saw. "That my heart may be at ease." [The Holy Quran, 2: 260] One can easily develop this confidence.
translation.ha: A yau, wato a wannan zamani da muke ciki, zamanin da ni da ku din nan muke rayuwa a ciki, akwai ayoyi da bisharori na Ubangiji da yawan gaske wadanda suke saukaka wa zuciyar mutum amincewa; don kuwa suna ganin abin nan da Annabi Ibrahim (a.s) ya fadi inda ya ke cewa: "amma domin zuciyata, ta natsu" (Suratul Bakara 2:260), mutum ya kan sami wannan nitsuwar.

translation.en: This is because the truth is in front of our eyes.
translation.ha: Saboda yana gani da idanuwansa; abubuwa ne da suke a gabannin idanuwanmu.

translation.en: These things are right in front of our eyes.
translation.ha: Wadannan abubuwa ne da muke ganinsu da idanuwanmu.

translation.en: This is the miracle of the Quranic call and the awareness that the Holy Quran has given us.
translation.ha: Wadannan wasu mu'ujizozi ne na Alkur'ani da kuma labarai da masaniyar da Alkur'ani ya ke ba mu.

translation.en: We should preserve these things.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a kiyaye wadannan abubuwa.

translation.en: Of course memorizing the Holy Quran is just a means.
translation.ha: Ko da ya ke hadda wata hanya ce ta isa ga wani abu, ba wai ita ce manufa ba. Haddar Alkur'ani wata hanya ce da mutum zai bi wajen samun saukin karanta Alkur'ani da maimaita shi cikin sauki haka nan kuma da saukin yin tunani.

translation.en: The youth should utilize their talent and their memory. Encourage your children and youth to memorize the Holy Quran.
translation.ha: Yana da kyau matasa su tafi su yi amfani da irin karfin da suke da shi, su yi amfani da kwakwalwarsu ta hadda, haka nan kananan yara ma wajen haddar Alkur'ani.

translation.en: We have made a lot of progress, but this level of progress is not enough.
translation.ha: Ko da ya ke ba za a iya kwatanta yau din nan da lokacin mu da ya gabata ba, lalle mun sami gagarumin ci gaba.

translation.en: When the Holy Quran is memorized, there will be more of an opportunity to reflect on it, and this reflection is the key.
translation.ha: A lokacin da aka haddace, to kuwa a nan ne za a sami karfi da kuma damar yin tunani sosai wanda kuma shi kansa wannan tunanin wani mabudi ne.

translation.en: In any case I would like to welcome all those who have attended these competitions. I hope Allah the Exalted will bestow His blessings on all of you out of respect for the Holy Quran, and I hope He will associate us with the Holy Quran in this world and in the hereafter.
translation.ha: Mabudi na asali shi ne dai wannan tunani cikin Alkur'ani. Ala kulli hal, mu dai muna maraba da dukkanin masu karatu da haddar Alkur'ani na kasar mu da kuma baki 'yan kasashen wajen da suka zo; muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya saukar da albarkokinsa a gare ku albarkacin Alkur'ani, sannan kuma ya tayar da mu a duniya da lahira tare da Alkur'ani.

translation.en: Leader's Message to 19th National Prayer Conference - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Sakon Jagora Ga Taron Tsayar Da Salla Karo Na Sha Tara

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: The creation of an entity called "mosque" - first in Quba and then in Medina - is among the most exquisite and meaningful innovations of Islam at the beginning of the formation of an Islamic community: The house of God and the house of people, the solitude of a close relationship with God and the companionship provided through socializing with people, the center for remembrance of God and spiritual ascension, the center for science, jihad and management of material affairs, the place for worshipping and a center for politics.
translation.ha: Samar da wani lamari mai suna masallaci, da farko a Kuba kana daga baya kuma a Madina, yana daga cikin mafi kyawun sabbin abubuwan da Musulunci ya gabatar tun daga farkon kafa al'ummar Musulunci: (Masallaci wanda ake kiransa da sunan) Dakin Allah da Dakin mutane; (wajen) kadaitaka da debe kewa da Allah da kuma kadaitaka da mutane, cibiyar zikiri da kuma mi'irajin ababe masu kyautata ruhi sannan kuma fagen ilimi da jihadi da tunani na duniya; sansani na ibada da siyasa, cibiyar hada zukata waje guda.

translation.en: These are all interrelated pairs which portray the image of the Islamic mosque and illustrate the gap that exists between the Islamic mosque and worship centers of other religions.
translation.ha: Dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne wadanda suke nuna yanayin masallaci a Musulunci, sannan kuma ya ke nuni da bambancin da masallaci (wajen ibada) na Musulunci yake da shi da sauran wajajen ibadu na sauran addinai.

translation.en: In the Islamic mosque, the enthusiasm and joy of pure worship is mixed with the enthusiasm of a healthy, pure and rational life and brings society closer to its Islamic standard.
translation.ha: A masallacin Musulunci shauki na ibada cikin tsarkin zuciya da kuma tsarkakan ayyuka na rayuwar duniya abubuwa da suke tafiya tare, sannan kuma suke kusata daidaikun mutane da al'umma gaba daya ga tafarkin Musulunci.

translation.en: The mosque is the manifestation of the union of the world and the hereafter and the union of individuals and society in Islamic ideology.
translation.ha: Masallaci alama ce da ke nuni da irin alakar da ke tsakanin duniya da lahira da kuma kulla alaka ta daidaiku da ta al'ummance a mahanga ta Musulunci.

translation.en: Based on this view our hearts beat for mosques and are filled with enthusiasm and sense of responsibility.
translation.ha: Wannan mahanga ce ta sanya zukatanmu suke kaunar masallaci sannan kuma suke cike da shauki da kuma jin nauyi.

translation.en: Today we are not short of individuals - in our mosques - who can present a view of this glorious and impressive image.
translation.ha: A yau din nan masallatanmu cike suke da mutanen da za su iya nuna irin wannan hoto mai kyau da shauki.

translation.en: The presence of our pure-hearted youth and conscious and sympathetic teachers and clergy has truly made mosques the center for remembrance of God, worshipping, thought and knowledge and has evoked beloved and precious memories in our hearts.
translation.ha: Kasantuwar matasa masu tsarkin zuciya da kuma malamai masana masu kishi, lalle za a iya mai da masallaci ya zamanto wata cibiya ta zikiri da ibada da tunani da masaniya da kuma sanya tunawa da ababen kauna cikin zukatanmu.

translation.en: However, before this duty is fulfilled in a perfect manner, none of us can ignore the danger which threatens society, youth, families and future generations as a result of shortage of mosques or the shortcomings which exist in mosques. Nor can we deprive ourselves of the great blessings which Islamic mosques present to society and the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: To amma kafin a cimma wadannan nauyi da aiki da su, babu wani daga cikinmu da zai iya kawar da hatsarin da rashin masallatai ko kuma rauninsu zai haifar ga al'umma da matasa da iyalai da kuma al'ummomi masu zuwa, mu gafala da kuma haramta wa kawukanmu irin albarkoki masu girma da masallaci irin na Musulunci ya ba wa kasarmu da kuma wannan tsari na mu (na Musulunci) da mutanenmu.

translation.en: Construction of mosques and the presence of qualified clergy in them is the most important point.
translation.ha: Batu na farko mai muhimmanci, shi ne gina masallaci da kasantuwar malaman da suka dace a wajen.

translation.en: Currently, despite the existence of thousands of mosques across the country, there is room for thousands more in villages, cities, satellite towns and residential complexes.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu da ake da dubban masallatai a kasar nan, akwai sauran wajaje gina wasu dubban masallatan a kauyuka da garuruwa da karkara da kuma cikin manyan gine-gine da jama'a suke rayuwa a cikinsu.

translation.en: Easy access to mosques is an urgent need for our faithful people, youth and teenagers.
translation.ha: Samun isa ga masallaci cikin sauki yana daga cikin lalurai na muminai da matasanmu.
