translation.ha: Wani bangare na wannan aiki mai girma shi ne wannan abin da kuke yi.

translation.en: You have gathered here from nearly one hundred countries in order to become familiar with the pure teachings of Islam.
translation.ha: Ku din nan da kuka fito daga kimanin kasashen dari (na duniya) don ku sami ilmin addinin Musulunci na hakika mai 'yantarwa.

translation.en: It is not our goal to export the Revolution to this and that country - not in the conventional political sense of the word "export". The Revolution is not something that can be exported through political means or advanced through military and security tools.
translation.ha: Manufar mu ba ita ce fitar da wannan juyin na mu zuwa wannan kasa da wancan kasa kamar yadda aka sani cikin urfi da kuma kamusi na siyasa ba; juyin juya hali ba wani lamari ne da za a iya fitar da shi zuwa wata kasa ta hanyar siyasa ko kuma ta hanyoyi na soji da tsaro ba; wannan kuskure ne.

translation.en: We closed this path since the very beginning.
translation.ha: Tun farko mun rufe wannan hanyar.

translation.en: The aim of the Islamic Republic is to reproduce lofty Islamic teachings so that Muslims feel they have an Islamic identity, so that they become familiar with Islamic teachings which can save humanity, so that they know what Allah the Exalted means when He says He sent a Messenger to remove "from them their burden and the shackles which were upon them".
translation.ha: Batun jamhuriyar Musulunci, lamari ne na samar da masaniya ta koli ta Musulunci, don musulmi su ji cewa suna da mutumci, su ji cewa suna da mutumci na Musulunci, su sami masaniya dangane da koyarwar Musulunci wanda ilimi ne mai 'yantar da bil'adama; su san mece ce ma'anar dalilin da ya sanya Allah Madaukakin Sarki fadin cewa: Mun aiko Annabi ne don "Kuma yana sauke musu nauye-nauyensu, da kukummai wadannan da suka kasance a kansu" (Suratul A'araf 7:157), mece ce ma'anar wadannan sarkoki da suka daure kafafun mutane a cikin al'umma ta shirka wanda kuma Musulunci ya ke son ya tsinka?

translation.en: [The Holy Quran, 7: 157] Due to lack of vigilance, the Islamic Ummah had long forgotten this truth.
translation.ha: Shekara masu tsawo kenan al'ummar musulmi suka mance da wannan hakika sakamakon gafalar da suka yi.

translation.en: The Islamic Ummah can be free, advanced, knowledgeable, glorious and powerful. These things are achievable thanks to Islamic teachings.
translation.ha: Al'ummar musulmi, albarkacin koyarwar Musulunci, tana iya samun 'yanci, tana iya samun ci gaba, tana iya samun ilimi, tana iya zama madaukakiya sannan da kuma zama mai karfi.

translation.en: For 200 years, the arrogant powers and colonial organizations tried to make Muslims erase this concept from their memory.
translation.ha: Ma'abota girman kai da cibiyoyin mulkin mallaka tsawon shekaru dari biyun da suka gabata sun yi iyakacin kokarinsu wajen ganin sun kawar da wadannan ma'anoni daga kwakwalan musulmi.

translation.en: The Revolution helped the Islamic Ummah remember these things.
translation.ha: Juyin Juya Halin Musulunci ya dawo da wadannan abubuwa cikin kwakwalan al'ummar musulmi.

translation.en: Today you have this great opportunity to become familiar with these teachings in the Islamic Republic, in the scientific center of Qom, in the auspicious society of "al-Mustafa". "Why should not then a company from every party from among them go forth that they may apply themselves to obtain understanding in religion , and that they may warn their people when they come back to them that they may be cautious?"
translation.ha: To ku din nan a yau kuna da wannan gagarumar dama ta samun irin wannan masaniya a jamhuriyar Musulunci, a helkwatar ilimi ta Kum, a wannan jami'a mai albarka ta Al-Mustafa; "domin su nemi na addini sannan kuma su yi gargadi ga mutanensu idan sun koma zuwa gare su" (Suratut Tauba 9:122) Ku din nan kuna iya zama fitila wacce za ta dinga haskaka fage. A yau duniyar musulmi tana bukatar hakan.

translation.en: Of course you are living in a foreign country now. Although you should feel at home here, you are away from your relatives, friends and family.
translation.ha: Ko da yake ku din nan kuna rayuwa cikin bakunta ne, duk kuwa da cewa wannan waje gidanku ne, amma dai kun yi nisa da iyalanku da danginku.

translation.en: You have to deal with certain hardships and problems. Your wife and your family have to deal with certain problems, but be patient.
translation.ha: Kuna fuskantar wahalhalu, kuna da matsaloli, ku kanku, matayenku da iyalanku duk kuna da matsaloli; to amma ku yi hakuri.

translation.en: During the early years of his prophethood, the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) was given a few essential guidelines by Allah the Exalted so that he could shoulder that heavy and unique responsibility. Patience was one of these guidelines:
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki a lokacin farko na aiko Annabi (s.a.w.a) ya shata wadansu layuka na asasi a gabansa don Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) ya sami damar iya daukan wannan nauyi mai girma.

translation.en: [The Holy Quran, 74: 1-7]
translation.ha: (Suratul Muddathir 74:1-7).

translation.en: It is necessary to be patient.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a yi hakuri.

translation.en: Patience means being steadfast.
translation.ha: Hakuri na nufin tsayin daka, yana nufin rashin gajiya, yana nufin rashin mika wuya ga wahalhalu.

translation.en: We all face different problems on our path. The important point is that we should not be overwhelmed. And this was a lesson that our magnanimous Imam taught us through his actions.
translation.ha: Wannan wani darasi ne da Imaminmu mai girma ya koya mana shi a aikace; ya yi hakuri A wancan ranar da Imam ya daga muryarsa sama a wannan gari na Kum, babu wanda ya amsa masa wannan kiran in ba 'yan wasu dalibai ba.

translation.en: He was patient.
translation.ha: Ya kasance bako ne.

translation.en: He was alone. The Imam was alone in his own homeland and hometown, but he resisted with patience.
translation.ha: Imam a kasar su ya zama bako, a garin su ya zama bako; to sai dai ya tsaya kyam.

translation.en: They put that great man under different kinds of pressure - both spiritual and material - but he resisted with patience.
translation.ha: Ya fuskanci matsin lamba daban-daban - matsin lamba ta abin duniya da kuma abubuwa na lahira masu kusata mutum da Ubangiji - to amma dai ya tsaya kyam.

translation.en: A believer is like a firm mountain that cannot be shaken by windstorms. None of these windstorms could shake his steely and firm determination.
translation.ha: Mumini tamkar tsayayyen dutse ne, guguwa ba ta girgiza shi babu guda daga cikin irin wadannan guguwa da iskar da suke girgiza wannan tsayayyiyar irada da kuma azama.

translation.en: He resisted. He exuded patience, and others learned patience from him.
translation.ha: Hakurinsa ya bayyana a fili, sannan sauran mutane ma sun koyi hakuri daga wajensa.

translation.en: Thus, other people started to exercise patience.
translation.ha: A saboda haka ne sauran mutane ma suka yi hakuri.

translation.en: And the Iranian nation managed to foil all these machinations through patience.
translation.ha: Su ma al'ummar Iran ta hanyar wannan hakuri ne suka yi nasara a kan dukkanin makirce-makircen da ake kulla musu.

translation.en: You know how many machinations have been designed and how many poisoned daggers have been secretly used against our nation and our government since the victory of the Islamic Republic of Iran up until today.
translation.ha: Ku din nan kun san irin makirci da kulle-kullen da aka kulla wa wannan al'umma da kuma wannan tsarin tun farkon nasarar jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran.

translation.en: The eight-year imposed war was one of the machinations that were designed against us.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin irin wadannan makirce-makircen da aka kulla mana shi ne wannan yaki na shekaru takwas.

translation.en: They imposed an eight-year-long war on us.
translation.ha: Sun kallafa mana yakin shekaru takwas.

translation.en: Today they are creating uproar about sanctions. But sanctions are not new. The Islamic Republic has been under economic sanctions for 30 years.
translation.ha: A yau suna ta maganganu da daga jijiyoyin wuya dangane da batun takunkumi, to ai wannan ba lamari ne na yau ba (ba bakon abu ba ne), shekaru talatin kenan Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran take karkashin takunkumi.

translation.en: The patience and resistance of this nation overcame all those spiteful and hostile actions and all that obstructionism.
translation.ha: Hakurin wannan al'umma, tsayin dakan wannan al'umma, sun sanya ta yin nasara kan dukkanin wadannan makirce-makirce da shaidanci.

translation.en: Today, by Allah's grace, the Islamic Republic is at the peak of its political and security power. Do not forget patience, steadfastness and resistance.
translation.ha: A yau da yardar Allah kuma cikin umurnin Allah Madaukakin Sarki, jamhuriyar Musulunci tana cikin mafi kyawun yanayi a fagen tsayin daka na siyasa da tsaro.

translation.en: This is an important factor that should be taken into consideration by anybody who has plans to achieve lofty goals.
translation.ha: Kada ku mance da hakuri da tsayin daka; wannan wani lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske cikin rayuwar duk wani mutum da yake da wata gagarumar manufa.

translation.en: You are great assets for Islam. Study hard and learn well.
translation.ha: Ku din nan ajiya ce ta Musulunci, ku din nan gagarumar guzuri ne ga Musulunci.

translation.en: Live in the atmosphere created by the Revolution and the Islamic Republic, and return to your country at an appropriate time to transfer these realities to your people through the means of knowledge, patience, ethics, humility and love. Your presence in this country does not have a political purpose.
translation.ha: Ku yi kokarin neman ilimi da kyau; ku numfasa cikin yanayi na juyin juya halin Musulunci da tsarin jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran sannan kuma cikin ikon Allah a duk lokacin da yanayi ya ba da dama ku koma cikin al'ummar ku, ku sanar da su wadannan ilmummukan da kuka samu cikin hakuri da kyawawan halaye da kaskantar da kai da so da kauna.

translation.en: There is a demand for knowledge everywhere.
translation.ha: Ilimi yana da masoya a ko ina.

translation.en: There is a demand for benevolent words and clear knowledge everywhere.
translation.ha: Magana mai kyau da masaniya suna da masoya a ko ina.

translation.en: Imam Ali ibn Musa ar-Ridha (a.s.) told one of his companions, "May God bestow His grace on those who revive our command."
translation.ha: Imam Ali bn Musa al-Ridha (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi) yana gaya wa wani daga cikin sahabbansa cewa: "Allah Ya yi rahama ga bawan da ya raya al'amarinmu".

translation.en: The man asked, "How can your command be revived?"
translation.ha: Wanda ya ruwaito wannan hadisin yana cewa: "Sai na ce masa ya ya za a raya al'amarin na ku?

translation.en: He answered, "By learning our knowledge and teaching it to people."
translation.ha: Sai ya ce: "Ya koyi iliminmu sannan kuma ya sanar da mutane".

translation.en: Then he said, "If people know the virtues of our words, they will obey us."
translation.ha: Saboda idan mutane suka san maganganunmu, lalle za su bi mu

translation.en: There is no need to become angry and complain about this and that. It is enough to learn the teachings of the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) household appropriately and transfer them to other people. These monotheistic teachings, these teachings about the nature of man, these teachings that encompass different issues of human life are by themselves attractive.
translation.ha: Wajen yada ilimin Ahlulbaiti, babu wata bukatar ku buga wannan kofa da wancan kofar; babu wata bukata ta aikata munanan halaye da nuna rashin amincewa kan wannan da wancan; ku tsaya wajen neman ilimin Ahlulbaiti kawai ya wadatar sannan kuma ku sanar da sauran mutane abin da kuka koya din. Wadannan ilmummuka na tauhidi, wadannan ilmummuka na sanin dan'adam, irin wadannan ilimummuka da suka shafi rayuwar bil'adama, shi kansa lamari ne mai jan hankali, lamari ne da ke jan zukata, lamari ne da ke sanya mutum a kan tafarkin Imamai.

translation.en: There is a great opportunity for you here.
translation.ha: To wannan waje (makarantar hauza ta Kum) wata dama ce mai girma a gare ku.

translation.en: You have gathered here from different countries.
translation.ha: (Ku din nan) mutane ne da kuka fito daga kabilu daban-daban, daga kasashe daban-daban, kuka taru a nan.

translation.en: Here each of you has the opportunity to become familiar with your Muslim brothers and their indigenous culture.
translation.ha: Kowane guda daga cikinku yana da wannan dama ta ku hadu da 'ya'uwanku musulmi da samun masaniya kan al'adunsu.

translation.en: Those from Europe can communicate with people from East Asia.
translation.ha: Daga wannan wajen za ku iya kulla tun daga nahiyar turai har zuwa Asiya.

translation.en: Those from Africa can communicate with people from Middle Eastern countries.
translation.ha: Ku din nan kuna iya kulla alaka daga nahiyar Afirka har zuwa kasashen yankin gabas ta tsakiya.

translation.en: Get to know each other.
translation.ha: Ku yi kokari wajen sanin junanku.

translation.en: Try to become familiar with each other's culture, wishes and ideals.
translation.ha: Ku fahimci irin al'adun juna da irin fatan da kuke da shi da manyan manufofinku; ta haka za a iya samar da wata al'umma guda.

translation.en: This is a very great opportunity, which you cannot find somewhere else.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu wannan wata gagarumar dama ce a gare ku. Ba za ku sami irin wannan dama a wani waje na daban ba.

translation.en: An international center has been formed here for Islamic scholarship.
translation.ha: Wata cibiya ta kasa da kasa ta Musulunci ce aka kafa ta a wannan wajen.

translation.en: When you gather in a place and become familiar with each other, an international society is formed for Islamic scholarship.
translation.ha: Za ku iya kafa wata cibiya na kasa da kasa a wannan wajen ta hanyar zama da junanku waje guda, ku dinga numfashi tare da kuma sanin junanku.

translation.en: Make the best of this opportunity.
translation.ha: Lalle ku yi kokarin amfanuwa da kyau da wannan damar.

translation.en: You are young.
translation.ha: Ku din nan matasa ne.

translation.en: The greatest asset that a youth has is his pure and enlightened heart.
translation.ha: Mafi girman jarin matashi shi ne wannan zuciya mai tsarki da yake da ita.

translation.en: My dear ones, make the best of this enlightened heart.
translation.ha: Ya ku abin kauna ta! Ku yi kokarin amfanuwa da wannan zuciya mai haske.

translation.en: Strengthen your relationship with Allah the Exalted.
translation.ha: Ku karfafa alakarku da Allah Madaukakin Sarki.

translation.en: If a youth who is prepared can bring his heart closer to Allah the Exalted through humility, dhikr, solemn prayer and reliance on God, the situation will be the best of the best.
translation.ha: Idan har matashin da yake da irin wannan shiri ya sami damar sanar da zuciyarsa Ubangiji ta hanyar kaskantar da kai da zikiri da tawassuli, to hakan zai zamanto "haske bisa ga haske" a gare shi.

translation.en: The light of divine knowledge will shine on your hearts.
translation.ha: Hasken masaniyar Ubangiji zai haskaka zukatanku.

translation.en: Avoiding sins, developing a close relationship with God and appreciating daily prayers are among the priorities.
translation.ha: Nesantar zunubi, debe kewa da Ubangiji da girmama salla suna daga cikin lamurra masu muhimmanci.

translation.en: Daily prayers are one of the greatest blessings of God.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin manyan ni'imomin Ubangiji ita ce salla.

translation.en: They give us the opportunity every day to ask Him for help, to say that we need Him and to strengthen our devotion through supplication and expressing our dependence on Him.
translation.ha: Salla tana samar da wannan dama ta cewa wajibi ne a kowace rana mu gana da Ubangijinmu, mu yi magana da Allah Madaukakin Sarki, ku nemi taimako daga wajensa, ku gabatar da bukatarku cikin wannan kaskantar da kai.

translation.en: Religious luminaries have always attached a lot of importance to daily prayers.
translation.ha: Manyan bayin Allah da suka gabata su kan ba wa salla gagarumin muhimmanci.

translation.en: No, daily prayers provide us with a great opportunity, and it is necessary to make use of them.
translation.ha: Lamarin ba shi ne kawai mu sauke wani nauyi da ke wuyanmu ba; a'a, wata dama ce mai girma wacce wajibi ne a amfana da ita.

translation.en: According to a narration, daily prayers are like a spring in your home in which you bathe five times a day.
translation.ha: Ana fadin cewa salla tamkar idon ruwa ne da ke gidanku, wanda a kowace rana kuke wanka a cikinsa sau biyar.

translation.en: This bathing can have permanent effects on young hearts.
translation.ha: Irin wannan wankan yana iya yin tasiri mai dawwama cikin zukatan matashi.

translation.en: It is through purity and piety that we can receive effective and incisive language from Allah the Exalted as a gift.
translation.ha: Lalle ta hanyar tsarki da takawa mutum ya kan iya samun kyautar magana mai tasiri cikin zukatan mutane daga wajen Allah Madaukakin Sarki.

translation.en: Our magnanimous Imam's spirituality, his pure nature, his relationship with God and the tears he shed in prayer in the middle of the night were one reason why a single word by our Imam had amazing effects on the general atmosphere of the country in difficult times and in all conditions.
translation.ha: Wani dalilin kuma da ya sanya magana guda ta Imam take yin irin wannan gagarumin tasiri mai ban mamaki a wannan kasar (musamman) a lokacin da ake cikin wata gagarumar matsala shi ne kusacin da Allah da yake da shi da kuma irin hawayen da yake zubarwa a tsakar dare.

translation.en: When the Imam was alive, his son - the Late Hajj Sayyid Ahmad - told me, "When the Imam gets up [to pray] in the middle of the night, he cries so much that ordinary tissues cannot wipe his tears. He has to wipe his tears with a towel."
translation.ha: Dan Imam - marigayi Hajj Sayyid Ahmad - tun ma lokacin Imam yana raye ya taba gaya min cewa: A tsakar dare a lokacin da Imam ya ke tashi, ya kan yi ta kuka ta yadda hatta wannan dan hankacif din nan da ake share hannu da shi ya kan kasa wajen share hawayen da ke zuba masa, har sai ya yi amfani da tawul wajen share hawayensa; ku duba irin wannan hawaye da yake zubarwa.

translation.en: That man of steel was not shaken by the flood of harms and events that were enough to shake a nation. The power and awe of global powers were hollow to that man. But before the greatness of God, he used to shed tears like that when praying and asking God for help.
translation.ha: Ku duba ku ga wannan mutumin wanda abubuwan da suke faruwa cikin rayuwa wadanda suke girgiza wata al'umma amma ko da wasa ba sa girgiza shi. Wannan mutumin da irin girma da iko masu karfi na duniya ba su da wani tasiri a gare shi, amma shi ne wannan mutumin da a gaban girma ta Ubangiji a lokaci da yake addu'a da neman gafara ya ke zubar da irin wannan hawayen.

translation.en: I would like to reiterate that I am very satisfied to have met you dear people.
translation.ha: Ina sake sanar da ku cewa lalle ina cikin farin ciki a yau din nan saboda samun damar ganawa da ku.

translation.en: I deem it necessary to express my sincere gratitude to Mr. A'rafi, the officials in charge of "Jame'at al-Mustafa", the instructors and all those who played a role in this great movement.
translation.ha: Lalle wajibi ne in mika godiya ta ga mai girma Sheikh A'arafi (shugaban jami'ar al-Mustafa ta Kum) da sauran jami'an 'Jami'ar Al-Mustafa' da sauran malamai da sauran mutanen da suke da hannu cikin gudanar da wannan gagarumin aiki.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted will bestow His grace and blessings on all of them, all of you and all those who made a contribution.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin sarki da ya sanya su, ya sanya ku da dukkanin wadanda suka taimaka cikin tausayi da kuma kulawarsa. Wassalamu alaikum wa rahamatullah wa barakatuhu.

translation.en: Leader’s Speech to Students - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Daliban Jami'a

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on August 10, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Republic in a meeting with university students in Tehran.
translation.ha: Shimfida: A ranar laraba 10, Augustan 2011 wacce ta yi daidai da ranar 9 ga watan Ramalana mai alfarma ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da dubban daliban da suka fito daga jami'oi daban-daban na kasar Iran da jami'ansu. Abin da ke tafe fassarar jawabin da Jagoran ya yi musu ne:

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I am thankful to Allah the Exalted from the bottom of my heart who gave me another opportunity in the month of Ramadan to be in the company of you dear, motivated and dynamic youth and to listen to your comments for a few hours.
translation.ha: Ina gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya sake ba ni damar zama cikin ku matasa masu girma, ma'abota nishadi da kumajin aiki a wannan rana na watan Ramalana don sauraren abubuwan da za ku fadi.

translation.en: The points which were raised in this meeting by my dear brothers, sisters and children were exactly the same things that I expected to hear from you dear youth.
translation.ha: Abubuwan da ‘yan'uwa maza da mata ‘ya'yana masu girma suka fadi a wajen nan shi ne dai abubuwan da na ke fatan ji daga bakunanku matasa masu girma.

translation.en: That is to say, I may not agree with certain opinions expressed in such meetings, but the spirit of thinking, making choices and expressing opinions with motivation is the same thing that I wish to see among our youth.
translation.ha: Mai yiyuwa ne ra'ayina ya bambanta da wasu daga cikin abubuwan da aka fadi din, wato mai yiyuwa ne ya zamana ban yarda da abin da aka fadi din ba, to amma ruhin tunani, zaban abubuwa da kuma ruhin bayani shi ne dai abubuwan da muke fatan gani daga wajen matasa.

translation.en: I want you to think, choose on the basis of your thought and have the courage to express your opinion on the basis of your choice.
translation.ha: Mu dai muna son ku yi tunani; sannan kuma bisa wannan tunani na ku, ku bukaci abubuwan da kuke so; sannan kuma bisa wannan bukata ta ku ku sami jaruntakar bayanin abubuwan da kuke so din a fili.

translation.en: But the spirit of thinking, making choices and dynamism are what our youth need today.
translation.ha: To amma dai shi kansa wannan ruhi na neman a aiwatar da wani abu shi ne dai abin da matasan mu na yau suke bukatarsa.

translation.en: I would like to start a discussion about something, but before that, I would like to make a few points about the comments that our friends made in this meeting. I would say the friends spoke very well.
translation.ha: To na dai shirya wani bahasi da nake son gabatarwa, ko da yake mafari ne na wani bahasi wanda zan yi karin haske kansa, to amma kafin hakan zan so in ce wani abu dangane da wasu abubuwa guda biyu zuwa uku da ‘yan'uwa suka fadi.

translation.en: I have written down the main topics that the ladies and gentlemen spoke about.
translation.ha: Na rubuta muhimman abubuwan da ‘yan'uwa maza da mata suka fadi.

translation.en: I have a few things to say about the election, but I will say these things in the future.
translation.ha: Ina da abubuwan fadi dangane da zaben wanda insha Allahu a nan gaba zan fade su.

translation.en: One of the friends reported that a student organization has been formed in order to research economy of resistance.
translation.ha: Wani daga cikin ‘yan'uwa ya sanar da kafa wata cibiya ta daliban jami'a don gudanar da bincike cikin fagen tattalin arziki.

translation.en: Such profound actions are exactly what the country needs.
translation.ha: Irin wadannan ayyuka masu girma su ne irin abubuwan da kasar nan take bukatar su.

translation.en: You should think, study and do research.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne ku yi tunani, ku gudanar da bincike sosai.

translation.en: Your research will definitely benefit yourselves even if it is not good or favorable for the organizations in charge.
translation.ha: Idan ma har wadannan binciken ba su amfani cibiyar da abin ya shafa ba ko kuma bai yi daidai da ayyukansu ba, to ko shakka babu zai amfani ayyukanku sannan kuma zai taimake ku.

translation.en: This is a very interesting thing to do.
translation.ha: Wannan wani aiki ne mai kyaun gaske.

translation.en: Moreover, another friend reported that a research center has been established in Sharif University of Technology and that it is working on such areas.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma wani daga cikin ‘yan'uwan ya sanar da cewa a jami'ar Sharif an kafa wata cibiya ta bincike sannan kuma tana gudanar da ayyukanta a wadannan fagagen.

translation.en: These are very important things to do.
translation.ha: Lalle wadannan ayyuka ne masu muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: The motivation of our young and thinking students is very important for the country.
translation.ha: Irin wadannan kumaji na samartaka na daliban jami'oi masu tunani lamari ne mai matukar muhimmanci ga makomar wannan kasar.

translation.en: Of course some of the solutions which were discussed were completely right.
translation.ha: Tabbas wasu daga cikin hanyoyin magance matsalolin da aka fadi, lalle sun dace.

translation.en: Anyway, it is not the case that our government officials are not concerned about economic issues.
translation.ha: Ala kulli hal lamarin dai ba shi ne cewa jami'ai ba su damu da batutuwan da suka shafi tattalin arzki ba ne.

translation.en: Criticisms were made of certain governmental organizations. There is no doubt that some of these criticisms are valid. I would accept some of the criticisms, but many things that seem possible on an intellectual level are things that are not easy in practice.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu wadansu daga cikin wadannan suka din sun dace, ni ma dai na yarda da hakan; to sai dai kuma a duniyar tunani da nazari mutum yana iya tunani abubuwa da yawa, abubuwa da yawa su kan zo cikin kwakwalwarsa, amma a fagen aiki kan, to aiwatar da wannan aikin ba lamari ne mai sauki ba.

translation.en: Obstacles should be eliminated, but it is not easy to clear all obstacles: sometimes it takes time to do so. It is necessary to pay attention to this point.
translation.ha: To wajibi ne a kawar da wadannan abubuwa masu kawo cikas din; ko da ya ke kawar da su din ba lamari ne mai sauki ba; a wasu lokuta ma suna bukatar lokaci; wajibi ne a yi la'akari da hakan.

translation.en: For example, regarding the regional issues one of the friends said that there has not been enough action.
translation.ha: Dangane da lamurran da suka shafi yankin nan, wani daga cikin ‘yan'uwa ya yi ishara da cewa a matsayin misali ba a yi abin da ya kamata a yi ba.

translation.en: I would tell you that in general this is not the case.
translation.ha: To ni dai a takaice ina son in sanar da ku cewa lalle ba haka lamarin ya ke ba.

translation.en: The general atmosphere inside the country was also good in this regard.
translation.ha: A wannan fagen ma dai yanayin kasar nan yanayi ne mai kyau.

translation.en: The presence of our students in different areas, opinions that are expressed regarding the regional issues - all of these things are helpful.
translation.ha: Kasantuwar daliban jami'a a bangarori daban-daban da bayyanar da ra'ayi dangane da lamurran da ke gudana a wannan yankin, dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne masu taimakawa.

translation.en: These efforts are being continued and by Allah's favor, their scope will grow and improve on a daily basis.
translation.ha: Ana ci gaba da gudanar da wannan aikin kuma da yardar Allah a kowace rana za su ci gaba da girma da kuma fadada.

translation.en: No, certain things are being done and the measures that are being taken are good measures.
translation.ha: Bai kamata a yi zaton cewa babu wani abin da ake yi ba, ana ci gaba da gudanar da ayyuka, kuma ayyuka masu kyau.

translation.en: First of all, what she said was absolutely well-thought-out and accurate.
translation.ha: Da farko dai abin da ta fadi din haka ya ke.

translation.en: These are tried and true facts. This is why I am so sensitive about the issue of humanities. I never said we should not learn the knowledge of westerners who have made a lot of progress over several centuries.
translation.ha: Mu dai ba mu taba cewa kada a koyi irin ilmummukan da kasashen yammaci suke da su a fagage daban-daban na ilmummukan dan'adam da suka samo su tsawon karnoni daban-daban ba, ko kuma kada mu karanta littattafan su ba; abin da mu ke cewa shi ne kada mu zamanto masu koyi ne kawai.

translation.en: This is completely clear to anybody who has read the history of the Renaissance and anybody who has become familiar with the people of that era.
translation.ha: Duk wanda ya karanta tarihin ci gaban ilimi (a Turai) da kuma fahimtar mutanensu a fili zai ga wannan lamarin.

translation.en: There is nothing wrong with benefiting from the kind of psychology, sociology, philosophy, communication sciences and other fields of humanities that have been established or promoted by the west.
translation.ha: Babu wata matsala mu yi amfani da ilmummukan fahimtar dan'adam da al'umma da falsafa da ilummuka na alaka da sauran ilummukan rayuwa da zamantakewa ta dan'adam da kasashen yammaci suka samar ko kuma suka yada su.

translation.en: I have repeatedly said that we do not at all feel ashamed of learning.
translation.ha: A lokuta da dama na sha fadin cewa mu dai ba ma jin kunya ko kaskanci dangane na koyon wani ilimi.

translation.en: We need to learn: both from the west and from the east.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne mu koya, mu koya daga kasashen yammaci, haka nan daga kasashen gabashi, hadisi na cewa: Ku nemi ilimi ko da kuwa a kasar Sin ne(1).

translation.en: We work under a master in order to become a master. Westerners do not want this. This has been the colonial policy of the west since old times.
translation.ha: To wannan shi ne abin da ‘yan kasashen yammacin ba sa so; tun da jimawa wannan ita ce siyasar mulkin mallaka ta kasashen yammaci; suna so ne ya zamana a duniya an sami nuna wariya da bambanci a cikin lamurran da suka shafi ilimi.

translation.en: History is one of the branches of humanities.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin ilummukan rayuwa da zamantakewa ta dan'adam shi ne tarihi.

translation.en: Once again I would like to advise you to read history.
translation.ha: A nan ma dai ina sake kiranku da ku karanta tarihi.

translation.en: Read the history of the era of colonialism in order to see what great violence westerns caused in spite of misleading appearance and their claims of support for human rights.
translation.ha: Ku karanta tarihin lokacin mulkin mallaka, don ku ga irin abubuwan da kasashen yammaci suka aikata a wannan fagen duk kuwa da ikirarin tsari da kare hakkokin bil'adama da sauransu da suke yi.

translation.en: This is not to say they only killed people. They also made a lot of efforts to keep their colonies backward and to deny them the opportunity to make progress in different areas.
translation.ha: Ba wai kawai sun kashe mutane ba ne; sun gudanar da ayyuka masu yawa wajen dakatar da ci gaban al'ummomi da ci gaba da barinsu karkashin mulkin mallakansu.

translation.en: What I am trying to say is that we should learn humanities so that we can produce an indigenous form of humanities and export it to the world.
translation.ha: Mu muna fadin cewa ne mu koyi ilmummukan dan'adam don mu sami damar samar da shi da kuma gabatar da shi ga duniya.

translation.en: Yes, when this happens, then every single person who goes out of our borders will be a source of hope and confidence for us.
translation.ha: Na'am a lokacin da hakan ta faru, to duk wani wanda ya fita daga kan iyakokin mu zai zamanto abin fata da kuma dogaranmu.

translation.en: This is why I say we must not imitate westerners in humanities. This is what I want to say as far as humanities are concerned. One of the friends pointed out that in his letter to Malek al-Ashtar the Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) had told Malek to publicly punish wrong-doers.
translation.ha: Wani daga cikin ‘yan'uwa ya yi ishara da cewa Amirul Muminin (a.s) cikin umurnin da ya ba wa Malik al-Ashtar ya bayyana masa cewa wajibi ne a tona asirin muggan mutane; amma kai kuma (mai maganar yana nufin Jagoran ne) kana cewa kada a tona asirinsu.

translation.en: The Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) did not tell Malek al-Ashtar to disgrace people before their offences had been proven.
translation.ha: To Amirul Muminin (a.s) bai ce a bayyanar da abubuwa (laifuffukan) da ba a riga da an tantance su ba.

translation.en: The Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) never said such a thing and definitely such a recommendation is not Islamic.
translation.ha: Babu inda aka taba samun hakan cikin maganganun Amirul Muminin (a.s), sannan kuma ko shakka babu hakan ba ya cikin koyarwar Musulunci.

translation.en: How can we publicly identify a person by name simply because an accusation has been leveled against him, an accusation that has not been proven?
translation.ha: Ta ya ya za mu bayyanar da abin da ba a riga da an tabbatar da shi ba, daga mujarradin tuhuma kawai?

translation.en: We have no right to publicly identify the accused by name.
translation.ha: Babu wata hujja da muke da ita da za mu fadi hakan.

translation.en: In a meeting with judiciary officials, I went further than this and said that even if a crime has been proven, public identification of the convict should not be the primary course of action.
translation.ha: Hatta ma a wancan zaman da aka yi ishara da ita din (ganawar Jagora da jami'an gwamnatin Iran), na fadi sama da hakan ma.

translation.en: After all, somebody might slip and do something wrong, for which he gets punished, but his family, his children and his parents have not done anything wrong to be disgraced. There is no reason to disgrace their family unless this is done out of concern for the greater good.
translation.ha: Na fadi cewa hatta laifin da aka tabbatar da shi, bai kamata a dinga yayata shi ba, don kuwa mutum guda ne ya aikata wannan laifin kuma za a hukumta shi, amma iyalansa, ‘ya'yansa da iyayensa ba su aikata wani laifi ba; da wani dalili ne za mu bata musu suna da shafa musu kashin kaji? Sai dai idan har akwai wata gagarumar maslaha cikin bayyanar da wannan lamari.

translation.en: Yes, sometimes there is a wisdom to publicly identifying a convicted criminal by name, in which case nothing is wrong with doing so.
translation.ha: Na'am akwai wani lokacin da akwai wata maslaha cikin shi kansa tona asirin cikin wani lamarin da aka tabbatar da shi, to a nan kan babu matsala cikin hakan.

translation.en: This is our logic and there is no narration from the Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) or any other infallible Imam (a.s.) that goes against this logic.
translation.ha: Babu wani abu sabanin hakan da ya fito daga bakin Amirul Muminin (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi) ko kuma daga baki wani daga cikin Imaman Shiriya (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare su).

translation.en: We do not have any right to publicly identify people by name in websites, newspapers or other places simply because they have been accused of something. This is not at all lawful.
translation.ha: Alal hakika ba mu da hakkin mu dinga tuhumar wasu mutane saboda zaton da muke da shi, lalle hakan bai halalta ba. Bai kamata mu yada hakan cikin shafukan internet ko jarida ko kuma wani mimbari na jawabi ba.

translation.en: It is necessary to preserve the dignity of people. I was asked to express my opinion regarding the extent to which the policies specified in Article 44 of the Constitution have been implemented.
translation.ha: Dangane da batun gudanar da siyasar doka ta 44 (dangane da shigo da ‘yan kasuwa cikin harkokin tattalin arzikin kasa), an tambaye ni kan mene ne ra'ayina kan hakan, shin an gudanar da ita ko kuma a'a?

translation.en: Well, I cannot speak in detail in this regard.
translation.ha: Kowane guda daga cikin wadannan bangarori yana da nasa hisabin; to amma idan har kuna son amsa ce ta gaba daya, to a nan zan ce lalle an gudanar da ayyuka masu kyaun gaske a wannan fagen.

translation.en: No, there are shortcomings, but certain things have already been done.
translation.ha: Ala kulli hal akwai gazawa, to amma dai an gudanar da ayyuka.

translation.en: As far as reforming the High Council of Cultural Revolution is concerned, I would say we have done what we were supposed to.
translation.ha: Haka nan dangane da sauyi a majalisar koli ta juyi na al'adu, lalle mun yi aikin da ya wajaba mu yi.

translation.en: It is true that there are special procedures for the High Council of Cultural Revolution.
translation.ha: To hanyoyin amfanuwa da majalisar koli ta juyi na al'adu suna da na su tsarin.

translation.en: One of the dear youth said that if the young generation wants to take on responsibilities, it should step into the arena. I confirm this.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin matasa masu girma ya bayyana cewa a matsayin misali cewa idan har ana son matasa su dauki nauyin gudanar da kasar nan, to wajibi ne su shigo cikin fage.

translation.en: There are some people who have been involved in theoretical work and are scholarly, but they are not prepared to enter the arena of action and deal with operational problems.
translation.ha: Akwai wadansu wadanda sun gudanar da ayyuka na ilimi, suna da ilimin, to amma su dai ba ma su jure wa irin matsalolin da suke tattare da kasantuwa a fage din ba ne.

translation.en: If you do not want other people to walk into you or if you do not want to walk into other people, then you must stay home.
translation.ha: Idan har mutum ba ya so ya buga ko a buge shi, to sai ya yi zamansa a gida.

translation.en: Of course it is possible to stay home or retreat from public life and still do something positive.
translation.ha: Tabbas ana iya zama a cikin gida sannan kuma ana iya tafiya a wani bangare nasa, kuma za a iya aikata ayyuka masu kyau; to amma daga lokacin da mutum ya shigo cikin fage na zamantakewa - shin fagen siyasa ne ko kuma sauran fagage na gudanarwa - to akwai wannan lamari na bugu da bugewa.

translation.en: But who do you think the people you are criticizing are?
translation.ha: To kuna tsammanin su wa kuke suka din?

translation.en: They are yesterday's good youth who worked hard and selflessly and now they are holding a position and doing their responsibilities.
translation.ha: Su ne dai wadannan matasan da suka yi aiki, suka sha wahala, suka yi jihadi, to a halin yanzu sun kai ga wani matsayi na shugabanci sannan kuma suna ci gaba da gudanar da wani aikin.

translation.en: They may make certain mistakes and your criticisms may be fair. But this is the nature of managerial work.
translation.ha: To mai yiyuwa ne ya zamana akwai wani kuskure cikin wannan aiki na su, kuma sukan da kuke yi yana bisa hanya.

translation.en: When you enter the arena of management, the same things will happen to you.
translation.ha: Ku din nan ma a lokacin da kuka shigo fagen shugabanci, to wadannan maganganu suna nan; wani matashin zai zo ya tsaya a nan, ya soki ayyukanku.

translation.en: A young man or lady will come and criticize you.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu kuna sukan cewa me ya sa wani tsoho yake shugabanci, mai ba shi shawara kuma matashi.

translation.en: Currently you complain why the manager is old and his consultant is young.
translation.ha: Kuna cewa ne shugaba ya zama matashi, mai ba da shawara kuma ya zama tsoho.

translation.en: This is while the young consultant is a young student, a young MA or Ph.D. student or a young man who has graduated recently.
translation.ha: Alhali kuwa wannan matashin mai ba da shawara wani dalibin jami'a ne; a matsayin misali dalibin jami'a mai digiri na biyu ko kuma dakta ko kuma bai jima da gama karatunsa ba.

translation.en: And he has not made a mistake, yet he becomes the target of criticisms. If a person is prepared for such things and has such qualifications before entering the arena of action, he or she will definitely get a position of responsibility.
translation.ha: Babu wani laifin da ya aikata, amma dai ana ta sukansa. To lalle akwai bukatar a sami irin wannan kumajin. Mutum ya samar wa kansa irin wannan shiri da kuma kwarewa ga kansa, ya shigo cikin fage, ko shakka babu zai sami irin wannan nauyi na shugabanci.

translation.en: One of the dear brothers who spoke very well in this meeting said in the beginning of his statements that we are working like this so that they realize there are still people who want to work.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin ‘yan'uwan mu mai girma wanda ya yi magana mai kyaun gaske a nan, a farkon maganarsa ya bayyana cewa muna ta gudanar da aiki don a san cewa har ya zuwa yanzu akwai mutane.

translation.en: Do not use the word "still".
translation.ha: Lalle bai kamata a dinga amfani da wannan kalma ta ‘har yanzu' ba.

translation.en: No, there was no such expectation.
translation.ha: Babu irin wannan fatna kuwa.

translation.en: As far as the Revolution is concerned, our expectations are far beyond these things.
translation.ha: Fatan da muke da shi dangane da lamurran da suka shafi juyin juya halin Musulunci, nesa ba kusa ba sun fi wadannan maganganu.

translation.en: Do not say "there are still people...."
translation.ha: Kada ku ce har ya zuwa yanzu akwai mutane.

translation.en: I will start a discussion later on which is partially related to this issue.
translation.ha: Wani bangare na bahasin da zan gabatar ya shafi wannan lamarin ne.

translation.en: It is a very good movement. These were the points I wanted to discuss. I have written down a summary of the comments made by the friends so that I do not forget them later on.
translation.ha: Irin wannan yunkuri na daliban jami'a wani yunkuri ne mai kyau kuma wanda wajibi ne a tabbatar da shi; lalle aiki ne mai kyau gaske. Ina so ne in gabatar da ‘yan wadannan abubuwa. Abubuwan da ‘yan'uwa suka fadi, na rubuta su a takaice don su ci gaba da zama a kwakwalwata.

translation.en: They will be investigated and followed up.
translation.ha: Za a bincika da kuma bin diddigin lamarin.

translation.en: It is wrong to think that these comments will be forgotten.
translation.ha: Bai kamata a yi zaton cewa za a mance da su ba.

translation.en: No, your comments will either be the focus of special attention and work, or they will at least be used to add to our collective knowledge and experience.
translation.ha: A'a, ko dai a jumlace ko kuma a daidaiku za a lura da su da kuma sanya su cikin aiki don alal akalla su taimaka cikin irin kwarewa da bayanan da ake da su.

translation.en: That is to say, none of these statements and opinions will be ignored.
translation.ha: Wato babu ko guda daga cikin wadannan abubuwa da zai tafi haka nan kawai.

translation.en: The next point that I want to raise is in fact the beginning of a discussion. By Allah's favor, you dear youth will follow up this discussion in your meetings.
translation.ha: Abin da ne ke son fadi, a hakikanin gaskiya wani mafari ne na wani bahasi, wanda cikin yardar Allah ku din nan matasa sai ku ci gaba da bin diddiginsa.

translation.en: Over the past 6, 7 months, I referred to the stability of the Islamic Republic and the Revolution in several speeches.
translation.ha: A yau ina so ne in kara haske kan batun tabbaci da tsayuwar juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma fadada shi.

translation.en: Of course what happens is the result of certain conditions in which the revolutionary generation lives, conditions that did not exist for previous generations. The Islamic Revolution is a case in point.
translation.ha: Wata zuriya ta al'umma ce ta samar da shi, ko da yake hakan ya dogara ne da wani irin yanayi da aka samar, wanda al'ummomin da suka gabata ba su sami irin sa ba; irin juyin juya halin Musulunci.

translation.en: They come to suffer from stagnation and deviation, in which case the transformation fails to benefit the people the way it should, but the damage that has been caused by the transformation remains for the people and it is not possible to make up for the damage.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin wadannan yanayi guda biyu ne dai zai bayyana: ko dai a lokacin da wannan al'umma ta samar da wannan sauyi, ya zamana al'ummomi masu zuwa su ci gaba da bin diddiginsa, su ci gaba da binsa da kammala shi da kuma ci gaba da riko da shi.

translation.en: I carefully studied the developments that have happened over the past 2 or 3 centuries - during which great revolutions have taken place - but I did not find a single case like the Islamic Revolution. I advise you to study the history of the same era: you may find a similar case.
translation.ha: Cikin sauye-sauye da aka samu tsawon karnoni biyu zuwa ukun da suka gabata wanda karni ne na juye-juyen hali masu girma, duk inda na duba - kuna iya bincikawa mai yiyuwa ne ku sami wani abu - amma dai ni duk yadda na dubi lamarin ban ga wani abu kamar juyin juya halin Musulunci ba wanda yanayinsa na farko ya ci gaba da kasantuwa har shekara da shekaru, haka ya kasance, haka manufarsa ta kasance, sannan kuma juyin yana ci gaba da bin hanyar cimma wannan manufar.

translation.en: They either did not continue at all, like the Russian Revolution, or they continued but with a considerable time lapse and with many hardships, like the French Revolution or the movement that led to America's independence, which might or might not be called a revolution.
translation.ha: (Sauran juyi) Ko dai bai ba su ci gaba da wanzuwa ba, a matsayin misali juyin juya halin tarayyar sobiyeti; ko kuma ya ci gaba da wanzuwar na wani lokaci mai tsawo tare da matsaloli da wahalhalu masu yawan gaske (misalin hakan) irin su babban juyin juya halin kasar Faransa, irin juyin juya halin Amurka; muna iya kiransu da juyin juya hali ko kuma koma dai mene ne.

translation.en: The initial goals were finally reached in one way or another, but with a lot of efforts and with a considerable time lapse.
translation.ha: Daga karshe dai an tabbatar da wadannan manufofi na farko ta wata hanya, amma bayan wahalhalu masu yawa da kuma tsawon lokaci.

translation.en: For example, the Great French Revolution has been called "great" because after this revolution two or three other revolutions happened in France over the next 50, 60 years, but the initial revolution was more important and more significant which was carried out in the year 1789 against the French monarchy, the same thing that happened in Iran.
translation.ha: A matsayin misali a wannan babban juyin juya hali na kasar Faransa, suna kiransa da babba saboda bayan wannan juyin an samu faruwar wasu juye-juyen guda biyu zuwa uku a tsawon shekaru hamsin zuwa sittin a kasar Faransan; to sai dai wannan juyi na farkon shi ne juyi mafi muhimmanci da kuma tasiri wanda ya faru a shekarar 1789 don tinkarar mulkin sarakuna a kasar Faransan; wato irin wannan abin da ya faru a kasar Iran.

translation.en: Of course the royal family that was ruling France at that time was far more established and powerful than the pathetic Pahlavi family. They were the Bourbons.
translation.ha: Ko da yake sarakunan da suke mulki a Faransa a wancan lokacin, sun fi kama kasa sosai sama da wadannan ‘ya'yan gidan sarautar Pahlawi na nan.

translation.en: They had ruled France for several hundred years and there were very powerful rulers among them.
translation.ha: Shekaru daruruwa suka yi suna mulki a kasar Faransa, daga cikin su akwai sarakuna masu karfin gaske.

translation.en: As I said the French Revolution happened in the year 1789.
translation.ha: To wannan juyin ya faru ne a wancan shekarar da na fadi wato ta 1789 miladiyya.

translation.en: The French Revolution was a popular revolution in the real sense of the word. That is to say, the people were present in it, just like our own Revolution. The leaders were also purely populist leaders with new ideas and they were after establishing a society pivoted on the role of the people.
translation.ha: To juyi ne dai na al'umma da dukkanin ma'anar kalma; wato a hakikanin gaskiya mutane sun kasance a fage - kamar irin juyin juya halin mu - jagororinsa ma dai jagorori ne da suke da alaka da mutane dari bisa dari sannan kuma suna da sabbin tunani sannan kuma suna kokarin samar da wata kasa ce ta al'umma.

translation.en: Of course what they had in mind was not ideological, but they wanted to have a populist government. They wanted to have a democratic government.
translation.ha: Ko da yake abin da suke son tabbatarwa ba wani lamari ne da ke da alaka da wata akida ba; suna so ne su tabbatar da hukuma ta mutane, suna son su kafa wata gwamnati ce ta mutane.

translation.en: The revolution took place in the year 1789.
translation.ha: To a wannan shekarar ne dai wannan juyi ya faru.

translation.en: In only 3, 4 years, the first group that had carried out the revolution was sidelined by an extremist group. Some of the revolutionaries were executed and the extremist group rose to power.
translation.ha: Bayan gushewar shekaru uku zuwa hudu wadansu masu tsaurin ra'ayi suka kawar da kungiya ta farko ta jagororin wannan juyin; aka kashe wasu daga cikinsu sannan su kuma suka dare karagar mulki.

translation.en: Then the people reacted and remove them from power because of the radical way in which they treated the people.
translation.ha: Shekaru hudu zuwa biyar wadannan masu tsaurin ra'ayi suka yi a kan karagar mulki; daga baya sakamakon irin abubuwan da suka yi wa mutane, mutane suka fatattake su.

translation.en: Some of them were executed and a third group came to power.
translation.ha: Aka kashe wasu daga cikinsu sannan wata jama'a kuma ta uku ta dare karagar mulkin.

translation.en: That is to say, three different groups of people came to power in 11, 12 years and each new group eliminated members of the previous group.
translation.ha: Wato tsawon shekaru sha daya zuwa sha biyu - wato zuwa shekara ta 1800 - kungiyoyi uku na jama'a sun yi mulki wanda kowace guda daga cikinsu ta kawar da wadda ta gabace shi ne.

translation.en: Over the first 10, 11 years, famous political figures from different revolutionary groups were executed.
translation.ha: Tsawon wadannan shekaru sha daya zuwa sha biyu na farko, an kashe sanannun ‘yan siyasa na cikin wannan juyin.

translation.en: Later on the chaos that resulted from these events - it is obvious that chaos would be created in such a country - exhausted the people's patience. In the end, a group with three members was formed and Napoleon was one of the members. He was a young army officer who had made certain achievements in Egypt.
translation.ha: Daga baya kuma wannan rikicin da ya kunno kai - a fili ya ke cewa a kasa irin wannan da take da irin wadannan siffofi rikici zai iya kunno kai - sun gajiyar da mutane; har zuwa lokacin da aka kafa wata kungiya ta mutane uku wanda Napoleon yana daga cikin wadannan mutane ukun; wani jami'in soji ne saurayi wanda ya kasance a Masar - labarin hakan dai ya yadu ko ina - ya sami matsayi don haka ya zo ya kasance a saman wannan kungiya ta mutane uku daga baya kuma ya zamanto sarki dan mulkin kama-karya.

translation.en: The country that had suffered all those losses in order to remove a king from power, the country that had executed King Louis XVI and his wife turned back into a monarchy after Napoleon.
translation.ha: Wannan kasar da ta fuskanci dukkanin irin wannan hasarar, ta kawar da sarauta daga karagar mulki sannan kuma suka rataye sarki Louis na sha shida da matarsa, sai ga shi an sake mai she ta mulkin sarauta da hanyar mulkin Napoleon.

translation.en: Of course Napoleon was an active and powerful military leader and he did great things for France.
translation.ha: Na'am Napoleon ya kasance wani soja ne mai karfi sannan kuma ya aikata ayyuka masu girma ga kasar Faransa.

translation.en: He had non-military achievements as well, but his achievements were mostly military achievements.
translation.ha: Yana da ayyuka wadanda ba na soji ba, to sai dai kuma mafi yawan ayyukansa na soji ne.

translation.en: He annexed several European countries to France. He annexed Italy, Spain and Switzerland to France.
translation.ha: Ya shigo da wasu kasashen turai zuwa cikin Faransa; ya mayar da kasashe irin su Italiya, Spain, Swiss suka zamanto wani bangare na Faransa.

translation.en: He conquered several European countries and annexed them to France.
translation.ha: Ya sami nasara kan wasu daga cikin kasashen Turai da mai she su karkashin ikon Faransa; ko da ya ke bayan gushewar Napoleon daya baya daya sun rabu da Faransan, wato wadannan nasarori da ya samu ba su tabbata ba.

translation.en: After Napoleon's exile and death, monarchy remained the system of government in France for around 50 years - that is to say, until around the year 1815. Of course there were very difficult and bitter upheavals. If you read 19th century French novels, including the books of Victor Hugo, Balzac and others, you will clearly see the signs of the upheavals and the hardships and bitterness that the people of France went through.
translation.ha: Bayan korar Napoleon da mutuwarsa - wato a kimanin shekarar 1815 - hukumar sarakuna ta yi kimanin shekaru hamsin tana iko a kasar Faransa cikin yanayi mai tsanani, ta yadda idan har kuka karanta littafan labarun karni na sha tara na kasar Faransa, a fili za ku ga alamun irin wadannan juyi da irin wadannan wahalhalu da bala'oi da suka faru a kan mutanen Faransa; daga cikin su kuwa akwai littafan Bictor Hugo da Balzac da sauransu.

translation.en: A republican government came to power. Later on the republic changed as well. There was the French First Republic, the Second Republic, the Third Republic and so on until the country turned into what is known today as France, which is a democracy.
translation.ha: Ko da yake bayan shekarar 1860 da wani abu, an sake samun faruwar wani juyin da ya kawar da ‘ya'yan gidan sarautar Napoleon - Napoleon na uku - da kuma kafa hukuma ta jamhuriya; ko da yake wadannan jamhuriyoyi ma sun sami sauyi: jamhuriya ta farko, jamhuriya ta biyu, jamhuriya ta uku har zuwa ga yau din nan yadda kuke ganin kasar Faransa take a yau.

translation.en: The French Revolution had to face all those hardships.
translation.ha: Haka juyin juya halin kasar Faransa ya fuskanci irin wadannan matsaloli; wato tun farkon bayyanarsa ya sami damar bayyanar da kansa cikin mutane da kuma samun matsayi, ya ci gaba da kasantuwa.

translation.en: The same things happened in America. The American Revolution - namely, America's liberation from the British government - took place 5, 6 years before the French Revolution, around 1782.
translation.ha: Juyin juya halin Amurka - wato abin da ake kiran ‘yantar da Amurka daga hannun Birtaniya - ya faru ne shekaru biyar zuwa shida kafin juyin juya halin Faransa; wato ya faru ne kimanin shekarar 1782.

translation.en: Of course America's population was not more than 4, 5 million at that time.
translation.ha: Ko da yake a wancan lokacin mutanen Amurkan ba su wuce mutane miliyan hudu zuwa biyar ba.

translation.en: Certain figures - such as the famous George Washington and others - came to power, but the same things that happened to the French Revolution happened to the American Revolution as well.
translation.ha: Sun yunkura, suka kafa wata gwamnati, wasu mutane suka dare karagar mulki - a matsayin misali wannan sanannen mutumin George Washington da sauransu - to sai dai su ma kamar hakan ne.

translation.en: After the initial movement had been carried out, the American nation went through a lot of hardships.
translation.ha: Bayan wannan yunkuri na farko da suka yi, al'ummar Amurka sun wahala sannan kuma sun fuskanci yakukuwan basasa masu ban mamaki, wanda a daya daga cikin wadannan yakukuwa na basasan - wanda mafi muhimmancinsa shi ne yaki tsakanin arewa da kudanci; wato alal hakika tsakanin arewa maso gabashi da kudu maso gabashi; don kuwa a lokacin yammacin Amurkan bai jima da shiga cikin kasar ba - tsawon wadannan shekaru hudun alal akalla mutane miliyan guda ne aka kashe.

translation.en: Of course accurate statistics did not exist at that time. The statistic is based on the estimates of those who have spoken or written in this regard. Finally after the passage of around 100 years since America's independence, the American government gradually became established and managed to continue its movement on the original path.
translation.ha: Ko da yake a wancan lokacin ma dai ba a rubuta adadin ba; wannan wani abu ne da wadanda suka yi rubutu kan hakan su ke fadi. Har zuwa lokacin da daga karshe dai a hankali a hankali bayan gushewar kimanin shekaru dari daga ‘yancin Amurka, kafin gwamnatin ta dan sami wani kwanciyar hankali da kuma samun damar ci gaba da tafiyar da take yi kamar yadda ta kasance tana yi a baya.

translation.en: Of course the crimes that were committed and the tragedies that were caused by the rulers and their armies are a long sad story: attacking the neighboring countries and massacre of Native Americans.
translation.ha: Tabbas irin danyen aikin da aka aikata, irin munanan abubuwan da masu mulki da na kurkusa da su da kuma sojojin su suka aikata, lalle abubuwa ne masu sosa rai sosai da kuma ban mamaki: da suka hada da kai hari kan kasashen makwabta, wuce gona da iri kan ‘yan asalin kasar - wato jajayen Indiyoyi - da kuma irin dirkar mikiyan da aka yi wa jajayen indiyoyin.

translation.en: I am sorry that our youth do not know about these events.
translation.ha: Lalle ni ina bakin cikin cewa matasan mu ba su san wadannan abubuwa ba.

translation.en: When a person knows that the civilization, progress and wealth of certain countries is the result of a large amount of vandalism, misconduct, brutality and injustice in the past, he will gain a new perspective on what he has to do and on the duties he must fulfill.
translation.ha: A lokacin da mutum ya fahimci cewa an samu irin wannan dukiya da ci gaban da ake ganinsu a wasu irin wadannan kasashe ne sakamakon irin wannan danyen aiki da rashin adalci, to kuwa mutum zai sake dubi cikin ayyukan da ya kamata ya aikata da kuma irin nauyin da ke wuyansa.

translation.en: The same things happened in the Soviet Union in another form.
translation.ha: A tarayyar Sobiyeti ma wani lamari makamancin hakan ne ya faru.

translation.en: The goals that had been specified in the Soviet Union were not fulfilled. The goals were ideological in nature.
translation.ha: A tarayyar Sobiyetin an tsara wasu manufofi da ake son cimmawa - wadanda manufofi ne da suke da alaka da akida - to amma ba a cimma su ba.

translation.en: It had been claimed that the Soviet government was a populist government - a socialist government, a government founded on the people and committed to fulfilling their needs. These principles were violated from the early years.
translation.ha: Tun da farko dai an yi da'awar cewa hukumar kwaminisancin wata hukuma ce ta mutane, hukuma ta al'umma, ta gurguzu. Hukuma ta al'umma wacce ta ginu bisa yunkuri na al'umma da kuma biyan bukatun mutane; to amma tun a shekarun farko-farko aka yi watsi da hakan.

translation.en: After the Russian Revolution took place in the year 1917, the path of the revolution changed in 5, 6 years. The people were eliminated from government calculations in the real sense of the word. A communist party with millions of members came to power, and within the party power belonged to the few individuals who were at the highest levels of the party.
translation.ha: Bayan shekarar 1917 wadda ita ce shekarar juyin juya halin tarayyar Sobiyetin, bayan shekaru biyar zuwa shida aka sauya hanyar da ake kai; aka yi watsi da mutane cikin gudanarwa ta hakika; wata jam'iyya ta ‘yan kwaminis mai miliyoyin membobi ta dare karagar mulki, a wannan jam'iyyar ma wasu ‘yan mutane ne suke mulki kuma a kowane lokaci su ne suke ci gaba da mulkin.

translation.en: During certain eras such as the Stalin era, power was in the hands of only one person. However, later on the central board of the communist party had control over everything in the country.
translation.ha: To a matsayin misali lokacin mulkin Stalin, kusan ana iya cewa mutum guda ne ma yake mulkin, amma zamunnan da suka biyo baya, wannan kwamiti da kungiya ta asali ta jam'iyyar kwaminis din su ne suke mulki.

translation.en: Some of these writings used to be translated into Farsi and I used to read them.
translation.ha: A wancan lokacin an rubuta littafa da dama wasu daga cikin su ma an fassara su cikin harshen Farisanci, mun karanta su.

translation.en: Before the collapse of the Soviet Union many of these bitter and unpleasant dimensions were kept hidden.
translation.ha: Har zuwa kafin faduwar tarayyar Sobiyeti, mafi yawa daga cikin wadannan abubuwa na ban takaici sun kasance a boye ne; bayan faduwar tarayyar Sobiyetin ne da dama daga cikin abubuwa suka fito fili, aka fahimci irin abubuwan da suke yi da kuma irin takura mutane da suke yi.

translation.en: That is to say, the revolution was totally derailed from the beginning.
translation.ha: Wato wannan juyi dai tun da farko ya kama wata hanyar, ba wai bai ci gaba da wanzuwa ba ne, a'a bai cika alkawarin farko da ya dauka ba ne.

translation.en: Of course there were also certain pseudo-revolutions in the Middle East region and mostly in North Africa and Latin America, which were not genuine revolutions.
translation.ha: Mun shaidi wasu yunkuri makamantan juyin juya hali da suka faru a yankin gabas ta tsakiya da kuma arewacin Afirka da Latin Amurka wadanda alal hakika ba wai juyin juya hali ba ne; a mafi yawan lokuta juyin mulki ne.

translation.en: In the late 1950s and early 1960s a leftist revolutionary movement was started in North African countries - namely, Egypt, Libya, Sudan and Tunisia.
translation.ha: A karshe-karhsen shekarun 1950 da kuma farko-farkon shekarun 1960 a kasashen arewacin Afrika - wato Masar da Libiya da Sudan da Tunusiya - an samu faruwar wasu juyin juya hali masu akidar gurguzu.

translation.en: All these countries became revolutionary.
translation.ha: Dukkanin wadannan kasashe, kasashe ne na juyi; amma in ban da wasu ‘yan kadan, su kansu wadannan mutanen da suka kaddamar da wannan juyin, sun kauce wa tafarkin juyin.

translation.en: One of these people was Tunisia's Bourguiba.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin su shi ne dai wannan Bourguiban na kasar Tunusiya.

translation.en: Similarly, in Egypt, Anwar Sadat was one of the supporters of Gamal Abdel Nasser. He was among the people who had carried out the coup or what they called "Free Officers Movement". Basically, during the time of Gamal Abdel Nasser, the Free Officers Movement had been started with the goal of liberating Palestine.
translation.ha: Ko kuma a kasar Masar, Anwar Sadat ya kasance daga cikin mabiyan Jamal Abdun Nasir; yana daga cikin jami'an sojin da suka yi juyin mulki ko kuma abin da suke kira juyin juya halin ‘yantattun jami'an soji; wannan yunkuri na ‘yantattun sojoji a lokacin Jamal Abdun Nasir ya ginu ne bisa taken "'Yanto Palastinu"; to amma daga baya dai lamari ya kai su ga yin sulhu da ‘yan fashin Palastinun, da kulla makirci a kan al'ummar Palastinu.

translation.en: Finally, a few years ago, they even cooperated with the Zionists to put a siege on Gaza and to eliminate the people of Palestine.
translation.ha: A baya bayan nan kan lamarin ma ya kai su ga hada baki da kulla makirci da yahudawan sahyoniya wajen killace Palastinawa, wajen killace Gaza, wajen gamawa da al'ummar Palastinu.

translation.en: That is to say, the original movement made a complete U-turn.
translation.ha: Wato sun juya baya dari bisa dari daga manufarsu ta farko.

translation.en: The same thing happened in Sudan.
translation.ha: Ko kuma a Sudan.

translation.en: I do not think you remember Nimeiry.
translation.ha: Ina tsammanin ba za ku iya tuna (Ja'afar) Numeiri.

translation.en: I remember the time when he obtained his first official position. He was a revolutionary officer who actually saved Sudan from the clutches of the west.
translation.ha: Numeiri ya kasance wani jami'in soji ma'abocin juyi ne wanda alal hakika ya ‘yantar da Sudan daga hannun ‘yan kasashen yammaci; amma shi kansa wannan Numeirin a sannun a hankali sai ya sake komawa wajen kasashen yammaci, ya zamanto wani dan amshin shatan kasashen yammaci; ta yadda ma'abota juyin da suka biyo baya wadanda su ne a kan karagar mulkin yanzu suka yunkura da kawar da shi daga karagar mulki.

translation.en: Jaafar Nimeiry gradually changed from an anti-west element who had carried out a coup against his pro-western government to a western puppet and mercenary.
translation.ha: Ja'afar Numeiri ya kasance wani mutum mai kyamar yammaci wanda ya yi juyin mulki ga wata hukuma ta yammaci, amma daga baya ya zamanto wani yaron kasashen yammaci kuma dan amshin shatansu.

translation.en: The same is true of the others.
translation.ha: Su ma sauran haka suka kasance.

translation.en: I remember that during the 1340s when Gamal Abdel Nasser was in office, we used to tune in to the Egyptian radio station "Sawt al-Arab" in the city of Mashhad.
translation.ha: Ni dai ina iya tunawa a shekarun 1340 hijira shamsiyya (1961-62) a garin Mashhad, mun kasance muna kama radiyo sautin larabawa na Masar - wanda ya kasance a lokacin Abdun Nasir - muna saurare.

translation.en: Gamal Abdel Nasser had travelled to Libya and he delivered a speech on Sawt al-Arab along with Jaafar Nimeiry and Muammar Gaddafi - who was a young man in his late twenties and had just carried out a coup.
translation.ha: Jamal Abdun Nasir ya tafi kasar Libiya, sannan kuma tare da wannan Gaddafin - wanda a wancan lokacin wani matashi ne dan shekaru ashirin da takwas zuwa da tara ya yi juyin mulki - da kuma wannan Ja'afar Numeirin dukkaninsu suna jawabi a wannan gidan radiyon na muryar Larabawa.

translation.en: They used to get together and make radical revolutionary statements.
translation.ha: Dukkaninsu sun taru suna ta fadin kalmomin juyi masu tsanani.

translation.en: Even Gaddafi used to invent slogans that filled us with excitement at that time. We were engaged in revolutionary activities and it was illegal to listen to the Egyptian radio station.
translation.ha: Wannan Gaddafin yana ta fadin wadansu kalmomi wadanda a lokacin suke caza mu. A wancan lokacin mun kasance cikin gwagwarmaya. Kama wannan radiyon ya saba wa doka.

translation.en: We used to gather in a house at night: one of my friends had a radio and we used to use it to listen to Sawt al-Arab.
translation.ha: Ni da wasu abokaina - wanda daya daga cikin mu yana da radiyo - da dare mukan tafi wani gida mu zauna muna sauraren wannan radiyon na muryar larabawa.

translation.en: This was what the movements were like. That is to say, due to different reasons, revolutions deviated from the original path at the beginning or later on.
translation.ha: Haka wadannan yunkurin suka kasance. Wato juye-juyen halin da suka bayyana saboda wasu dalilai mabambanta ko dai tun daga ranakun farko-farko suka kauce wa hanya, ko kuma bayan wani lokaci kadan suka kauce wa tafarkin da suke kai.

translation.en: In certain cases this deviation lasted more than several decades.
translation.ha: A wasu lokuta wannan kauce wa hanya ya kan dau shekaru.

translation.en: In a country like France the deviation lasted for more than 70 years before they gradually managed to realize some of the original goals - and not all of the goals, but a portion of them.
translation.ha: A kasa kamar Faransa, wannan kauce wa hanyar ya dau shekaru saba'in da wani abu, har lokacin da a hankali suka cimma wasu daga cikin manufofin, shi din ma ba wai dukkanin manufofin ba.

translation.en: The Islamic Revolution is an exception.
translation.ha: To amma juyin juya halin Musulunci (na Iran) kan ya zamanto wani juyi maras tamka.

translation.en: The Islamic Revolution was a movement that was carried out with specific goals in mind. The goals that had been specified were general in certain cases and they were gradually broken down and made more specific later on, but the Revolution had clear goals.
translation.ha: Juyin juya halin Musulunci wani yunkuri ne da ke da wasu manufofi bayyanannu, duk kuwa da cewa a wasu wajajen a dunkule suke; a hankali a hankali ne aka rarraba su, suka kara fitowa fili sannan kuma alamunsu suka bayyana; to amma dai manufofi ne wadanda suke a fili.

translation.en: Demanding islam, fighting the arrogant powers, demanding independence for the country, bringing about dignity for humanity, defending the oppressed, bringing about scientific, technological and economic progress for the country - these were the goals of the Revolution.
translation.ha: Manufar dai ita ce tabbatar da Musulunci, ita ce adawa da ma'abota girman kai, ita ce kiyaye ‘yancin kasar nan, ita ce mutumta dan'adam, ita ce kare wadanda ake zalunta, ita ce ci gaba na ilimi da fasaha da tattalin arziki; dukkanin wadannan su ne manufofin juyin.

translation.en: A look at the statements of Imam Khomeini (r.a.) and the main documents of the Revolution would reveal that the goals were rooted in Islamic texts.
translation.ha: A lokacin da mutum ya dubi maganganun Imam (yardar Allah ta tabbata a gare shi) da kuma sauran takardu da bayanai na asalin juyin, zai ga cewa dukkanin wadannan abubuwa sun samo asali ne daga Musulunci.

translation.en: Being popular and relying on the faith, beliefs, motivation and passion of the people were among the essential pillars of the Revolution.
translation.ha: Kasantuwarsa na mutane, dogaro da imanin mutane, akidar mutane da kumaji na mutane suna daga cikin tushe na asali na wannan juyin.

translation.en: This is a very important point considering the fact that thirty three years have passed since the Revolution. This is what I mean when I say the Revolution is stable and established.
translation.ha: A yau shekaru talatin da biyu kenan da samun nasarar wannan juyi. Lalle wannan lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske. Wannan shi ne tabbatuwa da kuma tsayin dakan juyin da muke fadi.

translation.en: Those who say our Lord is Allah, then continue in the right way. [The Holy Quran, 41: 30] The Iranian people said "our Lord is Allah" and they stood firm. This spirit was passed on to later generations.
translation.ha: Kalma guda muke fadi ita ce: "Lalle wadannan da suka ce, ‘Ubangijinmu, Shi ne Allah" sa'an nan suka daidaitu"(3), al'ummar Iran dai sun ce Allah ne, sannan kuma suka tsaya kyam a kan hakan. Wannan tsayin daka kan wannan maganar, an ci gaba da musayensa daga wannan zuriyar zuwa wancan.

translation.en: The statements that are made are the kind of statements that would have been made at that time. I used to go to University of Tehran once a week and I used to arrange meetings with students.
translation.ha: A baya na kan tafi jami'ar Tehran a kowane mako, na kan gana da daliban jami'a da jan su salla; bayan sallar na kan amsa musu tambayoyin da suke da su da kuma gabatar da jawabi.

translation.en: And this continued for a long time.
translation.ha: Lamarin ya dau lokaci ana yinsa.

translation.en: The statements that students used to make at that time were the same statements that you make today. Of course today the comments are more calculated and well-informed.
translation.ha: Abubuwan da muke fadi a wancan lokacin da kuma wadanda daliban jami'an suke fadi, su ne dai wadannan kalmomin; ko da ya ke a yau sun balaga da kuma kara zama wadanda suka dace da ilimi da kwarewa.

translation.en: What next? What I want to say is that from now on the responsibility of our young generation - who are mostly students - is to pursue this path with the same orientation and to move towards further development.
translation.ha: Abin da na ke son fadi shi ne dai wannan jumla guda: daga yanzu zuwa nan gaba wannan shi ne nauyin da ke wuyan matasan yau wadanda mafi yawansu daliban jami'a ne su ci gaba da riko da wannan tafarkin da kuma kai shi zuwa ga kamala.

translation.en: This specifies our responsibilities in academic environments. You are the ones who should do the work.
translation.ha: Ku din nan ku ne zuriyar da za su karbi wannan hakika; wato matasan yau, daliban jami'a na yau.

translation.en: In the future you will have to shoulder the responsibilities in the country. You will be the ones who will make plans and decisions for the country.
translation.ha: A nan gaba shugabancin kasar nan zai kasance a hannunku ne. Ku ne masu tsara kasar nan, masu daukan matsaya da gudanar da kasar nan.

translation.en: Of course such a decision will not be made. I have no doubts in this regard. Our young generation will continue this path because the movement enjoys religious roots and strong ideological foundations.
translation.ha: Zuriyar yau za ta iya daukan matsayin kin aikata komai, to amma na san ba za ku yi hakan ba, ba ni da komai kashin shakku kan hakan. Matasanmu na yau sakamakon tushe na addini da na akida da wannan yunkuri ya ginu a kai, lalle za su ci gaba da bin wannan tafarkin.

translation.en: For the first time in the history of revolutions in the world, a Revolution has been carried out that will present itself to the world and will pursue its original principles with all its power. And by Allah's favor, the Revolution will achieve its ultimate goals.
translation.ha: A karon farko cikin tarihin juye-juyen hali daban daban na duniya ne aka samar da wani juyi wanda kuma ya gabatar da kansa ga duniya wanda kuma bai yi watsi da maganganu da akidunsa na farko ba sannan kuma ya ci gaba da riko da su da dukkan karfinsa, kuma da yardar Allah zai kai ga manufarsa ta karshe.

translation.en: You should know that this auspicious movement which is based on these values depends on your motivation, determination, courage, power of thinking and strong willpower.
translation.ha: Ku san cewa wannan yunkuri mai albarka wanda kuma ya dogara da wannan abu mai kima ya ta'allaka ne da kumaji, himma, jaruntaka, karfi na tunani da kuma gagarumar azama.

translation.en: Thankfully the Revolution has made good progress so far. As I said, we have not strayed away from our goals.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda na fadi, ba mu kauce wa manufar da aka shata ba, ba mu kuma ja da baya ba; wannan bala'in da ya fada wa manyan jami'an juye-juyen halin da suka gabata bai fada wa juyin mu ba.

translation.en: The Revolution managed to preserve its essence by relying on its principles and it has also moved ahead on the path of perfection.
translation.ha: Lamurra daban-daban da suka kunno kai, juyin ya yi nasara a kan dukkaninsu sannan kuma da irin wannan karfi da ya ke da shi ya sami damar kare kansa don ya samu damar isa ga kamala.

translation.en: The Revolution has pushed the country forward.
translation.ha: Wannan juyi ya ciyar da wannan kasar gaba.

translation.en: The advances that we see in different areas have been unprecedented in the country over the past few centuries. A few days ago I briefly mentioned some of these advances in a meeting with our government officials.
translation.ha: Irin wannan ci gaban da a yau kuke ganinsu a bangarori daban-daban - wanda a jawabin da na yi a lokacin ganawa da jami'an gwamnati a kwanaki biyu zuwa ukun da suka gabata na yi ishara a takaice da wadannan abubuwa - wanda wannan kasar ba ta taba ganin irin sa cikin karnonin da suka gabata ba.

translation.en: Of course we had similar achievements in the old times, but the advances that have been made are unprecedented in recent centuries.
translation.ha: Na'am a cikin tarihi an taba samun hakan, a wani zamani gwargwadon yanayin zamanin an sami wani abu makamancin hakan; to amma a karnonin baya-bayan nan kan ba a taba ganin irin hakan ba.

translation.en: The country should move forward.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne kasar nan ta ci gaba.

translation.en: We are still taking the first steps. We are still at the beginning of our path.
translation.ha: Mu dai har ya zuwa yanzu muna a matakin farko ne, muna mafarin hanya ne.

translation.en: As I said, one of the most important characteristics of the Revolution is that it creates role models.
translation.ha: Na fadi cewa daya daga cikin siffofin da wannan juyi ya kebanta da shi, shi ne zama abin koyi.

translation.en: This is possible. Naturally student organizations have a role in this regard.
translation.ha: To ko shakka babu kungiyoyin daliban jami'a suna da rawar da za su taka.

translation.en: When you look at the enemies - namely, the arrogant powers, the camp of oppression, the camp of big international capitalists, cartels and trusts and other such camps - you should see them as a unified front. This is my first recommendation to the student organizations that think about different issues related to students, the country, the Revolution and different other things.
translation.ha: Nasiha ta ta farko da zan yi wa kungiyoyin daliban jami'a da suke tunani cikin lamurran da suka shafi daliban jami'a da kasar nan, juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma dukkan komai ita ce cewa: a lokacin da kuka kalli sansanin masu adawa, wato ma'abota girman kai, sansanin azzalumai da sansanin ‘yan jari hujja na kasa da kasa, to lalle ku kalle su da mahanga guda.

translation.en: There is a unified front that is opposed to the Islamic Revolution, which is a spiritual, religious, cultural and ideological Revolution.
translation.ha: Akwai hadin gwuiwa a tsakaninsu wajen fada da juyin juya halin Musulunci, wanda wani juyi ne na addini da al'adu da kuma akida.

translation.en: When you consider them a unified front, many of their actions will reveal their real significance.
translation.ha: A lokacin da kuka kalle su da mahanga guda, to kuwa da dama daga cikin ayyukansu za su bayyana cikin ma'anarsu ta hakika.

translation.en: This issue clarifies the responsibility of students and student organizations.
translation.ha: Hakan lamari ne da ke bayyanar da nauyin da ke wuyan daliban jami'a ko kuma kungiyar daliban jami'a a fili.

translation.en: Well, this is an act of terror.
translation.ha: To wannan wani aiki ne na ta'addanci.

translation.en: It makes you sad that the enemy or some terrorists have targeted a number of scientists in your country. Another way of looking at the issue is to consider the assassinations as part of a large-scale plot against the Islamic Republic. For example, in the eight-year war that we fought with Iraq, when the enemy artillery targeted a particular spot, it did not mean that the enemy was focusing all its attention on that particular spot.
translation.ha: A matsayin misali a fagen yakin kan iyaka da Iraki - wanda shekaru takwas muka yi muna yaki - idan har makiya suka kai hari kan wani waje, ma'anar hakan ba wai shi ne makiyan sun damu da wannan waje na musamman ba ne; ma'anar hakan ita ce cewa hakan wani yunkuri ne da makiya suke yi don janyo hankalin ku zuwa ga wannan wajen su kuma su sami damar kai hari wani wajen na daban - kamar yadda suke fadi yunkurin kariya wanda a hakikanin gaskiya hakan wani makirci ne - ko kuma su raunana sojojinmu da suke wajen don su sami damar kai hari na gaba daya.

translation.en: Another possibility was that the attack had been arranged to weaken our front at a particular place so that the enemy could carry out a large-scale operation. When you look at the issue from this perspective, it becomes clear that the enemy is after thwarting the scientific movement in the country.
translation.ha: A lokacin da kuke kallon lamarin da wannan mahangar, za a iya fahimtar cewa makiya suna kokarin kawar da yunkurin ciyar da ilimi na kasar nan gaba ne; wato wannan daya ne daga cikin makirce-makircen makiya.

translation.en: That is to say, the assassinations should be seen as a link in the chain of the enemy's plots.
