translation.ha: "Daga yanzu zuwa watanni shida masu zuwa, ba mu da tabbas ɗin iya biyan albashin malamai da sauran ma'aikatanmu".

translation.en: At the moment, 19 master teachers and small core staff have gone without salaries for over three months as the school struggles to secure strong funding partnerships and explore sustainable funding models for a school.
translation.ha: A yanzu haka, malamai guda 19 da kuma wasu tsirarun ma'aikata sun bar aiki ba tare da karɓar albashinsu na tsawon watanni uku ba, saboda makarantar na fafutukar samun haɗin gwiwar don samun tallafin da za a cigaba da gudanar da makarantar.

translation.en: While the archipelago is known as a tourist destination for its pristine beaches and luxury hotels, the majority of local people struggle with high unemployment even as poverty has slightly decreased, according to The World Bank.
translation.ha: Duk da kasancewar tsibirin ya yi shuhura a matsayin wajen ziyarar baɗi saboda albarkar rairayin bakin teku da kuma manyan otal-otal, yawancin jama'ar ƙasar na fama da rashin aikin yi duk da cewa talauci ya ɗan ragu kaɗan, a cewar Bankin Duniya.

translation.en: For 17 years, the DCMA has worked tirelessly to promote and protect Zanzibar’s rich heritage and traditions through music.
translation.ha: A tsawon shekaru 17, makarantar DCMA ta yi aiki tuƙuru don bunƙasawa tare da ba da kariya ga al'adun gargajiya na ƙasar Zanzibar ta hanyar kaɗe-kaɗe da waƙe-waƙe.

translation.en: The birthplace of legendary taarab singers Siti Binti Saad and Fatuma Binti Baraka, or Bi. Kidude, Zanzibar is home to musical genres that emerged through cultural exchange and collaboration along the Swahili Coast for hundreds of years.
translation.ha: A matsayin wajen da aka haifi mashahuran mawaƙan taarab kamar Siti Binti da Fatuma Binti Baraka ko kuma Bi Kidude, Zanzibar gida ce ga wani salon waƙa da kiɗa wanda ya samo asali daga mabambamtan al'adun jama'ar da ke zaune a bakin gaɓar tekun Swahili tsawon shakaru ɗaruruwa.

translation.en: Today, students can learn traditional musical genres like taarab, ngoma and kidumbak, along with instruments like drums, qanun and oud, as gatekeepers — and interpreters — of culture and tradition.
translation.ha: A yau, ɗalibai kan koyi salon kaɗe-kaɗen gargajiya kamar taarab da ngoma da kidumbak, ta hanyar amfani da kayan kiɗa kamar ganga da ƙanun da 'oud' a matsayin masu kula - da kuma fassara - al'ada da tarihi.

translation.en: Neema Surri, a violin player at the DCMA, has been studying the violin since the age of 9.
translation.ha: Neema Surri, mai kiɗan bayolin a DCMA ta fara koyar bayolin ɗin ne tun tana 'yar shekaru 19.

translation.en: "I know many young people who would like to study music but they can’t afford the minimal tuition fee because they are poor and unemployed", Surri said in the DCMA video.
translation.ha: "Na san matasa da yawa da suke son koyar kiɗa da waƙa amma ba za su iya biyan kuɗin makaranta ba saboda su talakawa ne marasa aikin yi", Surri ta faɗa a wani faifan bidiyo na DCMA.

translation.en: Students at the DCMA rehearse at the Old Customs House, where the school is based, in Stone Town, Zanzibar, 2019. Photo courtesy of the DCMA.
translation.ha: ɗalibai a makarantar DCMA su na yin gwaji a Tsohon Gidan Kwastam inda makarantar take, a Stone Town da ke Zanzibar a shekarar 2019. An samo hoton daga DCMA.

translation.en: After completing DCMA workshops, certificate and diploma courses, many DCMA students go on to perform on world stages as award-winning bands and solo artists.
translation.ha: Bayan kammala koyan aiki a shagunan DCMA da karɓar takardar shaidar karatun difloma, yawancin ɗaliban na DCMA su na yin wasa a mataki na duniya kuma su lashe kyaututtuka a matsayin ƙungiya ko ɗaiɗaiku.

translation.en: Zanzibar’s Amina Omar Juma, a former DCMA student and current DCMA teacher, recently returned from a tour in South Africa with her critically acclaimed, "Siti and the Band", known for "fusing the roots" by blending traditional taarab sounds with contemporary, layered rhythms.
translation.ha: Amina Omar Juma "yar ƙasar Zanzibar kuma tsohuwar ɗaliba kuma a yanzu malama a makarantar DCMA kwanan nan ta dawo daga tafiya zuwa ƙasar Afirka ta Kudu da ta yi tare da 'yan ƙungiyarta ta "Siti and the Band" waɗanda suka yi tashe a abinda ake kira "fusing the roots" wato gwamutsa kiɗan gargajiya na taarab da kiɗan zamani.

translation.en: She and other band members, also former DCMA students, released their first full album, "Fusing the Roots", in 2018, going on to perform at Sauti za Busara, East Africa's largest music festival, that same year.
translation.ha: Ita da sauran makaɗan, waɗanda su ma tsofaffin ɗaliban DCMA ne, sun saki cikakken kundinsu na farko mai suna "Fusing the Root" a shekarar 2018, kuma a wannan shekarar ne dai suk ayi wasa a Sauti za Busara, wato babban bikin makaɗa na Afirka ta Gabas.

translation.en: Here's Siti and the Band's "Nielewe" ("Understand Me") and music video, depicting scenes from Zanzibar while telling the story of a woman who experiences domestic abuse and dreams of life in music, much like Omar Juma's personal story:
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne faifan bidiyon Siti da sauran makaɗa mai suna "Niewele" ("Fahimce Ni") wanke ke nuna wasu wurare a Zanzibar tare da ba da labarin wata mata wacce ta fuskanci cin zarafi a cikingida kuma ta yi burin zama mawaƙiya, kamar dai irin labarin Juma.

translation.en: Read more: East African women in the music industry sing out against male domination
translation.ha: Karanta cigaba: Mata mawaƙa 'yan asalin yankin Afirka ta Gabas sun yi waƙoƙin nuna rashin goyon bayan mamayar mazaje.

translation.en: A history of cultural crossroads and collaboration
translation.ha: Tarihin gwamutsewa tare haɗuwar al'adu mabambamta

translation.en: Over 15,000 visitors have passed through the academy’s iconic building to enjoy live performances, workshops and classes and interact with passionate DCMA musicians who represent the future of Zanzibar culture and heritage, according to the DCMA.
translation.ha: A cewar DCMA, fiye da maziyarta 15,000 sun ziyarci gine-ginen makarantar don sauraron kaɗe-kaɗe da waƙe-waƙe kai tsaye da ziyartar shaguna da ajujuwa kuma sun tattauna da maɗadan na DCMA waɗanda suke wakiltar goben Zanzibar in dai ana maganar al'ada da gado.

translation.en: Drawing from a complex history of Indian, Arab and African exchange, the school celebrates the influence of "dhow countries", with inspiration from cultures that converged along the Indian Ocean and the Persian Gulf.
translation.ha: Ta hanyar ba da misali daga tarihin haɗuwar Larabawa da Indiyawa da mutanen nahiyar Afirka, makarantar tana bikin murnar tasirin "ƙasashen jirgin ruwa" tare da samun ƙwarin gwiwa daga mabambamtan al'adu da suka haɗu da juna a bakin gaɓar Tekun Indiya da Tekun Fasha.

translation.en: The Omani Sultanate, a "major maritime force from the 17th to 19th centuries", shifted its seat of power from Muscat to Zanzibar in 1840.
translation.ha: Masarautar Omani "babbar masarautar da ke bakin teku daga ƙarni na 17 zuwa na 19" ta canja matsuguninta daga Muscat zuwa Zanzibar a shekarar 1840.

translation.en: From Stone Town, Omani kings oversaw elaborate systems of maritime trade, including cloves, gold, and textiles, powered by strong winds that set dhows — traditional Arab vessels — sailing across the Indian Ocean, from India to Oman to East Africa.
translation.ha: Daga garin Stone Town, sarakunan Omani suna gudanar da babban kasuwanci a teku da ya ƙunshi sayar da kanunfari, zinare da tufafi ta hanyar amfani da ƙaƙƙarfar iskar teku da ke tafiyar da jiragen ruwan da ke ɗauke da kayayyaki - wasu irin jiragen ruwan Larabawa ne - su tashi su tsallaka Tekun Indiya daga ƙasar Indiya zuwa ƙasar Oman zuwa yankin Afirka ta Gabas.

translation.en: Young Zanzibaris recognize the importance of connecting with the past to determine their future and the music created today expresses that desire to bridge the old with the new.
translation.ha: Matasa 'yan ƙasar Zanzibar sun fahimci muhimmancin sanin jiyansu domin gano gobensu kuma kaɗe-kaɗe da waƙe-waƙe da ake yi a yanzu suna nuna burin tafiya daga tsoho zuwa sabo.

translation.en: DCMA students and teachers recently formed "TaraJazz", a blend of traditional taarab and modern jazz.
translation.ha: ɗalibai da malaman na DCMA kwanan nan sun ƙirƙiro "TaraJazz", wato wani salo da aka gwamutsa kiɗan gargajiya na taarab da kuma kiɗan zamani na jazz.

translation.en: Their violinist, Felician Mussa, 20, has only been studying the violin for 3.5 years; TaraJazz is one of the most sought-after bands on the islands, captured here by photographer Aline Coquelle:
translation.ha: Makaɗin bayolin ɗin su, Felicia Mussa 'yar shekara 20 ta ɗauki tsahon shekaru 3.5 ne kacal tana koyon kiɗan. TaraJazz ya kasance ɗaya daga cikin kiɗan da ya fi farin jini a tsibirin, kamar yadda mai ɗaukar hoto Alline Coƙuelle ta haska:

translation.en: The Swahili coast tells the story of epic cultural exchanges and the DCMA continues this tradition through its musical collaborations.
translation.ha: Gaɓar tekun Swahili na sanar da mu labarin musayar al'adu, sannan kuma makarantar DCMA ta ɗora a kan wannan al'ada ta hanyar haɗe mabambamtan kaɗe-kaɗe da waƙe-waƙe.

translation.en: Every year, the school hosts an initiative called "Swahili Encounters", matching well-known musicians hailing from Africa, the Middle East, Europe and North America with DCMA students to create original musical compositions within a week-long period.
translation.ha: A duk shekara, makarantar tana karɓar baƙuncin wani shiri da ake kira "Haɗuwar Swahili" inda ake haɗa makaɗa 'yan asalin nahiyoyin Afirka da Gabas ta Tsakiya da Turai da Amurka ta Arewa da ɗaliban DCMA don ƙirƙirar sababbin kaɗe-kaɗe da waƙe-waƙe a tsahon mako guda.

translation.en: At the end of the "encounter", the newly-formed collaboration performs at Sauti za Busara, and many of these collaborations turn into life-time friendships that transcend the boundaries of language and culture, proving music is a universal language.
translation.ha: A ƙarshen "haɗuwar" ne mawaƙan suke yin wasa a Sauti za Busara kuma yawancin wannan haɗuwar na rikiɗewa ta zama abota ta dindindin duk da bambamcin harshe da al'ada, kuma hakan ya tabbatar da cewa kiɗa harshe ne na duniya gaba ɗaya.

translation.en: DCMA offers weekly live performances showcasing students’ talents and collaborations with visiting musicians, Stone Town, Zanzibar, 2019. Photo courtesy of DCMA.
translation.ha: DCMA tana gudanar da wasannin kai tsaye a duk sati don nuna baiwar da Allah ya ba wa ɗalibanta tare da haɗin gwiwa da makaɗan da ke kawo ziyara Stone Town a Zanzibar, 2019. An samo wannan hoto daga DCMA.

translation.en: The DCMA recognizes that music empowers and unites people across cultures — and it also employs talented youth living in a struggling economy with limited job opportunities.
translation.ha: DCMA ta gano cewa kiɗa yana karfafa gwiwa da haɗa kan mutane masu al'adu dabam - sannan yana samar da aikin yi ga matasa masu baiwa da ke rayuwa a cikin matsin tattalin arziƙi da rashin aiyukan yi.

translation.en: For the 1,800 students who have trained at the DCMA, this is the only musical home they know, where they can learn and grow as professional musicians and artists.
translation.ha: A wajen ɗalibai 1,800 da aka horas a DCMA, wannan ne gidan kiɗan da suka sani kawai, a inda za su iya koyan kiɗa kuma su girma a matsayin gwanaye makaɗa kuma masu fasaha.

translation.en: One traveler from Spain, who recently visited the DCMA, wrote on TripAdvisor: "Personally, meeting the musicians was the best piece of my time on this island".
translation.ha: Wani matifiyi daga ƙasar Andalus, wanda ya ziyarci DCMA kwana-kwanan nan, ya rubuta a shafin TripAdɓisor: "Ni a wajena, haɗuwa ta makaɗan shi ne lokaci mafi daɗi da na ji a wannan tsibirin".

translation.en: As Zanzibar’s tourism sector rapidly grows, the DCMA believes that music plays an essential role in the celebration, preservation and promotion of Swahili culture, heritage and history.
translation.ha: A yayin da fannin yawon shaƙatawa na ƙasar Zanzibar ke ci gaba bunƙasa, DCMA sun haƙiƙance cewa kiɗa yana taka muhimmiyar rawa wajen cigaba da kuma adana al'ada da gado da tarihin Swahili.

translation.en: Zanzibar is far more than its beaches and luxury hotels — it’s a place bursting with talent that stems from an extraordinary history of cultural connection and collaboration.
translation.ha: Zanzibar ta wuce kawai zancen rairayin bakin teku da manyan otel - ita ƙasa ce da Allah ya albarkace ta da baiwa da ta samo asali daga tarihin haɗin gwiwar al'adu dabam-dabam.

translation.en: Editor's note: The author of this post has volunteered with DCMA.
translation.ha: Saƙon Edita: Marubucin wannan sharhi ya yi aikin sa kai a DCMA.

translation.en: Witch-hunting still claims lives in rural India
translation.ha: Farautar mayu na sanadiyyar asarar rayuka a ƙauyukan ƙasar Indiya.

translation.en: Superstition and lack of awareness behind witch-hunting in India
translation.ha: Camfi da rashin wayewa su ke janyo farautar mayu a Indiya.

translation.en: A village near Jamshedpur in Jharkhand. Picture courtesy Anumeha Verma
translation.ha: Wani ƙauye da ke kusa da Jamshedpur a Jharkhand. An samo hoto daga Anumeha ɓerma

translation.en: On 20 July, four elderly people were lynched by a mob in the Gumla District of Jharkhand, India after being accused of practicing witchcraft.
translation.ha: A ranar 20 ga watan Yuli, masu zanga-zanga sun kashe wasu tsofaffi su huɗu a unguwar Gumla da ke garin Jharkhand a Indiya biyo bayan zarginsu da maita.

translation.en: According to reports, the victims were accused of causing a man's death and they were eventually found guilty of witchcraft by a Panchayat (a village assembly).
translation.ha: Rahotanni sun nuna cewa, an zargi mutanen da abin ya shafa da laifin sanadiyyar kisan wani mutum, inda a ƙarshe Panchayat (majalisar ƙauye) ta same su da laifin aikata maita.

translation.en: The victims were dragged out of their homes and beaten to death by masked men wielding sticks.
translation.ha: Waɗansu mutane maza da suka rufe fuskokinsu ɗauke da sanduna sun janyo mamatan waje daga cikin gidajensu suka yi ta dukansu har suka mutu.

translation.en: Eight of the attackers were subsequently arrested by police.
translation.ha: Daga bisani 'yan sanda sun cafke takwas daga cikin maharan.

translation.en: According to police data published by The Times of India, witch-hunting in Jharkhand has claimed 123 lives from May 2016 to May 2019.
translation.ha: A cewar wani bayani da 'yan sanda suka fitar wanda jaridar The Times of India ta wallafa, maita ta yi sandin rasa rayukan mutane 123 a garin Jharkhand daga watan Mayun 2016 zuwa watan Mayun 2019.

translation.en: Across the country, 134 people were killed for the alleged use of "black magic" in 2016, according to the National Crime Records Bureau.
translation.ha: A gaba ɗayan ƙasar, an kashe mutane 134 a shekarar 2016 sakamakon zargin aikata "baƙin tsafi", a cewar Hukumar Tattara Bayanai game da Laifuffuka,

translation.en: A Perpetual Malady
translation.ha: Ciwon da ya-ƙi-ci-ya-ƙi-cinyewa

translation.en: "Witch-hunting is not new in Jharkhand", says Prem Chand, the Founding Chairman of the Free Legal Aid Committee (FLAC) in Jharkhand, in a telephonic interview.
translation.ha: "Farautar mayu ba sabon abu bane a Jharkhand" a cewar Prem Chand, shugaban da ya kafa Free Legal Aid Committee (FLAC) a Jharkhand, a wata ganawa ta wayar tarho.

translation.en: FLAC has been instrumental in bringing about legislation against witch-hunting in Jharkhand.
translation.ha: FLAC ta taka rawar gani wajen tabbatar da hukunci ga masu farautar mayu a Jharkhand.

translation.en: The organisation first began working in this area in 1991 when a woman was accused by her neighbour of causing a boy’s death.
translation.ha: ƙungiyar ta fara aiki a wannan waje a shekarar 1991 lokacin da wata mata maƙocinta ya zarge ta da kisan wani yaro.

translation.en: An irate mob attacked her and killed her husband and son.
translation.ha: Fusatattun cincirindon mutane sun kai mata hari suka kashe maigidanta da ɗanta.

translation.en: She sustained injuries.
translation.ha: Ta samu raunuka.

translation.en: When Prem Chand and his colleagues visited the offenders in the prison, they were met with defiance:
translation.ha: Lokacin da Prem Chand da abokan aikinsa suka ziyarci masu laifin a gidan yari sun gamu da tirjiya:

translation.en: They told us that they stood by their accusation.
translation.ha: Sun gaya mana sun amince da zargin da ake musu.

translation.en: They also shared a belief that when the blood of a woman branded as a witch falls on the ground, she loses her so-called powers of sorcery.
translation.ha: Sun kuma yarda cewa yayin da jinin matar da ake zargi da tsafi ya zuba a ƙasa, to ta rasa ikin tsafinta.

translation.en: Prem Chand says that it affects specific sectors of the population:
translation.ha: Prem Chand ya ce abin ya shafi wani sashe ne na al'umma.

translation.en: Usually, it is the women from the weaker sections of the society and economically backward regions that are targeted.
translation.ha: Yawanci mata marasa gata a cikin al'umma a wurare marasa ƙarfin tattalin arziƙi abin ya fi shafa.

translation.en: The victims are mostly Adivasis, Harijans and Dalits.
translation.ha: Yawanci abin ya fi shafar 'yan ƙabilar Adiɓasi da Harijan da Dalit.

translation.en: It is an assault on the dignity of women and a violation of constitutional rights for a dignified life for every human being.
translation.ha: Wannan keta haddin mata ne da kuma saɓawa dokar kundin tsarin mulki da ta ba wa ɗan adam damar rayuwa a mutunce.

translation.en: The Social and Political Realities
translation.ha: Haƙiƙanin zamantakewa da siyasa

translation.en: Activists say that deeply rooted superstitions prevalent in the hinterlands are a major cause behind the practice.
translation.ha: Masu kare hƙƙin ɗan adam sun ce yarda da camfie-camfe da ya yi tsamari a cikin ƙasa shi ne dalilin maita.

translation.en: A lack of education, poor health facilities and economic backwardness mark the regions where these practices are prevalent.
translation.ha: Rashin ilimi da rashin kayayyakin kula da kiwon lafiya da koma bayan tattalin arziƙi su ne alamun yankunan da ke fama da matsalar.

translation.en: The cases so far show that often a rumor started by someone is enough to get the ball rolling.
translation.ha: Matsalolin sun nuna cewa yawanci abin ya kan fara ne daga jita-jita.

translation.en: Despite the laws enacted by various Indian states which declare witch-hunting to be illegal, participants in these cases see it as a form of self-defense.
translation.ha: Duk da kasancewar jihohi da dama a Indiya sun kafa dokar da ta haramta farautar mayu, masu farautar su na ganin yin haka kariyar kai da kai ce.

translation.en: It is also used as an excuse for grabbing resources owned by women, exacting revenge or even exploiting women for sex.
translation.ha: Kuma ana amfani da ita a kwashe kayayyakin matan ko a yi ramuwa ko kuma ma a haike musu da jima'i.

translation.en: According to Prem Chand:
translation.ha: A cewar prem Chand:

translation.en: The premise is that once you brand a woman as a witch, you can subject her to any treatment.
translation.ha: Wato dai da zarar ka zargi mace da laifin maita, to za ka iya yanke mata duk hukuncin da ka ga dama.

translation.en: However, it is important to note that the practice is used as a justification for exploitation and is not a cause behind it per se.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, yana da muhimmanci a gane cewa ana amfani da wannan abu a matsayin hujjar tatse matan, ba wai shi ne dalili kaɗai ba.

translation.en: Ironically, the panchayat often provides tacit approval for branding a person a witch even if does not pass ruling on the punishment to be meted out.
translation.ha: Abin ban haushi, Panchayat ta kan amince mutum maye ne ko da kuwa ba ta yanke hukunci a kan sa ba.

translation.en: In addition to the elected panchayat, there are self-styled caste panchayats with no legal mandate whatsoever that operate in certain parts of the country.
translation.ha: Baya ga zaɓaɓɓun Panchayat, akwai Panchayats da suke naɗa kansu da kansu su yi aiki a wasu ɓangarori na ƙasar ba tare da amincewar doka ba ko kaɗan.

translation.en: These bodies pass verdicts and mete out punishments and remain largely unchallenged.
translation.ha: Waɗannan hukumomi su kan yanke kuma su zartar da hukunci kuma yawanci ba mai tanka musu.

translation.en: An incident in Ajmer district of Rajasthan in 2017 reported involvement of caste panchayat leading to the death of a 40-year-old woman.
translation.ha: Wani abu da ya faru a unguwar Ajmer a Rajasthan a shekarar 2017 ya bayyana sa hannun caste panchayats a wajen mutuwar wata mata mai shekaru 40.

translation.en: Legally, the courts can take action against such verdicts in case of both elected panchayats and caste panchayats.
translation.ha: A dokance, kotuna na iya ɗaukar mataki a game da hukunce-hukuncen da zaɓaɓɓun panchayats da caste panchayats suka yanke.

translation.en: However, the victims seldom get the opportunity to reach a court of law before they become targets of mobs.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, mutanen ba sa samun damar zuwa kotu kafin cincirindon jama'a ya far musu.

translation.en: Witch-hunting across India
translation.ha: Farautar mayu a cikin Indiya

translation.en: Jharkhand has recorded the highest number of crimes committed in the name of witch-hunting but it is not the only state.
translation.ha: Jihar Jharkhand tana da mafi yawan laifuka da ake aikatawa da sunan farautar mayya, amma fa ba ita kaɗai ce jihar da abin ke faruwa ba.

translation.en: Cases of witch-hunting have been reported from Chattisgarh, Odisha, Gujarat, West Bengal Assam, Bihar, Maharashtra and Rajasthan too.
translation.ha: Akwai rahoton laifukan farautar mayya a garuruwan Chattisgarh da Odisha da Gujarat da West Bengal Assam da Bihar da Maharashtra da kuma Rajasthan.

translation.en: In a chilling incident in 2014, Debjani Bora, an Indian athlete had become a target in Assam.
translation.ha: Wani abin tsoro ya faru a shekarar 2014 yayin da ''yan zanga-zanga suka yi yunƙurin far wa 'yar wasan ƙasar Indiya, Debjani Bora.

translation.en: According to Debjani’s statements, she was accused of being the cause of several deaths in Cherekali village located 180 km from Guwahati, the capital of the eastern state in India.
translation.ha: A bayanin da Debjani ta yi ta ce an zarge ta da zama sanadin mace-mace a ƙauyen Cherekali wanda ke da nisan kilomita 180 daga Guhuwati, babban birnin jihar gabas ta ƙasar Indiya.

translation.en: She was allegedly named by a headman of a village prayer hall and brutally assaulted by the villagers.
translation.ha: Wani shugaban ɗakin taron addu'a ne ya ambaci sunanta kuma jama'ar ƙuyen sun far mata.

translation.en: 2017 witnessed several cases in the state of Rajasthan.
translation.ha: A shekarar 2017 an samu laifuka da yawa a jihar Rajasthan.

translation.en: Among these, a 40-year-old woman Kanya Devi was attacked and beaten to death after being accused by her family members in Ajmer district of the state.
translation.ha: A ciki akwai hari da aka kai wa wata mata 'yar shekaru 40 mai suna Kanya Deɓi wacce aka kashe bayan da iyalanta mazauna unguwar Ajmer suka zarge ta.

translation.en: Victims and Survivors
translation.ha: Waɗanda abin ya shafa da waɗanda suka kuɓuta

translation.en: People blame accused witches for causing a slew of misfortunes: the death of a person or animal, droughts, crop failures, etc.
translation.ha: Mutane su kan zargi mayun da janyo bala'e-bala'e: mutuwar mutum ko dabba da fari da mutuwar amfanin gona da sauransu.

translation.en: The attacks on these women (and some men) are vicious and inhuman.
translation.ha: Akwai mugunta da rashin tausayi a hare-haren da ake kai wa matan (da wasu mazan).

translation.en: At times, the accusations and punishment are meted out by their families.
translation.ha: A wasu lokutan, iyalansu ne ke zarginsu kuma su hukunta su.

translation.en: Some have lived to tell the tale and fight. Chutni Mahato of Saraikela in Jharkhand is one of them.
translation.ha: Wasu sun kuɓuta har sun ba da labari kuma sun kwato haƙƙinsu. ɗaya daga cikinsu ita ce Chutni Mahato ta Saraikela a Jharkand.

translation.en: People from the region call her a "tigress".
translation.ha: Mutanen yankin na kiranta "macen damisa".

translation.en: She was accused of practicing witchcraft in 1995.
translation.ha: An zarge ta da maita a shekarar 1995.

translation.en: Since then, she has transformed into an activist crusading against the victimization of women in the name of witch-hunting with the help of NGOs working to end the practice.
translation.ha: Tun daga lokacin ta zama mai rajin kare haƙƙin ɗan adam, kuma tana yaƙi da cin zarafin mata da sunan farautar mayya tare da taimakon wata NGO da ke aiki don kawo ƙarshen al'adar.

translation.en: Chutni expresses how the lack of resources often makes it a struggle to fight against the practice.
translation.ha: Chutni ta bayyana yadda rashin kayan aiki ke kawo cikas wajen yaƙi da wannan al'ada.

translation.en: I wish there was more support from the authorities and government for the work that we are doing here.
translation.ha: Na so ace akwai ƙarin goyon baya daga shugabanni da gwamnati a kan aikin da uke yi a nan.

translation.en: However, I have suffered because of this practice.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, na sha wuya saboda wannan al'ada.

translation.en: When someone comes to me for help, I am always going to stand by them, she said in a telephonic interview.
translation.ha: Duk sanda wani yazo wajena neman taimako zan tsaya masa a koyaushe, ta faɗa a wata ganawa ta wayar tarho.

translation.en: Formulating Public Opinion
translation.ha: Tsara Ra'ayin Jama'a

translation.en: Both the survivors and activists feel that there is a lack of public opinion in support of ending witch-hunting.
translation.ha: Da waɗanda suka tsira da masu kare haƙƙin ɗam adam sun yarda cewa akwai rashin goyon bayan jama'a wajen kawo ƙarshen farautar mayya.

translation.en: The activists who were interviewed for this story expressed a paucity of political will and intellectual engagement to provide the momentum required for the campaign against the heinous practice to succeed.
translation.ha: Masu rajin kare haƙƙin ɗan adam da aka gana da su a wannan labari sun bayyana ƙarancin aniya daga 'yan siyasa da 'yan boko wajen samar da yanayin da ake buƙata a samu nasarar yaƙi da wannan mummunar al'ada.

translation.en: A silver lining in this dark cloud is that people working against the practice believe that the situation can be turned around.
translation.ha: Abin farin cikin dai shi ne mutanen da ke yaƙar wannan al'ada sun amince cewa akwai yiwuwar a canja yanayin.

translation.en: According to Prem Chand:
translation.ha: A cewar prem Chand:

translation.en: The efforts for ending witch hunting can be modeled on the same principles that the government has used for promoting other social problems such as the literacy mission.
translation.ha: Yunƙurin kawo ƙarshen farautar mayya za a iya cimmasa ne in aka bi irin ƙa'idojin da gwamnati ta bi wajen kyautata sauran matsalolin zamntakewa kamar na aikin samar da ilimi.

translation.en: Also, the intellectuals would have to lend their support to the cause to mold the public opinion.
translation.ha: Kuma sai masu ilimi sun ba da goyon baya ga shirin don a juyar da ra'ayin jama'a.

translation.en: The sources for the story were interviewed with the assistance of B. Vijay Murty, a journalist and resident editor based out of Jharkhand.
translation.ha: An samu ganawa da majiyar labarin ne da taimakon B. ɓijay Murty, ɗan jarida kuma edita da ke zaune a wajen Jharkhand.

translation.en: Caring for Myanmar’s orphaned elephants
translation.ha: Kula da marayun giwaye a Myanmar

translation.en: A camp staff member bottle-feeds Ayeyar Maung. / Aung Kyaw Htet / The Irrawaddy
translation.ha: Ma'aikaci a sansanin ya yi amafni da kwalaba wajen shayar da Ayeyar Maung. /Aung Kyaw Htet/ Kafar labarai ta Irrawaddy

translation.en: This article by Aung Kyaw Htet is from The Irrawaddy, an independent news website in Myanmar, and is republished on Global Voices as part of a content-sharing agreement.
translation.ha: Wannan labarin da Aung Kyaw Htet ta rubuta an wallafa shi a Irrawaddy, wani gidan jarida mai zaman kansa a dandalin yanar gizo, sannan an sake wallafa shia Global ɓoices a tsarin wat yarjejeniya ta musayar labarai.

translation.en: When forestry staff found her deep in the jungle of the Irrawaddy Delta, Ayeyar Sein was three months old.
translation.ha: Lokacin da ma'aikacin gandun daji ya same ta can cikin jejin Irrawaddy Delta, Ayeyar Sein tana da watanni uku a duniya.

translation.en: One of her legs was caught in a steel trap laid by poachers.
translation.ha: ɗaya daga cikin ƙafafunta ta maƙale a cikin tarkon ƙarfe da mafarauta suka kafa.

translation.en: Workers from the government’s timber extraction enterprise saved her and sent her to an elephant camp in Bago Region for treatment.
translation.ha: Ma'aikatan kamfanin saran ice na gwamnati sun tseratar da ita kuma suka aika da ita sansanin giwaye a Yankin Bago don duba lafiyarta.

translation.en: Now she is one of eight calves being sheltered at Wingabaw, Myanmar’s only elephant orphanage.
translation.ha: Yanzu tana ɗaya daga cikin matasan giwayen da ke ajiye a Wingabaw, wato gidan ajiyar marayun giwaye ɗaya tilo a ƙasar Myanmar.

translation.en: Another calf, Ayeyar Maung, endured a similar ordeal.
translation.ha: Wani maraƙin mai suna Ayeyar Maung shi ma ya sha irin wannan wahala.

translation.en: Before his arrival at the camp, the six-month-old was snared in a wire trap.
translation.ha: Kafin zuwansa sansanin, ɗan kimanin watannin shidan ya maƙale a cikin tarko na wayar ƙarfe.

translation.en: As he was stuck among a group of boulders in the same forest where Ayeyar Sein was found, his herd was forced to leave him behind.
translation.ha: A yayin da yake maƙale a tsakanin wasu duwatsu a cikin jejin da aka samo Ayeyar sein, dole garkensa suka tafi suka bar shi.

translation.en: However, forest workers were able to free him and he arrived at the camp last year.
translation.ha: Amma ma'aikatan dajin sun sake shi kuma ya samu zuwa sansanin shekarar da ta gabata.

translation.en: They are the youngest of the orphans at the camp; the oldest is nearly four years their senior.
translation.ha: Su ne mafi ƙarancin shekaru a cikin marayun da ke sansanin; mafi tsufa ya ba su kusan shekaru huɗu.

translation.en: All have tragic backgrounds.
translation.ha: Dukkansu su na da tarihi mai ban tausayi.

translation.en: Some were left by their herds, while others were orphaned when their parents were killed by poachers.
translation.ha: Wasu daga cikinsu garkunansu ne suka tafi suka bar su, wasu kuma sun zama marayu ne lokacin da mafarauta suka kashe iyayensu.

translation.en: At Wingabaw Camp, the motherless calves rely on baby formula provided daily by staff.
translation.ha: A Sansanin Wingabaw, marayun 'yan maruƙan sun dogara ne da dabarun jinjiri da ma'aikatan suke samarwa.

translation.en: They are allowed to roam in the forest in the morning and wash in a nearby stream before returning to the camp.
translation.ha: Ana barinsu su yi yawo a jeji da safe kuma su yi wanka a wata ƙorama da ke kusa kafin su dawo sansanin.

translation.en: Currently, it is believed that Myanmar has nearly 1,500 wild elephants.
translation.ha: A yanzu haka, Maynmar na da kusan adadin giwaye 1,500 a dawa.

translation.en: But they are under serious threat from poaching, with elephants being killed at the alarming rate of one a week.
translation.ha: Amma su na cikin barazana daga mafarauta, a inda a duk sati ake kashe giwa guda ɗaya.

translation.en: Tobago's coral bleaching alert makes it clear there is ‘no alternative’ to fighting the climate crisis
translation.ha: Faɗakarwar da tsibirin Tobago ya fitar game da yanayin koɗewar murjani ta nuna cewa 'babu wani zaɓi' face a yaƙi gurɓatar yanayi.

translation.en: The island's reefs are on "Bleaching Alert Level One"
translation.ha: Shimfiɗaɗɗun murjanin da ke ƙarƙashin ruwa a tsibirin su na "Matakin Farko na Koɗewa"

translation.en: Bleached stag horn coral. Photo by Matt Kieffer, CC BY-SA 2.0.
translation.ha: Koɗaɗɗen murjanin. ɗaukar hoto daga Matt Kieffer, CC BY-SA 2.0

translation.en: Tobago's coral reefs are an integral part of both the island's marine ecosystem and its economy.
translation.ha: Shimfiɗaɗɗun murjanin da ke ƙarƙashin ruwa a Tobago wani ɓangare ne mai muhimmanci ga tsarin rayuwar dabbobin ruwa da kuma tattalin arziƙin ƙasar.

translation.en: Home to numerous species of marine life (and a main source of fish for local fishermen), they also protect the coastline from wave erosion and the effects of tropical storms.
translation.ha: Gida ga mafi yawan dabbobin da ke rayuwa a cikin ruwa (kuma hanyar samun kifi ga masunta na gida), suna ba da kariya ga gaɓar teku daga zaizayewa da kuma kariya ga tasirin guguwar kurmi.

translation.en: Popular spots like Buccoo Reef are also popular tourist attractions.
translation.ha: Sanannun waurare kamar Buccoo Reef su na jan hankalin baƙi 'yan yawon shaƙatawa.

translation.en: But after a press release issued by the country's Institute of Marine Affairs (IMA) on August 22, 2019, in which it warned that — based on findings from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration's (NOAA) Coral Reef Watch — Tobago's coral reefs have been placed on a watch for "Bleaching Alert Level One", all eyes are on the island.
translation.ha: Amma bayan fda Hukumar Kula da Koguna ta fitar da bayani ga manema labarai ranar 22 ga Agusta, 2019 a inda ta yi gargaɗi cewa - sakamakon bincike da Hukumar Gudanar da Sararin Samaniya da Teku da ke Kula da Shimfiɗar Murjani - shimfiɗar murjabin ta tsibirin Tobago ya shiga "Matakin Farko na Koɗewa", hankali ya karkata a kan tsibirin.

translation.en: There is a distinct possibility that the bleaching could advance to Level Two within a matter of weeks, which would threatens not only the existence of the reefs themselves, but also the island's marine life and people.
translation.ha: Akwai matuƙar yiwuwar cewa koɗewar za ta tsallaka mataki na biyu a cikin 'yan makonni, hakan zai zama barazana ba wai kawai ga cigaba da zaman shimfiɗar ba har ga dabbobin cikin ruwa da kuma al'ummar ƙasar.

translation.en: What exactly is bleaching?
translation.ha: Wai menene koɗewa?

translation.en: Corals coexist with and become home to symbiotic algae, helping it store nutrients and remove waste.
translation.ha: Murjani na rayuwa ne tare da gansakuka da suke taimakon juna wajen ajiye abinci da kuma fitar da shara.

translation.en: In return, the algae gives the coral the energy it needs to grow, but drastic changes in water temperature can threaten this cooperative relationship.
translation.ha: hi kuma gansakuka yana ba wa murjani ƙarfin da ya ke buƙata ya girma, amma sauyin yanayi kan iya barazana ga wannan dangartakar haɗin kai.

translation.en: When water becomes too hot (or too cold) the corals expel the algae — and with it, its main source of food.
translation.ha: Yayin da ruwa ya yi zafi sosai (ko sanyi sosai), murjani zai zubar da gansakuka - wanda hakan na nufin ya zubar da hanyar samun abincinsa.

translation.en: Eventually, the coral starves to death; the most noticeable outward sign of this phenomenon is that the coral loses its colour, going from shades of brown and green to a crisp, brittle, bone white.
translation.ha: A ƙarshe gansakuka zai mutu da yunwa; babbar alamar wannan shi ne gansakuka ya rasa launinsa, ya canja daga ruwan ƙasa-ƙasa da kore zuwa farin ƙashi mai gautsi.

translation.en: Bleaching Level Alert One means that the corals are extremely likely to start the bleaching process.
translation.ha: Matakin Farko na Koɗewa na nufin akwai matuƙar yiwuwar miurjani ya fara koɗewa.

translation.en: The IMA therefore suggests that both biologists and citizens should keep an eye out for signs of bleaching over the next 9-12 weeks.
translation.ha: Saboda haka ukumar IMA ta shawarci masana halittu da sauran 'ayn ƙasar su zuba ido don ganin wasu alamun koɗau a cikin makonni 9-12.

translation.en: Level Two bleaching would be an indication of widespread coral bleaching and coral mortality.
translation.ha: Alamar mataki na biyu na koɗewa ita ce gaggawar koɗewar murjanin da kuma mutuwarsa.

translation.en: What causes it?
translation.ha: Me ke janyo hakan?

translation.en: According to local coral reef ecologist Anjani Ganase, the main contributors to coral bleaching in Tobago are the warmer water temperatures — a result of climate change.
translation.ha: A cewar wani masanin halittar murjani Anjani Ganase, babban abinda ke kawo koɗewar murjani a tsibirin Tobago shi ne ɗumamaar yanayin cikin ruwa - a sakamakon sauyin yanayi.

translation.en: Via email, Ganase explained that the ocean absorbs much of the heat in the atmosphere, which in turn causes the water — especially shallower bodies of water, like the Caribbean Sea — to heat up.
translation.ha: T cikin saƙon email, Ganase ya yi bayani cewa teku tana zuƙar yawancin zafin da yake a sararin sama, wanda hakan ke sa ruwa - musamman ma ruwa maras zurfi kamar na Tekun Yankin Karibiya - ya yi zafi.

translation.en: In fact, NOAA's 12-week outlook extends well past Tobago to the reefs of the Lesser Antilles.
translation.ha: A gaskiya, makonni 12 da NOAA ta bayar a duba har ya zarce Tobago zuwa shimfiɗar da ke Lesser Antilles.

translation.en: Other reefs around the region, most notably in parts of the Greater Antilles and Cuba, have already been placed on a Level Two Bleaching Alert:
translation.ha: Ragowar shimfiɗar murjanin da ke yankin, musamman ma na Greater Antilles da na cuba, har sun shiga matakin koɗewa na biyu.

translation.en: What are its effects?
translation.ha: Menene sakamakon abin?

translation.en: Coral bleaching is a huge threat.
translation.ha: Koɗewar murjani babban abin tsoro ne.

translation.en: Because reefs provide fishes with a habitat that allows them to have access to shelter, food and most importantly, shelter for their young until they are ready to survive in the wider ocean, the proposition of losing them will impact the ability of fish species to survive.
translation.ha: Saboda shimfiɗar murjanin na samarwa kifaye gida da za su zauna su rayu su samu abinci su kuma raini 'ya'yansu har zuwa lokacin da za su iya rayuwa a ko'ina a cikin teku, don haka yin asarar murjanin zai shafi rayuwar kifaye.

translation.en: It will also negatively affect the livelihoods of local fishermen.
translation.ha: Hakan kuma zai shafi rayuwar masunta na cikin gida.

translation.en: Tobago relies very heavily on its local tourism industry; its reefs reportedly attract around 40 per cent of the island's tourists.
translation.ha: Tobago ta dogara sosai ga sashen yawan shaƙatawa, kallon shimfiɗar murjaninta shi ke jan hankalin ksao 40 cikin ɗari na 'yan yawon shaƙatawa da ke zuwa tsibirin.

translation.en: Should coral bleaching continue, there will be fewer thriving reefs for people to explore and quite likely, a reduction in tourism dollars, which affects a range of hospitality-related industries: hotels, restaurants, transport services and tour companies.
translation.ha: Idan koɗewar murjanin ta cigaba, to za a samu ƙarancin murjanin da mutane za su kalla kuma hakan zai iya jawo raguwar adadin kuɗaɗen da ake samu daga 'yan yawon shaƙatawa, kuma hakan zai shafi kamfanoni kamar otel-otel da gidajen cin abinci da harkokin sufuri da na yawon buɗe ido.

translation.en: The great irony is that, as tropical storms intensify as a result of the climate crisis, reefs are needed more than ever to absorb the force of waves and create a buffer between the ocean and the shore — but the reefs are compromised by global heating.
translation.ha: Babban abin haushin ma shi ne, a yayin da guguwar kurmi ta tsananta sakamakon sauyin yanayi, yanzu ne lokacin da aka fi buƙatar shimfiɗar murjanin don su zuƙe ƙarfin igiyar ruwa kuma su shiga tsakanin teku da bakin gaɓa - amma ga shi nan shimfiɗar murjanin na lalacewa sakamakon ɗumamar yanayi.

translation.en: Studies show that coral reefs protect around 90 per cent of Tobago's shoreline from wave-induced erosion.
translation.ha: Bincike ya nuna cewa shimfiɗar murjani na ba da kariya daga zaizayar ƙasa sakamakon guguwa ga kaso 90 cikin ɗari na gaɓar tekun Tobago.

translation.en: In a feature address at the International Year of the Reef at the University of the West Indies in 2018, Professor John Agard said that this function will only become more important as storm intensities increase and sea levels rise.
translation.ha: A wani bayani da ya gabatar a taron shimfiɗar murjani na ƙasa da ƙasa a Jami'ar West Indies a shekarar 2018, Farfesa John Agard ta ce za a fahimci muhimmanci wannan aiki na murjani ne yayin da guguwa ta cigaba da tsananta sannan kuma matakin ruwan teku ya ƙaru.

translation.en: What can we do to stop it?
translation.ha: Me za mu iya yi don mu dakatar da hakan?

translation.en: Ganase says the lack of proper management that has allowed overfishing and pollution to go unchecked has made Tobago's coral bleaching worse.
translation.ha: Ganase ya ce rashin cikakkiyar kulawa da kuma ƙyale kamun kifi da gurɓatar yanayi ba tare da bincikensu ba shi ya janyo taɓarɓarewar koɗewar murjanin a Tobago.

translation.en: If this continues, she explains, active management and protection will be critical for full recovery and growth:
translation.ha: Ta yi bayanin cewa idan aka cigaba da hakan, bayar da kulawa da kariya za su zama abubuwa masu muhimmanci wajen farfaɗowa da cigaba.

translation.en: Ideally, coral reefs should be closed to the public and placed into an intensive recovery programme to ensure healthy fish communities and water quality that will support coral growth and recruitment.
translation.ha: Kamata yayi a rufe shimfiɗar murjanin daga jama'a sannan a saka su a wani shirin farfaɗo da su don tabbatar da lafiyar kifaye da amincin ruwa da zai taimaka wajen bunƙasar murjani.

translation.en: She added:
translation.ha: Ta ƙara da cewa:

translation.en: Individual actions to reduce our carbon footprintare are always warranted but we also need citizens to demand more action from our governments to provide the infrastructure, resources and education for climate conservation and adaptation.
translation.ha: Ana buƙatar aiyukan mutane don rage gawayi amma muna buƙatar 'yan ƙasa su nemi gwamnati ta ɗauki matakin samar da kayan more rayuwa, kayan aiki da kuma ilimin kiyaye albarkar yanayi da daidaita shi.

translation.en: Communities need the support to manage and conserve our natural resources not just from governments but from businesses and corporations that also utilise these resources.
translation.ha: Domin kula da kiyaye ma'adananmu, al'ummatai na buƙatar taimakon ba kawai daga gwamnati ba har ma daga 'yan kasuwa da kamfanoni da suke amfani da waɗannan ma'adanan.

translation.en: There is a pressing need for regional island governments to demand an international effort in tackling the climate crisis.
translation.ha: Akwai matuƙar buƙatar gwamnatin yankin tsibirin ta nemi taimakon ƙasa da ƙasa don magance matsalolin yanayi.

translation.en: On September 11, 2019, Barbadian Prime Minister Mia Mottley addressed this issue at the United Nations’ Geneva headquarters, urging larger nations to do better in fighting climate change.
translation.ha: A ranar 11 ga Satumba na shekarar 2019 ne Firaministan ƙasar Barbados Mia Mottley ta yi wannan maganar a hedkwatar Majalisar ɗinkin Duniya da ke Geneɓa, yana mai zaburar da manyan ƙasashe da su ƙara himma wajen yaƙi da sauyin yanayi.

translation.en: The islands of the Caribbean, she said, "do not have the luxury of time because [we] are busy trying to survive".
translation.ha: Ta ce sibirin da ke yankin Karibiya "ba shi da isasshen lokaci saboda [mu na] ƙoƙari ne mu tsira da rayukanmu".

translation.en: Ganase agrees about the urgency of the matter.
translation.ha: Ganese ta yarda da gaggawar da ake da ita a kan haka.

translation.en: Any and all forms of aid in tackling climate change and coral bleaching, she said, especially on political levels, "requires effort":
translation.ha: Ta ce duk wani irin tallafi don yaƙi da sauyin yanayi da koɗewar murjani musamman a mataki na siyasa yana "buƙatar yunƙuri".

translation.en: It's not going to be easy as seen internationally, but there is really no alternative.
translation.ha: Ba abu ne mai sauƙi be kamar yadda ƙasashen duniya suke zato, amma fa babu wani zaɓi.

translation.en: Travel: An extreme sport for Africans
translation.ha: Tafiye-tafiye: Babban wasa a wajen mutanen nahiyar Afirka

translation.en: Visa applications can feel like a sacrifice to the gods
translation.ha: Neman biza kan zama tamkar yanka ga alloli.

translation.en: Africa silhouette image by Natasha Sinegina (CC BY-SA 4.0).
translation.ha: Duhun hoton nahiyar Afirka daga Natasha Sinegina (CC BY-SA 4.0).

translation.en: Visa page images by Jon Evans (CC BY 2.0).
translation.ha: Hoton shafin biza daga Jon Eɓans (CC BY 2.0)

translation.en: Image remix by Georgia Popplewell.
translation.ha: Sake haɗa hotuna daga Georgia Popplewell.

translation.en: In 2019, Temitayo Olofinlua, a Nigerian writer and academic, was denied a visa to attend the European Conference on African Studies in Edinburgh, UK.
translation.ha: An hana Temitayo Olofinlua, wata 'yar boko marubuciya daga Nijeriya, bizar zuwa taron ƙarawa juna sani a kan nazarin nahiyar Afirka da aka gabatar a garin Edinburgh a Birtaniya a shekarar 2019.

translation.en: The British High Commission in Nigeria said they were “not satisfied” that Olofinlua would leave the UK at the end of her trip.
translation.ha: Babban Ofishin Jakadancin Birtaniya a Nijeriya sun ce "ba su gamsu" da cewa Olofinlua za ta bar Birtaniya a ƙarshen tafiyarta ba.

translation.en: The visa refusal was later rescinded by the UK Home Office. Olofinlua went to the conference and has since returned to Nigeria.
translation.ha: Ofishin Gida na Birtaniya ya soke hanin bizar daga baya. Olofinlua ta je taron ƙarawa juna sanin kuma tuni ta dawo Nijeriya.

translation.en: Others have not been as lucky. In April 2019, the UK visa authorities prevented 24 out of 25 African scientists working on infectious diseases from joining their colleagues at various events taking place as part of the London School of Economics Africa Summit.
translation.ha: Sauran mutane ba su yi wannan sa'ar ba. A shekarar 2019, hukumomin Birtaniya da ke ba da biza suka hana masana kimiyya 'yan afirka mutum 24 daga cikin 25 da ke aiki a kan cututtuka masu yaɗuwa bizar zuwa su haɗu da abokan aikinsu a shirye-shirye da akagabatar a taron ƙoli da London School of Economics ta shirya.

translation.en: The people most invested in and best-positioned to tackle the problem of diseases on their continent, were barred from participating in an event about “the challenge of pandemic preparedness.”
translation.ha: Mutanen da su ne suka fi cancanta da su magance cututtuka a nahiyarsu an hana su halartar taro a kan "ƙalubalen Shiryawa Annobar Duka Duniya".

translation.en: ‘You won't come back!’
translation.ha: Ba za ka dawo ba!

translation.en: Barring Africans from entry into certain countries is not only humiliating — it also highlights the institutional racism that underpins the notion that African professionals and creatives cannot be trusted to obey the law.
translation.ha: Hana mutanen Afirka shiga wasu ƙasashe ba wai kawai ƙasƙantarwa bane - ya kuma ƙunshi irin wariyar launin fata da ke nuna cewa ba za a taɓa gasgata ƙwararru 'yan Afirka game da bin doka ba.

translation.en: Article 13 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights declares that "Everyone has the right to leave any country, including his own, and to return to his country".
translation.ha: Doka ta 13 ta Kundin Kare Haƙƙin Dan Adam na Duniya ya bayyana cewa "Kowa yana da 'yancin ya bar kowacce ƙasa har ma ƙasarsa, sannan ya dawo".

translation.en: The reality, however, is that without a passport and valid visa, this right cannot easily be exercised.
translation.ha: A zahirane kuwa shi ne in har babu fasfo da biza, to wannan 'yancin ba zai samu ba.

translation.en: And the ease of getting a visa varies according to nationality.
translation.ha: Sannan kuma sauƙin samun biza ya bambamta daga ƙasa zuwa ƙasa.

translation.en: On the 2019 Henley Passport Index, Japan and Singapore hold the top spot for access to most countries, while Angola, Egypt and Haiti are at the bottom.
translation.ha: A rahoton Hanley Passport Indeɗ na shekarar 2019, ƙasashen Japan da Singapore su ke kan gaba wajen samun damar tafiya yawancin ƙasashen waje, a yayin da ƙasashen Angola da Masar da Haiti su ke koma baya.

translation.en: Read more: ‘No Visa Mix': Tanzanian singeli stars denied visas to US music festival
translation.ha: Karanta cigaba: "Ba Haduwar Biza". An hana Singeli stars 'yan ƙasar Tanzaniya bizar zuwa bikin kaɗe-kaɗe da waƙe-waƙe a Amurka.

translation.en: Kenyan author Ciku Kimeria describes the indignity of living without "passport privilege".
translation.ha: Marubuci ɗan ƙasar Kenya Ciku Kimeria ta bayyana wulaƙancin zama ba tare da "gatan fasfo".

translation.en: She notes that even a visa does not guarantee entry because "you still have to deal with the surly immigration official who will suspiciously ask, ‘And what are you here to do?’"
translation.ha: Ta bayyana cewa samun biza ba ya tabbatar da shiga cikin ƙasa saboda "duk da haka sai ka fuskanci barazanar jami'in hukumar shige da fice da zai tambaye cike da zargi 'Kai kuma me ka zo yi nan?'"

translation.en: If the answer to this question isn’t to the official’s satisfaction, visitors could find themselves being marched back to the departure gate.
translation.ha: Idan amsar tambayar ba ta gamsar da jami'in hukumar ba, maziyarci na iya tsintar kansa ana raka shi zuwa ƙofar fita.

translation.en: For Africans traveling outside the continent, applying for a visa can feel like offering sacrifices to a ravenous god.
translation.ha: A wajen 'yan Afirka masu buƙatar tafiya ƙasashen wajen nahiyar, neman biza kan zamo tamkar ba da hadaya ga mayunwatan alloli.

translation.en: Adéṣínà Ayẹni (Ọmọ Yoòbá), Global Voices Yoruba translation manager, recounts his recent experience trying to procure a visa to Lisbon, Portugal, for the 2019 Creative Commons Summit:
translation.ha: Adesina Ayeni (Ọmọ Yoòbá) manajan fassara zuwa Yarbancina Global ɓoices ya ba da labarin abinda ya faru da shi lokacin da ya nemi bizar zuwa garin Lisbon na ƙasar Portugal don halartar taron Creatiɓe Commons Summit na shekarar 2019.

translation.en: It was the greatest news of my life when I received a mail to deliver a keynote address at the 2019 CC Summit in Lisbon...
translation.ha: Labari mafi daɗi a rayuwata shi ne lokacin da sami saƙon email da ke cewa zan gabatar da babbar maƙala a taron CC Summit na shekarar 2019 a garin Lisbon…

translation.en: On April 18, 2019, some days to my birthday, I submitted my visa application to attend the Lisbon summit at the VFS Global office in Lekki, Lagos.
translation.ha: A ranar 18 ga watan Afrilu wato kwanaki kaɗan zuwa ranar zagayowar murnar cika shekara ta, na miƙa takardun neman bizar halartar taron na garin Lisbon at ofishin ɓFS Global a unguwar Lekki da ke garin Legas.

translation.en: The summit was slated for May 9-11, 2019, but visa processing takes a minimum 15 days.
translation.ha: An shirya gudanar da taron ne a ranar 9 ga watan Mayu, 2019, amma cuku-cukun samun biza ya kan ɗauki a ƙalla kwanaki 15.

translation.en: On the day I was to depart for Portugal, I still [hadn’t] received my passport...
translation.ha: A ranar da ya kamata ace na tafi ƙasar Portugal, har a sannan ban karɓi fasfo ba...

translation.en: 11 days after the summit elapsed, I received a text from the VFS for collection of my passport.
translation.ha: Kwanaki 11 da gama taron, sai na sami saƙo daga ɓFS cewa in je in karɓi fasfo ɗi na.

translation.en: The elders say, you cannot be at your best when sad.
translation.ha: Dattijai kan ce, ba za ka iya yin abin mai kyau ba in kana cikin baƙin ciki.

translation.en: It is one thing that I was not given a visa to attend the summit, another is that the huge scholarship grant to attend the summit went down the drain, wasted.
translation.ha: Abu ne dabam kasancewar an ƙi ba ni bizar halartar taron, akwai kuma asarar tallafin kuɗi da na rasa saboda rashin zuwa taron.

translation.en: I am miserable because I have not been able to refund the scholarship due to the Central Bank of Nigeria’s policy on wire transfers.
translation.ha: Raina ya ɓaci saboda ban sami damar mayar da kuɗin tallafin ba sakamakon wani tsarin Babban Bankin Nijeriya game da aikawa da kuɗi ta yanar gizo.

translation.en: It is excruciatingly painful that my right to associate as a free citizen of the global village was violated.
translation.ha: Abin akwai ciwo mai raɗaɗi kasancewar an danne min haƙƙina na yin mu'amala da sauran mutane a matsayina na ɗan adam da ke rayuwa a duniya.

translation.en: I was stripped of my voice!
translation.ha: An hana a ji muryata.

translation.en: For Africans traveling within Africa: A painful irony
translation.ha: Ga 'yan Afrika masu niyyar tafiya a cikin nahiyar ta Afrika: Abin takaici da ban haushi

translation.en: It’s difficult for Africans to travel outside Africa — but it can be equally grim to travel within the continent.
translation.ha: Abu ne mai wahala ga 'yan Afirka su samu damar tafiya zuwa wajen nahiyar ta Afirka - amma akwai yiwuwar shan wuya yayin tafiya a cikin nahiyar.

translation.en: Citizens of many countries in the global North can travel to most Africa countries visa-free, or with few restrictions, but the majority of Africans need visas to travel to over half of the other African countries.
translation.ha: Yawancin mutanen ƙasashen arewacin duniya kan iya tafiya zuwa ƙasashe da yawa a nahiyar Afirka ba tare da biza ba, ba kuma tare da tangarɗa mai yawa ba, amma yawancin jama'ar na nahiyar Afirka sai sun nemi biza sannan za su sami damar zuwa fiye da rabin ƙasashen na Afirka.

translation.en: Nigerian Global Voices contributor Rosemary Ajayi captures the "struggle of Africans traveling within Africa":
translation.ha: Wata 'yar ƙasar Nijeriya mai ba da tallafi a Global ɓoice ta bayyana irin "jidalin da 'yan Afirka suke fuskanta yayin tafiya zuwa wasu ƙasashen na Afirka dabam".

translation.en: I am happy that we, and many others, are highlighting the challenges Africans face getting Western visas.
translation.ha: Na yi farin ciki kasancewar muna bayyana irin ƙalubalen da mutanen Afirka ke shiga kafin su samu bizar zuwa ƙasashen yamma.

translation.en: This doesn't annoy me as much as the struggles of Africans travelling within Africa.
translation.ha: Wannan ba ya ba ni haushi irin yadda mutanen Afirka ke shiga jidali yayin tafiya a cikin nahiyar.

translation.en: At RightsCon in Tunis, and GlobalFact in Cape Town, I took the time to ask Africans if they had needed visas.
translation.ha: A RightsCon a birnin Tunis da kuma GlobalFact a birnin Cape Town, na ɗauki lokaci wajen tambayar 'yan Afirka in sun taɓa buƙatar biza.

translation.en: Just this weekend, I learnt of a Nigerian journalist who was unable to attend GlobalFact because he didn't have a visa.
translation.ha: A wannan ƙarshen satin ne na sami labari wani ɗan jaridar Nijeriya da ya kasa halartar taron GlobalFact saboda ba shi da biza.

translation.en: Let's not talk about how most of the African delegates at RightsCon had to fly out of Africa first, in order to get to Tunis.
translation.ha: Kar ma mu fara zancen yadda yawancin wakilan Afirka a taron RightsCon sai sun tashi sun bar nahiyar gaba ɗaya, kafin su samu zuwa birnin Tunis.

translation.en: Last month, I met an East African journalist applying for a visa to Nigeria. He was asked to supply the driver's license of the professional driver picking him up from the airport!
translation.ha: A watan da ya gabata, na haɗu da wani ɗan jarida daga yankin Afirka ta Gabas wanda ke neman bizar zuwa Nijeriya. An buƙaci ya ba da lasisin tuƙi na ƙwararren direban da zai ɗauke shi daga filin tashin jiragen sama!

translation.en: As Rosemary points out, intra-continental travel is often further complicated by having to travel out of the continent in order to reach a destination within Africa.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda Rosemary ta faɗa, abin da ke ƙara rikita sufuri cikin nahiyar shi ne wani lokacin dole ne sai mutum ya bar nahiyar ta Afirka gaba ɗaya kafin ya sami damar zuwa inda ya ke so a cikin nahiyar.

translation.en: At the International Air Transport Association (IATA) regional aviation forum in Accra in June, Ghana's Vice President, Dr. Mahamudu Bawumia lamented the fact that “a business person from Freetown [Sierra Leone], for example, should travel for nearly two days to go to Banjul (often through a third country) for a journey which a straight-line flight would have taken only one hour.”
translation.ha: A taron ƙungiyar Sufurin Jirgin Sama ta ƙasa da ƙasa a watan Yuni a garin Accra, Mataimakin Shugaban ƙasar Gana, Dr, Mahamudu Bawumia, ya nuna baƙin cikin yadda "ɗan kasuwa daga garin Free Town [Saliyo] sai ya yi tafiyar kwana biyu zuwa garin Banjul (wani sa'in ma sai ya biya ta wata ƙasar) duk saboda ya isa gurin da jirgi duda ɗaya zai iya kai shi a awa guda".

translation.en: The convoluted flight routes are then compounded by the extraordinarily high cost of air travel within the continent.
translation.ha: Abin damuwa ga duk wannan zagaye-zagayen bin hanyoyin shi ne masifar tsadar sufurin jirgin sama a cikin nahiyar.

translation.en: Is it true that Africans are unlikely to return home?
translation.ha: Shin gaskiya ne da wuya 'yan Afrika su dawo gida?

translation.en: A rescue operation off the Canary Islands in 2006.
translation.ha: Aikin ceto a bakin Tsibirin Kanari a shekarar 2006.

translation.en: Photo by Noborder Network. (CC BY 2.0)
translation.ha: An samo hot daga Noborder Network (CC BY 2.0)

translation.en: Between 2010-2017, migrants from sub-Saharan African countries accounted for the largest migrant population in the world after Syria.
translation.ha: A tsakanin shakarun 2010-2017, mutane daga ƙasashen Afirka da ke kudu da hamada su ne mafiya yawan matafiya a duniya bayan jama'ar ƙasar Sham.

translation.en: Many Africans leave the countries fleeing poverty or violent conflict, to seek asylum, refugee status or permanent residence in North America or Europe.
translation.ha: Yawancin jama'ar nahiyuar Afirka su kan bar ƙasashensu ne don gujewa talauci da rikice-rikice, su nemi mafaka ko su zauna a matsayin 'yan gudun hijira ko su nemi zaman dindindin a Amurka ta Arewa ko nahiyar Turai.

translation.en: A 2018 Pew Research study reports that the number of migrants from sub-Saharan Africa "grew by 50% or more between 2010 and 2017, significantly more than the 17% worldwide average increase for the same period".
translation.ha: Wani bincike da Pew Research ta yi a shekarar 2018 ya rawaito cewa adadin matafiya daga ƙasashen Afirka da ke kudu da hamada "ya ƙaru da kaso 50 cikin ɗari ko fiye da haka tsakanin shekarun 2010 da 2017, wannan ya haura kaso 17 cikin ɗari na duk duniya a lokaci iri ɗaya".

translation.en: Sub-Saharan Africans are also emigrating to countries far and wide.
translation.ha: Mutanen ƙasashen Afirka da ke kudu da hamada su na fita zuwa ƙasashen waje masu nisa.

translation.en: In 2014, over 170,000 migrants without legal documents ferried across the Mediterranean Sea to Italy.
translation.ha: A shekarar 2014, fiye da matafiya 170,000 suka tsallaka ta Kogin Bahar Rum zuwa ƙasar Italiya ba tare da takardun shiga ƙasar ba.

translation.en: Many hailed from sub-Saharan Africa.
translation.ha: Da yawansu 'yan asalin ƙasashen Afirka da ke kudu da hamada ne.

translation.en: In December 2018, Brazilian police rescued 25 sub-Saharan African nationals who had “been at sea for over a month” in the Atlantic Ocean.
translation.ha: A watan Disamba na shekarar 2018, 'yan sandan ƙasar Brazil sun ceci mutane 25 'yan ƙasashen Afirka da ke kudu da hamada waɗanda "su ke cikin teku fiye da wata guda" a Tekun Atlantika.

translation.en: The travelers had paid “hundreds of dollars apiece” for the trip from Cape Verde. In June 2019, US Customs and Border Protection in Del Rio, Texas, USA, arrested more than 500 Africans from Republic of the Congo, Democratic Republic of Congo, and Angola, for trying to cross into the USA via the Rio Grande River.
translation.ha: Matafiyan sun biya "dubunnan dalolin Amurka kowanne" domin tafiya daga ƙasar Cape ɓerde. A watan Yuni na shekarar 2019, jami'an Hukumar Kwastam da Tsaron Iyaka a Del Rio da ke Teɗas a ƙasar Amurka sun cafke fiye da mutane 500 'yan nahiyar Afirka waɗanda suka fito daga ƙasashen Jamhuriyar Kongo da Jamhuriyar Dimukraɗiyyar Kongo da Angola a yayin da suke ƙoƙarin tsallakawa zuwa Amurka ta cikin Kogin Rio Grande.

translation.en: While dominant narratives in the media perpetuate Africa as a continent of mass migration driven by poverty or violent conflict, however, Marie-Laurence Flahaux and Hein De Haas, scholars from University of Oxford and University of Amsterdam, respectively, take issue with this stereotype.
translation.ha: A yayin da kafafen yaɗa labarai ko da yaushe ke nuna Afirka a matsayin nahiyar matafiya sakamakon talauci da rikice-rikice, duk da haka, Marie-Laurence Flahauɗ da Hein De Haas, wasu shehunnan malamai daga Jam'iar Oɗford da Jami'ar Amsterdam ba su yarda da wannan ra'ayin ba.

translation.en: Flahaux and De Haas argue that these narratives are propagated not only by "media and politicians" but also by scholars.
translation.ha: Falhauɗ da De Haas sun yi bayanin cewa ba kawai "kafafen yaɗa labarai da 'yan siyasa' ne ke yaɗa waɗannan labarai ba har ma da malamai.

translation.en: Their research shows that migration from the continent is multi-layered and driven by global "processes of development and social transformation" that have increased the "capabilities and aspirations" of Africans’ to migrate — similar to migrants from other parts of the world.
translation.ha: Bincikensu ya nuna cewa akwai dalilai da yawa na tafiye-tafiye daga nahiyar sakamakon "cigaban da duniya ta samu da canji a tsarin zamantakewa" wanda hakan ya ƙarawa 'yan Afirka "damarmaki da buri" na tafiya - kamar dai ragowar matafiya na sauran sassan duniya.

translation.en: These stereotypical narratives, however, often inform visa policy:
translation.ha: Waɗannan ra'ayoyi da ake da su game da 'yan Afirka, duk da haka, su na taka rawa a tsarin ba da biza:

translation.en: Most countries’ authorities assume that all Africans who travel will not return to their home countries, leaving African visa applicants to bear the burden of proof.
translation.ha: Yawancin mahunkunta a ƙasashe su na zaton cewa duk 'yan afirka ba za su koma ƙasashensu ba, kuma hakan ya sa 'yan Afirka masu neman biza ke buƙatar nuna shaida.

translation.en: Getting non-African nations to take a more nuanced approach to visa approvals for African nationals is a long battle.
translation.ha: Fahimtar da ƙasashen da ba na Afirka a kan su sassauta dabarun bayar da biza ga 'yan Afirka wani yaƙi ne mai tsaho.

translation.en: Meanwhile, African nations can take action to improve mobility across the continent.
translation.ha: A hakan dai, ƙasashen Afirka kan iya ɗaukar matakin inganta harkar zirga-zirga a cikin nahiyar.

translation.en: A common African passport is one step — but it's not enough. The Single African Air Transport market (SAATM), and the Continental Free Trade Agreement, both launched last year, have laid the foundation for some of these shifts, but widespread implementation is still a long way off.
translation.ha: Samar da fasfon Afirka na bai ɗaya wani mataki ne - amma ya yi kaɗan. Kasuwar Bai ɗaya ta Sufurin Jiragen Sama a Afirka da kuma Yarjejeniyar Kasuwanci Kyauta a Nahiyar da aka ƙaddamar shekarar da ta gabata sun samar da tushe na wannan canji, amma aiwatarwar abu ne da zai ɗauki tsahon lokaci.

translation.en: Meanwhile, as an African, to dare to travel is to be subjected to cruel humiliations when travelling outside Africa — or to be jolted out of the fantasy of African unity by the harshness of travelling within the continent.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, ka yi ƙoƙarin yin tafiya a matsayinka na ɗan Afirka daidai yake da jefa kai cikin azaba.

translation.en: Either way the visa gods demand more sacrifices, while remaining adamantly intransigent.
translation.ha: Ko ma dai yaya, allolin biza na buƙatar yanka, a yayin da su ke nuna zallar rashin tausayi.

translation.en: Social media propelled ethnocentric disinformation and propaganda during the Nigerian elections
translation.ha: Kafafen sada zumunta sun yaɗa labaran ƙarya na ƙabilanci da kuma farfaganda a yayin zaɓuka a Nijeriya.

translation.en: Ethnic driven falsehoods spiked on social media during the elections
translation.ha: ƙarya mai alaƙa da ƙabilanci ta ƙaru a kafafen sada zumunta a lokacin zaɓuka.

translation.en: Voting in progress at presidential election March 28, 2015, in Abuja, Nigeria. Photo by US Embassy / Idika Onyukwu [Image Attribution: Non-Commercial 2.0 Generic (CC BY-NC 2.0)]
translation.ha: Kaɗa ƙuri'a na gudana a yayin zaɓen shugaban ƙasa a ranar 28 ga watan na shekarar 2015 a garin Abuja da ke Nijeriya. An samo hoto daga ofishin jakadancin Amurka/ Idika Onyukwu [Siffar Hoto: Ba na siyarwa ba 2.0 Gamayya (CC BY-NC 2.0)]

translation.en: This story is the first in a two-part series on online ethnic hate speech, disinformation and propaganda during the 2019 Nigeria elections.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne kashi na farko a jikin jerin labarai guda biyu na kalaman tsana da labaran ƙarya da farfaganda a yanar gizo a lokacin zaɓukan shekarar 2019 a Nijeriya.

translation.en: You can read the second part here.
translation.ha: Za ka iya karanta kashi na biyun a nan.

translation.en: Nigeria went to the polls to elect a new president and a national parliament on February 23, 2019.
translation.ha: "Yan Nijeriya sun tafi rumfunan zaɓe don zaɓen sabon shugaban ƙasa da 'yan majalisa a ranar 23 ga watan Fabrairun 2019.

translation.en: With two main contenders vying for the presidency, incumbent President Muhammadu Buhari obtained 15 million votes and triumphed over his closest rival, Atiku Abubakar, by a "margin of 56 percent to 41 percent".
translation.ha: A cikin manyan 'yan takara guda biyu da ke neman shugabancin ƙasar, shugaba mai ci Muhammadu Buhari ya samu ƙuri'u miliyan 15 kuma ya yi nasara a kan abokin hamayyarsa mafi kusa wato Atiku Abubakar da "tazarar kaso 56 cikin ɗari zuwa kaso 41 cikin ɗari".

translation.en: Buhari was sworn-in for a second term of four years on May 29, 2019.
translation.ha: Ranar 29 ga watan Mayun shekarar 2019, an rantsar da Buhari wa'adin mulki na biyu na shekaru huɗu.

translation.en: Read more: #NigeriaDecides2019: Everything you need to know for this year's general elections
translation.ha: Karanta cigaba: #NijeriyaTaTsaidaMagana2019: Duk wani abu da kake buƙatar sani game da zaɓukan wannan shekara.

translation.en: However, the election campaign was fought on different fronts, including social media.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, an yi yaƙin neman a wurare dabam-dabam ciki har da shafukan sada zumunta.

translation.en: There was widespread dissemination of ethnic hate speech at the service of disinformation and propaganda online, particularly on Twitter.
translation.ha: An samu yaɗuwar kalaman ƙiyayya na ƙabilanci da labaran ƙanzon kurege da farfaganda a shafukan yanar gizo, musamman ma a shafin tuwita.

translation.en: Ethnic hate in Nigeria
translation.ha: Tsanar ƙabilanci a Nijeriya

translation.en: Nigeria’s multi-ethnicity – over 250 ethnic groups and 500 languages – has at times been a source of conflict instead of strength.
translation.ha: Yawan mabambamtan ƙabi'lu a Nijeriya - akwai fiye da ƙabilu 250 da kuma harsuna 500 - wani lokacin kan zama mafarin rikici maimakon haɗin kai.

translation.en: This becomes particularly obvious during elections when politicians use these divisions to campaign for votes.
translation.ha: Wannan yafi fitowa fili lokacin zaɓuka yayin da 'yan siyasa ke amfani da wannan rabe-raben su nemi ƙuri'u.

translation.en: Naturally, online conversations in Nigeria have not been devoid of ethnic-induced hate.
translation.ha: Da ma can ba a rasa ƙiyayya saboda ƙabilanci a yayin tattaunawa a shafukan yanar gizo a tsakanin 'yan Nijeriya

translation.en: Read more: Nigeria: Curbing the tide of ethnic hate — online and off
translation.ha: Karanta cigaba: Nijeriya: Dakatar da guguwar ƙiyayyar ƙabilanci - a yanar gizo da a fili

translation.en: During the 2015 elections, for instance, Twitter Nigeria descended into a bitter and binary sparring match between supporters of the then-two major contestants, Goodluck Jonathan (PDP, an Ijaw Christian) and Muhammadu Buhari (APC, a Hausa, Fulani Muslim).
translation.ha: Misali, a lokacin zaɓukan shekarar 2015, shafukan tuwita a Nijeriya sun zama wani tsattsaman wajen rabuwar kai da ake gwabzawa tsakanin magoya bayan manyan 'yan takara guda biyu, Goodluck Jonathan (na jam'iyyar PDP, ɗan ƙabilar Ijaw kuma Kirista) da Muhammadu Buhari (ɗan jam'iyyar APC, Bahaushe kuma Bafulatani Musulmi).

translation.en: Twitter became a tool for propagating ethnic hate and party politics.
translation.ha: Tuwita ta zamo wajen yaɗa tsanar ƙabilanci da siyasar jam'iyya.

translation.en: Some thought 2019 would be different because Buhari from the All Progressive Congress (APC) and Abubakar from the People's Democratic Party (PDP) are both Hausa, Fulani Muslims, but that was not the case.
translation.ha: Wasu sun yi zaton za a sami bambamci a shekarar 2019 saboda Buhari da ya fito daga jam'iyyar All Progressiɓe Congress (APC) da Abubakar da ya fito daga jam'iyyar People's Democratic Party (PDP) dukkansu Hausawa ne Fulani kuma Musulmai amma hakan bai faru ba.

translation.en: Their vice-presidential candidates – Yemi Osibanjo (APC), a Yoruba, and Peter Obi (PDP), an Igbo, are both Christians— but from different ethnic groups.
translation.ha: Yan takararsu na mataimakin shugaban ƙasa - Yemi Osibanjo (APC) wanda yake bayarbe da Peter Obi (PDP) wanda yake Inyamiri dukkansu Kiristoci ne - amma daga yankuna da ƙabilu dabam.

translation.en: It seemed like a repeat of 2015 but now with different protagonists.
translation.ha: Abin sai ya zamto tamkar maimaicin shekarar 2015 amma yanzu da wasu mutanen dabam.

translation.en: The political atmosphere became ethnically-charged in 2017, two years before the elections, creating the conditions for an atmosphere of distrust.
translation.ha: ƙabilanci ya mamaye yanayin siyasar a shekarar 2017, wato shekaru biyu kafin zaɓuka, hakan ya samar da wani sharaɗi da ya janyo yanayi na rashin yarda.

translation.en: The Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), a secessionist organization in the southeastern part of the country led by Nnamdi Kanu, also added to the heightened ethnic tensions brewing.
translation.ha: ƙungiyar da ke Fafutukar Kafa ƙasar Biafra, wato ƙungiyar jam'ar kudu maso gabashin Nijeriya da ke yunƙurin ɓallewa daga ƙasar, wacce Nnamdi Kanu ke jagoranta, ta daɗa a kan damuwar ƙabilanci da ke jiƙuwa.

translation.en: Read more: As ethnic hate speech rises, Nigerian writers push back
translation.ha: Karanta cigaba: A yayin da kalaman tsana ke ƙaruwa, Marubutan Nijeriya sun ja da baya.

translation.en: Desertification in predominantly-Muslim northern Nigeria led to a southward migration of Nigeria’s cattle herders that ignited violent conflicts with farmers.
translation.ha: Kwararowar hamada a garuruwan Musulmi na arewacin Nijeriya ta janyo hijirar makiyayan Nijeriya zuwa kudancin ƙasar da hakan ya janyo rikice-rikice da manoma,

translation.en: The southern Christian communities’ resentment of the influx of Muslim Fulani herders was portrayed in some narratives as an 'Islamisation' force.
translation.ha: ɓacin ran al'ummar Kirista da ke kudancin ƙasar da shigowar Fulani makiyaya Musulmi ya bayyana ne a irin labaran da suke kira "Sojojin Musuluntarwa"

translation.en: The failure of the Nigerian government to investigate these clashes and "bring perpetrators to justice" resulted in the death of about 4,000 people from 2015 to late 2018, according to Amnesty International.
translation.ha: Gazawar gwamnatin tarayyar Nijeriya wajen binciken waɗannan rigingimu da kuma hukunta masu laifi "ya yi sanadin mutuwar kimanin mutane 4,000 daga shekarar 2015 zuwa ƙarshen shekarar 2018, a cewar Hukumar Afuwa ta ƙasa da ƙasa.

translation.en: Hence, ethnocentrism was already at an all-time high before the presidential elections in 2019.
translation.ha: Saboda haka, ana tsaka da ƙabilanci kafin zaɓen shugaban ƙasa a shekarar 2019.

translation.en: The prevailing distrust was a fertile ground for false information – online and offline – during the elections.
translation.ha: Rashin yarda da ya mamaye ko'ina shi ne yaɗuwar labaran ƙarya - a shafukan yanar gizo da kuma a zahiri - a lokacin zaɓukan.

translation.en: Elections and the credibility of online information in Nigeria
translation.ha: Zaɓuka da kuma dogaro da bayanan da ke kan shafukan yanar gizo a Nijeriya.

translation.en: The number of internet users in Nigeria grew from 98.3 million in 2017 to 100.5 million in 2018.
translation.ha: Adadin yawan masu amfani da shafukan yanar gizo a Nijeriya ya daɗu daga mutane million 98.3 a shekarar 2017 zuwa mutane miliyan 100.5 a shekarar 2018.

translation.en: Facebook maintains the lead as the social media platform of choice with 22 million users, followed by YouTube (7 million+), Twitter (6 million) and Instagram (5.7 million).
translation.ha: Kafar sada zumunta ta Facebook ita ce kan gaba da kimanin mabiya miliyan 22, sannan sai YouTube (da mabiya fiye da miliyan 7), sai Twitter (Miliyan 6) sai kuma Instagram (milyan 5.7).

translation.en: The majority of Nigerian voters are young. Out of the 84 million registered voters for the 2019 General Elections, over half — 51 percent — are young voters aged between 18 and 35, whereas nearly 30 percent are between 36 and 50 years old.
translation.ha: Yawancin masu yin zaɓe a Nijeriya yara ne masu ƙarancin shekaru. A cikin rajista guda miliyan 84 da aka karɓa na zaɓen shekarar 2019, fiye da rabi - wato kaso 51 cikin ɗari - na yara ne da ke tsakanin shekaru 18 da 35, a yayin da kaso 30 cikin ɗari na masu shekaru 36 ne zuwa 50.

translation.en: These two groups of voters, which include both digital natives and digital immigrants, form the majority of Nigerian voters who are digitally savvy.
translation.ha: Waɗannan rukunai biyu na masu zaɓe, da suka ƙunshi 'yan ƙasa masu amfani da kwamfuta da kuma baƙi masu amfani da kwamfuta, su ne masu zaɓe a Nijeriya waɗanda ke da ilimin kwamfuta.

translation.en: Therefore, it was not surprising that digital media was one of the prominent battlegrounds for election campaigns in 2019.
translation.ha: Saboda haka, ba abun mamaki ba ne don shafukan yanar gizo sun zamo fitattun fagen fama na yaƙin neman zaɓe a shekarar 2019.

translation.en: As a result, the credibility of online information during the 2019 elections suffered great attrition.
translation.ha: Sakamakon haka, a lokacin zaɓukan shekarar 2019 an samu ƙarancin dogaro da labaran shafukan yanar gizo.

translation.en: False and misleading information, promoted as gospel truth, was amplified by supporters of the two major parties in Nigeria: the All Progressive Congress (APC) and the People's Democratic Party (PDP).
translation.ha: Magoya bayan manyan jam'iyyu biyu a Nijeria: All Progresssiɓe Congress (APC) da People's Democratc Party (PDP), sun kambama bayanan ƙarya masu ruɗarwa tamkar wata gaskiya da aka saukar a cikin littafin Linjila.

translation.en: Based on ethnographic participant observation conducted between October 28, 2018, and May 29, 2019, ethnic hate was employed as a tool for disinformation and propaganda by both sides of the political divide on Twitter Nigeria during the 2019 presidential elections.
translation.ha: Wani shiri mai taken 'kula daga mai halarta na ƙabilu' da aka gabatar tsakanin 28 ga watan Oktoba na shekarar 2018 da 29 ga watan Mayu na shekarar 2019 ya nuna cewa jam'iyyun biyu sun yi amfani da shafukan tuwita na Nijeriya wajen amfani da tsanar ƙabilanci don yaɗa labaran ƙarya da farfaganda a lokacin zaɓukan shugaban ƙasa na shekarar 2019.

translation.en: These observations were captured as screengrabs of tweets or saved URLs collected over this period.
translation.ha: An lura da wannan ne a wasu hotunan allo na saƙonnin tuwita ko kuwa adireshin shafukan yanar gizo da aka ajiye a tsakanin wannan lokacin.

translation.en: In terms of ethnically-charged disinformation, some APC supporters accused Obi of being a bigot for purportedly deporting northerners while he was governor of Anambra State, in southeast Nigeria.
translation.ha: A ɓangaren labarun ƙarya na ƙabilanci, wasu magoya bayan jam'iyyar APC sun zargi Obi da laifin ƙin jinin wasu ƙabilun saboda wai ya taɓa korar 'yan arewa daga jihar Anambra a kudu maso gabashin Nijeriya lokacin da yake riƙe da muƙamin gwamna a jihar.

translation.en: Tweets went viral that claimed that Yoruba people were burning shops of Igbo traders in Lagos. Both stories were false and will be explored further in Part II of this essay.
translation.ha: Saƙonnin tuwita sun karaɗe ko'ina cewa Yarabawa sun ƙona shagunan 'yan kasuwa Inyamirai a garin Legas. Duk labaran guda biyu ƙarya ne kuma za a gano hakan a Kashi na II na wannan maƙala.

translation.en: Figure 1: Misinformed propaganda tweet by Festus Keyamo
translation.ha: Zane na 1: Saƙon tuwita mai ɗauke da farfaganda ta ƙarya daga shafin Festus Keyamo

translation.en: Figure 2: The true location of the image that Keyamo shared.
translation.ha: Zane na 2: Ainihin gaskiyar hoton wajen da Keyamo ya yaɗa.

translation.en: In another example, a photograph was used to misconstrue facts. On October 28, 2018, Festus Keyamo, then-media director of the Buhari Campaign Organisation, tweeted an image (Figure 1) of a tree growing between an apparently abandoned Nigerian rail track:
translation.ha: A wani misalin dabam, an yi amfani da wani hoto don jirkita gaskiya. A ranar 28 ga watan Oktoba na shekarar 2018, Festus Keyamo, wanda a lokacin shi ne daraktan kafofin yaɗa labarai na ƙungiyar Yaƙin Neman Zaɓen Buhari, ya yi amfani da shafin tuwita ya wallafa hoton (Zane na 1) wata bishiya da ta fito a tsakaninlayin dogo da aka daina amfani da shi a Nijeriya.

translation.en: This is how trees grew in-between rail tracks between 1999 and 2015...
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne yadda bishiyoyi ke fitowa su girma a tsakanin layin dogo a shekarun 1999 zuwa 2015…

translation.en: Now, this is the 'Completion Era' as the tracks are beginning to roar back to life.” The PDP government was in power between 1999 and 2015.
translation.ha: Wannan 'Lokacin Kammalawa ne' saboda yanzu layin dogo ya farfaɗo". Jam'iyyar PDP ta riƙe madafun iko tsakanin shekarun 1999 da 2015.

translation.en: However, a Nigerian Twitter user later traced back the image to an original Arabic-language tweet (Figure 2) posted earlier that same month.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, wani ɗan Nijeriya mai amfani da shafin tuwita ya gano cewa asalin hoton an wallafa shi ne a wani saƙon tuwita na harshen Larabci (Zane na 2) a farkon wannan watan dai.

translation.en: According to the tweet, the photo is from Lebanon.
translation.ha: Saƙon tuwitan ya nuna cewa an ɗauki hoton ne a ƙasar Lebanon.
