translation.en: In the wake of the International Year of Indigenous Languages in 2019 and the International Decade of Indigenous Languages 2022-2032, many Africans have started to take a wide range of actions to advance African languages.
translation.ha: A ranar tunawa da harsunan uwa na shekarar 2019 da kuma shekaru gomana harsuna uwa daga 2022-2032, da yawa daga mutanen Afirka sun fara ƙoƙari wajen ci gaban harsunan Afirka.

translation.en: Writing the Yorùbá language in the borrowed Latin script may soon become a thing of the past as one Yorùbá man, Chief Tolúlàṣẹ Ògúntósìn, based in Benin, West Africa, has invented a writing system to encode the Yorùbá language.
translation.ha: Na ba da daɗewa ba rubuta harshen Yaruba ta amfani da haruffan Latin zai zama tarihi, domin kuwa wani babban mutum mai suna Tolúlàṣẹ Ògúntósìn da ke zaune a Benin, Afirka ta Yamma ya ƙirƙiri hanyar rubuta harshen Yoruba.

translation.en: The newly invented Yorùbá alphabet is making waves in the hopes that it could replace Latin script used for over 100 years.
translation.ha: Sababbun haruffan Yoruba da aka ƙirƙiro yana samun ƙarɓuwa, inda ake fatan za su maye gurbin na harshen Latin da aka shafe fiye da shekaru 100 ana amfani da su.

translation.en: The distinct alphabet came to him through divine inspiration in his dreams, according to Chief Ògúntósìn in a Whatsapp interview with Global Voices.
translation.ha: A wata hira da aka yi da Global ɓoices ta yi da Tolúlàṣẹ Ògúntósìn ta Wasof ya bayyana cewa an yi masa ilhamar waɗannan haruffan a cikin mafarki.

translation.en: He now travels across Yorùbáland — spanning Benin to Nigeria — to promote his "talking alphabet" as sent to him by his ancestors.
translation.ha: A yanzu yana zaga ƙasar Yarbawa domin haruffansa na magana su samu karɓuwa, waɗanda kakanninsa suka aiko masa.

translation.en: Chief Ògúntósìn believes that this alphabet was used by Odùduwà, the father of the Yorùbá people, in ancient times — but was lost.
translation.ha: Mai girama Ògúntósìn ya yi imanin cewa, Odùduwà wanda shi ne asalin Yarbawa ma ya yi amfani da su a da, amma suka ɓace.

translation.en: There are 25 symbols in all.
translation.ha: Akwai haruffa 25 gabaɗaya.

translation.en: African linguists assert that if Africa is to grow, it must have its own orthographies or writing systems.
translation.ha: Masana kimiyyar harshe a Afirka sun yi iƙirarin cewa, idan ana so Afirka ta ci gaba, to dole ne ta samu ƙa'idojin rubutu ko kuma hanyar rubutu.

translation.en: A civilized and ancient Niger-Congo language like Yorùbá should not rely on a borrowed orthography to encode its thoughts and philosophy.
translation.ha: Harsunan dangin Niger-Congo na da da suka ci-gaba kamar Yoruba bai kamata su dogara a kan ƙa'idojin rubutu na aro ba wajen bayyana tunaninsu da falsafarsu.

translation.en: Read more: Yorùbá loan words: How languages evolve
translation.ha: ƙarin bayani: Kalmomin aro na Yoruba: Yaya harsuna suka samu

translation.en: In 1843, Reverend Samuel Àjàyí Crowther of the Christian Missionary Society developed the Yorùbá orthography by adopting Latin script with diacritics — or accent marks.
translation.ha: A shekarar 1843, Rabaren Samuel Àjàyí Crowther na ƙungiyar Christian Missionary Society ya samar da ƙa'idojin rubutun Yoruba ta hanyar amfani da rubutun Latin, inda ake amfani da alamar karin sauti.

translation.en: Ever since, thousands of books have been published in Yorùbá using Latin script instead of Ajami, an Arabic script used before 1843 to write in West African Indigenous languages such as Yorùbá and Hausa.
translation.ha: Tun lokacin an buga dubunnan litattafai a Yoruba ta hanyar amfani da haruffan Latin, maimakon ajami wanda haruffa ne na Larabci da aka yi amfani da su kafin shekarar 1834 wajen rubuta harsunan Afirka ta kudu kamar Yoruba da Hausa.

translation.en: Some language advocates contend that using Latin, a foreign script, to encode African languages, keeps the continent in an enslaved mindset.
translation.ha: Wani harshe yana son amfani haruffan Latin, wanda haruffa ne na baƙin harsuna wajen magana da harsunan Afirka, inda haka ya sa nahiyar ta ci gaba da kasancewa baiwa a zuci.

translation.en: Instilling this new writing system follows a history of ancient writing systems in Africa, like Egyptian hieroglyphics, the Adrinka collection of the Akan tribe of Ghana, Ethiopian Ge'ez, the Nsibidi ideographic script of West Central Africa which date back to 5000 BC, as well as Vai alphabet scripts are of African origin.
translation.ha: Amfani da wannan sabuwar hanyar rubutu ta bi sahun tarihin hanyar rubutu na a Afirka, kamar na Masar da tarin kalmomin Adrinka na ƙabilar Akpan da ke Ghana da Ge'ez na Habasha da rubutun Nasibidi na Afirka ta tsakiya wanda yake tun shekarar 5000 da kuma haruffan ɓai duk asalinsu na Afirka ne.

translation.en: Divining a 'talking alphabet'
translation.ha: Haruffan magana' na ilhama.

translation.en: Global Voices Yorùbá Lingua Manager Ọmọ Yoòbá interviewed Chief Ògúntósìn, via WhatsApp voice note messaging, to learn more about how he discovered this new alphabet.
translation.ha: Manajan Global ɓoices Yorùbá Lingua Ọmọ Yoòbá ya yi hira da Ògúntósìn ta hanyar saƙon murya na Wasof domin sanin yadda aka yi ya gano waɗannan sababbun haruffan.

translation.en: Chief Ògúntósìn, now 43, explained that after the demise of his father in 1997, he had to care for his siblings as the oldest son and could not further his education after completing secondary school.
translation.ha: Ògúntósìn wanda ɗan shekara 43 a yanzu, ya bayyana cewa, bayan mutuwar babansa a shekarar 1997, ya ɗauki nauyin 'yan uwansa a matsayinsa na babban ɗa, bai iya ci gaba da karatu ba bayan ya gama sakandire.

translation.en: However, as a Yorùbá chief, he focused his cultural work on uniting the seven grandchildren of Odùduwa, serving as a mediator.
translation.ha: Sai dai, a matsayinsa na basarake a ƙasar Yarbawa, ya mayar da hankali a kan ayyukansa na al'ada domin haɗa kan jikokin Odùduwa a matsayin mai shiga tsakani.

translation.en: As his cultural integration work progressed, however, he wanted to achieve more.
translation.ha: A yayin da ayyukansa suka ci gaba, kodayake ya so ya fi haka.

translation.en: In 2011, he approached a babaláwo or “diviner” of Ifa, the Yorùbá god of wisdom.
translation.ha: A shekarar 2011 ya tunkari mai faɗar abin da zai faru na Ifa, wato allan Yarbawa mai hikima.

translation.en: The diviner, Olókun Awópẹ̀tu, told him to visit his ancestral shrine within the Farasinmi community in Badagry, Lagos State, Nigeria, and to take whatever he came into contact with at the shrine.
translation.ha: Mai faɗar abn da zai faru, wato Olókun Awópẹ̀tu ya gaya masa ya ziyarci ɗakin ibada na kakanninsa a unguwar Farasinmi da ke garin Badagry na Jihar Lagos, Nijeriya sannan ya ɗauke duk abin da ya gani a cikin ɗakin.

translation.en: There, he found a “strange object” that he took with him back to Porto-Novo, Benin.
translation.ha: Ya samu baƙin abubuwa waɗanda ya ɗauke su zuwa Porto-Noɓo, Benin.

translation.en: When he arrived, the house was completely dark.
translation.ha: Lokacin da ya isa, ya tarar da gidan cikin duhu.

translation.en: In Burundi, four journalists jailed for months await appeal
translation.ha: A Burundi, 'yan jaridu huɗu da aka ɗaure sun jiran ɗaukaka ƙara

translation.en: The journalists were accused of threatening state security
translation.ha: An zargi 'yan jaridar da yi wa tsaron ƙasa barazana

translation.en: The Press House in Bujumbura, from which independent radios were blocked access. 19 May 2010.
translation.ha: Gidan 'Yan jaridu a Bujumbura, daga wurin da aka datse damar gidajen rediyoyi masu zaman kansu. 19 ga Mayu, 2010.

translation.en: Four journalists — Agnès Ndirubusa, Christine Kamikazi, Térence Mpozenzi and Egide Harerimana — were charged with attempting to undermine state security and were sentenced in January 2020.
translation.ha: Yan jaridu huɗu — Agnes Ndirubusa da Christine Kamikazi da Terence Mpozenzi da kuma Egide Harerimana — an zarge su yunƙurin yi wa tsaron ƙasa zagon ƙasa kuma an yanke musu hukunci a Janairun 2020.

translation.en: The four, who all work with Iwacu newspaper, adamantly reject the charges.
translation.ha: Huɗun, waɗanda duk suke aiki da jaridar Iwacu, cikin ko in kula duk sun yi watsi da zarge-zargen.

translation.en: They now await an appeal decision on their prison sentence, after their hearing on May 6.
translation.ha: A yanzu suna jiran hukuncin ɗaukaka ƙara game da hukuncin zaman kurkuku, bayan sauraron ƙararsu ran 6 ga Mayu.

translation.en: Antoine Kaburahe, Iwacu founder who now lives in exile, wrote:
translation.ha: Antoine Kaburahe, wanda ya ƙirƙiro Iwacu wanda a yanzu ya gudu ya bar ƙasarsa, ya rubuta:

translation.en: Breaking: End of court hearing in Bubanza. Iwacu’s defence is satisfied.
translation.ha: Da ɗumi-ɗumi: ƙarshen sauraron ƙarar kotu a Bubanza. Mai kare Iwacu ya gamsu.

translation.en: The accusations against the journalists do not hold up.
translation.ha: Zargin da ake yi wa 'yan jaridar bai isar ba.

translation.en: The journalists were only doing their job: reporting.
translation.ha: Yan jaridar suna yin aikinsu ne kawai: kawo rahoto.

translation.en: What a relief!
translation.ha: Abin farin ciki!

translation.en: The case is under consideration, verdict in max 30 days.
translation.ha: Ana duba lamarin, hukunci a mafi yawanci kwanaki 30.

translation.en: Stay strong!
translation.ha: Kar ka damu!

translation.en: Detained for reporting
translation.ha: An kama shi saboda kawo rahoto

translation.en: On October 22, Burundian security forces battled with an armed anti-government group — reportedly RED-Tabara, based in the Democratic Republic of Congo — around the Kibira forest border area.
translation.ha: Ranar 22 ga Oktoba, jami'an tsaron Burundi sun yi faɗa da wata ƙungiya mai ƙin jinin gwamnati masu riƙe da makamai - kamar yadda aka rawaito RED-Tabara, waɗanda suke a ƙasar Congo - a wajen iyakar dajin Kibira.

translation.en: Armed groups have often used this area to move through the region.
translation.ha: ƙungiyoyi masu ɗauke da makamai a koyaushe suna amfani da wannan wuri don su shigo cikin yankin.

translation.en: In the battle, 14 insurgents were said to be killed, while security forces suffered about 10 casualties.
translation.ha: A yaƙin, an ce an kashe 'yan ta'adda 14, su kuma jami'an tsaro sun rasa kusan mutum 10.

translation.en: Later that day, police detained the four Iwacu journalists and their driver, Adolphe Masabarakiza, when they went to report at the Musigati commune, Bubanza province, to speak to people who had fled the fighting.
translation.ha: Daga baya a wannan rana, 'yan sanda sun kama 'yan jaridar Iwacu su huɗu tare da direban su, Adolphe Masabarakiza, a lokacin da suka je don ɗaukar rahoton al'ummar Musigati, a lardin Bubanza, domin su yi magana da mutanen da suka gujewa faɗan.

translation.en: At first, they were detained without charge, and Christine Kamikazi was reportedly hit when arrested.
translation.ha: Da farko, an kama su ne ba tare da shari'a ba, kuma an samu rahoton an daki Christine Kamikazi a lokacin kamun.

translation.en: Police confiscated their phones and materials and the intelligence services demanded account passwords in order to search their phones.
translation.ha: Yan sanda sun ƙwace wayoyinsu da sauran kayayyaki sannan jami'an tsaron sirri sun nemi su ba su faswod ɗin shafukansu domin su bincika wayoyin nasu.

translation.en: The journalists were then transferred to other cells with deplorable conditions.
translation.ha: Daga nan sai aka mayar da 'yan jaridar zuwa wasu sel ɗin da suke da mummunan yanayi.

translation.en: On October 26, in Bubanza province, they were finally charged with "complicity in threatening state security".
translation.ha: Ran 26 ga Oktoba, a lardin Bubanza, an zarge su da laifin "haɗa kai wajen yi wa tsaron ƙasa barazana".

translation.en: On October 31, the public prosecutor confirmed this and accused them of having information on the insurgents’ attack.
translation.ha: Ranar 31 ga Oktoba, alƙalin ya tabbatar da wannan kuma ya zarge su da masaniya game da harin 'yan ta'addan.

translation.en: Various organizations promptly called for their release, including Human Rights Watch, International Federation of Journalists, Olucome, African Journalists’ Federation and the Association Burundaise des Radiodiffuseurs.
translation.ha: ƙungiyoyi da yawa sun yi kira ga sakin su, har da ƙungiyar Kare Haƙƙin ɗan'dam ta Duniya da ƙungiyar 'Yan jaridu ta Duniya da Olucome da ƙungiyar 'Yan Jarida ta Afirka da kuma ƙungiyar 'Yan Jaridu ta Burundi.

translation.en: However, the National Communications Council said at the time that it could not discuss the matter.
translation.ha: Amma, sai Hukumar Sadarwa ta ƙasa ta ce a wannan lokaci ba za ta yi bayani a kan matsalar ba.

translation.en: Iwacu criticized this reaction, recalling that they were first held without charge and that the council is supposed to support journalists.
translation.ha: Iwacu sun ƙalubalanci wannan martanin, suna masu tunatar da cewa da farko fa an kama su ne ba tare da wani caji ba, kuma wannan hukumar ya kamata ta goyi bayan 'yan jarida.

translation.en: Many people expressed support online and signed a petition. International media discussed it as a threat to press freedom, while Iwacu continues to follow the situation closely.
translation.ha: Mutane da yawa a intanet sun nuna goyon baya kuma sun cike takardar ƙorafi. Kafafen yaɗa labarai na duniya sun bayyana abin a matsayin barazana ga 'yancin aikin jarida, sannan Iwacu sun cigaba da bibiyar lamarin sau da ƙafa.

translation.en: Journalist Esdras Ndikumana tweeted:
translation.ha: ɗan jarida Esdras Ndikumana ya rubuta a Tuwita:

translation.en: Burundi: 4 Iwacu journalists (and their driver) accused of "complicity in threatening the interior security of the state" for having covered a rebel incursion in Bubanza languish in the this province’s prisons (Drawing by Yaga)
translation.ha: Burundi: an zargi 'yan jaridun Iwacu 4 (da direbansu0 da "haɗin bakin wajen yi wa tsaron cikin gida barazana" don sun yi rahoton shigar 'yan tawaye cikin Bubanza su ɓalɓalce a kurkukun wannan lardi (Zane daga Yaga)

translation.en: Court hearing
translation.ha: Sauraron ƙara

translation.en: After appealing the decision on their detention, the date for their court hearing was set for November 18, To their surprise, they were summoned on November 11, to appear before judges for questioning — but without lawyers.
translation.ha: Bayan ɗaukaka ƙarar kama su, an sanya ranar sake zaman kotun su zuwa ranar 18 ga Nuwamba, amma abin da ya ba su mamaki, sai aka kawo musu sammaci a 11 ga Nuwamba, domin su zo gaban alƙali don amsa tambayoyi - amma ba tare da lauyoyi ba.

translation.en: They refused to answer without legal assistance, asking why their lawyers had not been informed beforehand, and then returned to detention, to be heard on November 18.
translation.ha: Sun ƙi su amsa ba tare da taimakon lauyoyi ba, suna masu tambayar me ya sa ba a sanar da lauyoyinsu kafin lokacin ba, sannan suka dawo wajen ɗauri, domin a ji su a 18 ga Nuwamba.

translation.en: On November 20, the decision came that the four journalists would remain in detention, but the driver was provisionally released.
translation.ha: A 20 ga Nuwamba, sai hukunci ya fito cewa 'yan jaridar huɗu za su cigaba da zama a hannun hukuma, amma an saki shi direban nasu a yanzu.

translation.en: The prosecution originally called for a 15-year prison sentence.
translation.ha: Hukunci da farko ya yi nuni zuwa ga zaman gidan yari na shekaru 15.

translation.en: President Pierre Nkurunziza said during a press conference on December 26 that he wanted a fair trial but he could only intervene as a last resort, even though he could use his power to grant a presidential pardon.
translation.ha: Shugaban ƙasa Piere Nkurunziza ya bayyana a wani taron manema labari a 26 ga Disamba cewa yana son hukunci na adalci amma sai iya shiga a matakin ƙarshe, duk da cewa zai iya amfani da ikonsa wajen tabbatar da yafiyar shugaban ƙasa.

translation.en: Sentencing
translation.ha: Yanke hukunci

translation.en: On January 30, in Bubanza, the four journalists were sentenced to two and a half years in prison and a fine of a million francs each ($521 United States dollars) under article 16 of the Penal Code, while the driver was acquitted.
translation.ha: A 30 ga Janairu, a Bubanza, an yanke wa 'yan jaridar huɗu hukuncin shekaru biyu da rabi a kurkuku da tarar franc miliyan kowannensu ($521 dalar Amurka) a ƙarƙashin sashe na 16 na pinalkod, amma an wanke direban nasu.

translation.en: The prosecution could not prove any actual link or contact with the rebels, so the charge was changed to "impossible attempt at the complicity in undermining state security", that is — that they intended to threaten state security but it was not possible.
translation.ha: Hukuncin bai tabbatar da wani haƙiƙanin alaƙa ko mu'amala da 'yan tawayen ba, don haka sai aka sauya cajin zuwa "yunƙurin da bai yiwu ba na cin dunduniyar tsaron ƙasa", shi ne - sun yi ƙoƙarin su yi wa tsaron ƙasa barazana amma ba zai yiwu ba.

translation.en: Iwacu pointed out that the reporters went to the area after authorities had publicly mentioned the incident, were accredited, and there were no restrictions on the area.
translation.ha: Iwasu sun nuna cewa masu rahoton sun je wajen ne bayan mahukunta sun yi bayani a fili game da lamarin, kuma an tantance su, kuma ba wani hana zuwa wajen da aka yi.

translation.en: The key element used as evidence against the journalists was a WhatsApp message sent by one of the reporters to a friend, which said they were going to "help the rebels".
translation.ha: Babban abin da aka yi amfani da shi wajen kama 'yan jaridar shi ne wani saƙon Was'af wanda ɗaya daga cikin masu rahoton ya tura wa wani abokinsa, wanda ya ce za su "taimaki 'yan tawayen".

translation.en: They argued it was clearly a dry joke — the government has often conflated critics, political opponents, and armed groups to justify generalized crackdowns. But the text was taken literally as evidence against them.
translation.ha: Sun nuna cewa wannan wani mummunan wasa ne - gwamnati tana harhaɗa maganganun masu sukarta da masu siyasar hamayya da ƙungiyoyi masu ɗauke da makamai domin samun damar murƙushe su. Amma an yi amfani da saƙon a yadda yake domin kama su.

translation.en: Reporters Without Borders (RSF) said the journalists should be able to report on sensitive topics without fear of reprisals, particularly ahead of Burundi's May 20 election.
translation.ha: Reporters Without Boarders (RSF) sun ce 'yan jarida suna da damar yin rahoto a kan dukkanin wani abu mai muhimmanci ba tare da tsoron abin da zai biyo baya ba, musamman da ake daf da zaɓen Burundi na 20 ga Mayu.

translation.en: They made a petition calling for their release, which had almost 7,000 signatures in early May.
translation.ha: Sun yi ƙorafin da yake nuna a sake su, wanda ya sami sa hannu kusa 7,000 a farkon Mayu.

translation.en: European Union deputies, the European Parliament, and UN human rights experts are among those who called for their release.
translation.ha: Mataimakan ƙungiyar ƙasashen Turai da Majalisar ƙasashen Turai da ƙwararrun masanan kare haƙƙin ɗan'adam na MDD suna daga cikin waɗanda suka yi kira da a sake su.

translation.en: Appeal
translation.ha: ɗaukaka ƙara

translation.en: On February 20, the journalists appealed, questioning the quality of the legal process, including the change to the original charge without proper notification.
translation.ha: Ranar 20 ga Fabarairu, 'yan jaridan sun ɗaukaka ƙara, suna ƙalubalantar ingancin hanyoyin shari'ar, wanda ya haɗa da sauya zargin asali da aka yi musu ba tare da sanarwar da ta dace ba.

translation.en: On May 6, the journalists appeared at an appeal hearing, after approximately six months in jail.
translation.ha: A 6 ga Mayu, 'yan jaridar sun bayyana a wajen ɗaukaka ƙara, bayan kusan kimanin watanni shiga a gidan yari.

translation.en: Responding to the accusation based on the WhatsApp message, the defense noted that in another message, one journalist said the rebels were coming to "threaten the peace".
translation.ha: A lokacin da suke mayar da martani a kan zargin game da saƙon Was'af, masu kariyar sun nuna cewa a wani saƙon, 'yan tawayen suna zuwa domin "barazana ga zaman lafiya".

translation.en: RFI quoted their defense lawyer, Clément Retirakiza, saying there was an absence of evidence against them, and they wanted to show it was a purely professional trip.
translation.ha: Kafar RFI ta jiwo yadda lauyan kariya, Clement Retirakisa, yana cewa akwai ba wata hujja don kama su, kuma suna son su nuna tafiya ce ta aiki kawai.

translation.en: Iwacu has long been an independent voice that criticizes politicized violence — it is one of the last independent media outlets following the 2015 crackdown.
translation.ha: Kafar Iwacu ta daɗe da zama hanyar sadarwa mai zaman kanta wadda take ƙalubalantar rikice-rikicen siyasa - tana daga cikin kafafen yaɗa labarai masu zaman kansu na ƙarshe bayan murƙushewar 2015.

translation.en: A history of violence against journalists
translation.ha: Tarihin cin zarafin 'yan jarida

translation.en: After controversial 2015 elections — in which Nkurunziza returned for a third term that many argued as unconstitutional — there was a failed putsch. The media environment quickly deteriorated.
translation.ha: Bayan zaɓuɓɓukan 2015 da ake cecekuce a kansu - a inda aka zaɓi Nkurunziza a karo na uku wanda da yawa suka nuna ba ya kan tsarin kundin mulkin - an sami yunƙurin juyin mulkin da bai yi nasara ba. Nan da nan ɓangaren kafafen yaɗa labarai suka sukurkuce.

translation.en: Several radios stations — the most relied upon for information in Burundi — were closed and some were attacked. Dozens of journalists fled and some suffered torture, such as Esdras Ndikumana.
translation.ha: Da yawa gidajen rediyo - waɗanda aka fi dogara a kansu wajen samun bayanai a Burundi - an rufe su, wasu kuma an kai musu farmaki. Da yawan 'yan jaridu sun gudu wasu kuma an azabtar da su, kamar Esdras Ndikumana.

translation.en: Numerous journalists have also experienced violence from security forces, particularly when reporting on topics deemed “sensitive” by the state.
translation.ha: Yan jaridu da yawa sun yi fama da cin zarafi daga jami'an tsaro, musamman a lokacin da suke yi rahoton da gwamnati take ganin "mai muhimmanci" ne.

translation.en: In late 2015, cameraman Christophe Nkezabahizi was killed by police along with three family members, in an operation against protests after the contentious election.
translation.ha: A ƙarshen 2015, 'yan sanda sun kashe mai ɗaukar hoto Christophe Nkezabahizi tare da mutum uku daga iyalinsa, a wani yunƙurin hana zanga-zanga bayan zaɓen da ake da shakku.

translation.en: In July 2016, Jean Bigirimana was forcibly disappeared, reportedly arrested by intelligence services (SNR), with a limited police investigation.
translation.ha: A Yulin 2016, ta ƙarfi an ɓatar da Jean Bigirimana, wanda ake jin 'yan sandan sirrin (na SNR) sun kama, ba tare da wani binciken 'yan sanda ba.

translation.en: This year, on January 16, reporter Blaise-Pascal Kararumiye with Radio Isanganiro (Meeting Point Radio) was arrested following a report on local government finances. On April 28, journalist Jackson Bahati was hit by a police officer while reporting.
translation.ha: A wannan shekarar, ranar 16 ga Janairu, an kama Blaise-Pascal Kararumiye wanda mai rahoton rediyon Isangniro ne (Rediyon Wurin Haɗuwa) bayan wani rahoto game da kuɗin ƙananan hukumomi. Ranar 28 ga Afrilu, wani ɗan sanda ya daki Jackson Bahati a lokacin da yake rahoto.

translation.en: International media have not been spared, with BBC and VOA banned in 2019. RSF ranked Burundi 160 of 180 countries for press freedom — down 15 from 2015.
translation.ha: Kafafen yaɗa labarai na duniya ma ba a bar su ba, an kore BBC da ɓOA a 2019. RSF ta sanya Burundi ta 160 a jerin ƙasashe 180 game da 'yancin 'yan jarida ƙasa zuwa 15 a 2015.

translation.en: Women in Nigeria face a caustic landmine of political advocacy online
translation.ha: Mata a Najeriya suna fama da mummunan yafe game da ra'ayin siyasa a intanet

translation.en: #BringBackOurGirls and #ArewaMeToo reshaped political activism in Nigeria
translation.ha: Gangamin #BringBackOurGirls DA #ArewaMeToo sun sauya gwagwarmayar siyasa a Najeriya

translation.en: Members of the Mother's Savings Club, Nigeria. Image by Karen Kasmauski / USAID in Africa via United States government work, public domain.
translation.ha: Mambobin Kulob ɗin Kare Iyaye, a Najeriya. Hoto daga Karen Kasmauski / USAID a Afirka ta hanyar aikin gwamnatin Amurka, wurin al'umma.

translation.en: In Nigeria, the political advocacy sphere is a caustic landmine.
translation.ha: A Najeriya, ɓangaren nuna ra'ayin siyasa wani waje ne mai tsauri.

translation.en: Politics and advocacy usually get filtered through a religious and ethnocentric prism.
translation.ha: Siyasar gwagwarmaya a wasu lokutan taken samu suka daga ɓangarorin addini da ƙabilanci.

translation.en: Advocates with a strong social media presence — especially on Twitter — have to develop a tough skin to deal with the avalanche of gbas gbos (Nigerian Pidgin for “throwing punches”) in digital spaces.
translation.ha: Masu rajin da suke da mabiya a soshiyal mediya - musamman a Tuwita - dole su yi ɗamara domin tunkarar yawan kawo kutuf (Pidgin ɗin Najeriya da yake nufin "kawo naushi") a intanet.

translation.en: Nigerian female advocates — in addition to weathering this identity-driven harmful content — also face the added reality of gender-driven attacks.
translation.ha: Mata 'yan Najeriya masu gwagwarmaya - ƙari a kan wannan - sukan fuskanci farmakin da yake da alaƙa da jinsi.

translation.en: How do female advocates in Nigeria cope with the bitter online terrain such as trolling, hate speech and targeted misalignment of their messages?
translation.ha: Ta yaya mata 'yan gwagwarmaya a Najeriya suke iya rayuwa da irin wannan zazzafar suka a intanet kamar sakowa a gaba da kalaman ɓatanci da kuma juya saƙonninsu da gangan?

translation.en: How do they forge ahead to make sure that these attacks do not simmer their resolve or eclipse the message of their movement?
translation.ha: Ta yaya suke jurewa su cigaba domin tabbatar da cewa irin waɗannan soke-soken ba sa rage ƙoƙarinsu ko su dakushe saƙon gwagwarmayar tasu?

translation.en: Two online social media movements in Nigeria lend powerful insights into the experiences of advocacy and gender: The #BringBackOurGirls movement, led by Dr. Oby Ezekwesili; and #ArewaMeToo, led by Fakhriyyah Hashim, both experienced gendered political hatred that greatly affected the integrity of their messages.
translation.ha: Yunƙuri guda biyu a kan soshiyal midiya a Najeriya sun nuna wani babban abu game da yadda gwagwarmaya da kuma alaƙar jinsi take: Yunƙurin #BringBackOurGirls, wanda Dr. Oby Ezekwesili ta jagoranta; da #ArewaMeToo, wanda Fakhriyyah Hshim ta jagoranta, dukkaninsu sun fuskanci wata ƙyama ta siyasa mai alaƙa da jinsi wanda ya shafi gaskiyar saƙwannin nasu.

translation.en: #BringBackOurGirls (#BBOG) movement
translation.ha: Gangamin #BringBackOurGirls (#BBOG)

translation.en: Six years ago, on April 15, 2014, about 200 school girls between the ages of 15 and 18, were forcefully abducted by Boko Haram, an Islamist terrorist group, from Government Girls Secondary School in Chibok near Maiduguri, in northeast Nigeria.
translation.ha: Shekaru shida da suka shuɗe, ran 15 ga Afrilu, 2014, kusan 'yan mata 'yan makaranta 200 'yan tsakanin shekaru 15 zuwa 18, Boko Haram ta sace su da ƙarfin tsiya, wani ƙungiyar 'yan ta'adda, daga makarantar gwamnati ta 'yan mata a Chibok, kusa da Maiduguri, a arewa masu gashin Najeriya.

translation.en: The kidnapping of the Chibok girls ignited an international outcry.
translation.ha: Sace 'yan mata Chibok ya jawo maganganu daga duniya.

translation.en: The BBC reported that in April 2014, the #BringBackOurGirls trended on Twitter with over 3.3 million tweets, 27 percent of the tweets came from Nigeria, 26 percent from the United States and 11 percent from the United Kingdom.
translation.ha: BBC ta rawaito cewa a Afrilun 2014, gangamin #BringBackOurGirls ya yi yawa a Tuwita da rubuce-rubucen Tuwita sama da miliyan 3.3, kaso 27 cikin ɗari na rubuce-rubucen sun fito ne daga Najeriya, kaso 26 daga Amurka sai kuma kaso 11 daga Birtaniya.

translation.en: Dr. Oby Ezekwesili answering a question during a UN Women event with #BringBackOurGirls Campaign Coordinators.
translation.ha: A lokacin da Dr. Oby Ezekwesili take amsa tambaya a wani taron mata na MDD tare da shugabannin gangamin #BringBackOurGirls.

translation.en: Image by UN Women/Ryan Brown, September 14, 2014. (CC BY-NC-ND 2.0)
translation.ha: Hoto daga taron mata na MDD/Ryan Brown, 14 ga Satumba, 2014. (cc ɓy-nc-nd 2.0)

translation.en: Dr. Obiageli (Oby) Ezekwesili, a former vice president of the World Bank, and one-time minister of education in Nigeria, started tweeting about the Chibok girls the day they were kidnapped.
translation.ha: Dr. Obiagel (Oby) Ezekwesili, tsohuwar mataimakiyar shugaban Bankin Duniya, kuma ta taɓa riƙe ministar ilimi ta Najeriya, ta fara rubuce-rubuce a Tuwita game da 'yan mata Chibok a ranar da aka sace su.

translation.en: She was motivated to take action due to a previous attack on schoolboys at the Federal Government College of Buni Yadi in Yobe State, northeastern Nigeria on February 25, 2014.
translation.ha: Ta sami ƙarfin guiwar ɗaukar mataki ne saboda wani harin da ya wuce da aka kai wa yara 'yan makaranta maza a kwalejin gwamnatin tarayya a Buni Yadi a Jihar Yobe, arewa maso gabashin Najeriya ran 25 ga Fabarairun 2014.

translation.en: Fifty-nine boys died from gunshots or knife wounds, while the others were burnt to death.
translation.ha: Yara hamsin da tara sun rasu a sakamakon harbin bindiga ko raunukan wuƙa, wasunsu kuma an ƙona su har suka mutu.

translation.en: However, it was not until April 23, when, as a guest at a UNESCO event in Port Harcourt, in the oil-rich Niger Delta region, did her cry for the release of the schoolgirls grab national and international attention:
translation.ha: Amma, har sai 23 ga Afrilu, a lokacin da, a matsayin baƙuwa a wani taron UNESCO a Fatakwal, a yankin da yake NaijaDelta mai arziƙin man fetur, koke-kokenta na a saki waɗannan 'yan matan makarantar ya sami karɓuwa a ƙasa da ma duniya:

translation.en: And on May 7, 2014, former American first lady Michelle Obama posted an image of herself on Twitter holding a sign with the hashtag #BringBackOurGirls.
translation.ha: Kuma a 7 ga Mayu, 2014, tsohuwar matan shugaban ƙasar Amurka, Michelle Obama ta maƙala hotonta a Tuwita, tana riƙe da wata alama mai ɗauke da #BringBackOurGirls.

translation.en: She also released a video a few days later from the White House — making it a global sensation.
translation.ha: Ta kuma saki wani bidiyo 'yan kwanaki kaɗan daga baya daga Fadar Gwamnatin Amurka - wanda ya mayar da lamarin damuwar duniya.

translation.en: It would take two years before the Nigerian army rescued one girl, in May 2016.
translation.ha: Sai da aka ɗauki shekaru biyu kafin sojojin Najeriya su ceto yarinya ɗaya, a Mayu 2016.

translation.en: By October 2016, 21 girls were reunited with their families. And by May 2017, Boko Haram militants released 82 girls from captivity.
translation.ha: Zuwa Oktoba 2016, an sake haɗa 'yan mata 21 da iyalansu. Kuma zuwa Mayu 2017, mayaƙan Boko Haram suka saki 'yan mata 82 daga kamu.

translation.en: However, about 112 girls remain missing and 13 are presumed dead, according to a 2018 report.
translation.ha: Amma kusan 'yan mata 112 har yanzu ba a gan su ba kuma ana jin 13 sun mutu, kamar yadda wani rahoto ya nuna a 2018.

translation.en: Ezekwesili co-founded the #BBOG movement that mobilized a global protest for the release of the Chibok girls.
translation.ha: Ezekwesili tana daga waɗanda suka fara gangamin #BBOG wanda ya haɗa zanga-zanga ta duniya domin a saki 'yan matan Chibok.

translation.en: The movement later transformed into a formidable social movement organisation that has withstood the harsh Nigerian civic space.
translation.ha: Wannan gangamin daga baya ya zama wani gagarumin gangamin kawo sauyi a cikin al'umma wanda ya jure dukkanin wasu wahalhalun mutanen Najeriya.

translation.en: But the success of this movement occurred at great personal cost to Ezekwesili.
translation.ha: Amma nasarar wannan gangami ya samu ne ta hanyar wasu abubuwa da ita Ezekwesili ta kashe.

translation.en: The kidnapping of the Chibok girls occurred on the threshold of the 2015 presidential election, and Ezekwesili's online advocacy was viewed through the prism of partisan politics by some.
translation.ha: Sace 'yan mata Chibok ya zo ne ana kusa da zaɓen shugaban ƙasa na 2015, don haka wasu sun kalli ƙoƙarin Ezekwesili a intanet a matsayin wata siyasar jam'iyya.

translation.en: Her personal integrity was not only questioned but shredded.
translation.ha: Ba tababar gaskiya kawai aka yi ba, an ma yi watsi da mutuncinta.

translation.en: Some alleged that her #BBOG was merely a front to gain political capital.
translation.ha: Wasu sun yi zargin cewa yunƙurinta na #BBOG wata hanya ce kawai ta neman jarin siyasa.

translation.en: Reno Omokri, a former presidential aide, accused Ezekwesili of being used by the then-opposition party, the All Progressive Congress (APC), to "undermine" the government of President Jonathan, thereby paving the way for APC’s "rise to power".
translation.ha: Reno Omokri, tsohon mai taimakawa shugaban ƙasa, ya zargi Ezekwesili da jam'iyyar 'yan adawa ne suke amfani da ita, APC, domin su yi wa gwamnatin shugaban Jonathan "zagon ƙasa", ta hanyar samar da damar "samun iko" ga APC.

translation.en: Supporters of former President Jonathan and the Peoples’ Democratic Party spread "all manners of falsehoods" online against Ezekwesili in 2014: "I was actually being insulted, maligned..." said Ezekwesili in a live Twitter video broadcast on April 14, to mark the sixth anniversary of the abduction.
translation.ha: Masu goyon bayan tsohon shugaban ƙasa Jonathan da PDP sun yaɗa "duk wata irin ƙarya" a intanet a kan Ezekwesili a 2014: "A haƙiƙanin gaskiya an zage ni an ci mutuncina…" Ezekwesili ta bayyana a wani saƙon Tuwita na kai tsaye ran 14 ga Afrilu, domin nuna cikar shekaru shida da sacewar.

translation.en: Ezekwesili was falsely accused of being bitter for not gaining a ministerial appointment under Jonathan.
translation.ha: An zargi Ezekwesili a kan ƙarya da cewa tana adawa ne don ba ta sami muƙamin minista ba a ƙarƙashin Jonathan.

translation.en: According to her, some of her online attackers thought “that the reason we kept on with the advocacy of Chibok girls was that I wanted to be made a minister.”
translation.ha: Kamar yadda ta bayyana, wasu daga cikin masu yi mata barazana a intanet suna zaton "cewa dalilin tsayawarmu a kan wannan gwagwarmayar ta 'yan matan Chibok shi ne ina so a naɗa ni minista."

translation.en: How could I want to be made a minister when I rejected the request to be a minister way before the Chibok girls were abducted three years later?
translation.ha: Ta yaya zan so a naɗa ni minista bayan na yi watsi da neman a ba ni minista tun kafin a sace 'yan matan Chibok shekaru uku da suka wuce?

translation.en: Ezekwesili said in the live Twitter video broadcast.
translation.ha: Ezekwesili ta bayyana a wani bidiyon Tuwita na kai tsaye.

translation.en: She became a 2018 presidential contender, but later withdrew from the race.
translation.ha: Ta zama 'yar takarar shugabancin ƙasa a 2018, amma daga baya ta janye daga takarar.

translation.en: Live on Twitter, Ezekwesili recalled her grief: It was a very sad thing for me to bear the thought that children who went to school were so killed and brutally murdered to the point where parents could not recognise their children.
translation.ha: Kai tsaye a Tuwita, Ezekwesili ta yi bayanin damuwarta: abu ne na matuƙar damuwa a gare ni in dinga tuna cewa yaran da suka tafi makaranta an kashe su a haka an musu kisan gilla har ta kai ga jallin iyaye ba za su iya gane 'ya'yansu ba.

translation.en: But her grief and rage was eclipsed by the political maligning she endured to get the #BBOG message out.
translation.ha: To amma damuwarta da fushinta sun zama lami idan aka kwatanta da cin mutuncin da ta sha don fitar da saƙon #BBOG

translation.en: #ArewaMeToo and NorthNormal
translation.ha: #ArewaMeToo da Arewaƙalau

translation.en: On February 3, 2019, a young woman named Khadijah Adamua found the courage to tweet about the physical abuse inflicted by her ex-boyfriend.
translation.ha: A ranar 3 ga Fabarairu, wata matashiyar mata mai suna Khadijah Adamua ta sami ƙarfin guiwar yin rubutu a Tuwita game da cin zarafin da ta sha daga tsohon saurayinta.

translation.en: Adamua, who lives in Kano state in northwest Nigeria, had previously blogged about her horrific experiences.
translation.ha: Adamua, wadda take zaune a jihar Kano a arewa maso yammacin Najeriya, ta taɓa yin rubutu a kan munanan matsalolin da ta fuskanta.

translation.en: Fellow Nigerian Fakhriyyah Hashim tweeted her support for Adamua with the hashtag #ArewaMeToo:
translation.ha: Wata 'yar Najeriya Fakhriyya Hashim ta yi rubutu a Tuwita domin nuna goyon baya ga Adamua da hashtag na #ArewaMeToo:

translation.en: #ArewaMeToo became northern Nigeria’s version of the global #MeToo movement. (Arewa is the Hausa word for “North”) — igniting a storm of online discussion on rape and other forms of gender-based violence.
translation.ha: #ArewaMeToo ya zama kwafin arewacin Najeriya na gangamin #MeToo na duniya. (Arewa kalmar Hausa ce ta "Arewa") - wanda ya jawo cecekucen tattaunawa a intanet game da fyaɗe da sauran abubuwan cin zarafin mata.

translation.en: Violence against women is rampant throughout Nigeria. However, Relief Web asserts that between November 2014 and January 2015, northeastern Nigeria, especially Borno State, recorded the most violence against women.
translation.ha: Cin zarafin da ake yi wa mata yana da yawa a duk faɗin Najeriya. Amma shafin Relief Web ya bayyana cewa tsakanin Nuwamban 2014 da Janairun 2015 arewa maso gabashin Najeriya, musamman Jihar Borno, sun fi kowa fuskantar cin zarafin mata.

translation.en: In the Muslim-majority north, discussions about these taboo topics are difficult, often forcing victims into silence.
translation.ha: A yankin da Muslmi suka fi yawa na Arewa, yin bayani game da waɗannan abubuwan yana da wahala, sau da yawa hakan yakan jawo wanda abin ya shafa ya yi shiru.

translation.en: The online rage of #ArewaMeToo propelled the NorthNormal offline protests in Bauchi, Kano, Niger.
translation.ha: Damuwar da aka nuna a intanet ta #ArewaMeToo ta jawo zanga-zangar haƙiƙa a garin Bauchi da Kano da Naija.

translation.en: Sixteen days of NorthNormal protests occurred in November last year across eight northern Nigerian states and Abuja.
translation.ha: Kwanaki sha shida na zanga-zangar NorthNormal sun faru a Nuwamban shekarar bara a jihohi takwas na Najeriya da Abuja.

translation.en: They were largely positive and state legislators "were receptive of young indigenes” for taking “the baton to push for the VAPP", Hashim said.
translation.ha: Da yawansu sun sami karɓuwa kuma 'yan majalisun jihohi "sun karɓi matasan 'yan ƙasa" don yunƙurin "ɗaukar gabaran tursasa ɓAPP", Hashim ta bayyana.

translation.en: However, in Sokoto State, "government played a role in harassing and arresting NorthNormal campaigners", Hashim said.
translation.ha: Amma, a Jihar Sakkwato, "gwamnati ta taka rawa wajen cin tsorata da kama masu gangamin NorthNormal", Hashim ta bayyana.

translation.en: The police manhandled a local leader of the movement.
translation.ha: Yan sanda sun sassama shugaban gangamin.

translation.en: Thereafter, protests were banned by the Sultan of Sokoto, head of Nigerian Muslims.
translation.ha: Daga nan, Sultan ɗin Sakkwato, shugaban Musulmin Najeriya, ya soke duk wata zanga-zanga.

translation.en: According to Hashim, NorthNormal grew out of the #ArewaMeToo hashtag, and has two objectives: advocating for “the domestication of the Violence against Persons Prohibition Act (VAPP),” and championing the conversation on “various forms of gender-based violence and rape culture across northern Nigeria.”
translation.ha: Kamar yadda Hashim ta bayyana, NorthNormal ya samo asali ne daga hashtag ɗin #ArewaMeToo, kuma yana da burika biyu: yunƙurin samar da "tabbatuwar Dokar hana cin zarafin mutane (ɓAPP)," da kuma ingiza tattaunawa game da "nau'ika daban-daban na cin zarafin mata da al'adar fyaɗe a dukkanin arewacin Najeriya."

translation.en: The Violence Against Persons (Prohibition) Act 2015 was signed into law on May 23, 2015.
translation.ha: An amince da ƙudurin dokar cin zarafin mutane na 2015 a ranar 23 ga Mayun 2015.

translation.en: Under the VAPP Act — an improvement on the provisions of Nigeria’s penal code — acts of violence against women are punishable offences.
translation.ha: A ƙarƙashin dokar ɓAPP - wanda yake cigaba ne game da abin da penalkod na Najeriya yake da shi - cin zarafin mata laifuka ne da za a yi hukunci a kansu.

translation.en: This includes rape, spousal battery, forceful home ejections, forced financial dependence or economic abuse, harmful widowhood practices, female circumcision or genital mutilation, and/or child abandonment.
translation.ha: Wannan ya haɗar da fyaɗe da dukan abokin zama da kora daga gida ta ƙarfi da tursasa dogaro na kuɗi ko matsalolin rashin ɗaukar nauyi da cutar da bazawara da kaciyar mata da rashin kula da 'ya'ya.

translation.en: In Nigeria, rape is punishable with life imprisonment. A minor can face up to 14 years in prison.
translation.ha: A Najeriya, ana yin hukuncin fyaɗe da ɗaurin rai da rai. ƙarami kuma zai iya fuskantar shekaru 14 a kurkuku.

translation.en: In cases of gang rape, offenders are jointly liable to 20 years imprisonment without the option of a fine.
translation.ha: A matsalolin fyaɗe na mutane da yawa, masu laifin za su shafe shekaru 20 a gidan yari dukkaninsu ba tare da zaɓin tara ba.

translation.en: However, Section 47 of the VAPP Act stipulates that this legislation applies only in Abuja, Nigeria’s capital. NorthNormal and other organisations have been campaigning for all 36 state legislative assemblies to domesticate this act.
translation.ha: Amma sashi na 47 na dokar ɓAPP ya bayyana cewa wannan dokar ta shafi Abuja ne kawai, babban birnin Najeriya. NorthNormal da sauran ƙungiyoyi sun ta yin kira ga majalisun jihohi na jihohi 36 da su karɓi wannan dokar.

translation.en: Backlash against advocates
translation.ha: Bita da ƙulli ga masu gwagwarmaya

translation.en: One year after sparking the #ArewaMeToo movement, Hashim told Global Voices that although their advocacy exposed the "rot within society", it also took its toll.
translation.ha: Shekara ɗaya bayan fara gangamin #ArewaMeToo, Hashim ta sanar da Global ɓoices cewa duk da cewa yunƙurinsu ya fito da "matsalar da ke cikin al'umma", to amma fa akwai wata a ƙasa.

translation.en: Hashim experienced major online harassment when her group confronted "an alleged serial abuser of minors" who works at the finance ministry as part of their online advocacy.
translation.ha: Hashim ta fuskanci babbar matsalar barazana a intanet a lokacin ga ƙungiyarta suka ƙalubalanci wani "babban mai cin zarafin yara" wanda yake aiki a ma'aikatar kuɗi a wani ɓangare na gwagwarmayarsu ta intanet.

translation.en: She told Global Voices:
translation.ha: Ta gaya wa Global ɓoices:

translation.en: We launched a campaign against him [the serial abuser], demanding that he be sacked by the minister; some people did not like that so they orchestrated an online targeted harassment campaign to delegitimise ArewaMeToo.
translation.ha: Mun kafa gangami domin ƙalubalantarsa [babban mai cin zarafin], muna neman ministan ya kore shi daga aiki; wasu mutane ba sa son haka, don haka sai suka ƙulla wani bi-ta-da-ƙulli a intanet domin su wulaƙantar da ArewaMeToo.

translation.en: According to Hashim, harassers attempted to delegitimise ArewaMeToo by associating ArewaMeToo with LGBTQ [lesbians, gay, bisexual transgender and queer people] and their strategy worked as online harassment gained momentum, Hashim said.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda Hashim ta bayyana, masu cin zarafin sun so su wulaƙanta ArewaMeToo ta hanyar alaƙanta ArewaMeToo da LGBTƙ ['yan maɗigo da masu luwaɗi] kuma dabarar su ta yi domin abin nasu ya samu karɓuwa a intanet, Hashim ta bayyana.

translation.en: In Nigeria, gay marriage is illegal and under Sharia and penal legal codes, sodomy and lesbianism are punishable in some states.
translation.ha: A Najeriya, auren jinsi haramun ne kuma a ƙarƙashin Sharia da Pinalkod ana hukunta masu luwaɗi da 'yan maɗigo a wasu jihohin.

translation.en: By associating Haashim's movement with LGBTQ rights, online trolls distorted their message and framed #ArewaToo and NorthNormal as illegitimate.
translation.ha: Alaƙanta yunƙurin Hashim da ƙungiyar luwaɗi, masu yarfe na intanet sun juya musu saƙonsu aka sa musu #ArewaToo da kuma ArewaLafiya a matsayin haramtattu.

translation.en: However, Global Voices was not able to independently verify tweets that pinned Hashim's movement to LGBTQ rights.
translation.ha: Amma, Global ɓoices ba ta iya tabbatar da labaran Tuwita da suka alaƙanta yunƙurin Hashim da haƙƙin ƙungiyar 'yan luwaɗi ba.

translation.en: Still, Hashim posts messages of hope on Twitter:
translation.ha: Har yanzu, Hashim yana rubuta saƙonnin fata a Tuwita:

translation.en: Fakhriyyah Hashim, co-founder of #ArewaToo and NorthNormal (Image used with her permission).
translation.ha: Fakhriyya Hashim, ɗaya daga cikin waɗanda suka samar da #ArewaToo da ArewaLafiya (An yi amfani da hoto da izininta).

translation.en: She said all these experiences helped her grow a "really thick skin":
translation.ha: Ta ce duk waɗannan abubuwan sun sa ta ƙara samun damar "ɗauke kai":

translation.en: In my experience of being loud on political Twitter for good governance, I’ve grown a really thick skin, but even that didn't prepare me for the amount of backlash we got through ArewaMeToo and NorthNormal.
translation.ha: A masaniyata game da ɓaɓatu a siyasar Tuwita game da shugabanci nagari, na fara ɗauke kaina daga duk wata barazana, amma ko wannan bai sa na iya ɗaukar matsalolin da muka shiga ba a ArewaMeToo da NorthNormal.

translation.en: Though I mustered all of that and did not retreat to any cave, I did begin feeling demoralised about Northern Nigeria’s governanace and response to sexual violence...
translation.ha: Duk da cewa na iya shanye duk wancan kuma ban gudu ba, na fara jin gazawa game da shugabancin Arewacin Najeriya da martani game da cin zarafin mata…

translation.en: After every episode of attacks, we did gather more strength and energy to push back because the backlash made us see how society enforced the culture of silence and if we allowed our lips to be sealed then that would be the real tragedy.
translation.ha: Bayan kowane zagayen zage-zage, sai mu ƙara ƙwarin guiwa da ƙarfin ƙara kutsawa domin duk wata matsala takan sa mu ga yadda al'umma suke tursasa al'adar yin shiru kuma idan muka bari aka rufe mana bakinmu to wannan ne zai zama babbar masifa.

translation.en: Sadly, Hashim and Ezekwesili still struggle with the excruciating "lack of empathy" that characterises discourse about gender-based violence on- and offline.
translation.ha: Abin baƙin ciki, Hashim da Ezekwesili sun ci gaba da gwagwarmaya tare da tsananin "rashin tausayawa" wanda yake da alaƙa da maganganu game da cin zarafin mata a intanet da ma a rayuwa ta haƙiƙa.

translation.en: According to Hashim, this "deliberate maligning of a cause that only seeks better for victims of sexual violence" is incredibly difficult to grasp.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda Hashim ta bayyana, wannan "suka da gangan ga yunƙurin da yake neman yadda za a inganta rayuwar waɗanda abin ya shafa" abu ne mai matuƙar wahalar ganewa.

translation.en: This article is part of the project, "the identity matrix: platform regulation of online threats to expression in Africa".
translation.ha: Wannan rubutun ɓangare ne na wani shiri, "hanyar ganewa: kula da shafuka na barazanar intanet wajen bayyana ra'ayi a Afirka".

translation.en: These posts interrogate identity-driven online hate speech or discrimination based on language or geographic origin, misinformation and harassment (particularly against female activists and journalists) prevalent in the digital spaces of seven African countries: Algeria, Cameroon, Ethiopia, Nigeria, Sudan, Tunisia and Uganda.
translation.ha: Waɗannan rubuce-rubucen sun binciki maganganun ɓatanci da suka shafi waye mutum ko kuma wariya wadda ta shafi harshe ko asalin wurin zama, ko zurmawa da cin zarafi (musamman wanda ake yi wa mata 'yan gwagwarmaya ko 'yan jarida) wanda ya yaɗa a intanet a ƙasashen Afirka bakwai: Aljeriya da Kamaru da Habasha da Najeriya da Sudan da Tunisiya da kuma Uganda.

translation.en: The project is funded by the Africa Digital Rights Fund of The Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).
translation.ha: An ɗauki nauyin shirin daga Tallafin Afrika na Haƙƙoƙin Intane na Haɗakar ƙasashen Duniya game da dokar ICT domin Gabashi da Kudancin Afirka. (CIPESA).

translation.en: In Assad-controlled Syria, the official narrative is ‘no COVID-19 cases’
translation.ha: A Siriyan da Assad yake juyawa, a hukumance bayanin shi ne 'ba matsalolin Kwabid-19'

translation.en: After nine years of a deadly civil war, the health system in Syria is barely functional.
translation.ha: Bayan shekaru tara na mummunan yaƙin basasa, harkar lafiya a Siriya ba ta aiki sosai.

translation.en: In territories controlled by President Bashar al-Assad, authorities deny the presence of COVID-19.
translation.ha: A yankunan da Shugaba Bashar al-Asad yake da iko, mahukunta sun ƙi amincewa da samuwar cutar Kwabid-19.

translation.en: According to Johns Hopkins University, the country has confirmed 439 cases and 21 deaths as of July 15.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda jami'ar John Hopkins ta nuna, ƙasar ta tabbatar da mutum 439 da suka kamu da cutar da mutuwar mutum 21 har zuwa 15 ga Yuli.

translation.en: But narratives on the ground reveal the ways in which the state has denied and repressed the realities of COVID-19.
translation.ha: Amma maganganu na haƙiƙa suna nuna hanyoyin da gwamnati ta bi ta ƙi amincewa kuma ta murƙushe gaskiyar Kwabid-19.

translation.en: Walid Abdullah, 23, says the state has even gone so far as to suggest terminating the lives of suspected COVID-19 patients.
translation.ha: Walid Abdullahi, ɗan shekaru 23, ya bayyana cewa gwamnati har ta kai munzali tunanin ta ƙarar da rayuwar marasa lafiyan cutar Kwabid-19.

translation.en: Global Voices is using a pseudonym upon request to protect his identity.
translation.ha: Global ɓoices suna amfani da wani sunan saye domin su kare kar a gane shi.

translation.en: Speaking to Global Voices by phone, Abdullah explained that on May 13, he called Daraa National Hospital, in southern Syria, to inform them about a suspected case of coronavirus.
translation.ha: A yayin da yake magana da Global ɓoices ta waya, Abdullah ya bayyana ran 13 ga Mayu cewa, ya kira Asibitin ƙasa na Daraa, a kudancin Siriya, domin ya bayyana musu wani wanda ake zargin ya kamu da Kwaronabairas.

translation.en: When he asked what steps should be taken, the government hospital employee who answered the phone said: "Shoot him — we have no cure for him", according to Abdullah.
translation.ha: A lokacin da ya tambayi waɗanne matakai za a ɗauka, ma'aikacin asibitin gwamnatin wanda ya amsa wayar ya ce: "Ka harbe shi - ba mu da magani domin sa", kamar yadda Abdullah ya bayyana.

translation.en: He quickly ended the call.
translation.ha: Nan da nan ya katse kiran.

translation.en: Obviously, the idea of shooting a suspected COVID-19 patient was out of the question.
translation.ha: Alal haƙiƙa, tunanin a kashe mara lafiyar da ake ganin ya kamu da Kwabid-19 wani hauka ne kawai.

translation.en: "Death by COVID-19 is more honorable than to set foot in any public hospital", Abdullah told Global Voices.
translation.ha: "Mutuwa da Kwabid-19 ya fi mutunci sama da mutum ya sa ƙafa a duk wani asibitin gwamnati", Abdullah ya gaya wa Global ɓoices.

translation.en: This harrowing testimony is corroborated by other sources.
translation.ha: Wasu ɓangarorin suna gasgata waɗannan bayanan baƙin cikin.

translation.en: In a March 10 report published in The Voice of the Capital, an independent Syrian newspaper, medical personnel from the Syrian Ministry of Health claimed that "deliberate termination operations are taking place at the al-Mujtahid government hospital in the capital, Damascus, for those who are believed to be carrying the virus, through giving them additional doses of the drug [anesthetic]".
translation.ha: A wani rahoton da aka buga a The ɓoice of the Capital ranar 10 ga Maris, wata jaridar Siriya mai zaman kanta, ma'aikatan lafiya daga Ma'aikatar Lafiya ta Siriya sun yi zargin cewa "da gangan ana ta ƙarar da rayuwar waɗanda ake jin suna ɗauke da bairas ɗin a asibitin gwamnati na al-Mujtahid a babban birni, Damascus, ta hanyar ba su ƙarin wasu ƙwayoyi [magungunan hana jin raɗaɗi]".

translation.en: This claim also appeared on social media:
translation.ha: Wannan zargin ma ya fito a dandalin sadarwa:

translation.en: Another person from al-Mouwasat Hospital in Damascus was also quoted in the same article confirming this claim:
translation.ha: An kuma jiyo wani mutum daga asibitin al-Mouwasat a Damascus a wannan rubutun yana tabbatar da wannan zargin:

translation.en: "These terminations are conducted in complete secrecy and are carried out by doctors dedicated to following up on cases of suspected virus infection".
translation.ha: "Ana ƙarar da rayuwar mutanen ne a tsananin sirri kuma wasu likitoci ne da aka sa su su dinga bibiyar waɗanda suka faru waɗanda suka kamu da bairas ɗin".

translation.en: In a March 13 interview with the official Syrian News Channel, Minister of Health Nizar Al-Yaziji insisted on denying the existence of any COVID-19 cases in Syria, saying:

translation.en: "Thank God that the Syrian Arab Army has cleansed the Syrian soil from many germs:"

translation.en: The Syrian Ministry of Health did not announce its first case of COVID-19 until March 22, causing resentment and anger among Syrians who noted that the Assad regime lied and pursued a policy of denial.
translation.ha: Ma'aikatar lafiya ta Siriya ba ta sanar da samuwar matsalarta ta Kwabid-19 na farko ba har sai 22 ga Maris, wanda hakan ya jawo tsana da fushi a cikin mutanen Siriya waɗanda suke ganin gwamnatin Assad ta yi ƙarya kuma ta shigo da wani salon ƙin gaskiya.

translation.en: In an article published on an independent Syria 24 news site in response to Yaziji’s claims, one citizen poignantly asked, "didn’t you say in your statement that all germs have been eliminated?"

translation.en: If casualties exceed this capacity, the health system, already worn out by the war, is likely to collapse.

translation.en: We have learnt lessons from Ali (greetings be upon him) who describes human beings in this way: Those who have the same religion as you, they are brothers to you, and those who have religions other than that of yours, they are human beings like you.
translation.ha: Mun koya daga Imam Ali (a.s) wanda ya siffanta mutum da cewa: ‘imma dai dan'uwanka ne a addini, ko kuma kwatankwacinka cikin halitta".

translation.en: Our complaint against oppression and arrogance and against bullying and transgression is the moral and practical degeneration that has been imposed on our nations by the colonial and arrogant powers.
translation.ha: Korafin da muke yi dangane da zalunci da girman kai da iko da wuce gona da iri, da fasadi da munanan halaye da ayyuka wadanda ‘yan mulkin mallaka da ma'abota girman kai suka haifar wa al'ummomi ne.

translation.en: Currently, we can witness the bullying and interference of America and some of its followers in the region in the countries in which the breeze of awakening has turned into the storm of uprisings and revolutions.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu muna iya ganin tsoma baki da tursasawar da Amurka da wasu ‘yan amshin shatanta a wannan yankin suke yi cikin lamurran kasashen da iskar wannan farkawar ta kada ta kuma haifar da yunkuri da kuma juyin juya hali.

translation.en: Their promises must not affect the decisions and actions of outstanding political personalities and the great movement of the people.
translation.ha: Bai kamata a bari alkawurra da kuma barazanar da suke yi su yi tasiri cikin matsaya da kuma ayyuka na siyasa da kuma gagarumin yunkuri na mutane ba.

translation.en: In this case as well, we need to learn lessons from our experiences: those who pinned their hopes on the promises of America for years and based their behavior and policies on the inclination towards the oppressor did not manage to resolve any problems of their nations or eliminate an injustice to themselves or to others.
translation.ha: A nan ma wajibi ne mu dau darasi daga irin kwarewar da ake da ita. Wadanda shekaru aru-aru suka damfara dukkanin fatansu ga alkawurran Amurka da kuma dogaro da azzaluman shugabanni, sun gagara magance koda guda daga cikin matsalolin da al'ummominsu suke fuskanta ko kuma su magance wani zalunci da ake musu ko kuma wa wasunsu ba.

translation.en: By surrendering to America, they did not manage to prevent the demolition of even one single Palestinian home in a territory that belongs to the Palestinians.
translation.ha: Wadannan mutane ta hanyar mika wuya ga Amurkan da suke yi, sun gagara koda hana rusa gida guda ne daga cikin gidajen Palastinawa a kasar da take ta Palastinawa ce.

translation.en: The politicians and outstanding personalities who are deceived by the bribe or intimidated by the threats of the camp of the arrogant powers and miss the great opportunity of Islamic Awakening should be apprehensive about this divine threat: "Have you not seen those who have changed Allah's favor for ungratefulness and made their people to alight into the abode of perdition into hell?
translation.ha: ‘Yan siyasa da masanan da suka fada tarkon alkawurra ko kuma barazanar ma'abota girman kai sannan kuma suka rasa gagarumar dama ta farkawa ta Musulunci da ta kunno kai, wajibi ne su ji tsoron barazana ta Ubangiji da ke cewa: "Shin, ba ka lura ba da wadanda suka musanya ni'imar Allah da kafirci, kuma suka saukar da mutanensu a gidan halaka.

translation.en: They shall enter into it and an evil place it is to settle in." [The Holy Quran, Sura Ibrahim, Ayah 28-29]
translation.ha: Suna konuwa a wutar Jahannama, kuma tir da matabbatarsu" (Suratu Ibrahim 14:28-29).

translation.en: The fourth point is that today one of the most dangerous things that threatens the movement of Islamic Awakening is the efforts to foment discord and turn these movements into bloody sectarian, ethnic and national conflicts.
translation.ha: Batu na hudu shi ne cewa a yau daya daga cikin mafiya hatsarin abubuwan da suke barazana ga farkawa ta Musulunci, shi ne kokarin haifar da rarrabuwa da kuma mayar da wannan yunkurin zuwa ga wani yunkuri na adawa da zubar da jini na kungiyanci da mazhaba da kabilanci da ‘yan kasanci.

translation.en: Currently, this plot is being seriously pursued by intelligence services of the West and Zionism with the help of petrodollars and bribed politicians from East Asia to North Africa and particularly in the Arab region.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu kungiyoyin leken asirin kasashen yammaci da sahyoniyawa ta hanyar taimakon dalolin (kudaden) man fetur da ‘yan siyasa da suka sayar da kansu, tun daga gabashin Asiya har zuwa arewacin Afirka musamman a kasashen larabawa, suna ci gaba da aiwatar da wannan makirci da kuma ba shi dukkanin muhimmanci.

translation.en: And the money that could have been spent to bring about happiness for mankind is being used to make threats, excommunicate, assassinate, bomb, shed Muslim blood and to kindle the fire of long-lasting grudges.
translation.ha: Ana ta amfani da kudaden da za a iya amfani da su wajen faranta wa bayin Allah zukata, amma sai ana amfani da su wajen barazana ga rayuwarsu, kafirta mutane da gudanar da ayyukan ta'addanci da dana bama-bamai da zubar da jinin musulmi da kuma ruruta wutar kiyayya da gaba.

translation.en: Those who consider the unified power of Islam as an obstacle in the way of their evil goals have come to the conclusion that fanning the flames of conflicts inside the Islamic Ummah is the easiest way to achieve their satanic goal and they have used differences of opinion in Islamic jurisprudence, kalaam, history and hadith - which are natural and inevitable - as a pretext to excommunicate, shed blood and cause fitna and corruption.
translation.ha: Wadannan mutane da suke ganin hadin kan al'ummar musulmi a matsayin barazana ga bakaken manufofinsu, suna ganin rarraba kan al'ummar musulmi a matsayin mafi saukin hanyar isa ga wannan manufa ta su ta shaidanci. Suna amfani da bambancin mahanga a fagen fikihu da akida da tarihi da hadisi da ake da shi - wanda kuma wata dabi'a ce da ba za a iya guje mata ba - wajen kafirta musulmi da zubar da jininsu da kuma haifar da fitina da fasadi a tsakaninsu.

translation.en: A vigilant look at the scene of domestic conflicts clearly reveals the enemy's hands behind these tragedies.
translation.ha: Dubi da idon basira cikin irin rikice-rikice na cikin gida da ke faruwa a kasashen musulmi, a fili zai iya bayyanar da hannayen makiya cikin hakan.

translation.en: These deceptive hands undoubtedly take advantage of the ignorance, prejudice and superficiality that exists in our societies and they add fuel to the fire.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu wadannan hannaye masu zubar da jini, suna amfana ne da irin jahilci da bakar aniya da karancin fahimta da ke a tsakaninmu, sannan kuma suke amfani da hakan wajen ruruta wannan wutar.

translation.en: The responsibility of religious and political reformers and outstanding personalities is very heavy in this regard.
translation.ha: Nauyin da ke wuyan masu kawo gyara da masana na addini da siyasa a wannan fagen nauyi ne mai girman gaske.

translation.en: Currently, Libya, Egypt and Tunisia, Syria, Pakistan, and Iraq and Lebanon are in one way or another involved in or exposed to these dangerous flames.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu kasar Libiya ta wani bangare, Masar da tunusiya ta wani bangaren, Siriya ta wani bangaren, Pakistan ta wani bangaren, Iraki da Labanon ta wani bangaren na daban, suna fada cikin wannan wutar (ta fitina) da aka hura.

translation.en: It is necessary to be extremely careful and to look for a remedy.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a lura sosai sannan kuma a nemi hanyar magance hakan.

translation.en: It would be naÃ¯ve to think that all of these things are due to ideological and ethnic factors and motives.
translation.ha: Karamin tunani ne a jingina dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ga akida da kabilanci.

translation.en: Propaganda campaigns of the West and dependent and mercenary media in the region pretend that the destructive war in Syria is a Shia-Sunni conflict and they create a safety margin for the Zionists and the enemies of resistance in Syria and Lebanon.
translation.ha: Kafafen watsa labaran kasashen yammaci da na yankin nan ‘yan amshin shata, suna bayyana yaki mai ruguzarwar da ke faruwa a kasar Siriya a matsayin wani rikici na Shi'a da Sunna, don share fagen tabbatar da tsaro ga sahyoniyawa da makiyan gwagwarmaya a kasar Siriya da Labanon.

translation.en: This is while the two sides of the conflict in Syria are not Shia and Sunni, rather they are the supporters and opponents of anti-Zionist resistance.
translation.ha: Alhali kuwa bangarori biyun da suke rikici a kasar Siriya, ba Sunna ba ne, ba kuma Shi'a ba ne, face dai masu goyon bayan gwagwarmayar fada da sahyoniyawa da kuma masu adawa da su ne.

translation.en: Neither the Syrian government is a Shia government, nor is the secular and anti-Islam opposition a Sunni group.
translation.ha: Gwamnatin Siriya ba wata gwamnati ce ta Shi'a ba, haka nan su ma ‘yan adawan da babu ruwansu da addini sannan kuma masu adawa da Musulunci ba ‘yan Sunna ba ne.

translation.en: The only achievement of the plotters of this calamitous scenario is that they have managed to make use of religious sentiments of simple-minded people to kindle this deadly fire.
translation.ha: Nasarar da wadanda suka rura wannan wutar mai cutarwa suka samu ita ce sun sami nasarar motsa zukatan wasu masu kananan kwakwalwa ta hanyar amfani da mazhaba.

translation.en: A look at the scene and those who are involved in it at different levels can clarify the issue for any just individual.
translation.ha: Idan aka dubi wannan fage ta bangarori daban-daban, hakikanin lamarin ya kan iya fitowa fili ga duk wani mutum mai adalci.

translation.en: Also, in the case of Bahrain, this wave of propaganda is spreading lies and deception in another way.
translation.ha: Dangane da kasar Bahrain kuwa, irin farfagandar da ake yadawa wata hanya ce ta karya da wasa da hankulan mutane.

translation.en: In Bahrain, the oppressed majority - who have been deprived of the right to vote as well as other fundamental rights that a nation should enjoy - have risen up to demand their rights.
translation.ha: A Bahrain, mafi yawan al'ummar kasar da ake zalunta wadanda shekara da shekaru kenan aka haramta musu hatta hakkin kada kuri'a da sauran hakkoki na ‘yan kasa sun mike ne saboda neman wannan hakki na su na gaskiya.

translation.en: Should this be considered a Shia-Sunni conflict simply because the oppressed majority are Shia and the oppressive secular government pretends to be Sunni?
translation.ha: To amma shin ya dace a bayyana wannan rikicin a matsayin rikicin Shi'a da Sunna don kawai mafi yawan wadannan mutanen ‘yan Shi'a ne, sannan kuma hukuma mai mulki a can wacce ba ruwanta da addini amma take nuna cewa ita ‘yar Sunna ce?

translation.en: Of course, the European and American colonialists and their friends in the region want to make things appear like this, but what is the truth?
translation.ha: ‘Yan mulkin mallaka na kasashen Turai da Amurka da kawayensu a wannan yankin suna son su nuna hakan, to amma shin hakan gaskiya ce?

translation.en: These are the things that call religious scholars and just reformers to careful thinking and sense of responsibility and they make identification of the enemies' goals behind highlighting sectarian, ethnic and partisan differences an obligation for everybody.
translation.ha: Hakan lamari ne da ke sanya malaman addini da masu son kawo gyara su yi tunani da kuma jin cewa lalle akwai wani nauyi a wuyansu da kuma fahimtar manufofin makiya cikin kambama sabani na mazhana da kabila da kungiyanci da ake da shi.

translation.en: The fifth point is that one of the standards for judging whether Islamic Awakening movements are on the right path is the positions they adopt on the issue of Palestine.
translation.ha: Batu na biyar shi ne cewa daya daga cikin hanyoyin tabbatar da cewa yunkurin farkawa ta Musulunci yana kan tafarki madaidaici (ko a'a) shi ne cewa wajibi ne a lura da matsaya da mahangar wannan yunkurin kan batun Palastinu.

translation.en: Since sixty years ago up until today, the occupation of Palestine has been the biggest tragedy that has been imposed on the Islamic Ummah.
translation.ha: Tun daga shekaru 60 din da suka gabata zuwa yanzu babu wani abin da ke sosa ran al'ummar musulmi kamar yadda mamaye kasar Palastinu yake sosa musu.

translation.en: Since the first day up until today, the tragedy of Palestine has been a combination of killings, assassinations, destruction, usurpation and transgression against what is held sacred in Islam.
translation.ha: Wannan matsala ta Paalstinu tun daga ranar farko har zuwa yau din nan, babu wani abin da suka gani in banda kisan gilla, kashe mutane, rusa gidaje da mamaya da kuma wuce gona da iri kan ababe masu tsarki na Musulunci.

translation.en: The necessity of putting up a resistance against this warring and usurping enemy and fighting him has been agreed upon by all Islamic denominations and all honest and healthy national currents.
translation.ha: Tsayin daka da gwagwarmayar tinkarar makiya, wani lamari ne da dukkanin mazhabobin Musulunci suka yi tarayya kansa.

translation.en: Any current in Islamic countries which disregards this religious and national responsibility out of consideration for the domineering demands of America or under the pretext of unreasonable justifications should not expect to be viewed as loyal to Islam and sincere in its nationalistic claims.
translation.ha: Duk wani yunkuri a kasashen musulmi da ya yi watsi da wannan nauyi na addini da kuma kasa sannan kuma bisa bukatar Amurka da kuma riko da wasu hujjoji da suka saba wa hankali da hikima ya mance da wannan batu na Palastinu, bai kamata ya yi zaton cewa za a kalle shi kallo irin na mai sadaukarwa ga Musulunci da kuma daukansa a matsayin aboki ba.

translation.en: This is a test.
translation.ha: Wannan wani mafari ne.

translation.en: Anybody who does not accept the slogan of liberating Holy Quds and saving the Palestinian nation and Palestinian territories or anybody who sidelines this slogan and turns his back on the camp of resistance, will be condemned.
translation.ha: Duk wanda bai amince da taken ‘yanto masallacin Kudus mai girma ba da kuma ‘yantar da al'ummar Palastinu da kasar Palastinu ba, ko kuma ya mayar da hakan a matsayin wani abu na bayan fage da kuma juya wa kungiyoyin gwagwarmya baya, to abin tuhuma ne.

translation.en: The Islamic Ummah should keep this clear and fundamental standard in mind everywhere and at all times.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne al'ummar musulmi a ko ina sannan kuma a kowane lokaci su sanya wannan mizanin a matsayin tushe na ayyukansa sannan kuma abin lura.

translation.en: Dear guests, brothers and sisters, never lose sight of the enemy's plot.
translation.ha: Ya ku baki abin kauna! ‘Yan'uwa maza da mata!....

translation.en: Our lack of vigilance creates opportunities for our enemies. The lesson that Ali (greetings be upon him) teaches us is that "whoever is careless about his cause, his enemy will not sleep over this advantage..."
translation.ha: Kada ku kawar da idanuwanku daga makirce-makircen makiya; don kuwa gafalarmu za ta zamanto wata dama ce ga makiya. Hakika darasin Imam Ali (a.s) a gare mu shi ne cewa: 'Duk wanda ya yi barci, ba za a yi barci saboda shi ba'.

translation.en: In this regard, our experience in the Islamic Republic is also a source of lessons.
translation.ha: Kwarewar da muke da ita a Jamhuriyar Musulunci wata kwarewa ce da take cike da abubuwan daukan darasi a wannan bangaren.

translation.en: After the victory of the Islamic Revolution in Iran, the arrogant Western governments and America - which had long established full control over Iranian taghuts and used to determine the political, economic and cultural destiny of our country and which had underestimated the enormous power of Islamic faith in society and remained unaware of the power of Islam and the Holy Quran to deploy forces and to guide - suddenly realized that they had been unaware and their governmental organizations, intelligence services and control rooms resumed work in order to make up for the overwhelming defeat they had suffered.
translation.ha: Tun bayan nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci a kasar Iran, tun daga lokacin gwamnatocin kasashen yammaci da Amurka ma'abociyar girman kai, wacce take iko da dawagitan Iran da kuma iko da fagen siyasa da tatalin arziki da al'adu na kasar nan, sannan kuma ta yi sako-sako da gagarumin karfi na Musulunci da ke tattare da al'umma da kuma gafala da irin karfin Musulunci da Alkur'ani mai girma, suka fahimci matsalar da suka fada cikinta sakamakon wannan gafala da suka yi. Don haka suka shigo da dukkanin karfinsu na siyasa da leken asiri wajen cike wannan hasara da suka fuskanta.

translation.en: We have witnessed various kinds of machinations from them over the past thirty-something years.
translation.ha: Tsawon wadannan shekaru talatin da wani abun mun shaidi makirce-makirce kala-kala da suka kulla mana.

translation.en: In essence, there have been two factors that have foiled their plots: insistence on Islamic principles and presence of the people on the scene.
translation.ha: To sai dai a hakikanin gaskiya akwai abubuwa guda biyu da suka sanya wadannan makirce-makirce na su suka zamanto aikin baban giwa, su ne: riko da koyarwa ta addini da kuma kasantuwar al'umma a fage.

translation.en: These two factors are the key to the problems everywhere.
translation.ha: Wadannan abubuwa su ne mabudin magance matsaloli a ko ina.

translation.en: The first factor is guaranteed by sincere religious faith in divine promises and the second factor is guaranteed by sincere efforts and honest clarification.
translation.ha: Abin da ke tabbatar da abu na farkon shi ne imani da kuma gaskata alkawarin Ubangiji, sannan abin da ke tabbatar da na biyun shi ne kokari tare da tsarkin zuciya da kuma gaskiya.

translation.en: A nation that has faith in the honesty and sincerity of its leaders will bring in enthusiasm with their blessed presence, and wherever a nation stays on the scene with a solid determination, no power will have the capability to defeat it.
translation.ha: Al'ummar da ta yi amanna da gaskiyar shugabanninta da kuma ikhlasinsu, to kuwa za ta motsar da fagen da ake ciki ta hanyar wannan kasantuwa ta su mai albarka. A duk inda al'umma suka shigo fage da tsayayyiyar azama, to kuwa babu wani karfin da zai iya da su.

translation.en: This is a successful experience for all the nations that gave rise to Islamic Awakening through their presence.
translation.ha: Wannan wata kwarewa ce mai haifar da nasara ga dukkanin al'ummomin da suka haifar da farkawa ta Musulunci ta hanyar kasantuwarsu a fage.

translation.en: I pray to Allah the Exalted to bestow His guidance, assistance and mercy on you and on all Muslim nations.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya tabbatar muku da kuma dukkanin al'ummar musulmi shiriya, taimako da kuma rahamarsa.

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: The 13th of Aban belongs to the most prominent people of our country - our youth - more than anybody else.
translation.ha: Bukin ranar 13 ga watan Aban, sama da kowa, lamari ne da ya fi shafar matasan wannan kasa ne; daliban jami'a da na sauran makarantu.

translation.en: And this gathering, which is a sample of the young population of this divine country, is filled with knowledge and insight as well as enthusiasm about great revolutionary wishes and ideals.
translation.ha: Wannan taro ma wanda yake a matsayin daya daga cikin misalan gagarumin taron matasan wannan kasa, taro ne da ke cike da ilimi, basira da kuma kyakkyawan fata zuwa ga manyan koyarwar juyin juya halin Musulunci.

translation.en: Meeting you dear youth, my dear children, is one of the most pleasant occasions for me. This is an opportunity for me to discuss the issues that should be discussed between you and I.
translation.ha: Lalle a gare ni ganawa da ku din nan matasa masu girma, ‘ya'yana masu girma, wata gagarumar dama ce ta in gabatar muku da wadansu abubuwan da wajibi ne mu yi magana kansu a tsakaninmu.

translation.en: Historical occasions are often like a symbol.
translation.ha: A mafi yawan lokuta bukukuwa na tarihi suna a matsayin wata alama ce da take nuni da wani abu.

translation.en: In and of itself, the 13th of Aban is not different from the days before and after it, but it is a symbol. What is a symbol?
translation.ha: Ranar 13 ga watan Aban (4, Nuwamba), a matsayinta na wata rana, ba ta da wani bambanci da ranakun da suka gabace ta da kuma wadanda suka zo bayanta; to sai dai ita wata alama ce da take nuni da wani abu.

translation.en: A symbol is a code that contains many meanings.
translation.ha: Wata alama ce wacce a tattare da ita sannan kuma a cikin zuciyarta tana da wadansu ma'anoni masu yawa.

translation.en: This day is a symbol, and it contains a huge number of important points and issues, issues that are not at all historical.
translation.ha: Wannan rana wata alama ce wacce take tattare da batutuwa da lamurra masu muhimmanci; lamurran da ko da wasa ba na tarihi ba ne, face dai batutuwa ne da suka shafi yau din nan.

translation.en: Let us take a look at the occasions that the 13th of Aban represents.
translation.ha: Bari mu yi dubi cikin abubuwan da suka faru a wannan ranar.

translation.en: The first occasion that the 13th of Aban represents is the day when our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) was forced into exile in the year 1343.
translation.ha: Batu na farko da ya faru a wannan ranar shi ne cewa a shekarar 1343 (1964) a irin wannan ranar ce (tsohuwar gwamnatin Shah), ta tilasta wa Imaminmu mai girma gudun hijira.

translation.en: Why did they force him into exile?
translation.ha: Me ya sa suka tura shi gudun hijirar?

translation.en: Because the Imam (r.a.) had demanded a national right a few days before in a speech delivered in Qom, which was immediately distributed throughout the country on audio tape and in writing.
translation.ha: Saboda ‘yan wadansu ranaku kafin wancan ranar, ya gabatar da wani jawabi mai tsananin muhimmanci a garin Kum inda ba tare da bata lokaci ba ya yadu cikin kasar nan ta hanyar kasetocin radiyo da bugawa a takarda. A cikin jawabin Imam dai ya gabatar da wata bukata da kuma hakki na kasa ne.

translation.en: It is appropriate for our young generation to clearly understand what difficulties we have undergone to reach where we are now. Americans had tens of thousands of agents in Iran.
translation.ha: Wannan lamari ne da ya kamata matasanmu su fahimce shi da kyau; su san wace irin mashiga ce muka tsallake har muka iso ga wannan wajen da muke a halin yanzu.

translation.en: This was a bad thing that happened in our country.
translation.ha: Wannan wani mummunan aiki ne da ya kasance yana faruwa a kasar mu.

translation.en: Because it was dependent on America and acted as an American mercenary, the satanic Pahlavi regime had gradually allowed those agents to enter the country over a number of years. This was already bad enough, but what happened next was even worse: They approved a law in the parliament of that time, which granted immunity to American agents so that they could not be prosecuted by Iranian courts, judiciary and security organizations. This is called legal immunity.
translation.ha: Sakamakon dogaro da Amurkan da gwamnatin dagutu ta Shah take yi haka nan kuma sakamakon biyayya ido rufen da take yi wa gwamnatin Amurka, a saboda hakan ne ya sanya ta shigowa da wadannan Amurkawa cikin wannan kasar. Shi kansa wannan abu ne mai muni; to amma abin da ya faru (na kafa wannan doka) wani lamari ne da ya kara muni kan munin wannan lamarin. Wannan mummunan aikin kuwa shi ne majalisar shawara ta kasa da majalisar dokoki ta wancan lokaci ta amince ne da wata doka ta cewa jami'ai da ma'aikatan Amurka da suke kasar nan sun fi karfin dokokin kasar nan.

translation.en: When foreigners are allowed to enter a country and do whatever they like, when the courts and police force of a country are unable to do anything to stop foreigners, it shows that the country is suffering from an extreme form of weakness and dependence.
translation.ha: Wannan doka ita ce suka kira ta capitulation. Ku duba irin kolin biyayya da zama ‘yan amshin shatan da kasar nan ta kai, wato su aikata duk wani abin da zuciyarsu take so; kotuna da ‘yan sandan kasar nan ba su da ikon hukumta su.
