translation.ha: To amma a irin wannan yanayin sannan kuma a cikin irin wadannan kasashen, a sami wata mace mai hijabi ta hau kan dandamalin karbar kyautar zakaran zakaru sannan kuma wajibi ne kowa da kowa ya girmama ta.

translation.en: This is a very great achievement.
translation.ha: Aiki ne mai girman gaske.

translation.en: Everybody should appreciate from the bottom of their heart the value of woman athletes who participate in international arenas with hijab and modesty.
translation.ha: A hakikanin gaskiya, wajibi ne kowa da kowa ya gode wa mata 'yan wasanmu wadanda suke shigowa fage da hijabi sannan da kuma kiyaye mutumcinsu.

translation.en: What they do is really astonishing. When people look at these athletes, they see that not only does their disability not prevent them from living in a normal way, but they are also so determined that they become athletes and stand on the medal platform.
translation.ha: A lokacin da mutane suka kalli lamarin, suka ga wani matashin da ya ke da nakasa a jikinsa, amma wannan nakasa ba ta sanya shi zama waje guda ba, face dai ya kasance yana da wata himma da azama ta yadda har ya zamanto wani dan wasa sannan kuma har ya kai ga matsayin zama zakaran zakaru.

translation.en: This shows the determination of a nation.
translation.ha: Hakan lamari ne da ke nuni da azama da kuma irada ta wata al'umma.

translation.en: This shows the dignity and identity of a nation.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda hakan kuma lamari ne da ke nuni da matsayi na wata al'umma.

translation.en: I really feel that you are rendering services to your country and your people by winning competitions.
translation.ha: A hakikanin gaskiya ina jin cewa ku din nan kun yi gagarumin aiki ga kasarku, ga al'ummarku da kuma mutanenku.

translation.en: You convey messages that cannot be conveyed by any other means. You convey the message of determination, resistance and faith. When our athletes achieve a victory in such arenas and when they are ranked first, they chant the slogan of "Ya Hussein", prostrate themselves and hold up their hands and thank God.
translation.ha: Kuna isar da wani sako ne, wato sako na azama da irada, sako na tsayin daka da imani, wannan babu wata hanyar da za a iya isar da shi (in ba ta wannan hanyar ba). A sami wani dan wasan Iran bayan nasarar da ya samu a gasa ta kasa da kasa, ya daga murya yana rera taken 'Ya Husain'; ko kuma ya fadi kasa don yin sujada, ko kuma ya daga hannayensa sama yana gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki.

translation.en: Do you know how excited the Islamic Ummah and Muslim nations become when you do this?
translation.ha: Shin kun san irin dadi da motsar da da al'ummar musulmi da wannan aikin ya ke yi kuwa?

translation.en: In sports arenas, our outstanding youth - not ordinary youth - give such prominence to spirituality in a world in which there is an effort to make young individuals decadent and turn their backs on spirituality. What our athletes do is very effective and important.
translation.ha: A irin wannan duniyar da ake kokarin jan matasa zuwa ga rashin imani da nuna halin ko kula da kuma juya wa lamurra na addini baya, a sami wani matashi da ya yi fice - ba wai wani matashi haka nan da ba a sanshi ba - ya bayyanar da irin wannan riko nasa ga abubuwa da koyarwa ta addini.

translation.en: Fortunately, Islamic Iran has made astonishing progress in this area since the victory of the Islamic Revolution until today.
translation.ha: Abin farin cikin shi ne cewa kasar Musulunci ta Iran bayan nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci zuwa sama an sami ci gaba mai ban mamaki.

translation.en: Today, you are ahead of others in many arenas.
translation.ha: A yau din kuna a kan gaba a fagage daban-daban.

translation.en: But even if we consider all sports together, the situation is the same.
translation.ha: Idan kuka duba za ku ga cewa haka lamarin ya ake samunsa a sauran ayyuka na daban.

translation.en: Imagine that in an international sports competition - such as the recent one - you participate with 54 athletes and you win 12 medals. Imagine that America participates with 530 athletes and it wins 110 medals.
translation.ha: A matsayin misali a wata gasa ta duniya - kamar yadda ya faru - inda a matsayin misali kun tafi gasar da 'yan wasa 54, ku sami lambobin girma guda 12; sannan kasar Amurka da 'yan wasa 530, su sami lambobin girma 110.

translation.en: If America wants to win as many medals as you do, it should win 120 medals. It participates with 10 times more athletes than you do.
translation.ha: Idan har Amurka tana son ta sami irin nasarar da kuka samu, to wajibi ne ta samo lambobin girma 120, to amma ba su sami hakan ba; wato suna kasa da ku kenan.

translation.en: This means that if you participate in different sports with as many athletes as America and with the same quality, you will be ahead of all your opponents.
translation.ha: Ma'anar hakan ita ce cewa idan da a ce kun shiga cikin gasanni daban-daban da kuma irin wannan yawan, to da kuwa kun kasance a gaban kowa.

translation.en: These are valuable achievements.
translation.ha: Hakan ayyuka ne masu kima.

translation.en: Fortunately, the same is true of scientific areas.
translation.ha: Abin farin cikin shi ne cewa a fagen ilimi ma haka lamarin yake.

translation.en: These are our capacities. This is our country.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce kwarewarmu, wannan kuma ita ce al'ummarmu.

translation.en: That is why our history is so outstanding.
translation.ha: Saboda hakan ne ma tarihinmu ya samu irin wannan daukaka.

translation.en: People like Ibn Sina [Avicenna], Zakariya Razi, Farabi, Saadi, Hafiz and other such people cannot be born in a low-level society.
translation.ha: Ibn Sina da Farabi da Muhammad bn Zakariyya Razi da Sa'adi da Hafiz da makamantansu ba sun taso ne cikin kaskantacciyar al'umma ba.

translation.en: This shows that enormous capacities exist in this area of the world.
translation.ha: Hakan alama ce da ke nuni da samuwar kwarewar da ake da ita a wannan yankin na duniya.

translation.en: Today, fortunately, the Revolution has acted in a way that these capacities can develop in all areas, particularly sports.
translation.ha: To a yau a halin yanzu abin farin cikin shi ne cewa juyin juya hali ya yi wasu abubuwan da suka sanya bayyanar wadannan kwarewar da al'ummar Iran suke da su a bangarori daban-daban.

translation.en: These are your characteristics.
translation.ha: To wadannan wasu falalolinku ne wadanda kamar yadda na fadi cewa ku din nan koli ne.

translation.en: And the thing that you do is, in fact, a movement towards peaks.
translation.ha: A hakikanin gaskiya kuna yunkuri ne zuwa ga isa ga kololuwa da kuma sanya wasu ma zuwa ga kololuwar.

translation.en: As I said, you are the ambassadors of Iran who represent the Iranian nation's identity and dignity.
translation.ha: Na fadi cewa ku din nan jakadun Iran ne kuma masu bayyanar da yanayi da mutumci na Ba'iraniye.

translation.en: You should preserve these characteristics. The fact that you introduce your nation as a determined, religious, talented and noble nation which is committed to sharia is very valuable.
translation.ha: To ku kiyaye wadannan siffofi. Tafiyar da za ku yi ku bayyanar da al'ummarku a matsayin wata al'umma mai irada, mai tsayin daka da imani da riko da shari'a, ma'abociyar kwarewa, lalle lamari ne mai kima.

translation.en: You should take care not to let this change.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne ku kiyaye hakan, kada ku bari a dushe haskensa.

translation.en: The youth of the country look up to you.
translation.ha: Matasan kasar nan suna kallonku ne.

translation.en: You promote sports in practice. I would tell you that you should promote it in words too.
translation.ha: Ku din nan a aikace, kuna yada wasanni ne. Ina kiranku da kwadaitar da wasanni da harshenku ma.

translation.en: That is to say, you should encourage the youth of the country through interviews and the speeches that you deliver in the media, television and other such things.
translation.ha: Wato a cikin maganganunku da mutane, a fagen zamantakewa da kuma tattaunawar da za ku yi a kafafen watsa labarai, a talabijin da makamantansu, ku kwadaitar da matasan kasar nan.

translation.en: Share your experience in sports so that the youth will be excited.
translation.ha: Ku gabatar da irin kwarewar da kuke da ita a lokacin wasa, don ku kwadaitar da matasa.

translation.en: We need all the people in our country to do sports activities.
translation.ha: Muna bukatar dukkanin mutanen kasar nan su dinga yin wasan motsa jiki.

translation.en: The existence of a healthy manpower is of prime importance to the country because a country makes progress with its manpower.
translation.ha: Mutane masu lafiya, suna da muhiummanci na koli a kasar nan; don kuwa ci gaban kasa, ta dogara ne da mutane masu lafiya.

translation.en: Natural resources, mines and natural wealth are good things, but if there is no manpower, if there is no human capacities in a country, it will face the same situation that a number of countries which have these natural resources do.
translation.ha: Albarkatun kasa da dukiya ta dabi'a, lamari ne mai kyaun gaske; to amma idan aka rasa karfi na mutane, to abin da zai faru shi ne abin da a yau yake faruwa a wasu kasashen da suke da irin wadannan albarkatun kasan. Wasu mutane ne za su zo su amfana da su.

translation.en: Physical health is the main condition for the existence of such manpower. If people turn to sports activities, many social and behavioral problems - such as addiction, family rows, financial and psychological problems and other such problems - will be solved. Many of our problems will be solved if sports activities become truly common among all the people in our country.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne irin wannan karfi na mutane ya zamanto tare da ilimi da himma da riko da addini sannan kuma tsarkakakke. Lafiya ta jiki sharadi ne na asali. Shigowar mutane cikin fagen wasanni, za ta magance da dama daga cikin matsaloli na zamantakewa da kyawawan halaye da ake fuskanta.

translation.en: Of course, today the situation is a lot better than the past, but we still need to improve this. You can play a role in this regard.
translation.ha: Matukar dai wasanni suka sami gindin zama a kasar nan - ko da ya ke tabbas a yanzu ya fi na shekarun baya, to amma har ya zuwa yanzu muna bukatar hakan - to lalle za a magance da dama daga cikin matsaloli.

translation.en: That is to say, you can strengthen morality and promote Iranian traditions.
translation.ha: Za ku iya yin tasiri a wannan fagen; wato ku dinga kwadaitar da kyawawan halaye da kuma dabi'u na al'ummar Iran.

translation.en: The fact that our youth refused to compete with Zionist athletes in sports arenas is very valuable.
translation.ha: Lamarin ne mai kyaun gaske irin yadda wasu matasanmu su ke kin yin gasa da yahudawan sahyoniyawa, lamari ne mai kimar gaske.

translation.en: That is why arrogant powers became so angry.
translation.ha: Hakan shi ne abin da ke bakanta wa ma'abota girman kan duniya rai.

translation.en: This move, which was made by our youth, is very important. It is truly a crucial and important diplomatic effort to confront the Zionist regime.
translation.ha: Wannan abin da matasanmu suka yi, lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske. A hakikanin gaskiya hakan wani kokari ne na diplomasiyya mai girma da kuma muhimmancin gaske wajen tinkarar gwamnatin sahyoniyawa.

translation.en: I would like to stress the issue of morality in sports.
translation.ha: Wani lamarin da nake son sake jaddadawa kansa shi ne batun nuna kyawawan halaye a lokacin wasa.

translation.en: Our friends in this meeting spoke about it.
translation.ha: Yan'uwa sun fadi, ni ma ina da labarin hakan kuma na yarda da shi.

translation.en: There are certain dangers.
translation.ha: Akwai abubuwa masu kautar da mutum daga hanya da yawa.

translation.en: We should hold this danger at bay.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne mu nesantar da kanmu daga wannan hatsari na kyawawan halaye.

translation.en: The issue of morality in sports is very important.
translation.ha: Batun kiyaye kyawawan halaye a cikin wasanni lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: Being humble, being loyal and sympathetic to the people and exercising good sportsmanship are very important qualities.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma rashin ji-ji-da-kai, girmama mutane, nuna tausayi, kasantuwa tare da mutane da kuma kishi da sadaukarwa don mutane, su ma lamurra ne masu muhimmanci.

translation.en: It is one thing to achieve these qualities, it is quite another to preserve these qualities.
translation.ha: Mutum ya samar da wadannan siffofi a tattare da shi wani abu ne, sannan kuma ci gaba da kiyaye su, shi ma wani abu ne wanda kuma ya fi zama wajibi.

translation.en: One should preserve these qualities. In my opinion, a number of people destroy the sporting environment by making accusations, causing rows, spreading false rumors and damaging the reputation of individuals.
translation.ha: Wadannan abubuwa ne da wajibi ne mutum ya kiyaye su. A ra'ayina akwai wasu mutanen da suke lalata fagen wasanni; ta hanyar bata sunan wasu, ta hanyar tuhumce-tuhumce, ta hanyar yada kararraki da kuma haifar da rikici a tsakanin kungiyoyi daban-daban na wasa.

translation.en: Unfortunately, the media which broadcast sporting events have played a major role in committing these illegal actions. I deem it necessary to warn them in this regard.
translation.ha: Abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa rawar da kafafen watsa labarai suke takawa a wannan bangaren, ba karamar rawa ba ce. A nan wajibi ne in tunatar da kuma jan kunne.

translation.en: Media networks which broadcast sporting events find a trivial issue to use against a certain team, a certain athletics federation and a certain athlete.
translation.ha: A duk lokacin da kafafen watsa labarai suka ga dan wani abu ya faru a kan wani ne ko kuma wata kungiya ta wasa, ko wata hukuma ko kuma wani dan wasan, nan take za su mai da shi abin magana.

translation.en: They use it as a tool to pit this against that, to cause rows and make them give a controversial interview.
translation.ha: Su dora shi kan wannan da wancan, su haifar da rikici, su yi da wannan da wancan.

translation.en: The more harshly an interviewee speaks, the more inappropriate things he says and the more he curses in his interview, the happier these media networks will be.
translation.ha: Gwargwadon irin wuce gona da iri cikin magana, da fadin muggan maganganu da zage-zagen da mutumin da ake hira da shi zai fadi, gwargwadon irin farin cikin da wannan kafar watsa labaran za ta yi.

translation.en: Another issue which I have spoken about many times - this is related to officials in charge of sporting activities - is that you should take the issue of prioritizing different sports into consideration.
translation.ha: Akasin hakan ya kamata su yi. Wani batun kuma wanda na sha fadinsa - wanda yana da alaka ne da jami'an bangaren wasanni - shi ne cewa a dinga lura da mafi muhimmanci cikin bangarorin wasanni.

translation.en: I have referred to a number of such sports in recent years.
translation.ha: A shekarun baya na ambato sunayen wadannan wasannin.

translation.en: Well, in such and such sports, we do not at all rank high in the world and we have no chance to do so. We are unlikely to rank high in such sports.
translation.ha: Akwai wani wasan da ba mu taba samun wata lambar girma a duniya ba, kai ko ma sa'a ba mu da shi, wato ko ma tunanin za mu sami wata lambar yabo ba ma.

translation.en: Of course, there are certain reasons for this.
translation.ha: Tabbas akwai dalilan hakan.

translation.en: But in certain sports, we are ranked high in the world.
translation.ha: To amma a wasu wasannin kan muna da matsayi a duniya.

translation.en: Today, you stand on the medal platform in a number of sports such as wrestling, weightlifting or other sports. This is very important.
translation.ha: A yau din nan a duniya kuna da lambobin yabo na zakaran-zakaru, a matsayin misali a gasar kokawa, ko daga nauyi ko kuma wasu gasannin na daban, to wannan dai lamari ne mai muhimmanci.

translation.en: A few years ago - I do not remember which year it was - I had a meeting with my athlete friends.
translation.ha: A shekarun baya, a halin yanzu dai ba zan iya tuna ko a wace shekara ba ce, a lokacin da wadannan ‘yan wasa suka zo nan muka gana, na ambaci sunan ‘Cugan'.

translation.en: It is our sport and it is a good sport.
translation.ha: To wannan wasa dai na mu ne mu iraniyawa, wasa ne kuma mai kyau.

translation.en: It is an entertaining and exciting sport.
translation.ha: Wasa ne mai faranta rai da sanya nishadi.

translation.en: We have a talent for this sport in Iran.
translation.ha: Akwai kwarewa da kuma karfin wannan wasa a Iran, idan da a ce babu da ba a gudanar da shi ba.

translation.en: Throughout history, chowgan has been a well-known sport in Iran.
translation.ha: Tsawon tarihi wannan wasan ya yi fice a Iran.

translation.en: One of the brothers in this meeting said that we should benefit from foreign coaches.
translation.ha: Wani daga cikin ‘yan'uwa ya yi maganar a dinga amfani da masu horarwa ‘yan kasashen waje, to ni dai ba na adawa da hakan.

translation.en: You should not think that I am opposed to hiring a good and competent foreign coach.
translation.ha: Kada wani ya yi zaton cewa ni ina adawa da a dauko masu horarwa ‘yan kasashen waje wadanda za su iya amfanarwa ba ne.

translation.en: But when you benefit from a native coach for soccer, basketball, volleyball, wrestling or any other sports, I become happy and I feel a sense of pride.
translation.ha: To amma a lokacin da kuka yi amfani da wani mai horarwa dan gida a matsayin misali a bangaren kwallon kafa ko kwallon kwando ko kwallon hannu ko kokawa da sauransu, lalle ni zan yi farin ciki da kuma jin daukaka.

translation.en: It is very good that the coach of our athletes and our youth is one of us and is nurtured here.
translation.ha: Abu ne mai kyau a ce mai horarwar daya ne daga cikinmu, a nan aka yi tarbiyyarsa.

translation.en: Of course, some foreign coaches are good and some others are not good and they take a lot of money, they have high expectations and sometimes they do not carry out their duties.
translation.ha: Tabbas wasu daga cikin masu horarwa na wajen sun iya aikinsu, wasu kuma a'a.

translation.en: Therefore, this is what I mean when I sometimes speak about foreign coaches.
translation.ha: A saboda idan har a wani lokaci na yi magana dangane da masu horarwa na waje, to wannan shi ne abin da na ke nufi.

translation.en: This is what I mostly speak about. I have spoken about this issue many times.
translation.ha: Wannan daya ne daga cikin abubuwan da muke fadi, a lokuta da dama na sha fadin hakan.

translation.en: As other scientific research, the research that is carried out in the world on a specific sport is not the last word.
translation.ha: Yana da kyau masana a fagen wasannin, su kutsa da kuma gudanar da bincike na ilimi.

translation.en: It is possible to carry out research on the basis of such research or add new things to it in order to improve or even reject it.
translation.ha: A matsayin misali mai yiyuwa ne a duniya ya zamana an gudanar da wani bincike na ilimi a wani wasan, to amma bai kamata a tsaya a wajen ba, a ci gaba da gudanar da ayyuka bisa hakan har a kai ga gaci.

translation.en: Well, you should do such things in Iran.
translation.ha: Yana da kyau a yi hakan a Iran.

translation.en: We have managed to do things which the enemy could not even imagine.
translation.ha: Mun gudanar da ayyuka na ilimi wadanda makiyanmu hatta tunanin hakan ma ba sa yi na cewa wani Ba'iraniye zai iya yin wannan aiki.

translation.en: That is to say, it would have to go through several mazes.
translation.ha: Wato a yi ta yawo da shi, wanda ko shakka ma ba za su bari ba.

translation.en: If we had decided to buy nuclear fuel for the research reactors that we have, they would not have given a bit of it to us without making the Iranian nation completely humiliated.
translation.ha: Idan har muna son mu samar wa wannan cibiya makamashin da take bukata, mu saya daga wajensu, don a kaskantar da al'ummar Iran sannan kuma babu wani abin da za su ba mu.

translation.en: Once I said that if the oil that we have, belonged to the Europeans and if we wanted to buy oil or petroleum from them, they would sell each barrel of it to us at an exorbitant price. They are such people.
translation.ha: A wani lokaci a baya na taba fadin cewa shi kansa wannan man fetur din da muke da shi, idan da a ce na wadannan kasashen Turai din ne sannan kuma za mu dinga saya ne daga wajensu, to da kuwa sun dinga sayar mana shi da tsadar gaske shi din ma dan kadan kadan.

translation.en: They thought that we would have to buy the 20-percent fuel from them and we would give in to their demands. That is why they created such obstacles.
translation.ha: To suna tunanin cewa saboda mu sami damar sayan makamashi kashi 20 cikin dari, dole ne mu mika musu kai, a saboda haka ne suka kirkira mana wadannan matsaloli.

translation.en: But our youth carried out research on it and they themselves produced the 20-percent fuel.
translation.ha: Daga nan suna zaton ba za mu iya samar da bututun zuba makamashin ba; amma haka matasanmu suka samar da shi sannan suka fara aiki.

translation.en: Now, they are faced with a fait accompli that the Iranian nation presented them with. Such complex and great work is being carried out.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu ana gudanar da irin wadannan ayyuka masu rikitarwa da kuma girman gaske, shin wata matsala take cikin a gudanar da irin wadannan ayyuka na ilimi a fagen wasanni?

translation.en: Why do not we carry out great work in sports? The rules and practices that exist in sports - whether individual sports such as wrestling and weightlifting or team sports - should be researched.
translation.ha: Akwai wasu bangarori na wasanni, shin wasanni ne na daidaiku irin su kokawa da daga nauyi da sauransu ko kuma wasanni na jama'ance, da aka gudanar da ayyuka na ilimi, don haka a kara kan abubuwan da aka yi.

translation.en: It is possible to develop such guidelines for them.
translation.ha: A gudanar da gyara a wani bangare na su.

translation.en: In any case, I hope that Allah the Exalted will help all of you succeed.
translation.ha: Ala kulli hal, ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya ba wa dukkaninku dacewa.

translation.en: I express my deep gratitude to all of you and all the young athletes for the things that they did in international arenas such as saying adhan after conquering the peaks of success, prostrating themselves, praying, mentioning the name of our infallible Imams (a.s.) and wearing hijab. May God bestow success on you.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma ina mika godiya ta ga matasanmu dangane da abubuwan da suka yi a fagen wasa, irin su kiran salla a kololuwar dutsen da suka hau, ko kuma yin sujada a fagen wasa, ko kuma daga hannaye da yin addu'oi, ko kuma ambaton sunayen Imamai ko kuma kiyaye mutumci da dokoki na addini. Ina rokon Allah da ya ba wa dukkaninku dacewa.

translation.en: You are very popular among the people of Iran and I hope you will remain popular forever.
translation.ha: Ku din nan sanyin idanuwan al'ummar Iran ne, kuma insha allahu za ku ci gaba da zama hakan.

translation.en: Leader's Speech on the Occasion Eid al-Ghadir - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Imam Khamenei Yayin Ganawa Da Mutane Wajen Bikin Idin Ranar Ghadir

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Mercifulâ€Œ
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I would like to congratulate all the dear audience, the dear brothers and sisters, the dear people of Iran, all Shia Muslims and all those people who feel proud of and who enjoy the truths of Islam and knowledge about the content of this holy religion on the occasion of the auspicious day of Eid al-Ghadir.
translation.ha: Ina taya dukkanin mahalarta wannan taron, ‘yan'uwa maza da mata masu girma, da madaukakan al'ummar Iran, da dukkanin ‘yan Shi'a, kai da ma dukkanin wadanda suke da masaniya dangane da abin da ya shafi wannan addini mai girma da kuma jin daukaka da jin dadin hakan, murnar wannan rana mai albarka ta Idin Ghadir.

translation.en: And I welcome all the dear participants, particularly the dear brothers and sisters who have come from distant cities and who have ornamented this meeting with their presence.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda kuma na ke wa dukkanin mahalarta wannan taron barka da zuwa, musamman ‘yan'uwa maza da mata da suka zo daga nesa da kuma kawata mana wannan Husainiyar.

translation.en: I would like to say a few things about the issue of Ghadir and then I will say a few things about the responsibilities that the issue of Ghadir and awareness about the deep lessons of Ghadir entrusts to us.
translation.ha: Da farko zan yi magana ne dangane da batun Ghadir.

translation.en: The issue of Ghadir is a very important issue in the history of Islam.
translation.ha: Lamarin Ghadir wani lamari ne mai matukar muhimmanci a tarihin Musulunci.

translation.en: First, the essence of this astonishing and important event and this holy statement - "Whomsoever's Moula [leader] I am, Ali is also his Moula" - is not something that has been narrated by Shia only. This event is among clear and absolute truths.
translation.ha: Da farko dai asalin wannan lamari mai ban mamaki da kuma muhimmanci (na Ghadir) da kuma wannan madaukakiyar jumla ta "مَن کُنتُ مَولاه فَهذا عَلىٌّ مَولاه" wato "Duk wanda na zamanto shugabansa, to Aliyu shugabansa ne", ba wai lamari ne wanda ‘yan Shi'a ne kawai suka nakalto shi ba, face dai yana daga cikin abubuwan da aka sallama da kuma yarda da su.

translation.en: Those who wanted to find faults with this event did not cast doubts on the origin of this statement. Rather, they resorted to ta'weel and interpretation of this sentence.
translation.ha: Hatta mutanen da suke kokarin sanya shakku cikinsa, ba sa shakkar asalin fitar maganar daga bakin Ma'aiki, face dai sun koma ne suna tawili da yi wa lamarin da wannan jumlar fassarori na daban.

translation.en: The issue of Ghadir is a clear historical and Islamic issue. The doubts and questions - about the meaning of this sentence - that have come to the minds of some intellectual and philosophical newcomers of today are the same doubts and questions that have been raised since a thousand years ago.
translation.ha: Amma asalin lamarin kan, wani abu ne da aka yarda da faruwarsa a tarihin Musulunci. Irin shubuhohi da wasu ma'anoni da a halin yanzu wasu suke gabatarwa kan wannan lamarin, maganganun ne da shekaru dubun da suka gabata aka gabatar da su, sannan kuma manyan malamai sun amsa da kuma magance wadannan shubuhohi.

translation.en: Therefore, there is not any room for raising doubts about the essence of this issue, this event and what the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) said. On that day, the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) asked the people, "Am I not closer to you than your own selves?" This sentence was a reference to a Quranic ayah which said, "The Prophet is closer to the believers than their own selves" [The Holy Quran, 33: 6].
translation.ha: Don haka babu wani shakku cikin asalin lamari da faruwarsa da kuma ma'anar jumlar da Manzo (s) ya fadi yayin da ya tambayi mutane (sahabbansa) cewa "أَلَستُ أَولى بِكُمْ مِنْ أنْفُسِكُم" wato "Ashe ba ni ne na fi soyuwa a gare ku sama da kanku ba" wanda ishara ce ga ayar nan ta Alkur'ani mai girma da ke cewa: "النَّبِيُّ أَوْلَى بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ مِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ" "Annabi ne mafi cancanta ga muminai bisa ga su kansu" (Suratul Ahzab 33:6) daga nan sai ya fadi jumla: "مَن کُنتُ مَولاه فَهذا عَلىٌّ مَولاه", don haka babu shakku cikin asalin lamarin.

translation.en: So, there is not any room for doubt about the essence of this issue. What should be said about the content of this historical, holy and meaningful sentence - apart from the appointment of the Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) as the caliph and Imam after the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) which is the common meaning of this sentence - is that there is another important issue which should not be ignored.
translation.ha: To amma abin da ya kamata a ce dangane da abin da wannan jumla mai girma da ke cike da tarihi take nuni da shi, baya ga batun nada Amirul Muminin (a.s) a matsayin halifa kana kuma imami bayan Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) da kuma wasiccin Annabi - wanda ita ce ma'anar da aka fi sani na wannan jumlar - akwai wata ma'anar ta daban mai muhimmanci cikin wannan jumla wanda bai kamata a gafala daga ita ba, ita ce kuwa muhimmancin da Musulunci ya ba wa lamarin hukuma da kuma siyasar gudanar da lamurran al'umma a mahangar Musulunci.

translation.en: The answer to those people who have tried to throw Islam out of the arena of social and political issues, to confine it to personal and individual affairs and to adopt a secular outlook towards Islam - the hands of the enemies and their propaganda efforts have been promoting this outlook among Muslims for many years - is the issue of Ghadir.
translation.ha: A hakikanin gaskiya lamarin Ghadir ya zamanto martani ne ga mutanen da suke kokarin raba Musulunci da batutuwa na siyasa da zamantakewa ta al'umma, da takaita shi ga lamurran da suka shafi rayuwar daidaikun mutane - wato a hakikanin gaskiya suna wa Musulunci wani irin kallo ne na cewa addini ba shi da wata rawa da zai taka cikin tsarin gudanar da rayuwa ta zamantakewa ta al'umma, wanda hakan wata farfaganda ce da makiya da ‘yan amshin shatansu suka jima suna yadawa tsakanin musulmi.

translation.en: At the command of Allah the Exalted, the Holy Prophet (God's greetings be upon him and his household) addressed an important and fundamental issue in that sensitive condition and during the last months of his life. This important issue was attending to the issue of government after the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) time.
translation.ha: A daidai wannan lokaci mai matukar muhimmanci, sannan a watannin karshe karshe na rayuwarsa ne, Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a), bisa umurnin Ubangiji, yayi bayanin wannan lamari mai muhimmancin gaske. Wannan lamarin kuwa shi ne batun yadda za a gudanar da hukuma a bayansa.

translation.en: Here, the appointment of the Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) was not confined to spiritual aspects.
translation.ha: (Yana da kyau a fahimci cewa) Nada Amirul Muminin (a.s) da aka yi a nan, ba wai kawai nadi ne da ya shafi bangare na ruhi da kusaci da Allah ba ne.

translation.en: Rather, it can be said that spiritual aspects are not things that someone can be appointed and elected for.
translation.ha: Kai ana ma iya cewa bangaren ruhi ma ba lamari ne da za a iya nada shi ba.

translation.en: The Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) recommended this to the people.
translation.ha: Wadannan su ne abin da Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) ya nuna wa musulmi.

translation.en: This is an important point on the issue of Ghadir and it is a rejoinder to all those people who think and promote the idea that Islam should be kept away from political issues, issues related to the government and the like.
translation.ha: Wannan wani bangare ne mai matukar muhimmanci cikin lamarin Ghadir, wanda kuma ya ke a matsayin amsa cikakkiya ga dukkanin mutane da suke tunani da kuma yada farfaganda cewar babu ruwan Musulunci da lamurran siyasa da hukuma.

translation.en: Therefore, these two truths - that is to say, the truth about the appointment of the Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) as the Imam after the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) and the truth about attending to the issue of government, politics, imamate and managing the Islamic Ummah after the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) - and these two very important and sensitive issues exist in the event of Ghadir.
translation.ha: A saboda haka ana iya ganin wadannan lamurra guda biyu masu muhimmanci, wato nada Amirul Muminin (a.s) a matsayin imami (halifa) bayan Annabi da kuma lamarin gudanar da hukuma da siyasa da jagorantar al'umma bayan Ma'aiki (s.a.w.a), cikin lamarin Ghadir, kamar yadda kuma suna daga cikin ilmummuka da masaniyar da suke kumshe cikin Ghadir.

translation.en: They are among teachings that have been guaranteed by Ghadir and they are a great lesson for all Muslims, whether for their present time or for their future.
translation.ha: Hakan kuwa darasi ne mai girma ga dukkanin musulmi, ga yau da kuma goben al'ummar musulmi.

translation.en: Today, what we should pay attention to is that the issue of Ghadir is an ideological issue.
translation.ha: Abin da ya zama wajibi mu yi la'akari da kuma ba shi muhimmanci a yau, shi ne cewa lamarin Ghadir wani lamari ne na akida.

translation.en: Shia and the followers of the school of the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) household and the school of imamate are committed to the issue of Ghadir.
translation.ha: ‘Yan Shi'a da mabiya tafarkin Ahlulbaiti da karantarwar imamanci, sun yi imani da lamarin Ghadir; hakan tushe ne na tunani da koyarwar Shi'anci.

translation.en: Without a doubt, this is the base of Shia philosophy and there is no room for any discussion on this issue.
translation.ha: Babu kokwanto ko wani shakku cikin hakan.

translation.en: Those who doubt this and those who have a question in this regard can take part in scholarly and expert meetings and discuss it. Shia's logic is strong.
translation.ha: Mutanen da suke da wata shubuha ko wata magana kan hakan, suna iya zama a majalisi na ilimi da bahasi na ilimi, su yi bahasin hakan. Shi'a suna da karfafa hujjoji dangane da hakan.

translation.en: However, this should not influence the public lives of Muslims, their cooperation with and brotherhood towards one another.
translation.ha: To amma bai kamata hakan ya haifar da wani gibi cikin rayuwa ta gaba daya ta musulmi da yanayin mu'amalarsu da juna da ‘yan'uwantakar da ke tsakaninsu ba.

translation.en: The issue of differences between Muslim denominations - whether Shia and Sunni denominations or the different denominations that exist inside these two major denominations - has been one of the targets of the greed of the enemies of Islam, not just the enemies of Shia Islam.
translation.ha: Don kuwa haifar da sabani tsakanin kungiyoyi da mazhabobin musulmi - shin mazhabar Shi'a da Sunna ne, ko kuma mazhabobi da kungiyoyi daban-daban da suke cikin wadannan manyan mazhabobi guda biyu na Musulunci - ta kasance daya daga cikin bangarorin da makiya Musulunci suka jima suna hari. Ba wai kawai makiya ‘yan Shi'a ba.

translation.en: For many years, there has been an effort to create discord between Muslims.
translation.ha: Tsawon shekaru aru aru an yi kokari wajen haifar da sabani tsakanin musulmi.

translation.en: This is because the existence of discord between Muslims will make them spend their efforts, energy and motivation on domestic fights.
translation.ha: Don kuwa makiyan sun san cewa sabani tsakanin musulmi, wani lamari ne da zai sanya musulmin tara dukkanin himma da karfinsu gaba daya wajen fada da junansu, da kuma yin watsi da manyan makiyansu na hakika.

translation.en: This has been the major policy of colonialism for many years and after the victory of the Islamic Revolution and the formation of the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce babbar siyasar ‘yan mulkin mallaka tsawon shekaru aru-arun da suka gabata.

translation.en: Because they witnessed the development of the Islamic Republic's thoughts in the world of Islam, they placed more emphasis on and showed more persistence in creating discord.
translation.ha: Sai dai bayan nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci da kafa tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci (a Iran) sun kara kaimi sosai don kuwa sun ga irin tasiri da yadda tunanin Jamhuriyar Musulunci yake yaduwa a duniyar musulmi.

translation.en: They invested in doing this in order to separate the world of Islam from the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Sun kara kaimi sosai don dai su raba duniyar musulmi da Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

translation.en: The Islamic Republic, our great Revolution and our great Imam (r.a.) managed to attract the thoughts of the world of Islam and the hearts of Muslims.
translation.ha: Tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci, juyin juya halin Musuluncinmu mai girma da kuma marigayi Imam Khumaini sun sami nasarar janyo hankulan duniyar musulmi zuwa gare su, sun janyo zukatansu da kuma samar wa yunkurinsu mahanga.

translation.en: This frightened colonialism, arrogance and Zionism - particularly American politicians.
translation.ha: ‘Yan mulkin mallaka, ma'abota girman kai da kuma sahyoniyawa da kuma siyasar Amurka sun tsorata.

translation.en: As a result of this, they resorted to their old weapon which is the weapon of creating discord.
translation.ha: A saboda haka ne suka koma ga tsohon makaminsu, wanda shi ne makamin haifar da sabani da rarraba tsakanin musulmi.

translation.en: Since many years ago until today, they have been fueling the fire of discord between Shia and Sunni so that they can divert the attention of the two sides from the main enemy - who is the enemy of Islam, not the enemy of Shia or Sunni in particular - and so that they can busy them with each other.
translation.ha: A yau sannan kuma tsawon wadannan shekaru sun ba da himma wajen haifar da sabani tsakanin Shi'a da Sunna duk dai da nufin shagaltar da dukkanin bangarori biyu daga makiyansu na asali - wadanda su ne makiyan Musulunci, ba wai makiyan Shi'a kawai ba ne ko kuma Sunna kawai ba ne - da hada su fada da junansu.

translation.en: This is the policy of colonialism.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce siyasar ‘yan mulkin mallaka.

translation.en: They have experience in the ways for doing this.
translation.ha: Shekaru aru aru suka yi suna gudanar da ayyukansu a wannan fagen.

translation.en: Therefore, they know how to do it and they are extremely active in this arena.
translation.ha: Suna da masaniya kan hakan, sannan kuma sun yi dukkanin abin da za su iya.

translation.en: This takfiri orientation - the thing that has emerged in Iraq, Syria and some other regional countries today and that confronts all Muslims, not just Shias - is the handicraft of colonialists themselves.
translation.ha: Wadannan kungiyoyi masu kafirta musulmi, wadannan da a halin yanzu suka kunno kai a kasashen Iraki da Siriya da ma wasu kasashen yankin nan, a hakikanin gaskiya suna fada ne da dukkanin musulmi, ba wai kawai da ‘yan Shi'a ba.

translation.en: They made something called al-Qaida and DAESH in order to confront the Islamic Republic and the movement of the Islamic Awakening. However, this product has become a burden for themselves.
translation.ha: Su suka kirkiro kungiyoyi da sunan Al-Ka'ida da sunan Da'esh (ISIS) don fada da Jamhuriyar Musulunci, don fada da irin farkawa ta Musulunci da aka samu.

translation.en: Of course, if we take a careful and analytical look today, we see that the unreal effort which America and its allies are making in the region today under the name of confronting DAESH is, in fact, an effort for channeling enmities among Muslims more than it is an effort for nipping this evil movement in the bud.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu a yau idan mutum ya kalli lamarin da idon basira, zai ga cewa kokarin da Amurka da kawayenta suke yi cikin abin da suke kira ‘fada da Da'esh' - wanda a hakikanin gaskiya ba haka lamarin yake ba - kafin ya zamanto wani kokari ne na ganin bayan wadannan lalatattun kungiyoyi, wani kokari ne wajen rarraba kan musulmin.

translation.en: They are trying to divert Muslims' attention from the main enemy.
translation.ha: Suna kokari ne wajen hada musulmi fada a tsakaninsu.

translation.en: We - whether Shia and Sunni Muslims or anyone who is committed to Islam and who believes in the authority of the Holy Quran - should know that America and American, arrogant and Zionist policies are the enemy of Islam, Islamic awareness and the rule of Islam.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne mu fahimci hakan - shin Shi'a ne ko kuma Sunna; duk wanda yayi imani da Musulunci, duk wanda ya yi imani da iko na Alkur'ani, wajibi ne ya san cewa - makiyan Musulunci da farkawar Musulunci da aka samu da kuma iko na Musulunci su ne Amurka da ma'abota girman kan duniya da kuma sahyoniyawa da siyasar da suke gudanarwa.

translation.en: The effort that they are making today is the continuation of the effort that they have been making for 35 years.
translation.ha: Abin da a halin yanzu suke yi, ci gaba ne na kokarin da suka faro shi shekaru 35 din da suka gabata (wato bayan nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci a Iran).

translation.en: It is 35 years now that they have been making all sorts of efforts. However, by God's permission and grace, they were defeated in all the efforts that they made against the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Shekaru 35 kenan suke ta kokari ta hanyoyi daban-daban, amma cikin ikon Allah da yardarsa, sun sha kashi cikin dukkanin wadannan makirce-makirce na su a kan Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

translation.en: By Allah's favor, they will definitely be defeated in this one as well.
translation.ha: A wannan sabon makircin ma, da yardar Allah, za su sha kashi.

translation.en: What the responsibility of Muslims - whether Shia or Sunni Muslims - is, is that they should not help the enemy by provoking the feelings of one another.
translation.ha: Nauyin da ke wuyan musulmi - shin musulmi ‘yan Shi'ane, ko kuma musulmi ‘yan Sunna - shi ne su fahimci cewa sosa zukatan junansu wani lamari ne da zai taimaka wa makiya cimma burinsu.

translation.en: Shia should know that if there is a fight between Shia and Sunni and if feelings are provoked, it is the common and the main enemy who will benefit from this.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne ‘yan Shi'a su san cewa matukar suka yi wani abin da zai haifar da sabani da fada da rikici tsakanin Shi'a da Sunna, to kuwa makiyansu na asali ne za su amfana da hakan.

translation.en: Therefore, it should not let this happen.
translation.ha: Bai kamata su bari hakan ta faru ba.

translation.en: The two sides should be careful.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne bangarori biyun su yi taka tsantsan.

translation.en: They should not provoke each other's feelings, they should not insult each other's holy beliefs and they should not fuel the fire of discord between Muslim tribes and groups - particularly between Shia and Sunni - because this is what the enemies of Islam want.
translation.ha: Kada su motsa da sosa ran junansu, kada su ci zarafin ababe masu tsarki na junansu, kada su hura wutar fitina da rikici tsakanin mazhabobi da kungiyoyi na musulmi musamman tsakanin Shi'a da Sunna - wanda hakan shi ne abin da makiya Musulunci suke so.

translation.en: Everyone should pay attention to this.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne kowa ya kula da hakan.

translation.en: If someone does something to provoke the feelings of the other side and to create enmity, they should certainly know that they are helping America, vile England and Zionism. They should know that they are helping those people who create DAESH, al-Qaida and the like and who create the takfiri orientation in order to create discord between Shia and Sunni.
translation.ha: Idan har wani ya yi wani abin da zai sosa ran dan'uwansa da haifar da kiyayya a tsakaninsu, to ya san cewa ya taimaki Amurka ne, yana taimakon Ingila lalatacciya ce, ya taimaki sahyoniyawa ne; ya taimaka wa mutanen da suka kirkiro kungiyoyin Da'esh (ISIS) da Al-Ka'ida da makamantansu da kuma kirkiro kungiyoyi masu kafirta musulmi da nufin haifar da sabani da rarrabuwa tsakanin Shi'a da Sunna ne.

translation.en: Today, Islamic unity, Islamic brotherhood and Islamic solidarity is one of the most necessary and urgent responsibilities for all Islamic societies.
translation.ha: A yau hadin kai na Musulunci, ‘yan'uwantaka ta Musulunci da hadin gwiwa na Musulunci, daya ne daga cikin mafiya wajibcin nauyin da ke wuyan musulmi wanda wajibi ne kowa ya yi riko da shi.

translation.en: All of us should be committed to this responsibility.
translation.ha: Tabbas musulmai masu basira da sanin ya kamatan da suke rayuwa karkashin tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci sun fahimci irin wannan nauyi da ke wuyansu, muna fatan a nan da ma sauran wajaje za a yi aiki da wannan nauyin.

translation.en: I hope that God bestows success on all of you and I hope that He will help all of you and the entire world of Islam to benefit from the blessings of Eid al-Ghadir.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya ba wa dukkaninku dacewa. Ya ba ku da kuma dukkanin duniyar musulmi albarkokin da ke cikin wannan idi na Ghadir, insha Allah.

translation.en: Leader’s Message to International Conference on Global Fight Against Terrorism - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Sakon Jagora Ga Taron Kasa Da Kasa Na Fada Da Ta'addanci

translation.en: The following is the full text of the message issued on June 25, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution to the participants of the International Conference on Global Fight Against Terrorism.
translation.ha: Abin da ke biye fassarar sakon Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ne ga taron fada da ta'addancin na kasa da kasa:

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: Dear guests and honorable audience, welcome.
translation.ha: Ya ku baki masu girma, da kuma mahalarta wannan taro masu girma!

translation.en: I would like to thank you for coming together to discuss one of the tragic phenomena currently afflicting humanity - namely, terrorism.
translation.ha: Ina mika godiya ta a gare ku da kuka taru a wannan wajen don yin bahasin daya daga cikin babbar annobar da a halin yanzu take ci wa bil'adama tuwo a kwarya wato ta'addanci sannan kuma ina muku barka da zuwa.

translation.en: By Allah's favor, such discussions, which should undoubtedly continue and result in a conscious determination and sincere effort in the global community, will be an essential step towards curbing terrorism and saving humanity from this agonizing phenomenon.
translation.ha: Wannan bincike da bahasi wanda ko shakka babu wajibi ne ya ci gaba sannan kuma a isar da shi cikin gaskiya da rikon amana ga dukkanin al'ummomin duniya, da yardar Allah zai iya zama wani mataki na asasi na kawar da ta'addanci da 'yantar da bil'adama daga wannan annoba mai cutarwa.

translation.en: Having faith in God's guidance and assistance, we will pursue this issue in a hopeful way, and we will move ahead accompanied by all sincere and empathetic people and all those who feel responsible.
translation.ha: Mu dai cikin dogaro da Allah da kuma neman taimako da shiryarwarsa za mu ci gaba da wannan aikin sannan kuma ta hanyar hadin kan dukkanin masu kishi da jin nauyi a wuyansu zai ci gaba.

translation.en: It is not a product of modern times. But the introduction of dreadful weapons, which facilitated tragic mass killings, has made this reprehensible phenomenon a hundred times more fearsome and dangerous.
translation.ha: Ta'addanci dai ba wani bakon lamari na wannan zamani ba ne, to amma samuwar muggan makamai da kuma saukin aiwatar da kisan kare dangi hakan ya sanya wannan babbar annoba ta zamanto mai razanarwa da kuma hatsarin gaske ninkin ba ninkiya.

translation.en: Another important and shocking point is the evil calculations of the hegemonic powers which have introduced terrorism into the cycle of their policies and plans as a tool to achieve their illegitimate goals.
translation.ha: Wani lamari mai muhimmanci da kuma tada hankali, shi ne lissafi na shaidanci da masu karfi na duniyan suke yi na amfani da ta'addanci a matsayin wani kayan aiki na cimma haramtattun manufofinsu da kuma shigar da shi cikin siyasa da tsare-tsarensu.

translation.en: The historical memory of the nations of our region will never forget how colonial governments organized ruthless terrorist organizations such as the World Zionist Organization and more than ten similar other organizations and how they gave rise to the Deir Yassin tragedy and similar events in order to occupy Palestine and to force its oppressed people out of their homes.
translation.ha: Har abada kwakwalan al'ummomin wannan yankin ba za su taba mancewa da yadda gwamnatocin 'yan mulkin mallaka suka shirya kungiyoyi daban-daban na ta'addanci masu shan jinin al'umma irin su kungiyar yahudawan sahyoniya ta duniya da sauran kungiyoyi irin wannan kimanin guda goma wajen aikata wannan mummunan aiki da suka aikata a lokacin da suka yi fashin kasar Palastinu da korar al'ummomin wannan kasa da ake zalunta daga gidaje da bukkokinsu.

translation.en: Since its establishment up until today, the Zionist regime has openly continued its terrorist activities inside and outside Palestine, and it has shamelessly announced them.
translation.ha: Tun farkon samuwar gwamnatin sahyoniyawa har zuwa yau din nan a fili suke ci gaba da ayyukan ta'addancinsu a ciki da wajen Palastinu sannan kuma a fili suke sanar da wadannan ayyuka na su na rashin kunya.

translation.en: Current and previous leaders of the Zionist regime openly take pride in their history of terror and - in certain cases - their participation in terrorist activities.
translation.ha: Shugabannin haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila na da da na yanzu suna alfahari da ayyukan ta'addancin da suka aikata da hannayensu kai hatta a wasu lokuta ma suna alfahari da yin tarayyarsu cikin aiwatar da wasu ayyukan ta'addancin.

translation.en: The regime of the United States of America is another example, a regime that has left a long trail of terrorist activities as well as financial and arms support for organized terrorists in the regional countries.
translation.ha: Wani misalin na daban kuma ita ce kasar Amurka wacce tsawon gomomin shekarun da suka gabata ta samar da wannan annoba ta ta'addanci da kuma ba ta goyon baya na kudi da makamai ga (kungiyoyin da suka aiwatar da) ayyukan ta'addanci da aka tsara su a cikin kasashen wannan yankin.

translation.en: Deadly raids of drones on defenseless families in the villages and underprivileged areas of Afghanistan and Pakistan, which have turned weddings into mourning ceremonies on many occasions, the Blackwater crimes in Iraq and the killing of Iraqi civilians and prominent figures, supporting bombers in Iran, Iraq and Pakistan, assassinating nuclear scientists in Iran with the cooperation of MOSSAD, shooting down the Iranian passenger plane in the Persian Gulf and killing around 300 innocent children, men and women - these are examples of this disgraceful and unforgettable trail of crimes.
translation.ha: Hare-haren da jiragen sama marasa matuka na Amurka suke kai wa kan iyalai marasa kariya a kauyuka da garuruwan kasar Afghanistan da Pakistan wadanda a lokuta da dama sun mayar da bukukuwan aure zuwa ga bukukuwa na juyayi, ayyukan ta'addancin kungiyar Black Water a kasar Iraki da kisan gillan da ake yi wa masanan kasar, taimakon kungiyoyi masu dana bama-bamai a kasar Iran da Iraki da Pakistan, kashe masanan fasahar nukiliya a Iran bisa taimakon kungiyar MOSSAD (kungiyar leken asirin haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila), harbe jirgin fasinja na Iran a Tekun Fasha da kashe kimanin kananan yara dari uku da kuma maza da mata matafiya.....(dukkanin wadannan ayyuka) wani bangare ne na wadannan danyen aiki na su da ba za a taba mancewa da su ba.

translation.en: America, England and certain other western governments, with their dark and incriminating record in terrorist activities, have added claims of fighting terrorism to the list of their extravagant claims.
translation.ha: Amurka da Ingila da kuma wasu gwamnatocin yammaci na daban wadanda masu bakin tarihi na aiwatar da ayyukan ta'addanci, (a halin yanzu) suna da'awar fada da ta'addanci wanda hakan kari ne na irin wadannan ikirari na karya da suke yi.

translation.en: The terrorists who ruthlessly murdered thousands of people in the 1360s are now living under the support of European governments and statesmen, the same terrorists who assassinated 72 scientific and political figures and high-ranking officials of Iran on one occasion, and assassinated our president and prime minister on another occasion.
translation.ha: Yan ta'addan da a shekarun 1970-80 da suka yi sanadiyyar mutuwar dubban mutane cikin yanayi na rashin imani, wanda a daya daga cikinsu shi ne harin da a cikinsa manyan jami'ai da masanan kasar nan kimanin 72, sannan a wani harin kuma na daban shugaban kasa da firayi ministan kasar mu suka yi shahada, amma har ya zuwa yanzu wadannan ('yan ta'dda) suna nan karkashin kulawa da kariyar gwamnatoci da shugabannin kasashen Turai.

translation.en: With such behaviors, claims of fighting terrorism are extremely shameless.
translation.ha: Da irin wadannan ayyuka, ko shakka babu ikirarin fada da ta'addanci, wani lamari ne na wauta da rashin kunya.

translation.en: From the perspective of the leaders of the order of domination, terrorism is whatever that threatens their illegitimate interests.
translation.ha: A wajen shugabannin tsarin mulkin mallaka, ta'addanci shi ne duk wani abin da ya ke barazana ga haramtattun manufofinsu.

translation.en: They label as terrorists the resistance fighters who are defending their legitimate right of countering occupiers and interferers, but they do not recognize as terrorists their evil and mercenary centers which are threatening the life and security of innocent people.
translation.ha: A wajen su 'yan gwagwarmayar da suke amfani da wannan hanya ta gwagwarmaya wajen neman halaltattun hakkokinsu da kuma fada da 'yan mamaya to wadannan 'yan ta'adda ne, to amma ba sa ganin lalatattun 'yan amshin shatansu wadanda suka zamanto annoba ga rayuka da tsaron mutanen da ba su ci ba su sha ba a matsayin 'yan ta'adda.

translation.en: One of the essential things that this conference can do is to present a clear and accurate definition of terrorism.
translation.ha: A saboda haka daya daga cikin ayyukanku na asasi a yayin wannan taro yana iya zama bayyanar da ma'ana ta hakika ta ta'addanci.

translation.en: Relying on Islamic teachings - according to which human dignity is a top priority and according to which killing a single innocent person is like killing all human beings - and as a nation which has suffered great losses during the past three decades as a result of terrorism, we think of fighting this evil phenomenon as our fundamental responsibility, and by Allah's favor, we will continue our efforts on the path of this great struggle with all our power.
translation.ha: Mu dai ta hanyar dogaro da koyarwar addinin Musulunci wanda girmama mutumcin dan'adam daya ne daga cikin manyan bangarorinta sannan kuma ya ke ganin kashe wani mutum guda da bai ci bai sha ba a matsayin kashe dukkanin mutane ne, sannan kuma a matsayin wata al'umma wacce cikin shekaru talatin din da suka gabata ta fuskanci gagarumar hasara daga ayyukan ta'addanci, lalle tana ganin fada da wannan annoba ta shaidan a matsayin wani nauyi da ba za ta taba yin watsi da shi ba da ke wuyanta, kuma cikin yardar Allah za ta ci gaba da tafiya a kan hanyar fada da wannan annoba da dukkan karfinta.

translation.en: Greetings be upon you and upon God's servants
translation.ha: Amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare ku da kuma bayin Allah na gargaru.

translation.en: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Khamenei

translation.en: Leader’s Comments in a Book on Hajj - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Ta’alikin Jagora Bayan Karanta Wani Littafi Dangane Da Tafiya Aikin Hajj

translation.en: This book plunged me once again into the nostalgic excitement and enthusiasm of visiting the House of God and the shrine of His Messenger (s.w.a.), the kind of excitement and enthusiasm which I am no longer very hopeful about.
translation.ha: Wannan littafin ya sake tayar da damuwa da kaunar ziyartar Dakin Allah da haramin Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) da nake da ita. Wannan shauki da kuma kauna wanda a halin yanzu fatan da ake da shi na tabbatar da ita ya kawu.

translation.en: As far back as I can remember â€“ since the days of my youth â€“ I have never found my heart free of the flames of this enthusiasm.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda zan iya tunawa – tun daga shekaru aru-aru na samartaka – ban taba fitar da wannan yanayi na kauna da shauki daga zuciya ta ba.

translation.en: During the dark era of suppression, every cleric, knowledgeable or not, could easily register for hajj pilgrimage out of enthusiasm or even out of indulgence, but I could not do so.
translation.ha: Kai hatta a zamanin bakin zalunci da kowane malami mai masaniya (ta addini) da ma mara ita, da kaunarsa ko kuma bisa tilasci, cikin sauki, zai iya tafiya aikin hajji…amma ni dai na gagara!

translation.en: In other words, for fear of the Shah's SAVAK, no caravan leader was able or courageous enough to put my name on the list of hajj pilgrims, let alone assign me as the cleric in charge of the caravan.
translation.ha: Ko kuma dai kamata ya yi in ce: babu wani shugaban tawaga, sakamakon tsoron ‘yan sandan Sabak, da zai iya yin jaruntakar sanya suna na cikin jerin sunayen alhazansa – ina ga kuma batun malamin cikin tawagar alhazai.

translation.en: Yes, even during those difficult times, my heart was not free of the hope of visiting Ka'bah and kissing the footprints of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) in Mecca and Medinaâ€¦. And although my wish was fulfilled during the 10-day hajj pilgrimage of the year 1358 thanks to Shahid Mahallati, the flames of that enthusiasm became brighter and stronger.
translation.ha: Na’am, hatta a wancan lokaci mai tsanani amma zuciyata ba ta yanke fatar ziyartar Ka’aba da kuma sumbantar bigiren kafafun annabi (s.a.w.a) a Makka da Madina ba…duk kuwa da cewa na sami damar biyan wannan fatan, bayan da na sami damar tafiya aikin hajji na kwanaki goma a shekara ta 1358 (1980) albarkacin shahid Muhallati; to amma wutar wannan shauki ta kara ruruwa ne.

translation.en: When I was President, I had pinned my hopes on having this opportunity after my presidential terms.
translation.ha: A lokacin da nake rike da matsayin shugaban kasa na sanya dukkan fata na ga bayan hakan ne; to amma a halin yanzu kan….?

translation.en: But todayâ€¦? Restless enthusiasm and faint hopeâ€¦. I only find solace in reading or listening to such travelogues, which itself increases my enthusiasm even more.
translation.ha: Wannan shauki da fata sun ku san kawo karshe…abin da ya rage kawai shi ne karanta irin wadannan littafa ko saurarensu wanda shi kansa ya kan sake tabbatar da wannan shaukin da kaunar.

translation.en: Leader’s Speech to Naval Forces in Bandar Abbas - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora A Sansanin Sojin Ruwa A Bandar Abbas

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on July 24, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Republic in a meeting with the naval forces of the Army and the Revolutionary Guards in the port city of Bandar Abbas in southern Iran.
translation.ha: Shimfida: A ranar asabar 23, Yulin 2011 ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya kai wani rangadi sansanin sojin ruwan soji da dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci na Iran da ke garin Bandar Abbas. Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran da ya yi ne a yayin ganawar da ya yi da jami'an sojin ruwan:

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I am thankful to Allah the Exalted who gave me this opportunity to renew our covenant and hold another meeting with you dear youth and you dear commanders and personnel [of the Islamic Republic of Iran's Navy].
translation.ha: Ina wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki godiya da Ya ba ni wannan damar ta kasancewa a wannan wajen don sake tabbatar da alkawari da sake ganawa da kuma yi muku ban gajiya Ya ku ‘yan'uwa masu girma kwamandoji, ma'aikata da matasa masu girma.

translation.en: I assure you that what you are doing in the naval forces of the Army and the Revolutionary Guards is one of the most effective things that can be done: making up for the backwardness that we suffered for many years because satanic governments failed to prepare the ground for the progress of our maritime industry and the presence of Iran's Navy [in international waters].
translation.ha: Ku sani cewa a yau din nan daya daga cikin ayyuka mafi tasiri, shi ne wannan aikin da ku din nan dakarun ruwa na soji da na dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci kuke yi a halin yanzu: (wato) cike gurbin koma baya na shekara da shekaru da hukumomin dagutu suka haifar (wa wannan kasar) wadanda suka hana dakarun ruwa na Iran samun ci gaba da kuma hana su yin tasiri a cikin teku na kasa da kasa. Wajibi ne gagarumin kokarin da za ku yi a yau ya zamanto ya cike wannan gibi na shekara da shekaru da aka haifar.

translation.en: As we all know, the sea provides a great opportunity for a country to make progress and to protect its national interests.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda dukkaninmu muka sani, teku dai a wajen wata kasa, wata gagarumar dama ce ta ci gaba da kiyaye manufofi na kasa.

translation.en: The sea brings about strategic advantages for a country and a nation: considerable and wide-ranging advantages.
translation.ha: Amfanin da ke tattare da teku a wajen wata kasa da kuma wata al'umma, wata fa'ida ce ta hakika da gina kasa; fa'ida ce mai girmar gaske.

translation.en: Certain countries managed to spread their power to far-away territories in four centuries by controlling the sea and developing maritime industry. Nations were oppressed. Territories were occupied.
translation.ha: Wadanda suka sami damar tabbatar da ikonsu a teku tsawon karnonin da suka gabata - wato kimanin karnoni hudu - sun sami damar fadada irin iko da mulkin da suke da shi zuwa wasu kasashe na nesa.

translation.en: National resources were squandered. But through these oppressive measures, the governments and countries that had control over the sea managed to gain power and accumulate wealth for themselves.
translation.ha: Sun zalunci al'ummomi, sun kame kasashe, sun sace albarkatun kasashe da al'ummomi; wadannan gwamnatoci da kasashen da suka sami ikon kame tekun ta wadannan hanyoyi na zalunci sun sami nasarar tattaro dukiya da karfi mai yawan gaske wa kawukansu.

translation.en: For many years the nations of our region - both in the Persian Gulf and in the Gulf of Oman - were used to obeying the bullying people who entered this region sailing in their warships. The nations of our region had to keep silent and listen to them.
translation.ha: Tsawon shekara da shekaru al'ummomin wannan yankin na mu, shin na Tekun Fasha ne ko kuma a Tekun Oman, sun saba jin sauti da muryar masu tinkaho da karfin da suka hau jiragen ruwan yakin su suka taso daga can nesa suka zo wannan yankin, sannan kuma su ka yi shiru babu wani abin da suka yi.

translation.en: This was the case in this region for many years.
translation.ha: Haka wannan lamarin ya ci gaba da gudana a wannan yankin na tsawon shekara da shekaru.

translation.en: Today everything has changed.
translation.ha: To a yau kan komai ya sauya.

translation.en: The long coast that belongs to the Iranian nation is being controlled by an independent government and a proud and vigilant nation - a nation that relies on Allah the Exalted, a nation that knows its power and is proud of it, a nation whose willpower overwhelms any domineering political and military power, a nation that forces back all those who want to impose their rule on nations.
translation.ha: Bakin ruwa mai tsawo wanda mallace ta kasar Iran, a yau ya zamanto a hannun ‘yantacciyar gwamnati da kuma al'umma madaukaka wadanda suka farka; al'ummar da ta dogara da Allah Madaukakin Sarki; wadanda suka fahimci irin karfin da suke da shi sannan kuma suka dogara da shi hakan kuma suke tabbatar da iradarsu a kan iradar duk wani karfi na siyasa da soji, sannan kuma suke tilasta wa dukkanin mutanen da suke son tabbatar da ikonsu a kan al'ummomi ja da baya.

translation.en: In spite of the unpleasant and detrimental presence of warships from different European and North American countries, today the Persian Gulf and the Gulf of Oman are free and independent, thanks to the presence of the Islamic Republic and the powerful Iranian nation.
translation.ha: A yau yankin Tekun Fasha da Tekun Oman, duk kuwa da kasantuwa mai cutarwa wacce kuma ba'a maraba da ita ta jiragen yakin kasashe daban-daban - na turai da Amurka - a wannan yankin, to amma sakamakon kasantuwar Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran, ya zamanto wani yanki mai ‘yanci da kuma daukaka.

translation.en: There was a day when certain people used to come to our region and determine the destiny of this region through their military presence, but those days are gone.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu dai lokacin da wasu mutane za su zo wannan yankin su tilasta wa al'ummominsa abin da suke so ta hanyar amfani da karfin soji ya wuce.

translation.en: Today nations know that foreigners' military presence in a region - in any region and not just in our region - is a source of insecurity for that region.
translation.ha: A yau al'ummomi suna sane da cewa kasantuwar sojin ‘yan kasashen waje a kowane yanki - ba wai kawai a wannan yankin na mu ba - lamari ne da zai zamanto ummul aba'isin din rashin tsaro a yankin.

translation.en: The security of the Persian Gulf and the Gulf of Oman will be ensured only through the presence of the countries of the region and their cooperation.
translation.ha: Za a iya tabbatar da tsaron Tekun Fasha da Tekun Oman ne ta hanyar kasantuwar kasashen wannan yankin da kuma aiki kafada da kafada a tsakaninsu ne kawai.

translation.en: The benefits of these waters belong to everybody.
translation.ha: Albarkatun da ke cikin teku na kowa da kowa ne; albarkatu masu yawa da suke cikin wadannan tekuna na wadannan al'ummomi ne.

translation.en: The advantages belong to the nations of the region. How can the regional nations use these blessings to further their national interests?
translation.ha: Ta ya ya za a yi amfani da wadannan albarkatu ta yadda za su zamanto masu amfanin kasa da kuma kasashen wannan yankin? Za a cimma hakan ne ta hanyar samun karfi.

translation.en: This power can be ensured by you members of the Armed Forces who are very familiar with the meaning of jihad and selflessness. Since the establishment of the Islamic Republic, we have never provoked any power or any country into confrontation and war. And we will try as much as we can to avoid any kind of calculated or accidental confrontation.
translation.ha: Ku din nan dakaru masu makami wadanda kuke gudanar da ayyukanku da ke da ma'ana ta jihadi ne za ku iya tabbatar da hakan. Tun daga farkon lokacin da aka kafa tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci, mu dai babu wata kasa da muka tsokana da yaki kuma a nan gaba ma ba za mu yi hakan ba, sannan kuma gwargwadon yadda za mu iya za mu hana faruwar irin wannan yakin da aka shirya da ma wanda ya kunno kai ba tare da shiri ba - to wannan dai lamari ne da yake nan a wajensa - mu dai wata al'umma ce mai son zaman lafiya da sulhu; to amma mutanen da suke son ciyar da ayyukansu gaba ta hanyar amfani da karfin soji da amfani da tursasawa, to wajibi ne su ji a jikinsu cewa akwai wata al'umma tsayayyiya a gabanta; ko shakka babu ku din nan sojin ruwa ku ne alamar irin wannan tsayin daka da karfi na al'umma a cikin teku da kuke nan a dukkanin bakin ruwan nan.

translation.en: Every day and night of your life and any operational, logistical or training responsibility that you have is a good deed, a measure to further the interests of the Iranian nation and to increase the glory of the Islamic Republic of Iran.
translation.ha: Kowace rana da kuma darenku, dukkanin lokuta na aikinku, dukkanin wani hari da kariya da kuma horarwa da za ku yi wani kyakkyawan aiki ne; wani yunkuri ne wajen tabbatar da amfani na kasar Iran da daukakar Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran.

translation.en: Allah the Exalted will take all these selfless efforts into account and He will reward you for these efforts.
translation.ha: Lalle Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai ba da lada ga wannan kokari - kokarin da mafi yawa daga cikin mutane ba su san shi ba; alal hakika wani kokari ne da yake a boye - lalle (Allah) Ya tanadar muku da wata lada.

translation.en: Make as many efforts as you can on this sacred path in a sincere and selfless way and know that this country is indebted to you dear youth who show its power.
translation.ha: Ku yi dukkanin abin da za ku iya wajen ganin an ci gaba da wannan kokari mai tsarki, wanda aka yi shi cikin dukkanin tsarkin zuciya da dukkan karfi, ku san cewa wannan kasa da wannan tsari da kuma wannan al'umma suna da bashin matasa a wuyansu, wadanda su ne suke tabbatar da irin tsayin dakan wannan al'umma da kuma bayyanar da shi a fili.

translation.en: With the presence of the Armed Forces, there are many accomplishments to make in the Persian Gulf and the Gulf of Oman.
translation.ha: Albarkacin kasantuwar dakaru masu makami, wannan yankin yana da aiki mai girma a wuyansa; shin yankin Tekun Oman ne ko kuma yankin Tekun Fasha.

translation.en: Governmental organizations and different government officials have a duty to cooperate with the Armed Forces as much as needed so that these accomplishments can be made in the best possible way.
translation.ha: Cibiyoyin gwamnati da jami'ai daban-daban na kasar nan suna da nauyi a wuyansu na cewa wajibi ne su ba wa dakaru masu makami hadin kan da suke bukata, don su sami damar gudanar da wannan aiki yadda ya kamata.

translation.en: I am happy to be among you dear youth, government officials, managers and commanders of the Armed Forces in this region. I am thankful to God.
translation.ha: Lalle ni na yi farin ciki ainun saboda samun damar kasantuwa a cikinku ‘yan'uwa masu girma, matasa, jami'ai da daraktoci da kwamandojin dakaru masu makami a wannan yankin.

translation.en: As the dear youth said, I just want to tell you that Allah the Exalted will reward you and He will help you, your families and your relatives benefit from divine blessings and the prayers of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake). Greetings be upon you and Allah's mercy and blessings
translation.ha: Ina gode wa Allah, sannan kuma kamar yadda wannan matashi mai girma wanda a cikin abin da ya karanta ya bayyana cewar manufar zuwa ta ita ce yi muku ban gajiya da neman kara muku karfin gwuiwa, ina son in gaya muku cewa ya kamata ku san cewa ladar wannan kokari na ku yana nan a kiyaye a wajen Allah Madaukakin Sarki, sannan ku din nan da kuma iyalanku ko shakka babu kuna cikin tausayawa da kuma falala ta Ubangiji, sannan kuma insha Allahu za ku zamanto cikin addu'oin mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi).

translation.en: Leader’s Speech at Imam Ali (a.s.)
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora A Jami'ar Jami'an Soji Ta Imam Ali (a.s)

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on November 10, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution to a group of cadets in a graduation ceremony at Imam Ali (a.s.)
translation.ha: Shimfida: A ranar alhamis 10, Nuwambar 2011 ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya halarci wajen bikin yaye daliban jami'ar soji ta Imam Ali (a.s) da ke birnin Tehran inda ya gabatar da wani jawabi mai matukar muhimmanci da mayar da martani kan barazanar da manyan kasashe masu girman kai suke yi wa Iran.

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I would like to extend my congratulations to all the dear graduates of the military academies of the Islamic Republic of Iran and all the dear youth who have received epaulets and joined the ranks of the mujahids of the Islamic Republic of Iran's Army.
translation.ha: Ina taya dukkanin daliban da suka gama karatunsu a jami'ar sojin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran haka nan kuma ga dukkanin matasa masu girma da suka sami lambar girma da kuma shiga cikin dakaru masu jihadi na sojin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran murna.

translation.en: The fact that so many faithful and sincere youth â€“ graduates and students â€“ join the great Army and Armed Forces of the Islamic Republic is worthy of congratulating.
translation.ha: A wajen mu (hakan) wani idi ne sannan kuma lamari ne da ya cancanci a taya murna kansa na cewa wadannan matasan, masu tsarkin zuciya da haske sannan kuma masu neman ilimi sun shiga cikin dakarun sojin Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

translation.en: You should also thank God for these great blessings.
translation.ha: Ku din nan ma ku gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki saboda wannan dacewar da kuka samu.

translation.en: Military academies of the Islamic Republic of Iran are the centers of knowledge and jihad.
translation.ha: Jami'oin sojin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran cibiya ce ta ilimi da jihadi.

translation.en: The scent of spirituality and piety in these academies keeps getting stronger on a daily basis.
translation.ha: Abin da a ko da yaushe mutum ya ke ji a jikinsa da kuma shaka shi ne kamshi na abubuwa masu kyautata ruhi da imani a wadannan jami'oi wadanda kuma a ko da yaushe sai karuwa suke yi.

translation.en: This is a cause for joy and happiness.
translation.ha: Lalle hakan abin faranta rai da jin dadi ne.

translation.en: These academies are active in terms of scientific work and they enjoy active students, good teachers and commanders who are also outstanding scientific figures. Moreover, the atmosphere of mujahid-like and pious preparedness, the war games, undergoing military training in the hot weather of summer during the month of Ramadan, the large number of cadets who fast once or more every week â€“ these are things that are unprecedented not only in the Armed Forces of our country but also in the armed forces of the world of Islam.
translation.ha: Wadannan jami'oi suna tsaye a fagen ilimi; sannan kuma ga dalibai masu kishi, malamai masu kwarewa, haka nan kuma babban kwamanda wanda shi kansa ma'aboci ilimi ne; bugu da kari ga fage da ke cikin shiri na jihadi da karfin imani; atisaye da horarwar soji a cikin yanayi mai zafi na watan Ramalana da watannin zafi; haka nan kuma ga wani adadi mai yawa na daliban jami'an da suke daukan azumi sau guda ko ma sama da haka a kowane mako - wannan wani bayani ne da nake da shi - (ko shakka babu) hakan wani lamari ne maras tamka a tsakanin sojoji ba wai a kasar mu ba, kai hatta ma a duniyar musulmi.

translation.en: These things are the result of the firm determination of a nation that has been making efforts to raise the flag of faith, Islam and piety.
translation.ha: Hakan ya samo asali ne sakamakon gagarumar himmar wata al'umma wacce take kokari wajen daga tutar imani da Musulunci da addini sama.

translation.en: Members of the Armed Forces â€“ who study, undergo training, make efforts and prepare themselves for the sake of God and divine ideals and who enter the arena selflessly whenever there is an opportunity for selfless struggle and defense â€“ are a source of power for Islam and Muslims.
translation.ha: Dakarun soji wadanda suke karatu saboda Allah, a tafarkin Allah da kuma daukaka kalmar Allah, da kuma sadaukarwa a duk lokacin da damar hakan ta kunno kai, tushe na karfi ne ga Musulunci da kuma musulmi.

translation.en: They are a source of power for the country.
translation.ha: Tushe ne na karfi ga kasar nan.

translation.en: You are powerful for two reasons.
translation.ha: Ku din nan masu girma da daukaka ne.

translation.en: First, you spend the valuable days of your youth on acquiring knowledge and engaging in jihad with sincere spirituality and faith.
translation.ha: Wannan girma da daukaka da kuke da ita ta samo asali saboda dalilai guda biyu: Na farko shi ne cewa kuna gudanar da rayuwarku ta samartaka ce a tafarkin neman ilimi da hanyar jihadi da kuma imani; hakan daukaka ce.

translation.en: This is power. â€œAnd to Allah belongs the might and to His Messenger and to the believers.â€ [The Holy Quran, 63: 8] Power belongs to God, His Messenger and believers.
translation.ha: Girma kuwa na Allah ne da Manzonsa da kuma muminai (Suratul Munafikun 63:8), wato daukaka ta Allah da Manzonsa da kuma muminai ce.

translation.en: So you are considered among believers.
translation.ha: Ku din nan ta wannan hanya da kuka rika kuna daga cikin muminan.

translation.en: The second reason is that you are a source of power for your country and your nation.
translation.ha: Dalili na biyu shi ne cewa ku din nan ku ne tushen karfi da daukaka ga kasarku da kuma al'ummar ku.

translation.en: A nation that can prove it is prepared to resist and defend itself in order to have independence, preserve its identity and fight for its ideals and existence â€“ such a nation is powerful.
translation.ha: Duk wata kasa da kuma wata al'ummar da ta iya tabbatar da cewa a shirye take wajen kare 'yancinta, wajen kare mutumcinta, wajen kare koyarwar da ta rika, wajen kare kasantuwarta da kuma tsayin dakanta, to madaukakiya ce.

translation.en: The power of such a nation is secretly acknowledged even by its enemies although they might not be prepared to announce this publicly because of being stubborn.
translation.ha: Hatta makiya dai suna jin irin wannan daukaka da wannan al'umma take da ita a jikinsu; duk kuwa da cewa ba za su fadi hakan da baki ba saboda kiyayyar da ke cikin zukatansu.

translation.en: You spearhead our national defense and today your power is acknowledged even by your enemies. Many of your enemies even acknowledge your power publicly.
translation.ha: A yau wannan daukakar da kuke da ita - a matsayinku na garkuwa ta kasa - hatta makiya sun gaskata hakan; wasu da dama daga cikin su ma suna fadin hakan a bakunansu.

translation.en: Allah the Exalted says, â€œAgainst them make ready your strength to the utmost of your power, including steeds of war, to strike terror into (the hearts of) the enemies of Allah.â€ [The Holy Quran, 8: 60] Your preparedness makes the enemy fearful: not fearful of your invasion because you are not aggressive, but fearful of your resistance and of attacking you.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki yana fadin cewa: "Kuma ku yi musu tanadi iyakar iyawarku na karfi (makami) da kuma tanadaddun dawakai, ku rika tsorata makiya Allah da kuma makiyanku da shi.." (Suratul Anfali 8:60). Irin shirin da kuke da shi yana tsoratar da makiya; ba wai suna tsoron wuce gona da irin ku ba ne - don kuwa ku din nan ba masu wuce gona da iri a kan kowa ba ne - suna tsoron irin tsayin dakan da kuke da shi ne, suna tsoron yin tunanin kawo muku hari ne.

translation.en: In a world in which reliance on the power of bayonets and weapons can unfortunately play a determining role in the relations between nations and countries, in a world in which there are bullies who decide to take control of the destiny of other nations with iron fists, in a world that is materialistic, only a nation that proves to be prepared for defense will be secure from harm.
translation.ha: A irin wannan duniya wacce abin bakin ciki dogaro da karfi na bakin bindiga ya ke taka gagarumar rawa wajen tsara irin alakar da ke tsakanin kasashe da kuma al'ummomi, a duniyar da masu takama da karfi sakamakon irin karfin da suke da shi suke son mallake makomar al'ummomi da karfin tuwo - wato a irin wannan duniya ta abin duniya - to kasar da za ta tsira daga wannan cutarwar ita ce kasar da ta tabbatar da irin shirin kare kanta da take da shi.

translation.en: Our Armed Forces and the Army of the Islamic Republic proved this.
translation.ha: Dakarun mu masu makami, dakarun sojin Jamhuriyar Musulunci masu girma sun tabbatar da hakan.

translation.en: This is power. This is a source of power for a country.
translation.ha: Wannan daukaka ce; hakan lamari ne mai haifar da daukaka ga wata kasa; lalle wajibi ne ku kiyaye hakan.

translation.en: It is necessary to preserve this preparedness. You should preserve all your material and spiritual assets. During your service and throughout your life, you should safeguard your piety, faith, motivation and spiritual purity as well as your firm determination to defend the country.
