translation.ha: Na'am a halin yanzu dai mun zuba ido mu ga abin da zai faru a kasashen da ba a jimawa nan ba suka yi juyin juya hali don mu ga abin da za su yi. To amma ya zuwa yanzu dai a hakikanin gaskiya ban ga irin wadannan sojojin ba. Wato sojojin da babu ruwansu da kokarin son mulkin wasu mutane sannan kuma ba saboda wani mutum suke aikinsu ba.

translation.en: I would like to stress that neither God nor Islamic principles would allow us to order our Army, our Armed Forces or our men to fight to death for the sake of a particular person.
translation.ha: A nan dai ina son in jaddada cewa Allah ba zai yarda ba sannan kuma dokokin Musulunci ma ba za su bari mu ce sojoji da dakarunmu su ba da jininsu saboda kare wani mutum ba.

translation.en: Yes, everybody may fight to death for the sake of Islam.
translation.ha: A'a, na'am saboda Musulunci kan kowa ya mutu; wane ya mutu saboda Musulunci.

translation.en: For the sake of raising the flag of our independence as an Islamic country, everybody must be ready to fight to death and this death is called martyrdom.
translation.ha: Kowa ya yi shirin sadaukar da ransa don tabbatar da 'yancin kasa - wadda kasa ce ta Musulunci - wanda wannan mutuwar sunanta shahada.

translation.en: Then our Army would be a divine and spiritual army. It would be an Islamic army, an example of the "immaculate tree" that I have discussed previously.
translation.ha: A irin wannan yanayi, sojojin suna iya zama sojoji na Ubangiji; wadannan sojojin za su zamanto sojojin Musulunci; wannan ita ce wannan bishiya mai dadi da na fadi.

translation.en: This has been the goal since the beginning of the Revolution.
translation.ha: Tun daga farkon nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci har zuwa yau din nan wannan ita ce manufar.

translation.en: And I would tell you that fortunately we have been moving closer to this goal.
translation.ha: Abin farin cikin shi ne cewa a kusan kulla muna ci gaba da kusatar wannan manufar ce; lalle ina son in sanar da ku hakan.

translation.en: I have been witness to the growth of the Army over the past thirty years.
translation.ha: Ni dai na shaida daga kurkusa irin wannan yunkuri na sojoji da irin ci gaban da suka samu tsawon shekaru talatin da wani abu.

translation.en: I was present when we first celebrated the 29th of Farvardin.
translation.ha: Na kasance a wajen bikin ranar sojoji na farko da aka gudanar.

translation.en: In the year 1358, when our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) had been hospitalized, a temporary platform was built in front of the hospital and a few units of the Army paraded past the platform and Imam Khomeini (r.a.) announced the day as Army Day.
translation.ha: A wancan lokacin a shekarar 1358 (1979) Imam ya kasance yana asibiti a kwance, a nan gaban asibitin aka shirya wani waje sannan sojoji suka zo suka yi fareti sannan kuma Imam ya sanar da wannan ranar a matsayin ranar sojoji. Lalle ina da masaniya dangane da yanayin sojoji.

translation.en: Among the people who are present in this meeting - those who have been in the Army in the past thirty years - maybe there is not even one person whose graduation ceremony was held in my absence.
translation.ha: A tsakaninku da kuke wajen nan - wadanda suke cikin soji tsawon shekaru talatin zuwa wannan lokacin - mai yiyuwa ne babu wani da ban halarci bikin gama karatunsa ba.

translation.en: I think I was present in the graduation ceremonies of each and every one of you, those of you who graduated from our military academies and were awarded epaulets. I see that today our Army is more advanced than 20, 15 years ago. It is much more advanced compared to the beginning of the Revolution.
translation.ha: A zahiri na kasance wajen dukkanin bikin gama karatunku da kuma samun lambobin girma da kuka yi; wato ku din nan da kuka tafi makarantar soji sannan kuma kuka sami karin girma. A lokacin da na duba ina ganin cewa a yau sojojinmu sun sami ci gaba sama da shekaru sha biyar zuwa ashirin din da suka gabata; ko kuma gagarumin ci gaba idan aka kwatanta da farko-farkon nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci.

translation.en: We have made good progress and it is necessary to maintain it.
translation.ha: Lalle wannan wani yunkuri ne mai kyau; wajibi ne a ci gaba da wannan yunkurin.

translation.en: This progress will bring about happiness in this world and in the hereafter.
translation.ha: Wannan wani yunkuri ne da ke tare da sa'ada ta duniya da lahira.

translation.en: Today a movement has started in the world and everybody has realized that the movement is opposed to the system of hegemony.
translation.ha: A yau din nan akwai wani yunkuri da ke yawo a duniya wanda kowa da kowa ya san shi. Wannan yunkuri shi ne yunkuri na adawa da tsarin mulkin mallaka.

translation.en: We do not have a problem with individuals, no matter in which part of the world they live. The issue is the system of hegemony.
translation.ha: Mu dai ba mu da matsala da daidaikun mutane - mutanen wannan yanki na duniya da wancan yankin - face dai matsalar mu da 'yan mulkin mallaka ne.

translation.en: What is the system of hegemony?
translation.ha: Mene ne ma'anar tsarin mulkin mallaka?

translation.en: It is the mechanism in the world according to which countries and nations are categorized into two groups: the domineering and the dominated.
translation.ha: Shi ne wannan tsari da ya raba kasashen duniya da al'ummominsu zuwa gida biyu: wato 'yan mulkin mallaka da wadanda ake musu mulkin mallakan.

translation.en: Some of the evil hegemons are denying this and they do not announce it.
translation.ha: To wadansu dai daga cikin wadannan lalatattun 'yan mulkin mallakan suna boye wannan ma'anar da kuma inkarin hakan.

translation.en: But there are some others who announce this because of their stupidity.
translation.ha: Amma wasu kuma sakamakon irin wauta ta zati da suke da ita a fili suke fadin hakan.

translation.en: One example is the previous US President who openly announced that in the case of Afghanistan, the Twin Towers and other such issues, those who are not with America are against it.
translation.ha: Misalin hakan shi ne tsohon shugaban kasar Amurka (George Bush) wanda dangane da lamarin kasar Afghanistan da kuma harin da aka kai wa wadannan tagwayen gini (a ranar 11 ga watan Satumba) a fili yake fadin cewa: duk wanda ba ya tare da Amurka, to kuwa yana tare da makiya ne.

translation.en: Well, this is stupidity.
translation.ha: To wannan dai wauta da hauka ne.

translation.en: The hegemons of the world build their relations with the world on the basis of domination.
translation.ha: Haka 'yan mulkin mallakan duniya suke tsara alakarsu da sauran duniya.

translation.en: The problem that the powerful hegemons of the world are faced with is that there is a movement in the world that is opposed to this mechanism and Islamic Iran is at the epicenter of this movement.
translation.ha: Wato wajibi ne su zamanto wadanda ake wa mulkin mallaka.

translation.en: You are at the epicenter of this movement. Islamic Iran has been very patient in this regard. The day when we started the movement, we did not receive any response from any part of the world.
translation.ha: Cibiyar wannan yunkuri kuwa ita ce kasar Musulunci ta Iran; wato ku din nan ne. Hakurin kasar Musulunci ta Iran yana da yawa. A ranar farko da muka fara wannan yunkurin, babu wani waje a duniyar nan da aka karbe shi.

translation.en: We thought that certain nations would soon join the movement, but that did not happen.
translation.ha: Muna zaton cewa cikin sauri wasu al'ummomi za su shigo cikin wannan yunkurin, to amma hakan dai ba ta faru ba.

translation.en: After the passage of years, this thought seeped into the bodies and minds of nations. They gradually changed until a capacity was created.
translation.ha: Bayan gushewar shekara da shekaru, a hankali a hankali wannan tunani ya fara kutsawa cikin zukata da kwakwalan al'ummomi; a sannu a hankali ya samu ginuwa har zuwa lokacin da wata dama ta samu.

translation.en: This is the case with all historical movements.
translation.ha: Haka dukkanin yunkure-yunkure na tarihi suka kasance.

translation.en: They are gradual, but they need a spark. Then a single event might trigger a movement, releasing the energy that has accumulated over time, just like what happened in Egypt or certain other places.
translation.ha: Babu wani yunkuri na tarihi da ya faru haka kawai, a hankali a hankali ya bayyana; to sai dai kawai yana bukatar wani loakci da wani waje ne, wani lamari ya faru kwatsam sai wannan dama da karfi da ake da shi wanda kuma ya taru, sai ya bayyanar da kansa; sai ya zamanto kamar abin da ya faru a Masar da sauran wajaje.

translation.en: It took us thirty years to reach this point.
translation.ha: Shekaru talatin aka shafe kafin muka kai ga wannan wajen.

translation.en: Therefore, this movement is an important movement.
translation.ha: A saboda haka, wannan yunkurin wani yunkuri ne mai muhimmanci.

translation.en: The colonialists and superpowers are afraid of this movement in the real sense of the word.
translation.ha: A hakikanin gaskiya 'yan mulkin mallaka da masu takama da karfi suna tsananin tsoron irin wannan yunkurin.

translation.en: These threats, sanctions, conflicts and other such things are all caused by fear.
translation.ha: Dukkanin irin wadannan tada jijiyoyin wuya, ihu bayan hari da takunkumi da barazanar da suke yi da dai sauransu, duk suna yin hakan sakamakon wannan tsoron da suke da shi.

translation.en: I am not claiming that they are afraid of the Islamic Republic, especially as a government or as an army.
translation.ha: Ni dai ba wai ina da'awar cewa su din nan suna tsoron Jamhuriyar Musulunci musamman a matsayinta na wata gwamnati ko wasu sojoji ba ne.

translation.en: This is not the issue.
translation.ha: Lalle lamarin ba haka yake ba.

translation.en: They are afraid of this unprecedented phenomenon that is completely unknown to them.
translation.ha: Abin da suke tsoro shi ne wannan abin da ya kunno kai wanda bai kasance wani abu sananne a wajensu ba.

translation.en: And it is in our country that the movement is being strengthened on a daily basis. They are afraid of our pious youth, our determined youth and our national sentiments which are accompanied by good - if not perfect - understanding.
translation.ha: To a nan ne wannan yunkurin yake ci gaba da kunno kai da kuma kara girma a kusan kullum. Suna tsoron irin wadannan matasa na mu muminai, masu azama da kishin kasa wanda hakan ya kasance ne cikin ilimi da masaniya. A hakikanin gaskiya mizanin ilimi da basira a kasar nan mizani ne mai kyau.

translation.en: You are part of this sensitive and important organization. The Armed Forces are sensitive and important. You should continue like this.
translation.ha: Ku din nan wani bangare ne na wadannan mutane da cibiyoyi masu tsananin muhimmanci - don kuwa cibiyar soji wata cibiya ce mai muhimmanci - lalle wajibi ne ku kiyaye hakan sannan kuma ku ci gaba da aiwatar da shi.

translation.en: During the early years after the victory of the Revolution, the commander came to me and made an accurate point that I liked very much. It stuck in my mind.
translation.ha: A farko-farkon nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci ya zo waje na, ya fadi wata magana wacce na ji dadin maganar - sannan kuma lalle haka maganar take - wanda har ya zuwa yanzu ban mance da ita ba.

translation.en: He said, "There is an element of leadership in command."
translation.ha: Ya fadi cewa: "akwai wani bangare na jagoranci cikin aikin shugabanci na soji".

translation.en: You are the future commanders of the Ground Forces and the Army and you should improve your leadership qualities.
translation.ha: Ku din nan ku ne kwamandojin soji a nan gaba; don haka wajibi ne ku karfafa irin wannan karfi na jagoranci da kuke da shi.

translation.en: Command means issuing a set of orders, telling people what to do and what not to do. Leadership means showing the standards that would take the place of those orders, giving rise to a movement without having to order people what to do and what not to do, a movement that originates from the heart.
translation.ha: Zama kwamandan soji yana nufin ba da umurni, ni na yi bari na bari, jagoranci kuwa yana nufin yunkuri da nuna alamun da za su maye gurbin yi da kuma kada ka yi din; wato a samar da wani yunkuri da motsi ba tare umurnin yi ko kar ka yi ba; wato yunkuri daga cikin zuciya.

translation.en: Instead of establishing a relationship with bodies, it is necessary to establish a relationship with hearts. You should create and strengthen this capacity in yourselves, in which case your country and nation will definitely achieve victory.
translation.ha: Maimaikon haifar da alaka ta jiki, a samar da alaka ta zuci; wajibi ne ku samar da hakan sannan kuma ku karfafa hakan a tattare da ku. Idan har aka sami haka, to kuwa ko shakka babu nasara tana tare da kasar mu da kuma al'ummarmu.

translation.en: That is to say, these feelings and this state of mind will prove helpful in difficult times.
translation.ha: Wato a lokacin tsanani da wahala, irin wannan shu'urin ya kan taimaka wa mutum.

translation.en: I have seen certain examples in this regard.
translation.ha: Lalle ni din nan na ga misalan hakan.

translation.en: Certain people - such as Shahid Sayyad Shirazi and Shahid Babai - are very famous and everybody knows them: those who were present from the beginning to the end of the war and were finally martyred.
translation.ha: Na'am wasu daga cikin irin wadannan mutanen, mutane ne sanannu, kowa ya sansu, mutane irin su shahid Sayyad Shirazi, shahid Babayi; wadannan mutane ne wadanda tun farkon yaki har zuwa karshensa sun kasance a ciki kana daga baya suka yi shahada; a cikin sojojin akwai irin su da yawa wadanda na gansu.

translation.en: But I have met many such people in the Armed Forces during the war, both on the front line and in the meetings that used to be held behind the front line in order to make decisions.
translation.ha: A cikin dakaru masu makami, a lokacin yaki; shin a cikin yakin ne ko kuma a tarurrukan daukar matsaya a bayan fage, akwai su da yawa wanda hakan lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: Often the courageous actions that are carried out on the front line originate from the determination and willpower that is mainly shaped behind the front line. If the determination is sincere and if it can make its way to the front line, then those courageous actions take place on the front line.
translation.ha: A mafi yawa lokuta irin yunkurin da ake yi a sahun farko-farko su kan samo asali ne daga yunkure-yunkuren da aka yi a bayan fagen yaki da kuma irin azamar da ake da ita. Matukar dai irin wadannan iradar suka zamanto da gaske sannan kuma suka sami damar ciyar da kansu gaba, to a irin wannan lokacin ne irin wadannan jaruntaka za su bayyana, wanda a wasu lokuta a fili ake ganin su.

translation.en: In any case the Ground Forces are important.
translation.ha: Ala kulli hal dakarun sojin kasa, dakaru ne masu muhimmanci.

translation.en: Genuine preparedness consists of religious faith, motivation, training, military knowledge, the necessary expertise, being on standby and firmness of character.
translation.ha: Shiri na hakika shi ne imani, kumaji, horo na soji, kwarewa ta yaki, samun kwarewar da ake bukata da kuma karfi na daidaiku.

translation.en: One's ethical and behavioral character should be so strong that different temptations cannot affect it. Sometimes certain temptations might affect and overwhelm people. There are some people who are humiliated for the sake of money, social position and carnal desires.
translation.ha: Wasu daga cikin abubuwa masu janyo hankali na rayuwa sukan kaskantar da mutum. A wasu lokuta a kan ga wasu mutane sukan kaskantar da kansu saboda kudi, sukan kaskantar da kansu saboda mukami saboda biyan bukata ta jima'i, to hakan kaskanci ne ga mutum.

translation.en: The most honorable and powerful people are those who refuse to give in to temptation.
translation.ha: Mafi daukaka da girman mutane su ne wadanda ba su bari wadannan bukatu suka kaskantar da su ba.

translation.en: Of course, this does not mean that we should turn our backs on the attractions of life.
translation.ha: Ko da yake hakan ba yana nufin juya baya daga bukatu na rayuwa ba ne; ma'anar hakan ita ce samun damar tankwara irin wadannan bukata.

translation.en: It is necessary to have the power to resist and to exercise self-restraint, which makes you prepared.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne ka zamanto kana da karfi na gwagwarmaya da kuma tsayin daka, wajibi ne ka zamanto kana da karfi na kin mika kai.

translation.en: There are many things that I would like discuss with you dear friends, brothers and youth, but there is not enough time. I hope Allah the Exalted bestows success on you.
translation.ha: Ni dai ina da abin fadi da yawa gare ku 'yanuwa maza da mata masu girma; to amma babu lokaci. ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya ba ku dacewa da kuma taimaka muku. Ya Ubangiji Allah!

translation.en: Dear God, bestow Your blessings on these people.
translation.ha: Ka saukar da albarkokinka a kan wadannan mutane da suka taru a nan.

translation.en: Dear God, bestow Your blessings on the Iranian nation.
translation.ha: Ka saukar da albarkokinka a kan al'ummar Iran; ka saukar da falaloli da albarkokinka a kan dakarun sojojinmu, sojojin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran.

translation.en: Dear God, make the bond of kindness, brotherhood, friendship and closeness stronger among different organizations of the Armed Forces, including the Army, the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps, Basij and the Police Force.
translation.ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka sanya so da kauna da tausayawa da 'yan'uwantaka da fahimtar juna tsakanin dakarun kasar mu, kama da sojoji da dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci da 'yan sanda da sauransu.

translation.en: Dear God, by the blessedness of Muhammad (s.w.a.) and his household, help us be among the servants about whom You have said, "Allah is well pleased with them and they are well pleased with Allah."
translation.ha: Albarkacin (annabi) Muhammadu da Alayen Muhammadu ka sanya mu cikin wadannan bayi naka da kake fadi dangane da su cewa: "Allah Ya yarda da su, kuma sun yarda da shi" (Suratul Ma'ida 5:119).

translation.en: [The Holy Quran, 5: 119] Dear God, help us be among the servants whom You have promised to protect and support.
translation.ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka sanya mu daga cikin bayinka da ka yi alkawarin ba su kariya da kuma taimakonsu.

translation.en: Dear God, make us benefit from the prayers of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake) and fulfill his prayers that are related to us.
translation.ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka sanya mu cikin addu'oin Waliyul Asr (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi).

translation.en: Formation of the Board for Arbitration and Coordination - Khamenei.ir  Ayatollah Khamenei- Leader of the Islamic Revolution- in order to assess and advise in matters concerning arbitration and coordination of relations between the three branches of government, according to Article 110, Section 7 of the Constitution, establishes the Board for Arbitration and Coordination of Relations Between the Three Branches of Government and appoints Ayatollah Hashemi Shahrudi as its chairman.
translation.ha: Don yin nazari da kuma gabatar da shawara kan hanyoyin da za a magance sabanin da ka iya kunno kai tsakanin bangarori uku na gwamnati (majalisar ministoci, majalisar dokoki da kuma ma'aikatar shari'a) da kuma kyautata alakar da ke tsakaninsu, sannan kuma bisa bangare na 7 na doka ta 110 na kundin tsarin mulkin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran, a ranar litinin (25-7-2011) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya kafa kwamitin koli na magance sabani da kuma kulla alaka mai kyau tsakanin bangarori uku na gwamnati karkashin jagorancin Ayatullah Mahmud Hashemi Shahrudi.

translation.en: The full text of the hukm is as follows:
translation.ha: Abin da ke biye fassarar umurnin da Jagoran ya fitar ne a wannan bangaren:

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: Ayatollah Seyyed Mahmoud Hashemi Shahrudi,
translation.ha: Ayatullah Sayyid Mahmud Hashemi Shahrudi (Allah ya kara masa tsawon rai)

translation.en: In implementing Section 7 of Article 110 of the Constitution, the Board for Arbitration and Coordination of Relations Between the Three Branches of Government is established, in order to assess and advise in matters concerning the arbitration and coordination of relations between the three branches of government, with your Eminence and Hojatul Islam Seyyed Muhammad Hassan Abutorabi, Seyyed Murtaza Nabavi, Abbas Ali Kadkhodai and Seyyed Samad Moussavi Khoshdel selected as members to the Board for a term of five years. The chairmanship of the Board will be entrusted to your Eminence.
translation.ha: Bisa bangare na 7 na doka ta 110 na kundin tsarin mulki, na kafa kwamitin koli na magance sabani da kuma tsara kyakkyawar alaka tsakanin bangarori uku na gwamnati da nufin nazari da gabatar da shawara dangane da yadda za a magance sabani da tsara alakokin bangarori uku na gwamnati. Haka nan kuma na zabe ka da malamai: Hujjatul Islam Sayyid Muhammad Hasan Abu Turabi, Sayyid Murtadha Nabawi, Abbas Ali Kodkhayi da Sayyid Samad Musawi Khoshdel a matsayin membobin wannan kwamitin na tsawon shekaru biyar.

translation.en: It is necessary that all high ranking officials of the government cooperate with each other, that relations between the three branches of government are regulated in a satisfactory manner and that any potential differences are resolved.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne manyan jami'an wannan tsari su tsara alakarsu da sauran jami'ai ta zamanto mai kyau sannan kuma abar so haka nan kuma su yi dukkanin abin da za su iya wajen kawar da sabanin da zai iya kunno kai sannan kuma su ba wa wannan kwamitin dukkanin hadin kai wajen gudanar da aikinsa.

translation.en: I pray to Almighty God for your success.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya ba ku dacewa.

translation.en: Seyyed Ali Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Khamenei

translation.en: 3rd of Mordad 1390
translation.ha: 3, ga watan Mordad, 1390

translation.en: Leader’s Speech to Thousands of Basijis from Qom Province - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Dubban Dakarun Basij Na Lardin Kum

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, and peace and greetings upon our Master and Prophet, Ab-al-Qassem Al-Mustafa Muhammad, and upon his immaculate and infallible household, especially the one remaining with Allah on earth.
translation.ha: Dukkan godiya ta tabbata ga Allah. Tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata ga shugabanmu kuma annabinmu Abul Kasim al-Mustafa Muhammad tare da Alayensa tsarkaka zababbu kuma ma'asumai musamman ma Wanjajjen Allah a bayan kasa.

translation.en: Greetings be upon you Fatima Masoumeh, our master, the daughter of Musa ibn Ja'far.
translation.ha: Amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare ki Ya shugabata Ya Fatima al-Ma'asumah Ya 'yar Musa bn Ja'afar.

translation.en: Greeting of Allah and His angels and chosen servants be upon you and your immaculate ancestors.
translation.ha: Amincin Allah da mala'ikunSa da tsarkakan bayinsa a gare ki da tsarkakan iyayenki.

translation.en: The gathering of the dear basijis - who enjoy warm and enlightened hearts and firm determination - in this holy center in the presence of the holy soul of the great and pure lady, the daughter of Musa ibn Ja'far, is a sign and a flag to demonstrate the grandeur and progressiveness of the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Kasantuwar gungun dakarun sa kai na Basij masu girma, masu kumaji da masaniya da tsayayyiyar irada da azama a wannan waje mai tsarki, a gaban ruhi mai tsarki na wannan mace mai girma da tsarki - 'yar Musa bn Ja'afar - shi kansa hakan wata alama ce, wata alama ce da kuma tuta da take nuni da daukaka da irin ci gaban da tsarin Musulunci ya ke samu.

translation.en: The mere presence of millions of enthusiastic, faithful, sincere and insightful youth from across the country in the Basij is enough to prove that this government is dynamic, purposeful, determined and progressive. This presence is enough to show that this government and this great movement by the Iranian nation are immune to the most complex plots and the most dangerous moves of the enemy.
translation.ha: Idan ma da a ce ba mu da wani dalili na tabbatar da ci gaba da kasantuwar wannan tsari da iradarsa da manufar da yake da ita da kuma ci gaban da yake samu sai irin wannan kasantuwa ta miliyoyin matasa masu imani da gaskiya da basira a duk fadin kasar nan da sunan Basij, to shi kansa hakan abu ne da ke tabbatar da cewa wannan tsari da kuma yunkurin al'ummar Iran wajen fuskantar makirce-makircen makiya ba abu ne da za a iya cutar da shi ba.

translation.en: Of course this is not a slogan - it is based on logical reasoning.
translation.ha: Tabbas wannan ba take ba ne; wani lamari ne da ya dogara bisa dalilai da suka yi daidai da hankali.

translation.en: The idea to establish the Basij was a sign of divine power which was bestowed on that righteous servant of God, that great man and that unique figure in the history of Islam after the infallible Imams (a.s.). The idea to establish the Basij was proposed and practiced by our magnanimous Imam (r.a.).
translation.ha: Dakarun sa kai na Basij daya ne daga cikin ayoyin kudura ta Ubangiji wanda Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya ba wa wannan bawan Allah salihi (wato marigayi Imam Khumaini), ga wannan babban mutumi, ga wannan mutum maras tamka cikin tarihin Musulunci bayan Imamai (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare su).

translation.en: He stood up for this idea with all his power. He took care of this sapling until is became an immaculate tree which yields "its fruit in every season by the permission of its Lord". [The Holy Quran, 14: 25] The idea to establish the Basij was one of the blessings that God bestowed on that great man and that righteous and humble servant of God.
translation.ha: Tunanin samar da karfin sa kai na al'umma, dakarun sa kai na masu rauni wanda Imamin mu mai girma ya gabatar, ya aiwatar da shi a aikace sannan kuma da dukkanin karfinsa ya tsaya a bayansu wajen goyon bayansu, sannan kuma ya ci gaba da ba wa wannan tsiro ruwa har ya zamanto wata bishiya mai dadi wacce "Tana bayar da abincinta a kowane lokaci da izinin Ubangijinta" (Suratu Ibrahim 14:25), hakan daya ne daga cikin tausayin Ubangiji ga wannan babban mutum, wannan babban salihin bawa sannan kuma ga wannan babban bawan Allah mai kaskantar da kai a gare Shi.

translation.en: The Imam's insightful eyes saw these signs of divine power.
translation.ha: Idanuwan Imam masu cike da basira lalle suna ganin alamun wannan karfi da taimako na Ubangiji.

translation.en: The problem with us is that we sometimes feel divine assistance but fail to see it appropriately.
translation.ha: Aibin da muke da shi shi ne cewa a wasu lokuta mu kan ji taimakon Ubangiji a jikinmu, to sai dai ba ma ganinsu da kyau.

translation.en: We fail to realize what great assistance is being bestowed on us. But the Imam saw that sign.
translation.ha: Ba ma iya fayyace wacce irin taimako ne wannan mai girma wanda Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya ba mu; to sai dai shi kan yana gani.

translation.en: I have told this anecdote many times before.
translation.ha: Na sha ba da labarin wani abu da ya faru a lokuta da dama inda (Imam) ya taba gaya min - ina ga abin ya faru ne a shekarar 1365 (1986) - cewa tun farkon nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci zuwa yau din nan lalle a ko ina aka duba muna ganin wani karfi da ya ke taimaka mana da kuma wuce mana gaba.

translation.en: The Imam's outlook on the Iranian nation was different from those of others.
translation.ha: Yadda Imam ya ke kallon al'ummar Iran ya sha bamban da irin yadda sauran mutane suke kallo.

translation.en: If we had decided to ask many religious and non-religious scientific elites to evaluate the Iranian nation at that time, we would have received weird evaluations. Some people did not consider this nation as faithful.
translation.ha: A wancan lokacin idan har mu ka kalli da dama daga cikin hukumcin da masana na addini da wadanda ba na addini ba da na 'yan siyasa da wadanda ba 'yan siyasa ba suke yi dangane da yadda suke kallon al'ummar Iran; za mu ga cewa hukumci ne mai ban mamaki sosai.

translation.en: Yet others had doubts about the power and loyalty of the people. I heard these things from many people. But in the year 1341, when there was no sign of massive public demonstrations, the Imam said in the city of Qom that the people would gather all over the plain around Qom and pledge their allegiance to him if he just asked them to.
translation.ha: Wasu ba sa ganin wannan al'umma a matsayin al'umma ma'abociyar imani, wasu ba sa ganinta a matsayin mai gaskiya, wasu kuma suna sanya shakku cikin karfi da sadaukarwarta - lalle mu mun ji hakan, mun ji hakan daga mutane da dama - to amma Imam kan a shekarar 1341 (1962) a wannan gari na Kum, a wancan lokacin babu irin wannan taro mai girma na jama'a, a wannan masallaci na Masjid al-A'azam ya fadi cewa idan har muka kirayi mutane, to kuwa wannan sahara ta Kum za ta cika da mutane; za su fadi cewa lalle mun amsa maka.

translation.en: This was what he thought of the people.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce mahangarsa dangane da mutane, ya san mutane.

translation.en: He knew the people. He discovered the valuable element in the hearts and souls of the people and made use of it.
translation.ha: Imam ya gano wannan karfi mai girma wanda yake mayar da tagulla zinare cikin zukatan mutane sannan kuma ya yi amfani da shi.

translation.en: Therefore, the Islamic Revolution achieved victory in spite of the obstacles on its way.
translation.ha: A saboda haka duk da irin wadannan matsaloli da ake fuskanta, amma da haka juyin juya halin Musulunci ya yi nasara.

translation.en: No analyst could believe such an event would take place in Iran. He trusted God and took action. He formed a bond with the hearts of the people and encouraged them to step into the arena.
translation.ha: Shi din nan ya dogara ne da Allah, don haka sai ya shigo cikin fagen aiki, ya samar da alaka tsakaninsa da zukatan mutane sannan kuma ya shigo da mutane cikin fage sai wannan gagarumin lamari ya faru; daga baya kuma sai ya gabatar da lamarin Basij.

translation.en: You are the sweet fruits of that immaculate tree which was planted in this land by the Imam himself. The tree will continue producing fruits. "Have you not considered how Allah sets forth a parable of a good word (being) like an immaculate tree, whose root is firm and whose branches are in heaven, yielding its fruit in every season by the permission of its Lord?
translation.ha: Ku din nan ku ne 'ya'yan itacen wannan bishiya mai zaki da dadi wadda Imamin mu mai girma ya dasa ta a wannan kasar da hannayensa, kuma har zuwa yanzu aka ci gaba da amfanuwa da abin da take samarwa; kamar yadda Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya fadi: "Shin, ba ka gani ba, yadda Allah Ya buga wani misali, kalma mai kyau kamar itaciya ce mai kyau, asalinta yana tabbatacce, kuma reshenta yana cikin sama?

translation.en: [The Holy Quran, 14: 24-25] When the land is fertile and prepared and when the seed is pure, the tree will never stop growing.
translation.ha: Tana bayar da abincinta a kowane lokaci da izinin Ubangijinta" (Suratu Ibrahim 14:24-25).

translation.en: That is to say, nothing will be able to harm it.
translation.ha: A lokacin da kasa ta zamanto a shirye sannan kuma kwayar da aka shuka mata ta zamanto mai tsarki, to kuwa itaciyar da za ta fitar ba za ta zamanto mai karewa ba; wato babu wani abin da zai iya cutar da ita.

translation.en: The Basij is such an immaculate tree.
translation.ha: To Basij dai irin wannan bishiya ce mai tsarki da dadi.

translation.en: During the Sacred Defense Era, the young generation before you made a lot of achievements in the battlefield.
translation.ha: A lokacin kallafaffen yaki, matasan da suka zo gabanninku sun aikata ayyuka masu yawan gaske a fagen daga.

translation.en: The Basij played its role during the Sacred Defense Era.
translation.ha: A lokcain yaki, lalle dakarun Basiji sun taka gagarumar rawarsu.

translation.en: Both the Army and the Army of the Guardians of the Islamic Revolution admitted that the Basij played a determining role in different stages of the long and difficult battle.
translation.ha: Sojoji da kuma dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci sun yarda da cewa kasantuwar Basij a dukkanin fagage daban-daban na wannan yaki ya zamanto lamari ne mai ayyana makoma da kuma tasiri.

translation.en: The Basij is present wherever there are selfless efforts - selfless efforts in the arena of knowledge, selfless efforts in the arena of politics, selfless efforts in the arena of social activities, selfless efforts in the vast international arena.
translation.ha: A duk inda aka sami kokari da mujahada, to kuwa Basij suna nan.

translation.en: Basij means joining faith and action together - not just action, but selfless action.
translation.ha: Ma'anar Basiji tana tafiya ne kafada da kafada da imani da kuma aiki.

translation.en: From an Islamic perspective, faith without action is the minimum requirement.
translation.ha: A mahangar Musulunci, imani ba tare da aiki ba, mafi karancin abin da ake bukata ne.

translation.en: Perfect and genuine faith is one that is accompanied by jihad in the arena of action.
translation.ha: Cikakken imani da imani na hakika shi ne wannan imani da yake hade da aiki a fage.

translation.en: Those who believed and left their homes and struggled for the cause of Allah, and those who took them in and helped them - these are the believers in truth. [The Holy Quran, 8: 74] A true believer is one whose faith is accompanied by jihad and assistance for other believers.
translation.ha: Kuma wadanda suka yi imani kuma suka yi hijira, kuma suka yi jihadi, a cikin hanyar Allah, kuma da wadanda suka bayar da masauki, kuma suka yi taimako, wadannan su ne muminai na gaskiya (Suratul Anfal 8:74) muminai na hakika su ne mutanen da suka hada imani da jihadi da hijira da kuma taimako. Da wadannan abubuwa ne ake gane Basiji.

translation.en: This and many other Quranic verses reject the wrong and misguided idea that faith minus action and jihad is enough to get close to God.
translation.ha: Wannan tunani na jin cewa ana iya samun kusaci da Allah ta hanyar imani ba tare da jihadi ba kuskure ne, lalle wannan aya da wasu ayoyi masu yawa su na kore yiyuwar hakan.

translation.en: The Basij is based on the idea that faith must be accompanied by action - selfless action.
translation.ha: Dakarun Basiji sun ginu ne bisa wannan akida ta imani tare da aiki, shi din ma aiki ba kama hannun yaro.

translation.en: Therefore, there are various arenas for jihad.
translation.ha: A saboda haka jihadi yana da fagage daban-daban da muka fadi.

translation.en: The progress of the Basij in various dimensions is the kind of progress that is expected by anybody who is familiar with the Basij.
translation.ha: Irin ci gaban da dakarun Basiji suka samu a bangarori daban-daban shi ne dai irin ci gaban da duk wani wanda ya san Basiji yake tsammanin gani.

translation.en: The Basij has emerged victorious out of all the tests it has faced.
translation.ha: Abin da ya wajaba ya zamanto ma'auni a gare mu gaba daya, ga dukkanin dakarun basiji masu girma, ga dukkanin matasanmu a dukkan yanayi a wannan kasa mai girma, su ne wadannan abubuwa guda uku: wato basira, ikhlasi da kuma aiki a daidai lokacin da ya dace ba tare da jinkiri ba sannan kuma gwargwadon yadda ya dace.

translation.en: A dignified man is honorable and trustworthy, but he cannot be the standard for truth.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne wadannan abubuwa guda uku, wato basira, ikhalasi da kuma aiki a daidai lokacin da ya dace, su zamanto ma'auni.

translation.en: Sometimes dignified men - like some companions of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) - make a mistake and follow the wrong path.
translation.ha: A wani lokaci a kan iya samun wadansu mutane masu girma irin su sahabban annabi su zamanto sun kauce hanya, su yi kuskure.

translation.en: It is necessary to identify the truth. It is necessary to identify the path in order to be able to tell if somebody is righteous or not.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a san gaskiya, wajibi ne a ayyana hanya don a fahimci wannan mutum yana kan gaskiya ne ko kuma kan bata.

translation.en: Whoever treads the right path is righteous, and whoever does not tread the right path should be rejected.
translation.ha: Duk wani wanda ya bi wannan hanya, gaskiya ce; duk kuwa wanda ya bi hanyar da ba ta gaskiya ba, ba abin amincewa ba ne.

translation.en: It is necessary to identify the truth.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a fahimci gaskiya.

translation.en: The young and faithful people who have gathered under the flag of the Basij showed that they enjoy this insight. They showed that they are insightful.
translation.ha: Gungun matasa muminai wadanda suka taru karkashin inuwar Basiji da tutar Basij lalle sun nuna irin wannan basirar, sun nuna cewa su mtuane ne masu basira, hakan shi ne lamari na farko.

translation.en: Insight is the first element, and it should remain so in the future.
translation.ha: A nan gaba ma haka ya wajaba lamarin ya kasance.

translation.en: It is necessary to develop the ability to think critically.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a samu karfin yin sharhi, wajibi ne a sami karfin ayyana lamurra.

translation.en: As the founder of this great movement to whom our society owes a debt of gratitude, Imam Khomeini (r.a.) said, "If I strayed away from Islam, the people would turn their back on me."
translation.ha: Imam - wannan mutumin wanda shi ne uban wannan yunkuri, ya sanya wa wannan al'umma rai da yunkuri mai girma - ya taba fadin cewa idan ma ni din nan zan kauce wa Musulunci, to kuwa mutane za su juya min baya.

translation.en: Therefore, insight is the first element, and it should not be forgotten.
translation.ha: A saboda haka basira, ita ce lamari na farko. Bai kamata a mance da basira ba.

translation.en: Sincerity is the second element.
translation.ha: Lamari na biyu, shi ne ikhlasi.

translation.en: According to a narration, if somebody who is fighting for a divine cause goes after the spoils of war and gets killed as a result, he has not been martyred in the way of God.
translation.ha: An ce idan har mutum ya tafi fagen jihadi fisabilillah alhali yana da wata manufa ta kan kansa, ya zamanto ya tafi saboda neman ganima sannan kuma aka kashe su, to ba shahidi saboda Allah ba ne.

translation.en: Following the divine path for the sake of God is the requirement for being considered a martyr and mujahid. That is to say, a martyr should have sincerity.
translation.ha: Sharadin shahada da jihadi a tafarkin Allah shi ne cewa wajibi ne manufar mutum ta zamanto saboda Allah; wato ya zamanto yana da ikhlasi.

translation.en: If our movement is affected by our personal or familial motives and our friendships, then this sincerity becomes impure and leads to certain problems.
translation.ha: Matukar dai manufa ta zamanto ta daidaiku, manufa ta kungiyanci, manufa ta iyali da abokantaka suka yi tasiri cikin yunkurin mu, to hakan shi ne ya ke shafan ikhlasi, sannan kuma yake haifar da matsala.

translation.en: Lack of sincerity shows its effects one way or another.
translation.ha: A wani waje dai rashin ikhlasi zai bayyanar da kansa.

translation.en: Timely and proportional action is the third element.
translation.ha: Lamari na uku shi ne aiki a lokacin da ya dace kuma gwargwadon yadda ya kamata.

translation.en: If one does not know when to do what, one may make big mistakes.
translation.ha: Idan har mutum ya zamanto wanda bai fahimci lokacinsa ba, bai san wane aiki ne ya kamata a aikata shi a wani waje ba, mai yiyuwa ne mutum ya yi gagarumin kuskure.

translation.en: A basiji is one who makes these efforts.
translation.ha: Basiji shi ne mutum da ya ke aikata wannan aikin.

translation.en: When making these efforts, it is necessary to keep the clear and appropriate path in mind - namely, the path of the Revolution, the path of safeguarding the Islamic Republic, the path of reviving religion.
translation.ha: A cikin dukkanin wadannan abubuwa wajibi ne a yi la'akari da wannan ingantaccen tafarki wanda kuma yake a fili; wato tafarkin juyi, tafarkin kare wannan tsari, da kuma tafarkin raya addini.

translation.en: If we want to take care of these three elements, we need to engage in a jihad against our inner self.
translation.ha: Matukar dai muna son kiyaye wadannan abubuwa guda uku, wajibi ne mu yi kokari wajen gyara kan mu; wato jihadi mafi girma.

translation.en: Jihad against our inner selves is what we all need today.
translation.ha: Jihadi da son zuciya wani kokari ne da a yau dukkaninmu muke da bukatarsa.

translation.en: One of the main requirements for developing an appropriate understanding of events is to see what path the enemy is pursuing.
translation.ha: Daga cikin abubuwan da ya suke wajibi ne a samar da su wajen fahimtar lamurra shi ne mu sanya ido mu ga wani tafarki ne makiya suke bi.

translation.en: Today distorting realities and different events is one of the main paths that the enemy is pursuing, and this is among the important elements of soft war.
translation.ha: A yau daya daga cikin tafarki na gaba-gaba cikin aikin makiya - wanda yana daga cikin muhimman hanyoyin da makiya suke bi a yakinsu na ruwan sanyi - shi ne a sauya hakikanin lamarin da ke faruwa, a sauya hakikanin abubuwan daban-daban da suka faru.

translation.en: The propaganda efforts made by the enemy in this regard are indicative of its weakness.
translation.ha: Ita kanta farfagandar da makiya suke ta yi a wannan fagen, lamari ne da ke nuni da rauninsu.

translation.en: Whenever the enemy faces an overwhelming problem in the arena of realities, it steps up its propaganda efforts.
translation.ha: A duk inda makiya suka fuskanci matsala a kokarin da suke yin a bakanta hakikanin lamurran da ke faruwa, sai su kara yawan farfagandar da suke yi.

translation.en: Today if one takes a look at the enemy's efforts in the vast arena of methods of propaganda - from Internet tools to audio visual means and to mouthpieces they have in different places inside and outside the country - one would see that one of the main techniques is to distort the events that happen in the country and to present the situation of the country as disappointing and in decline.
translation.ha: A yau idan mutum ya kalli ayyukan da makiya suke yi a fagen farfagandarsu; kama daga kafafen internet har zuwa da hanyoyi na gidajen radiyo da talabijin da sauran masu magana da yawunsu da suke bangarori daban-daban - a cikin gida ma suna da wadanann mutane - za mu ga cewa mafi girman abin da suke kokarin yi shi ne sauya hakikanin abin da ke faruwa a cikin gida; su nuna yanayin da kasa take ciki a matsayin wani yanayi mai sanya yanke kauna, lamari ne da ya kama hanyar rushewa da kuma kama hanyar kai wa tsaka mai wuya.

translation.en: The fact that they are making so many efforts in this arena is indicative of their weakness in the arena of realities.
translation.ha: Gagarumin kokarin da suke yi a wannan fage, shi kansa lamari ne da ke nuni da raunin da suke da shi a fage na hakika.

translation.en: Of course the efforts have increased today. The propaganda efforts have increased because the current government officials are shouting the slogans of the Revolution more seriously, because the path of the Imam, the path of the Revolution and the path of rendering services for the people are more prominent today, because our government officials are populist and the people can feel this.
translation.ha: Makiya tsawon wadannan shekaru talatin sun kasance masu wannan kokarin; ko da yake a yau lamarin ya fi kamari. A yau saboda jami'an kasa da gwamnatin da take ci a yanzu suna gabatar da taken juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma riko da su; da kuma sanya taken Imam da tafarkin juyi a matsayin tafarkin da suka sa a gaba, don haka a yau lamarin ya fi fitowa fili da kara kaimi.

translation.en: Today if you take a look at the enemies' propaganda, you will see that when they speak about economic matters, all they want to say is that we have reached a dead end, that the problems are insurmountable, that there are many problems and that bad things will happen in the future.
translation.ha: A saboda haka farfagandar ta karu. A yau idan kuka kalli farfagandar makiya, a matsayin misali a shafi tattalin arziki, dukkanin abin da suke fadi shi ne cewa an kai ga yanayi na tsaka mai wuya, akwai matsaloli da dama, gobe ga abin da zai faru da dai sauransu.

translation.en: And there are some people who believe what they say and repeat their comments inside the country.
translation.ha: Wadansu mutane kuma sun yarda da hakan kuma suna ci gaba da sake nanata hakan a cikin gida.

translation.en: Before the elections and the fitna that followed, some people - who had successfully passed the test of fitna - used to come to me and say that the year 1388 would be a difficult time in terms of economic matters. They used to present the situation as gloomy, disappointing and overwhelming.
translation.ha: Kafin fara zabe da wannan lamari na fitinar da ta kunno kai, wasu daga cikin wadanda suka taka rawa cikin wannan fitina, suna zuwa wajenmu suna gaya mana cewa lalle shekara mai zuwa za ta zamanto shekara mai wahala - wato wannan shekarar ta 2009 - a fagen tattalin arziki kaza ne zai faru, yanayin da ake ciki yanayi ne da ke cike da matsaloli wadanda ba za a iya maganinsu ba.

translation.en: These propaganda efforts by the enemies show that they have not been able to keep pace with the great and accelerated movement by our people and government officials.
translation.ha: Suna so su sace gwuiwoyin jami'ai, haka ma mutane. Wannan farfaganda tana nuni da cewa su din nan an bar su a baya cikin wannan gagarumin yunkuri da mutane da jami'ai suke yi.

translation.en: Therefore, if one realizes that the enemy has such a position, one will have an appropriate and accurate view of reality.
translation.ha: A saboda haka idan da an fahimci wannan mahanga da manufa ta makiya, to kuwa da mahangar mutum dangane da hakikanin abin da ke gudana za ta zamanto mahanga mai kyau.

translation.en: Similarly, in the area of foreign policy, you noticed the same thing in some of our newspapers or in the comments made last year by some elements of the fitna. They used to repeatedly say, "We have been humiliated in the world" and "The Islamic Republic has lost its honor and value in the world" and other such things.
translation.ha: Ko kuma dangane da siyasar waje, siyasar kasa da kasa, hatta cikin wasu daga cikin cikin jaridunmu kuna dai ganin abin da suke rubutawa; haka nan kuma kun ga hakan cikin maganganun da wadansu daga cikin wadanda suka tayar da wannan fitina suke fadi; sai sake jaddadawa suke yi suna fadin cewa mu dai an kaskantar da mu a duniya, jamhuriyar musulunci ta zamanto ba ta da mutumci a idon duniya, ta zamanto maras kima, kaza ya faru, kaza ya faru.

translation.en: Today when we look at the realities, we see that the Islamic Republic's honor has been increasing among different Muslim and non-Muslim nations in the world on a daily basis.
translation.ha: A yau idan muka kalli hakikanin abin da ke faruwa, za mu ga cewa mutumcin jamhuriyar Musulunci a tsakanin al'ummomi daban-daban na duniya - musulmi da wadanda ba musulmi ba - a kowace rana sai dada karuwa yake yi.

translation.en: The enemies of the Iranian nation know, understand and feel this truth.
translation.ha: Makiya al'ummar Iran sun sani kuma sun fahimci hakan; to sai dai suna boyewa ne kawai.

translation.en: For example, why should we underestimate the President's trip to Lebanon?
translation.ha: Me ya sa za a dauki wannan ziyara da shugaban kasar Iran ya kai kasar Labanon a matsayin wani karamin abu?

translation.en: If the same thing had happened to any other country, especially the leaders of arrogance, they would have opened a big chapter for it in political propaganda and analyses.
translation.ha: Lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske. Faruwar hakan ga kowace kasa musamman ma shugabannin girman kan duniya za ta zamanto wani sabon shafi da za su yi amfani da shi wajen farfaganda da amfani na siyasa.

translation.en: Lebanon is not our neighbor, and its people are not all Muslims. The population is a mixture of Muslims and Christians, and the Muslim population consists of Shia and Sunni Muslims.
translation.ha: A samu wata al'umma wacce ma ba ta makwabtaka da mu, sannan kuma ba dukkansu ne ma musulmi ba; hadin gambiza ne na musulmi da kiristoci, su ma musulmin sun hada da Sunna da Shi'a; a samu irin wannan al'umma da ta kumshi bangarori daban-daban su fito kwansu da kwarkwatansu don yin maraba da shugaban kasar Iran, su bayyanar da kaunarsu, lalle wannan wani lamari ne maras tamka; babu wata kasa da hakan ta taba faruwa da ita.

translation.en: Which country's president would be welcomed like that in another country?
translation.ha: Wani shugaban kasa ne zai sami irin wannan yanayi a lokacin da ya kai ziyara wata kasa?

translation.en: And this is not particular to Lebanon.
translation.ha: Lamarin kuma ba ya kebanta ne kawai da kasar Labanon ba.

translation.en: Today if our prominent government officials go to Egypt and no restrictions are imposed, the same things would happen there too. The same is true of Sudan and all other Muslim countries.
translation.ha: A yau idan har manyan jami'an kasar mu suka tafi Masar, matukar dai mahukuntan kasar suka bari to irin wannan yanayi ne zai faru, idan suka tafi Sudan ma idan dai har an bari abin da zai faru kenan.

translation.en: This shows the greatness of the Iranian nation.
translation.ha: Hakan lamari ne da ke nuni da girman al'ummar Iran.

translation.en: This is an achievement that you made.
translation.ha: Wannan abu ne da kuka yi.

translation.en: The honor belongs to you. Such a thing would not have happened if the government had been isolated from the people and had not enjoyed the support of millions of motivated youth.
translation.ha: Idan (da gwamnatin Iran) wata gwamnati ce wacce ta yi nesa da al'umma, idan da wata gwamnati ce wacce miliyoyin matasa masu imani ba sa goyon bayanta, da hakan ba za ta faru ba; wannan lamari ne da yake da alaka da ku matasa.

translation.en: The honor belongs to you dear youth. Yet, look at the enemy's propaganda - it shows exactly the opposite of this.
translation.ha: To amma idan kuka dubi farfagandar makiya; za ku ga cewa sabanin hakan dari bisa dari ne suke nunawa.

translation.en: Whenever they have to speak the truth, they distort it trough their analyses.
translation.ha: A wajen da ya zamanto musu wajibi su fadi wani abu, su kan yi hakan, amma a wajajen da bai zama musu tilas ba, su kan boye, su kan boye hakikanin abin da ke gudana.

translation.en: The same is true of the Basij itself. At a certain stage, the enemy focused its global propaganda efforts on the Basij, and these efforts are partially continued even today.
translation.ha: Makiya a wani lokaci - a yau ma suna ci gaba da yin hakan, a wani lokaci da karfi, a wani lokaci kuma da rauni - sun sanya dukkanin farfagandarsu ne a kan Basiji.

translation.en: They said whatever they could.
translation.ha: Duk wani abin da za su iya fadi sun fadi.

translation.en: They bombarded the Basij with negative propaganda in order to ruin its reputation in the eyes of the people, but they failed. "And Allah will show the truth to be the truth by His words."
translation.ha: Sun ta yada bakaken farfagandar a kan Basiji, don su zubar da mutumcinsu a idon mutane, to sai dai sun gaza; "Kuma Allah Yana tabbatar da gaskiya da kalmominSa" (Suratu Yunus 10:82).

translation.en: [The Holy Quran, 10: 82] Allah the Exalted will not let this obvious truth stay hidden. Therefore, the Basij has acquired increasing honor in our country on a daily basis.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki ba zai bari a boye hakikanin da take a fili ba; a saboda haka mutumcin Basiji, alhamdu lillahi, a kowace sai dada karuwa yake yi a wanann kasa sannan kuma a kowace rana.

translation.en: Across the country, the youth who are active in different sectors consider the Basij as a great and brilliant identity and as the symbol of determination. You dear basijis should strengthen this. You should try to strengthen this by keeping the three elements - insight, sincerity and timely and proportional action - in mind.
translation.ha: A dukkanin fadin kasar nan, matasa a bangarori daban-daban, suna kallon Basiji ne da idon girmamawa da daukaka sannan kuma alama ta azama da irada; wannan lamari ne da wajibi ne ya karfafa muku gwuiwa Ya ku dakarun Basij; ku karfafa hakan bisa la'akari da wadannan abubuwa guda uku da aka fadi - wato lamarin basira, ikhlasi da kuma aiki a daidai lokacin da ya dace -.

translation.en: It is necessary to avoid extremism. Going to extremes is harmful, no matter what the direction is.
translation.ha: Rashin aikata wani aiki lalle yana cutarwa, shi ma wuce gona da iri cikin aiki yana cutarwa, don haka ku kula sosai.

translation.en: Revolutionary enthusiasm should not be diminished at all.
translation.ha: Ko da wasa bai kamata irin kumaji na juyi ya ragu ba.

translation.en: These different mountains of problems that oppressed people across the world are faced with will not be eliminated unless through the willpower and firm determination of believers.
translation.ha: Idan ba tare da azama da karfafffiyar irada ta imani ba, ba za a iya kawar da wannan matsaloli daban-daban da suke kawo cikas ga hanyar raunanan duniya ba.

translation.en: The goal is not just to improve the situation of the country.
translation.ha: Bai kamata manufar ta kasance kawai karfafa yanayin cikin gida ba ne.

translation.en: The world of Islam and even humanity is in need of assistance from Islam and the Islamic Ummah.
translation.ha: Duniyar musulmi, kai dukkanin bil'adama ma suna bukatar taimako daga wajen Musulunci da al'ummar musulmi.

translation.en: This firm determination should be preserved. This revolutionary enthusiasm should be increased on a daily basis.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne wannan azama da irada ta ci gaba da wanzuwa, wajibi ne irin wannan kumaji na juyi ya ci gaba da karuwa.

translation.en: It is necessary to pay attention to God and rely on Him and His representatives.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a bude kofofin tawassuli da komawa ga Allah, riko da waliyan Allah, hanyar ibada, tafarkin kaskantar da kai da tunani; mu karfafa hakan a gare mu.

translation.en: There is no doubt that the future of the Iranian nation and the Islamic Ummah is far better than its present conditions.
translation.ha: Kada ku yi shakka cewa goben wannan al'umma ta Iran da al'ummar musulmi za ta fi yau kyau.

translation.en: For example, notice how much progress the Iranian nation has made in all political, scientific and social areas over the past 30 years - that is to say, since the beginning of the Revolution. You should know that our future progress will be even more than the amount of progress we have made so far.
translation.ha: Idan kuka dubi wannan tazara da aka samu tsakanin shekaru talatin din da suka gabata da kuma yau din nan - wato tun farkon juyin juya halin Musulunci ya zuwa yau - za ku ga irin gagarumin ci gaban da al'ummar Iran ta samu a dukkanin fagage na siyasa da ilimi da zamantakewa da sauransu; ku sani cewa irin ci gaban da za a samu a nan gaba zai karu sama da wanda ake da shi a yau.

translation.en: The movement of the Iranian nation in all arenas is unstoppable.
translation.ha: Yunkurin al'ummar Iran a dukkanin fagage ba lamari ne da za a iya dakatar da shi ba, da yardar Allah kuma za a ci gaba da tafiya a kan wannan mikakken tafarki na Ubangiji da Musulunci da Alkur'ani.

translation.en: By Allah's favor, Muslim nations will become more vigilant on a daily basis. I hope Allah the Exalted will hasten the re-appearance of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake).
translation.ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya gaggauta bayyanar Waliyul Asr (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi); Ya sanya mu daga cikin mabiyansa na hakika a lokacin bayyanarsa da kuma buyarsa sannan kuma ya sanya zuciyar wannan mai girman ta yarda da mu.

translation.en: Dear God, make all Iranian people, especially our dear basijis, benefit from the prayers of that Imam.
translation.ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka sanya addu'ar wannan mai girma ta hada da dukkanin al'ummar Iran musamman ma gungun dakarun sa kai na Basiji.

translation.en: Leader’s Speech to Members of IRGC - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Kwamandojin Dakarun Kare Juyi

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on July 4, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with members of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps.
translation.ha: Shimfida: A ranar litinin 4, Yulin 2011 ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da manyan kwamandojin dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci na kasar Iran don tunawa da ranar haihuwar Imam Husaini (a.s) sannan kuma ranar dakarun kare juyi a kasar Iran.

translation.en: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I would like to congratulate you dear members of this great revolutionary family on Revolutionary Guards' Day.
translation.ha: Ina taya ku, dakarun kare juyi masu girma da dukkanin iyalan wannan cibiya mai girma kuma ta juyi murnar ranar dakarun kare juyi.

translation.en: I would also like to congratulate all believers on the Eids of the holy month of Rajab which remind us of great achievements and on the holy of month of Sha'ban which is the month of mercy, remembrance of God, dhikr and reliance on God.
translation.ha: Baya ga wannan, ranakun idin da suke cikin wannan wata mai albarka, suna tunatar da mu ababen alfahari da suka faru da kuma shi kansa wannan wata na Sha'aban wanda wata ne na gafara da rahama, wata ne na tuna Allah da neman taimakonsa, don haka shi ma muna taya dukkanin muminai murnar shigowarsa.

translation.en: The interesting idea to have a day for members of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps and to relate this day to the auspicious birthday anniversary of Imam Hussein (a.s.) is a significant innovation which shows us the path.
translation.ha: Samar da wata rana mai sunar ranar dakarun kare juyi da kuma jingina ta da ranar haihuwar Shugaban shahidai (Imam Husaini, amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi) wani lamari ne da ya dace wanda kuma yake da wata manufa da ake son cimma ta.

translation.en: It is necessary to thank those who were the first to think of this idea and to make us notice this concept. This is because the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps has made an impressive promise to safeguard the Islamic Revolution.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a gode wa mutanen da tun da farko suka yi wannan tunanin sannan kuma suka fahimtar da mu hakan; don kuwa aikin dakarun kare juyi, aiki ne mai girma, wanda shi ne ba da kariya ga juyin juya halin Musulunci.

translation.en: I will briefly speak about this issue later on.
translation.ha: A nan gaba zan yi karin haske kan hakan.

translation.en: The concept of guardianship was embodied by Imam Hussein (a.s.) with all its dimensions and with all the necessary and possible means. This is not to say that others did not do such a thing or did not want to do such a thing, rather it means that this movement was fully realized in the behavior of the Lord of the Martyrs (a.s.) during his ten-year imamate.
translation.ha: Hakika ana iya ganin wannan ma'ana - ta ba da kariya - da dukkanin bangarorinta, da dukkanin kayayyakin aikin da suka sawwaka cikin rayuwar Shugaban shahidai (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi); ko da ya ke ba wai saura ba su aikata wani abu ba ne ko kuma ba sa son su aikata ba ne, face dai da wannan ma'ana ce ta cewa tushen wannan yunkuri ya tabbata ne cikin ayyukan shekaru goma na imamancin Shugaban shahidai (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi).

translation.en: One can clearly notice in his lifestyle all the methods that could have been used by a descendant of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) to preserve the great legacy of Islam which has been passed down by the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) and his father as well as their genuine followers. We can clearly see everything in the lifestyle of the Lord of the Martyrs (a.s.) - everything ranging from clarification, to forewarning, to promotion of Islam, to provoking the conscience of prominent figures of his time during a sermon in Mina.
translation.ha: Duk wasu hanyoyin da dan Manzon Allah zai iya amfani da su wajen kiyaye wannan abin gado na Musulunci mai girma - wanda abin gado ne na kakansa da mahaifinsa da mabiya tafarkinsu -Shugaban shahidai ya bi su wajen kare Musulunci; kama daga yin bayani da jan kunne, kama daga kokarin isar da sako, kama daga farkarwa da motsa lamiran mutane na musamman - wato wadanda muke kiransu da zababbun cikin al'umma ko kuma masu fadi a ji - wanda daya daga cikin alamun hakan ita ce wannan huduba ta Mina (da Imam Husaini ya yi).

translation.en: All these things are tangible in the lifestyle of the Lord of the Martyrs (a.s.).
translation.ha: Idan aka dubi rayuwar Shugaban shahidai ana iya ganinsu a fili.

translation.en: Imam Hussein (a.s.) was aware of the consequences of his movement. He was an infallible Imam.
translation.ha: Ba wai cewa Imam Husaini (a.s) ba shi da masaniya dangane da makomar wannan yunkuri na sa ba; a'a shi Imami ne.

translation.en: Infallible Imams' extensive knowledge and insight are beyond our heads. Imam Hussein (a.s.) revolted to set a role model and he refused to surrender. He asked people to help him and when a group of people from Kufa expressed their willingness to accompany him on this path, Imam Hussein (a.s.) accepted their offer and moved towards Kufa and he did not give up in the middle of the way.
translation.ha: Batun masaniyar Imam da ilimin Imam da irin masaniya mai fadin gaske da yake da ita lamari ne da ya fi irin abin da muke tunaninsa a cikin kwakwalanmu; face dai ya sanya hakan ne a matsayin wani tafarki na aiki, babu mika kai cikin. Ya bukaci taimakon mutane, a lokacin da aka sami wasu mutane - wadanda su ne wadannan mutanen Kufan - sannan kuma suka bayyana cewa a shirye suke su kasance tare da shi, don haka sai ya amince da wannan bukata ta su ya kuma kama hanyar tafiya wajen su; sannan kuma bai yi nadama ko sauya ra'ayinsa a kan hanya ba.

translation.en: He said that his duty was what he was doing. He said that he had to express his opposition, no matter what the consequences were.
translation.ha: A yayin da mutum ya kalli maganganun Imam, zai ga cewa ya riga da ya dau azamar kai wa ga karshen wannan aiki.

translation.en: This was how Imam Hussein (a.s.) acted.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne abin da Imam Husaini (a.s) ya yi bayaninsa.

translation.en: This was a perfect instance of self-sacrifice and it safeguarded Islam.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne sadaukarwa ta gaba daya sannan da kuma kiyaye Musulunci.

translation.en: If Imam Hussein (a.s.) had not accepted this danger, if he had not made a move, if he had not taken action, if his blood had not been shed, if those great tragedies had not happened to the shrine of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.), to Imam Ali's (a.s.) daughter and to the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) descendents, this event would not have gone down in history.
translation.ha: Wannan yunkuri dai shi ne ya kare Musulunci, shi ne ya tabbatar da ababe masu tsarki cikin al'umma sannan kuma suka ci gaba da zama.

translation.en: What Imam Hussein (a.s.) did was an extraordinary feat.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce sadaukarwar da Imam Husaini (a.s) ya yi.

translation.en: That is to say, the dimensions of his action are far more than what we estimate.
translation.ha: Wato bangarorinsa ya ketare irin abubuwan da muke tunani nesa ba kusa ba.

translation.en: Once I spoke about Imam Hussein's (a.s.) patience. His patience was not limited to enduring thirst or seeing his companions being killed.
translation.ha: Hakurinsa ba wai kawai cikin cewa ya yi hakurin kishirwa ba ne ko kuma hakurin da ya nuna dangane da kashe masa magoya baya da aka yi ba ne; dukkanin wadannan hakuri ne masu sauki.

translation.en: The kind of patience that is difficult to practice is to listen to influential, aware and respectable people who keep creating doubts and telling you that what you are doing is dangerous and wrong. Who did those things?
translation.ha: Hakurin da ya fi hakan wahala shi ne hakurin da ya yi a kan wasu mutane, manyan gari, masana da kuma mutanen da ake girmamawa da suke gaya masa cewa kada ka aikata kaza, wannan abin da kake yi din kuskure ne, akwai hatsari cikinsa.

translation.en: People like Abdullah Ja'far, Abdullah Zubair and Abdullah Abbas. These prominent figures of that time were constantly telling Imam Hussein (a.s.) not to do what he was doing.
translation.ha: Mutane ne irin su Abdullah Ja'afar, Abdullah Zubair, Abdullah Abbas, wadannan manyan mutane na wancan lokacin, 'ya'yan manyan sahabbai masu muhimmanci, su ne suke ce masa kada ka aikata hakan.

translation.en: If it were somebody else, somebody who did not have that determination and stable character, he would have thought, "Well, I did my duty. These people are talking like this and the world is acting like that, so I should just say what I am supposed to say and do nothing else."
translation.ha: Kowane mutum ne kuwa idan dai har ba shi da irin wannan azama da tsayin daka, to kuwa shi da kansa zai fara tunanin cewa lalle yanzu kan babu wani nauyi a wuyana, ga dai abubuwan da wadannan mutane suke fadi, sannan kuma haka duniya ta ke tafiya, don haka babu bukatar in wahalar da kai na.

translation.en: A person who decides to stand up against such statements, such temptations, such doubts and such efforts to bend sharia and is not dissuaded from continuing his path - such a person is the one who can give rise to such a great transformation.
translation.ha: Mutumin da ya tsaya kyam a gaban irin wadannan maganganu, irin wadannan waswasi da sanya shakku, sannan kuma bai kauce wa hanya ta shari'a da kuma girgiza daga hanya ba, to wannan mutum shi ne wanda zai iya samar da irin wannan gagarumin sauyi.

translation.en: In this regard our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) was similar to the Lord of the Martyrs. I explained this in another meeting and I do not want to go into the details now.
translation.ha: Imamin mu mai girma (Imam Khumaini) ya taba kwatanta irin wannan yanayi da kuma shugaban shahidai wanda a wani lokaci a baya na taba fadin hakan, to a halin yanzu dai ba na son in shiga wannan fagen; don kuwa yana bukatar sharhi.

translation.en: This was how Imam Hussein (a.s.) acted as a guardian.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne tsayin daka da kuma kariya ta Imam Husaini (a.s).

translation.en: It is possible to criticize all currents, all groups, all individuals and all legal and natural persons. But if we consider the movement of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps in a fair way, we will see that the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps has kept its promise since the first day.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu ana iya samun matsala da kura-kurai tattare da dukkanin kungiyoyi da kuma mutane; to amma idan har muka kalli ayyukan dakarun kare juyi da ido na adalci, tun daga ranar farko har zuwa yau din nan, za mu ga cewa alal hakika dakarun kare juyi sun yi aiki da alkawarin da suka dauka; sannan kuma sun tsaya kyam a wannan tafarkin.

translation.en: Individual members come and go, but the collective identity of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps has remained the same.
translation.ha: Mutane dai su kan zo su kuma tafi; to amma an kiyaye wannan yanayi na su na gaba daya.

translation.en: During my last meeting with the esteemed members of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps, I raised an important point.
translation.ha: A ganawa ta karshe da na yi da 'yan'uwa dakarun kare juyi masu girma, na fadi wani abu wanda yana da muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: I would like to discuss the point briefly. I said that the new generations of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps should try to be a step ahead of the previous generations.
translation.ha: Zan yi ishara da hakan ne, shi ne cewa dakarun kare juyi na yanzu da kuma ma masu zuwa wajibi ne su yi kokari wajen wucewa gaban wadanda suka gabace su.

translation.en: That is to say, the world is moving forward. It is moving towards perfection. It is an evolutionary movement.
translation.ha: Saboda a halin yanzu duniya tana ci gaba da tafiya ne da kuma samun kamala; yunkurin da ake yi yunkuri ne na kamala.

translation.en: Therefore, it is reasonable to expect a young member who has just entered the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps to push the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps one step forward in terms of knowledge, insight, awareness and selflessness and in terms of willingness to work and doing the job in an appropriate and timely way - these are the characteristics that the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps has demonstrated during these years.
translation.ha: A saboda haka muna fatan matasan dakarun kare juyi su zamanto sama da wadanda suka gabace su a fagen masaniya, basira, fahimta, sadaukarwa, shirin aiki, aiwatar da aiki yadda ya kamata sannan kuma a daidai lokacin da ya kamata a aiwatar da shi, wanda kuma wannan wata siffa ce wacce dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musuluncin suke da ita tsawon wadannan shekaru. A lokacin da mutum ya kalli dakarun kare juyi na yau, zai ga cewa lalle suna da matsayi mai girma.

translation.en: Do not say, "How is this possible?" No, it is perfectly possible. Just take a look at the conditions of those days: our enemies had imposed a war on us and they were present on our soil.
translation.ha: Ku duba ku ga irin yanayin da ake ciki a wancan lokaci: ana cikin yaki ne ga shi kuma makiya sun shigo kasar mu; haka nan kuma kafin ma wannan kallafaffen yakin na shekaru takwas, an samu wasu masu adawa da wannan juyin da suke dauke da makami, ko kuma bayan hakan lokacin da aka fara yaki, shi kansa hakan wani lamari ne mai karfafa gwuiwa da tayar da kumaji hatta ga mutumin da ma babu ruwansa ya kan shigo da shi cikin fage.

translation.en: Today we are no longer fighting a war, but there is a war that is more subtle and of course more dangerous. Awareness of the depths of this war requires more capability and more vigilance.
translation.ha: To a yau dai babu wannan yakin; wani irin yaki ne mai rikitarwa da rudani ake da shi sannan kuma mai tsananin hatsarin gaske. Wannan yaki yana bukatar tsananin fahimta da kwarewa da kuma taka tsantsan sosai.

translation.en: If we see certain people entering this arena, making efforts, fighting and staying in the arena with insight, then we can say that these people are not inferior to the war veterans in terms of motivation and performance.
translation.ha: Idan har a yau mun ga wasu mutane sun shigo wannan fagen sannan kuma suna kokari da kuma gwagwarmaya sannan kuma sun ci gaba da tsayin daka a wannan fage da dukkanin basira, to a nan ana iya cewa ba a taba ganin irin sa ba a fagen karfafa gwuiwa da kuma aiki.

translation.en: The situation can be same in the future as well.
translation.ha: A nan gaba ma haka ya kamata lamarin ya kasance; haka ya kamata himmar ta kasance.

translation.en: It is necessary to focus one's efforts on this goal. Today I will explain that the identity of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps as the guardian of the Revolution should not be interpreted as conservative.
translation.ha: Ina son in sanar da ku cewa bai kamata a dauki yanayin dakarun kare juyi, wanda yanayi ne na tsayin daka da kariya, da ma'anar yanayi irin na 'yan mazan jiya ba (wanda babu wani ci gaba a cikinsa ba).

translation.en: In one analysis, this guardianship can be interpreted as conservative.
translation.ha: Ana iya fassara wannan kiyayewa da yanayi na 'yan mazan jiya.

translation.en: That is to say, we can say the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps is responsible to preserve the current situation of the Revolution.
translation.ha: Wato mu ce za mu tabbata a kan yanayin da juyi ya ke kai a halin yanzu; to wannan dai ba shi ne abin da muke fadi ba.

translation.en: Why?
translation.ha: Don me?

translation.en: Because the Revolution is by nature a progressive movement, and an accelerated movement at that.
translation.ha: Saboda juyin juya halin Musulunci a zatinsa wani yunkuri ne mai ci gaba, mai ci gaba da tafiya sosai. Zuwa ina?

translation.en: The principles and values which we should insist on and for which we should lay down our life, are the kind of principles and values that have been specified in our goals.
translation.ha: Wadannan koyarwa wadanda wajibi ne a tsaya kyam a kan su da kuma sadaukar da rayuwa saboda da su, su ne dai wadannan koyarwar da aka tsara su cikin wadannan manufofi.

translation.en: The ultimate goal is transcendence, perfection and closeness to God.
translation.ha: Manufa ta karshe, wacce ita ce daukaka da kamala da kusaci da Ubangiji.

translation.en: A less important goal is self-education. A less important goal is to establish an Islamic society in which all the characteristics of an Islamic society are present, including justice, monotheism and spirituality.
translation.ha: Manufa wacce ta ke kasa da wannan ita ce gina mutum; manufa wacce ta ke kasa da wannan ita ce samar da al'umma ta Musulunci mai ayyananniyar manufa, wacce take da batun tabbatar da adalci a cikinta, akwai tauhidi a cikinta da kuma abubuwan da suke kusata mutum da Ubangiji.

translation.en: These are the goals.
translation.ha: Wadannan su ne manufofin.

translation.en: No, the goal is to establish justice.
translation.ha: A'a, adalci shi ne dai wannan manufa.

translation.en: Monotheism and establishment of perfect sharia and justice - these are the goals and they cannot be changed.
translation.ha: Tauhidi da tabbatar da shari'ar Musulunci a yanayi na gaba daya su din nan manufa ce, wadannan wasu abubuwa ne da ba za a iya sauya su ba.

translation.en: The Revolution is moving in this direction.
translation.ha: A wannan fagen kan juyin nan yana ci gaba da tafiya ne.

translation.en: Preserving and safeguarding the Revolution means maintaining this progressive movement.
translation.ha: Kiyaye juyi yana nufin kiyaye wannan yanayi na ci gaba da kuma sauyi.

translation.en: This is the duty of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce ma'anar kiyaye juyin juya halin Musulunci.

translation.en: If we adopt this perspective and interpret guardianship in this way, then the dynamism and enthusiasm that is embodied by the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps will be intensified.
translation.ha: Idan har muka kalli lamarin da irin wannan kallon sannan kuma muka fahimci ma'anar ba da kariya da wannan ma'anar, to a irin wannan yanayin ne irin wannan kumaji da yunkuri na kariya zai karu ninkin ba ninkiya.

translation.en: Today's youth do not limit themselves to surface manifestations that exist in our society to a large extent. Rather, they pay attention to the depth and nature of things. These are what they pursue.
translation.ha: Bai kamata matasan mu na yau su takaita da zahirin lamurra wadanda a yau din nan akwai su da yawa cikin al'ummar mu ba, face dai su lura da abubuwan masu zurfi, masu bukatar gudanar bincike; su yunkura wajen cimma wadannan abubuwa.

translation.en: Deep faith and further awareness: these are what we should look for.
translation.ha: Imani mai zurfi da masaniya ta sosai su ne abubuwan da ya zama wajibi mu lura da su.

translation.en: This is the appropriate interpretation of guardianship - guardianship of the revolutionary movement and progress.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wannan ita ce ma'anar kariya ta hakika sannan kuma cikakkiyar ma'anarta; kiyaye yunkuri irin na juyi da kuma ci gaba irin na juyi.

translation.en: If we want this to happen, there are two things that have to be done in the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps. One is the internal progress of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps.
translation.ha: To idan muna son tabbatar da wannan aikin, wajibi ne a gudanar da wasu ayyuka guda biyu a cikin dakarun kare juyi: abu na farko shi ne yunkurawa na cikin gida na dakarun kare juyin; wato su karfafa kansu da samun kamala.

translation.en: These two dimensions should move forward hand in hand.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a samar da wadannan abubuwa guda biyu sannan kuma su dinga tafiya tare.

translation.en: If we ignore the first type of progress, we will fail to have the movement which will bring about progress and transcendence in the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps and the second kind of progress will be thwarted - that is to say, the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps will fail to act as the driving force behind the Revolution.
translation.ha: Idan har muka gafala da abu na farko, wato mu ka yi watsi da wannan yunkuri na ci gaba na cikin dakarun kare juyin ba, to kuwa abu na biyun wato tasirin dakarun kare juyin wajen ciyar da juyi gaba, ba zai yi nasara ba. Idan har muka nade hannaye da kafafunmu, to kuwa ba za mu iya cimma komai ba.

translation.en: This internal progress has a material aspect as well as a spiritual aspect.
translation.ha: Wannan yunkuri da aiki na cikin gida yana da bangare na abin duniya da kuma bangare na ruhi.

translation.en: The spiritual aspect consists of paying attention to the values in the real sense of the word - namely, specifying the standards, safeguarding them and evaluating oneself and others on the basis of these standards with the purpose of progress towards the goals in an appropriate way.
translation.ha: Bangare na ruhi shi ne wannan kula da ababe masu tsarki da dukkanin ma'ana ta hakika, wato ayyana ababe masu tsarki da kuma gabatar da su ga sauran mutane saboda ci gaba, saboda ci gaba da tafiya a kan ingantaccen tafarkin cimma wadannan manufofi.

translation.en: This is the spiritual aspect. And the material aspect is the good measures that are being adopted by the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps, the measures related to organization, science, research, development, military training and other such dimensions.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne bangarensa na ruhi, bangarensa na abin duniya kuwa su ne dai wadannan ayyuka masu kyau da ake ci gaba da aiwatar da su a cikin dakarun kare juyin; bangare na ayykan ofis da bangarori daban-daban, bangaren na ilimi da bincike, bangare na kere-kere da samar da abubuwa, bangaren horarwa ta soji da makamantan hakan.

translation.en: All these things should be done together.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne dukkanin wadannan abubuwan su zamanto tare da junansu.

translation.en: This is internal progress. Such an organization can be the standard and a role model. Some of our people and youth may not join the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps, but they may choose this organization as their role model in life - the appropriate model for spirituality and prudence, the model for choosing the right method and making the right move in areas related to reconstruction.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne yunkuri na cikin gida. Ta haka ne za a samar da irin wadannan mutane wadanda za su zamanto abin koyi. Mai yiyuwa ne wasu matasa da wasu mutane ba za su sami damar shiga cikin dakarun kare juyin ba, to amma za su iya zaban wannan a matsayin abin koyi cikin rayuwarsu; abin koyi na kyautata ruhi, abin koyi na tunani da ingantaccen tafarki da ingantaccen yunkuri cikin rayuwa.
