translation.en: More precisely, today Islam is in need of this movement. The movement of the Islamic Republic has had its influence on the world.
translation.ha: Daga nan kuma sai batun tasirin wannan yunkuri cikin dukkanin yunkurin juyin juya halin Musulunci. Hakan shi da kansa zai iya haifar da wannan abin da ake so din.

translation.en: That is to say, one cannot find a parallel movement in history.
translation.ha: Wato a yau din nan Musulunci yana bukatar irin wannan yunkuri.

translation.en: Of course I have observed or studied the developments that have taken place in various parts of the world, especially in our own region.
translation.ha: Ko da ya ke ni dai tsawon rayuwa ta haka nan kuma a lokacin samartaka, na shaidi faruwar abubuwa daban-daban a duniyar nan ciki kuwa har da a wannan yanki na mu, wadanda ko dai na gansu ko kuma na karanta.

translation.en: I have seen revolutions that took place in North Africa and Latin America as well as the leftist revolutions that happened during the 1960s. It is not the case that I do not know the historical background of these developments. No, I have seen these things.
translation.ha: Wadannan juye-juyen hali da suka faru a kasashen Afirka, Latin Amurka, juye-juyen hali na ‘yan gurguzu da suka faru a shekarun 1960 - wato kimanin shekaru hamsin din da suka gabata - duk mun gan su; ba wai kawai mun fahimci irin yanayinsu da kuma abubuwan da suka kumsa ba ne; a'a mun ma gansu ne.

translation.en: But what is happening today is unprecedented. These developments do not have a parallel. The events that happened in the 1960s - in Africa, in Latin America and in certain Asian countries - were often limited to one party or organization spreading its domination over the destiny of a nation with a material and Marxist orientation, a party or organization that lacked spirituality and divine elements.
translation.ha: To amma abin da a halin yanzu yake faruwa, lamari ne da ba a taba ganin irin sa ba; wato lamari ne da ba shi da tamka. Abubuwan da suka faru a shekarun 1960 miladiyya - shin a Afirka ne ko kuma a Latin Amurka ko kuma a wasu daga cikin kasashen Asiya - abin da ya faru shi ne nasarar wata jam'iyya ko wata jama'a ce a kan makomar wata al'umma; da wata akida ta abin duniya da markisanci wanda babu Allah a cikin hakan.

translation.en: The so-called revolutionary parities and governments that came to power in North Africa, including the governments of Gamal Abdel Nasser, Gaddafi and others - all of them seized power by staging a coup.
translation.ha: Wadannan jam'iyyu da gwamnatoci da ake kiran su na juyi da suka kafu a kasashen arewacin Afirka, dukkaninsu sun dare karagar mulki ne ta hanyar juyin mulki; irin su Jamal Abdul Nasir, irin su wannan Gaddafin da sauransu.

translation.en: These were not popular and revolutionary in the real sense of the word. What is happening today is that people are present in the arena with their body and soul.
translation.ha: Abin da a halin yanzu yake faruwa, shigowar mutane fage ne da dukkan jiki da kuma rayukansu; to irin wadannan juyi su ne juyi na mutane.

translation.en: They are ordinary people.
translation.ha: Mai yiyuwa ne a sami cewa wasu jam'iyyu da kungiyoyi sun shigo ko kuma ma suna da tasiri; to amma wadanda suke a cikin fage, ba wai wata jama'a ce ta soji ba, ba wata jama'a ce ta masu juyin mulki ba; wani gungun ne na mutane, gungun jama'a ne, su din ma masu akida ta tauhidi da yarda da Allah; suna masu rera taken Allahu Akbar da kuma tsayar da sallar jam'i.

translation.en: This is the truth.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce hakikanin lamarin.

translation.en: This is totally unprecedented.
translation.ha: Wannan dai wani lamari ne da ba a taba ganinsa ba.

translation.en: According to what I have seen, heard or studied, such widespread developments are totally unprecedented. What is happening is new.
translation.ha: Gwargwadon abin da muka gani ko muka ji ko muka karanta na abin da ya shafi juye-juyen da aka gudanar, ba mu taba ganin wani irin wannan lamarin da irin wannan yanayin. Wannan wani sabon abu ne.

translation.en: That is to say, a new page has been turned in the history of the region and, consequently, the world.
translation.ha: Alal hakika ya sauya tarihin wannan yankin da kuma tarihin duniya ma; wani sabon fasali ne ya kunno kai.

translation.en: Of course the enemies are working on this issue with all their power.
translation.ha: Ko da yake makiya suna ci gaba da gudanar da ayyukansu da dukkan karfin su a wannan fagen.

translation.en: They do not want this role model to be in front of Muslims' eyes. They do not want Muslim nations to see what position Iran has achieved.
translation.ha: Ba sa so wannan lamarin ya zamanto abin koyi ga al'ummomin musulmi, su ce ku duba ku ga inda Iran ta kai.

translation.en: But this is something that has already happened, whether they like it or not.
translation.ha: To amma ko suna so ko ba sa so; su yarda ko kuma kada su yarda, hakan ta faru.

translation.en: The scientific and technical work that is being done and the research that is being carried out by the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps and other organizations affiliated to the Armed Forces and the work that is being done outside the Armed Forces in our universities and different research centers - these are the things that specifically delineate future prospects.
translation.ha: Wadannan ayyuka na ilimi da fasaha da bincike da ku din nan da sauran cibiyoyin soji suke gudanarwa da kuma wadanda a ke gudanarwa a jami'oi da sauran cibiyoyi daban-daban na ilimi a wannan kasar abubuwa ne da suke shata makoma.

translation.en: That is to say, they are the factors that will determine the future.
translation.ha: Wadannan su ne abubuwa da suke nuni da cewa makoma dai ta waye.

translation.en: Of course this has been achieved due to Islam and the revolutionary spirit and it is necessary to strengthen this spirit.
translation.ha: Ko da yake hakan ya samo asali ne albarkacin Musulunci da ruhi na juyin juya hali, a saboda haka wajibi ne a karfafa irin wannan ruhi da ake da shi.

translation.en: Therefore, this is how we should interpret guardianship of the Revolution.
translation.ha: Da wannan ma'ana ce ya kamata a dauki wannan batu na kare juyi.

translation.en: We should interpret it as a dynamic and progressive concept. One of the things that we need to pay attention to in the arena of action is that we should take care not to let revolutionary organizations become involved with fruitless and possibly harmful activities during this progressive movement.
translation.ha: Da wannan ma'ana ta sauyi da ci gaba. Daya daga cikin lamurran da ake bukatar su a fagen sannan kuma wajibi ne a kula da su su ne cewa: mu lura kada cibiyoyi na juyi su da mu kansu da ayyukan da ba su da amfani wadanda a wasu lokuta ma masu cutar da wannan yunkuri na ci gaba ne.

translation.en: One of these fruitless and harmful activities is the issue of internal disputes. Sometimes a current may stand up against the Revolution with the purpose of defeating it. In this situation it is everybody's duty to defend the Revolution.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin su shi ne wannan batu na sabani, wanda saboda hakan ne na ke yawaita magana kansa. A wani lokaci a kan sami wani yunkuri da ya ke kunno kai da nufin kawar da wannan juyin, to a nan dai nauyin da ke wuyan kowa shi ne ba da kariya.

translation.en: The Revolution defends itself like any other living creature.
translation.ha: Juyin juya hali tamkar duk wata halitta rayayyiya ce da za ta kare kanta.

translation.en: If a revolution is unable to defend itself during the time of sedition and different kinds of military, political and other coups, then that revolution is not alive.
translation.ha: Duk wani juyin da ba zai iya kare kansa a lokacin fitina ba, a lokacin da ake kokarin yi masa juyin mulki - na siyasa ne ko na soji da sauransu - to wannan ba rayayyen juyi ba ne.

translation.en: Our Revolution is alive, so it defends itself and it always wins, just as it did in the year 1388.
translation.ha: To amma wannan juyi (na mu) a raye ya ke; a saboda haka ya ke kare kansa, yana ci gaba da samun nasara, babu ja da baya; kamar yadda kuka ga ya faru a shekarar 1388 (2009 bayan zaben shugaban kasar da aka gudanar).

translation.en: Other times it is not a matter of trying to overthrow the government: it is simply a matter of differences of taste and opinion. It is necessary to decrease these differences as much as possible.
translation.ha: A wani lokaci haka lamarin ya ke (wato ana kokarin kifar da tsarin ne), a wani lokacin kuma ba haka lamarin ya ke ba, ba wai wani kokari ne na cutar da tsarin da kuma kifar da shi ba, sabani ne na ra'ayi kawai.

translation.en: It is harmful to fuel these differences of opinion.
translation.ha: Kirkiro irin wadannan sabani lamari ne mai cutarwa.

translation.en: One issue is that if a person says something that is wrong, should somebody respond to him? Yes, of course.
translation.ha: Wani batun kuma na daban shi ne cewa idan aka sami wani mutum ya fadi wata magana ta kuskure, to shin wajibi ne a sami wani da zai mayar masa da martani ko kuma a'a?

translation.en: Responding to a faulty statement should be done in a particular way.
translation.ha: Mayar da martani da magana ta kuskure tana da nata hanyar, tana da aikin da ya kebanta da ita.

translation.en: This is a mistake.
translation.ha: To wannan dai kuskure ne.

translation.en: I am not at all opposed to clarification by anybody or any organization. On the contrary, I support clarification and I believe in it.
translation.ha: Ni dai ba na adawa da karin haske da bayyana lamurra yadda suke daga wajen kowane mutum ko kuma kowace cibiya ta gwamnati ce, face ma dai ina so sannan kuma ma na yi imani da lamarin bayani da karin haske.

translation.en: That is to say, clarification has been one of our essential strategies since the beginning.
translation.ha: Wannan lamari na bayani da karin haske yana daga cikin tushen aikin mu tun daga farko.

translation.en: Clarification is necessary, but this does not mean that we should constantly fuel internal disputes.
translation.ha: Karin bayani wajibi ne; to amma hakan ba tana nufin shi kenan sai mu dinga kara irin sabani na cikin gida da ake da su ba ne.

translation.en: Be careful.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne mu lura sosai.

translation.en: Everybody should be careful in this regard. The Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps should be especially cautious.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne kowa ya yi taka tsantsan; musamman dakarun kare juyi. Wajibi ne dakarun kare juyi su yi taka tsantsan.

translation.en: And foreign organizations are extremely happy about this. They analyze these disputes. They say that there is discord among us.
translation.ha: A cikin lamurra na siyasa da sauran lamurra daban-daban na tunani da zauki bai kamata a dinga kunna wutar rikici da sabani a tsakanin mutane ba.

translation.en: It is clear that this issue is because of our weakness.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu wannan lamari ne da ke nuni da raunin da muke da shi.

translation.en: We should not let this weakness continue or increase.
translation.ha: Bai kamata mu bari wannan raunin ya ci gaba da wanzuwa ba ko kuma ma ya karu.

translation.en: It is necessary to pay attention to this point. The movement should be dignified and logical. If certain people have differences of opinion, they should express their views in a logical way.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a lura da hakan. Wajibi ne yunkurin mu ya zamanto yunkuri mai karfi da ke cike da hujjoji. Idan har wani yana da wani sabanin ra'ayi, to ya yi bayanin hakan da dalilai.

translation.en: As I said, I believe in clarification.
translation.ha: A baya na fadi cewa lalle na yi imani da bayani da karin haske.

translation.en: During the revolutionary activities, I had the same problem with leftist and Marxist elements who were also involved in revolutionary activities. I used to highlight the importance of clarification, but they did not believe in clarification.
translation.ha: A lokacin gwagwarmaya ma sabanin da ya kunno kai tsakanin mu da ‘yan gurguzu da markisanci wadanda su ma a lokacin suke gwagwarmaya shi ne kan wannan lamari da muka ce wajibi ne a yi bayani, don su ba su yi amanna da karin haske da bayani ba.

translation.en: They used to say something else. They had a different analysis.
translation.ha: Wani abu na daban su ke fadi, ko kuma suna da wata fassara ta daban.

translation.en: Basically the Revolution was based on clarification, logical reasoning and avoidance of uproar. Uproar will work against logical reasoning.
translation.ha: Tun farko ma dai ayyukan juyin nan sun ginu ne bisa tushen bayani da karin haske da kuma bayanin da ya yi daidai da hankali wanda kuma yake cike da dalilai ba tare da tada jijiyoyin wuya ba.

translation.en: It may succeed in attracting a few people, but a few other people who are more intelligent will be pushed away.
translation.ha: Mai yiyuwa ne ya janyo hankula wasu mutane hudu, to amma kuma zai kori wasu mutane hudun masu hankali.

translation.en: This is what I believe.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne abin da muke fadi; wannan ita ce maganar da muke yi.

translation.en: The movement should be a progressive movement.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne yunkurin ya zamanto yunkuri ne na ci gaba wanda ya yi daidai da zamani.

translation.en: There are a lot of requirements.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wannan yunkurin yana bukatar abubuwa da dama.

translation.en: One of them is the need to form a unified front and this is related to the issue of unity which I discussed earlier. "Surely Allah loves those who fight in His way in ranks as if they were a firm and compact wall."
translation.ha: Na rubuta wasu abubuwa dai; daga cikin su kuwa har da shiga sahu guda wanda shi ne dai wannan lamari na hadin kai da na yi magana kansa "Lalle Allah Yana son wadanda ke yin yaki domin daukaka KalmarSa, a cikin sahu kamar su gini ne mai damfarar juna" (Suratus Saff 61:4), tamkar wani gini ne mai karfi, tamkar wata katanga ce mai karfin da ba za a iya kutsawa cikinta ba.

translation.en: [The Holy Quran, 61: 4] It is necessary to stand up against the enemy's invasion like a firm and impenetrable wall. You dear youth who have joined the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps and you honorable clergy, religious scholars and active, faithful and young seminarians who represent the Leader in the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps - all of you should be aware of two things.
translation.ha: To ku din nan matasa masu girma da kuke cikin dakarun kare juyi; malamai masu girma da dalibai masu imani da kumaji da kuke gudanar da ayyukanku a ofishin wakilci na Jagora, wajibi ne ku fahimci wasu abubuwa guda biyu: na farko shi ne cewa dukkanin ku kuna da ayyuka masu yawa a gaban ku; matasa dakarun kare juyin ne ko kuma malamai masu girma; akwai gagarumin aiki a gaban ku da wajibi ne ku sauke shi.

translation.en: Both the young members of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps and the honorable clergy have a lot of things to do. Another issue is that you should know that if you make determined efforts, you can definitely do these things and after some time you will realize that you have made progress.
translation.ha: Abu na biyu shi ne ku san cewa idan har kuka yi himma, to ko shakka babu za ku iya yin wannan aikin, sannan kuma bayan wani lokaci kwatsam za ku ga cewa kun kai wani matsayi mai girma; wato ci gaban da babu wanda ya isa ya dakatar da shi.

translation.en: That is to say, if you make determined efforts, progress is definite. If there is determined effort and hope, progress is definite and there is no doubt in this regard.
translation.ha: A duk lokacin da aka yi kokari, a duk lokacin da aka yi himma, a duk lokacin da ya zamana akwai fata, to ko shakka babu za a ci gaba, wato babu tafiya gaba a dawo baya.

translation.en: All members of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps should pay attention to this point.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne dakarun kare juyi su lura da hakan.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted will help you.
translation.ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya taimake ku.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted will make you benefit from His blessings.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya sanya ku cikin tausayawarsa.

translation.en: There is another point that I would like to raise because most of the high-ranking officials of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps are present in this meeting.
translation.ha: Ina son in sanar da jami'an dakarun kare juyi masu girma; saboda mafi yawansu duk suna wajen nan, cewa daya daga cikin ayyuka masu tsananin muhimmanci wanda kuma ya zama wajibi ne in sanar da mai girma kwamandan dakarun kare juyin shi ne ku lura da iyalan shahidan ku.

translation.en: But all of them need compassion and empathy.
translation.ha: To a kula da su, a tafi wajen su.

translation.en: You should pay attention to their families. And I hope our friends in the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps will have a unified and organized performance in this regard. I hope Allah the Exalted will keep you safe and will make you benefit from the prayers of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake).
translation.ha: Ina fatan ‘yan'uwa za su yi kokari sosai a wannan fagen Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya kare ku, ku ci gaba da wanzuwa sannan kuma ku zamnato cikin addu'oin Waliyul Asr (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi) sannan kuma ruhin Imam mai girma da sauran shahidai masu tsarki su yarda da ku da kuma mu gaba daya.

translation.en: Leader's Speech in Meeting with Officials and Participants of Conference on Islamic Unity - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Jami'an Iran Da Mahalarta Taron Hadin Kan Musulmi Ranar Maulidi

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on January 9, 2015 by Ayatollah Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution, in a meeting with government officials and foreign participants of the 28th Conference on Islamic Unity. The meeting was held on the occasion of the birthday anniversaries of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) and Imam Sadiq (a.s.).
translation.ha: Shimfida: Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei yayi ne a lokacin ganawarsa da manyan jami'an Iran, baki mahalarta taron kasa da kasa kan hadin kan musulmi bugu da kari kan jakadun kasashen musulmi da suke Iran don tunawa da ranar haihuwar Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) wanda aka gudanar ranar Juma'a, 09, Janairun 2015 a Husainiyar Imam Khumaini (r.a) da ke gidan Jagoran:

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I would like to congratulate all the honorable participants on the occasion of the auspicious birthday anniversaries of the Holy Prophet of Islam and Imam Sadiq (peace and greetings be upon them).
translation.ha: Ina taya dukkanin mahalarta wannan taro masu girma, murnar zagayowar ranar haihuwar Annabin Musulunci mai girma da Imam Sadik (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare su).

translation.en: The officials of the country, the dear guests of Unity Week and the honorable ambassadors of Islamic countries are present in this meeting.
translation.ha: Ina taya jami'an gwamnati, bakin taron makon hadin kai masu girma, jakadun kasashen musulmi masu girma, wadanda duk suke wajen nan, murnar wannan rana mai albarka.

translation.en: I would like to extend my congratulations to the people of Iran, Islamic nations, the entire Islamic Ummah and all liberated people throughout the world - those for whom the issue of freedom and human values is very important.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma ina taya dukkanin al'ummar Iran da sauran al'ummar musulmi, sannan da kuma dukkanin ‘yantattu na duniya; mutanen da batun ‘yan'adamtaka da ‘yancin kai ya dame su, murnar wannan rana.

translation.en: Today is the birthday anniversary of the prophet of knowledge, wisdom, morality, mercy and unity. He was the prophet of all great human virtues.
translation.ha: Don kuwa yau din nan rana ce ta haihuwar Manzon ilimi; Annabin ilimi, da hankali da kyawawan halaye, Annabin rahama, Annabin hadin kai, sannan kuma Annabin dukkanin siffofi masu girma da kyau na bil'adama.

translation.en: Anyone who is attached to these human virtues loves the Prophet of Islam (s.w.a.).
translation.ha: Duk mai riko da kuma girmama wadannan siffofi na dan'adamtaka, to kuwa zai so Annabin Musulunci da kuma kaunarsa.

translation.en: You and I - the Muslims who claim and feel proud to follow this great personality and who are prepared to show resistance, lay down our lives and spend money on his path - need to follow his teachings and make efforts on this path.
translation.ha: Ni din nan da ku, musulmi da ke ikirarin bin wannan mai girma sannan kuma mu ke alfahari da hakan da kuma shirin sadaukar da rayuka da dukiyarmu a kan tafarkinsa, lalle muna bukatar mu zamanto masu koyi da wannan koyarwar.

translation.en: The message of Islam includes this obedience and learning - that is to say, the knowledge, wisdom, acumen, mercy, unity, morality and other human characteristics that the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) message promoted and that Hazrat Abi Abdullah Ja'far ibn Muhammad al-Sadiq (peace and greetings be upon him) made the most efforts to promote and establish.
translation.ha: Wato wannan ilimi da amfani da hankali da hikima da rahama da hadin kai da kyawawan halaye da dukkanin siffofin da Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) ya ke da su, wadanda Imam Abi Abdillah Ja'afar bn Muhammad al-Sadik (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi) ya yi gagarumin kokari wajen yada wadannan ma'anoni da kuma tabbatar da su.

translation.en: Today, this is the responsibility of all Muslims.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne mu yi kokari wajen tabbatar da su; wannan kuwa shi ne babban nauyin da ke wuyan dukkanin musulmi.

translation.en: Of course, the masses of the people follow the officials of countries.
translation.ha: Tabbas sauran mutanen gari suna bin jami'an kasashensu ne.

translation.en: It is governments, outstanding personalities, intellectuals, ulama, politicians and other such personalities who have the main responsibility in this vast arena.
translation.ha: Akwai jami'an gwamnati, manyan gari, masana, malamai, ‘yan siyasa da makamantansu, wadanda su ne suke da gagarumin nauyi a wuyansu.

translation.en: Today, when I take a look at the issues of our own society and the issues of the world of Islam, I see that although all these great matters - including knowledge, wisdom and morality - are important for the world of Islam, the thing that is of primary importance is unity.
translation.ha: A yau a yayin da nake kallon abubuwan da ke faruwa a cikin al'ummarmu da kuma wadanda suke faruwa a duniyar musulmi, duk kuwa da cewa dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne masu girma da kuma muhimmnci - a yau ilimi da hikima da kuma kyawawan halaye, dukkaninsu wasu lamurra ne masu muhimmanci ga duniyar musulmi - to amma abin da a halin yanzu yafi zama mai muhimmanci ga duniyar musulmi shi ne hadin kai.

translation.en: We Muslims have drifted away from one another to a great extent.
translation.ha: Mu musulmi mun nesanci junanmu sosai.

translation.en: Unfortunately, certain policies have been successful in separating Muslims and the hearts of Muslim groups from one another.
translation.ha: Abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa siyasar kasashen yammaci a wannan fagen ta yi nasarar rarraba zukatan kungiyoyin musulmi.

translation.en: Today, we need unity.
translation.ha: A saboda haka a yau din nan muna bukatar hadin kai.

translation.en: In this vast region - which forms a great portion of the population of the whole world - if Muslim nations join hands in general orientations, not in details, then the world of Islam will achieve progress and transcendence. If they are seen together, this will exert great influence.
translation.ha: Matukar bakin al'ummar musulmi a duniyar musulmi - wanda wani bangare ne mai girman gaske na - ya zo daya, ba wai cikin kananan abubuwa ba, face cikin manyan lamurra da matsaya, to kuwa da duniyar musulmi ta kai wani matsayi na daukaka.

translation.en: If heads and outstanding personalities of Islamic countries speak against one another, this emboldens the enemy and gives him hope.
translation.ha: Idan aka samu shugabannin kasashen musulmi ko kuma masanansu suna fadin maganganu kan junansu, magana kawai, to hakan yana kara wa makiya karfin gwiwa.

translation.en: If we stay together even in our statements, this brings about greatness for the world of Islam and for the personality of the Islamic Ummah.
translation.ha: Kai ko da kawai cikin maganganu ne, a ganmu tare da jananmu, to hakan zai kara karfi da daukaka ga duniyar musulmi da kuma shugabanninta.

translation.en: Whenever we witnessed instances of this unity and gathering - even if it is a mere gathering of bodies - its reflection in the world brought about dignity for Islam, for Muslims and for the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.).
translation.ha: A duk inda aka sami irin wannan haduwar kan, ko da kuwa haduwa ce ta jikkuna, to kuwa za mu ga hakan ya zamanto abin daukaka da kara mutumci ga Musulunci da musulmi; lamari ne da zai kara daukaka ga Manzon Allah.

translation.en: When we read Eid ul-Fitr prayers together, we say, "You Who have turned this day into an Eid for Muslims. You Who have turned this day into a source of dignity, greatness and abundance for Muhammad (God's greetings be upon him and his household)" [al-Iqbal, page 289].
translation.ha: A yayin da muke sallar idi tare, muna fadin cewa: "Wannan rana ce wacce ka sanya ta ta zamanto ranar idi ga musulmi, sannan kuma ka sanya ta ta zamanto mabubbugar girmamawa da mutumci da kuma daukaka ga (Annabi) Muhammad, tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi da Alayensa" (wannan wani bangare ne na Kunutin da ake yi a yayin sallar idi kamar yadda ya zo cikin littafin al-Ikbal, shafi na 289).

translation.en: Even the mere gathering of bodies during prayers is a source of dignity for the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.).
translation.ha: Haduwar jikkuna kawai waje guda, lamari ne abin daukaka a wajen Annabi; haka nan abin girmamawa da kuma daukaka ga musulmi.

translation.en: The same is true of the gathering of Hajj.
translation.ha: Haka lamarin yake dangane da taron Hajji ma.

translation.en: This year, you witnessed that during Husseini Arbaeen, millions of people gathered.
translation.ha: A wannan shekarar kun ga yadda miliyoyin mutane suka taru a lokacin taron Arba'in na Imam Husain (a.s).

translation.en: People all over the world bowed down in respect to this great movement which was launched by a group of Muslims - of course, it was not particular to Shias and Sunnis too participated in this rally - and which sent waves throughout the world.
translation.ha: Shi kansa wannan gagarumin taron na musulmi - duk da cewa ba wai kawai ‘yan Shi'a ba ne, ‘yan Sunna ma sun shigo ciki - ku dubi yadda ya dau hankulan duniya.

translation.en: They considered it to be the greatest rally in the world. Who had such an opinion?
translation.ha: Ta yadda suka bayyana shi a matsayin taro mafi girma a duniya. Waye suka fadi hakan?

translation.en: I deem it necessary to thank the government, people and different tribes of Iraq who made sacrifices, rendered services and showed greatness of character in this very important test.
translation.ha: Lalle a daidai wannan lokacin ina ganin ya dace kuma ma ya zama wajibi, in mika godiya ta ga gwamnati da al'umma da kuma kabilun kasar Iraki saboda irin sadaukarwa da kuma hidimar da suka yi.

translation.en: This year's Arbaeen of Karbala was an astonishing event.
translation.ha: Lalle taron Arba'in na bana wani lamari ne mai ban mamaki.

translation.en: The enemies of Islam and Ahlul Bayt vainly thought that they had blocked the path of Muslims. Notice what a great movement was launched.
translation.ha: Makiyan Musulunci da makiyan Ahlulbaiti (a.s) suna zaton sun toshe wa musulmi hanya.

translation.en: When even bodies stay together, it has such a reflection.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne abin da zai faru a lokacin da ko da jikkuna ne kawai suka hadu waje guda.

translation.en: If we stay together, if Islamic governments and Muslim nations - whether Shia or Sunni or different denominations of Shia and Sunni - are honest with one another, if they are not suspicious of one another, if they do not insult and have malevolent intentions against one another, notice what will happen in the world and what great dignity will be brought about for Islam.
translation.ha: Matukar muka hadu waje guda, idan kasashen musulmi da al'ummomin musulmi - Sunna da Shi'a, bangarori daban-daban na Shi'a da Sunna - idan har suka hada kansu waje guda, zukatansu suka hadu waje guda, ba su zamanto masu mummunan zato ga junansu ba, ba su zamanto masu bakar aniya ga juna ba, suka nesanci cin mutumcin junansu, to kuwa za ku ga irin abin da zai faru a duniya. Za ku ga irin daukakar da Musulunci zai samu.

translation.en: Today, some elements both among Sunnis and Shias are working at separating Muslims from one another.
translation.ha: A yau, akwai wadansu mutane, a cikin Ahlusunna, haka nan a cikin Shi'a, da suke kokarin raba musulmi da junansu.

translation.en: If you trace these elements, you will see that all of them are connected to espionage and intelligence services of the enemies of Islam - not the enemies of Iran and Shia Muslims, rather the enemies of Islam.
translation.ha: Idan kuka binciki dukkanin wadannan mutanen, za ku samu cewa suna da alaka da cibiyoyin leken asirin makiyan Musulunci; ba wai makiyan Iran ba, ba wai makiyan Shi'a kawai ba, face dai makiyan Musulunci.

translation.en: The kind of Shia which works with the MI6 of England and the kind of Sunni which is a mercenary of the CIA of America are neither Shia nor Sunni.
translation.ha: Irin wannan Shi'ancin da ke da alaka da kungiyar leken asirin MI6 na Birtaniyya, da kuma Sunnancin da ya zamanto dan amshin shatan kungiyar leken asirin Amurka CIA, su din nan ba shi'a ba ne, haka nan ba Sunna ba ne.

translation.en: Both of them are against Islam.
translation.ha: Dukkaninsu masu kiyayya ne da Musulunci.

translation.en: It is 35 years now that we in the Islamic Republic are letting out this cry. We do not only speak, rather we act.
translation.ha: Shekaru 35 kenan a nan Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran mu ke rera wannan take (na hadin kai); ba wai kawai a baki ba, a aikace ma mun aikata hakan.

translation.en: The Islamic Republic's assistance to its Muslim brothers has mostly been given to Sunnis. We have stood beside the Palestinians.
translation.ha: Ya zuwa yanzu irin taimakon da Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran ta ba wa ‘yan'uwanta a duniyar musulmi, mafi yawansu sun tafi ne zuwa wajen ‘yan'uwanmu Ahlusunna.

translation.en: We have stood beside the religious people of regional countries because we know that today, the issue of unity is at the top of Islamic issues.
translation.ha: Mun tsaya kyam wajen goyon bayan Palastinawa, wajen goyon muminan kasashen wannan yankin. Don kuwa mun san cewa hadin kai shi ne babban lamarin da yake da muhimmanci ga duniyar musulmi.

translation.en: I advise and I insist that well-known ulama, outstanding personalities and politicians of the world of Islam do not speak so much about discord and disunity. Some people in the world are spending money in order to promote Islamophobia and damage the reputation of Islam. And we ourselves are trying to damage one another's reputation and frighten people of one another.
translation.ha: Ina kiran manyan malamai, masana da ‘yan siyasar duniyar musulmi, da su nesanci maganganun da za su haifar da rarrabuwan kai tsakanin musulmi. A halin yanzu akwai wasu mutane da suke kashe makudan kudade don sanya tsoron Musulunci a cikin zukatan duniya, don su bakanta fuskar Musulunci a duniya, amma sai mu kuma mu zo muna kokarin bakanta junanmu da bata sunan junanmu, muna tsorata junanmu!

translation.en: This is against wisdom and politics.
translation.ha: Lalle hakan ya saba wa hikima da siyasa.

translation.en: I have heard that some regional governments have based their foreign policy on confronting Iran. Why should they do this?
translation.ha: Na ji cewa wasu gwamnatocin yankin nan, sun tsara siyasarsu ta waje bisa tushen adawa da kuma fada da Iran. Don me?

translation.en: This is against reason.
translation.ha: Lalle wannan wauta ce.

translation.en: Why should someone make such a great mistake?
translation.ha: Me ya sa mutum zai aikata irin wannan gagarumin kuskure?

translation.en: On the contrary, we have based our foreign policy on camaraderie, brotherhood and friendly relationship with all Muslim and regional countries, whether those which are our neighbors and those which are not.
translation.ha: Mu kan sabanin hakan, mu mun gina siyasar wajen mu ce bisa tushen abokantaka da ‘yan'uwantaka da kulla alaka da dukkanin kasashen musulmi da kasashen yankin nan, kama daga makwabta da wadanda ma ba makwabtan ba.

translation.en: This is our policy.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce siyasar mu.

translation.en: We have acted in the same way until now and we will act in the same way in the future.
translation.ha: Mun aikata hakan a aikace, a nan gaba ma haka za mu ci gaba da yi.

translation.en: Thankfully today, the people of Iran have gained such a deep awareness that they know the future interest of their country depends on Islamic unity with other Muslim nations and countries.
translation.ha: A yau alhamdu lillahi al'ummar Iran sun sami irin wannan basirar, wannan wayewa da masaniyar da ta sanya su fahimtar cewa maslahar makomar kasarsu tana cikin hadin kai na Musulunci. Hadin kai da al'ummar musulmi da sauran kasashe na daban.

translation.en: Of course, some people are trying very hard to create obstacles in the way of this unity, to arouse suspicions and to temp the people, but our people have thankfully understood this today.
translation.ha: Koda yake akwai wasu mutane da suke kokari ba dare ba rana wajen haifar da matsala, su sanya yanayin rashin yarda da sanya waswasi, to amma alhamdu lillahi al'ummarmu a yau sun fahimci hakan.

translation.en: The cry of our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) - both before the victory of the Revolution and after the formation of the Islamic government - about the issue of unity paid off and our people became aware.
translation.ha: Wannan kira zuwa ga hadin kai da marigayi Imam Khumaini yayi- tun kafin nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci, haka nan kuma bayan kafa gwamnatin Musulunci - ya yi aikinsa, al'ummarmu ta fahimci inda aka sa gaba. Wannan nauyi ne da ke wuyan kowa.

translation.en: Today, all Muslims throughout the world should think about the Islamic Ummah and Islamic unity.
translation.ha: A yau wajibi ne dukkan musulmi, a duk inda suke, su zamanto masu tunanin al'ummar musulmi da hadin kansu.

translation.en: If we think of the Islamic Ummah, the interests of our countries will be safeguarded as well.
translation.ha: Idan har muka zamanto masu damuwa da halin da al'ummar musulmi suke ciki, to kuwa tabbas za a iya lamunce manufofin kasashenmu.

translation.en: His interest lies in attacking one country and raising an army with the help of another country.
translation.ha: Su kai wa wancan kasar hari, su ba wa wancan taimako; maslaharsu tana cikin hakan ne.

translation.en: We should not allow him to do this.
translation.ha: Bai kamata mu bar hakan ta faru ba.

translation.en: Who is the enemy?
translation.ha: Wane ne makiyi?

translation.en: The enemy is American capitalism and global arrogance which is headed today by America and the Zionists.
translation.ha: Makiyi dai shi jari hujjar Amurka da ma'abota girman kan duniya wanda a yau suke karkashin jagoranci Amurka da sahyoniyawa.

translation.en: The Zionist government in occupied Palestine is part of the dangerous group and the deadly cancer which the Zionists have created in the world.
translation.ha: Gwamnatin sahyoniya a Palastinu da aka mamaye wani bangare ne na wannan cutar kansa mai halakarwa da sahyoniyawan suka samar a duniya.

translation.en: We should stand up against them.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a tsaya kyam wajen tinkararsu.

translation.en: We should refer to Islam and Quranic texts in order to stand up against them.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne mu koma ga Musulunci da koyarwa Alkur'ani wajen fada da su.

translation.en: Sometimes, one takes a look at some writings and sees that some people write certain things which are not based on Quranic ayahs.
translation.ha: A wasu lokuta mutum ya kan ga wasu rubuce-rubuce, a wasu lokuta a kan samu wasu suna fadi da kuma rubuta wasu abubuwa wadanda babu su cikin ayoyin Alkur'ani.

translation.en: The Holy Quran says, "Say you: â€˜We believe in Allah, and the revelation given to us, and to Ibrahim, Isma'il, Isaac, Jacob, and the Tribes, and that given to Moses and Jesus, and that given to all prophets from their Lord'" [The Holy Quran, 2: 136].
translation.ha: Alkur'ani yana fadin cewa: "Ka ce: Mun yi imani da Allah, da abin da aka saukar zuwa gare mu, da abin da aka saukar zuwa ga Ibrahim da Isma'il da Ishaka da Ya'akubu da Jikoki da abin da aka bai wa Musa da Isa, da abin da aka bai wa Annabawa...."

translation.en: After the Holy Quran speaks about the conditions that Muslims should believe in, it says, "So if they believe as you believe, they are indeed on the right path" [The Holy Quran, 2: 137].
translation.ha: (Suratul Bakara 2:136), bayan da ya ambaci dukkanin wadannan shari'oi da suka gabata, wanda wajibi ne musulmi su yi imani da su. daga nan sai ya ce: "To, idan sun yi imani da misalin abin da kuka yi imani da shi, to, lalle ne sun shiryu".

translation.en: Islam does not believe in pluralism.
translation.ha: Musulunci dai bai yarda da yawaitar addinai ba.

translation.en: Those who promote the idea that Islam believes in pluralism because it has praised Hazrat Moses and Hazrat Jesus should refer to the Holy Quran and Islamic texts. They put forward this idea without enough information and out of ignorance.
translation.ha: Lalle ya kamata mutanen da suke fadin cewa Musulunci ya yarda da hakan saboda yana girmamawa da kuma jinjinawa Annabi Isa da Musa, lalle ya kamata su koma su yi nazarin karantarwar Musulunci. Suna fadin wasu maganganu ne kawai bisa rashin masaniya da gafala.

translation.en: This is Islam: "So if they believe as you believe, they are indeed on the right path. But if they turn back, it is they who are in schism, but Allah will suffice you as against them" [The Holy Quran, 2: 137].
translation.ha: To wannan dai shi ne Musulunci: "To, idan sun yi imani da misalin abin da kuka yi imani da shi, to, lalle ne sun shiryu, kuma idan sun juya da baya, to, suna a cikin sabani kawai, saboda haka, Allah zai isar maka a gare su" (Suratul Bakara 2:137).

translation.en: This is the meaning of the Holy Quran.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce ma'anar Alkur'ani mai girma.

translation.en: To the believers is he most kind and merciful" [The Holy Quran, 9: 128].
translation.ha: Sannan a tsakanin musulmi kuma ya kasance "abin da zai cuce ku yana damunsa" (Suratut Tauba 9:128).

translation.en: He is kind to believers and "those who are with him are strong against unbelievers, but compassionate amongst each other" [The Holy Quran, 48: 29].
translation.ha: Ya kasance mai tausayi ga muminai. Amma "Masu tsanani ne a kan kafirai, masu rahama ne a tsakaninsu" (Suratul Fat'h 48:29).

translation.en: You should be strong against those who show enmity to you and who are your enemies. You should be firm against them. You should not be like a soft earthwork which the enemy can infiltrate easily.
translation.ha: Ku kasance masu tsanani ga wadanda suke kiyayya da ku, wadanda suke a matsayin makiyanku; wato ku zamanto masu tsanani a gare su, kada ku zamanto masu taushi ta yadda a duk lokacin da makiya suke so za su iya kutsa ku.

translation.en: You should stand firm against the enemy, but you should be compassionate among yourselves.
translation.ha: Ku zamanto a tsaye da kafafunku, to amma kuma "masu rahama ne a tsakaninsu".

translation.en: You should be honest with and kind to one another.
translation.ha: Ku zamanto masu so da tausayawa junanku.

translation.en: This is one of the lessons of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.).
translation.ha: Kada kan iyakoki su sanya ku fada da junanku. Wadannan wasu ne daga cikin darussan rayuwar Ma'aiki.

translation.en: Today - which is the birthday anniversary of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) - we should learn his lessons.
translation.ha: Yau dai, wacce ran ace ta haihuwar Annabi (s.a.w.a), yana da kyau mu dau darasi daga rayuwarsa.

translation.en: Mere praise of that great personality is not the only thing that is expected of us today. We should learn his lessons.
translation.ha: Jinjinawa da bayanin rayuwar Ma'aiki, bai wadatar ba. Wajibi ne mu dau darasi daga rayuwarsa.

translation.en: I hope that Allah the Exalted helps us to succeed in doing what we say.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba wa dukkaninmu dacewar aiki da abin da muke fadi.

translation.en: Dear God, make the world of Islam and the Islamic Ummah stronger and more successful on a daily basis.
translation.ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka kara ba wa al'ummar musulmi karfi da daukaka a kullum.

translation.en: Leader’s Speech to Members of Assembly of Experts - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da 'Yan Majalisar Kwararru

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on March 8, 2012 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with the chairman and members of the Assembly of Experts.
translation.ha: Shimfida: A ranar Alhamis 8, Maris 2012 ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da shugaba da sauran membobin majalisar kwararru ta jagoranci ta Iran bayan taronsu na kwanaki biyu da suka gudanar. Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran ya yi ne:

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I would like to welcome the honorable gentlemen, the esteemed members of the Islamic Republic’s Assembly of Experts.
translation.ha: Ina wa malamai masu girma, 'yan majalisar kwararru na tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci masu girma barka da zuwa.

translation.en: I would also like to express my gratitude to the gentlemen who made certain points in this meeting, which shows that they are sensitive to the domestic issues and events and that they feel responsible towards the future of the country.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma ina mika godiya ta dangane da batutuwan da malamai suka gabatar a wannan zaman wanda hakan yana nuni da irin yadda suke ba wa lamurran da suke faruwa a kasar nan da kuma makomar kasar nan muhimmanci.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted will help all of us make efforts with pure intentions in order to fulfill the responsibilities that have been placed on our shoulders.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba ku dacewa sannan kuma ya taimaka wa dukkainmu wajen iya sauke nauyin da ke wuyanmu gaba daya cikin tsarkin niyya.

translation.en: However, all of us should make efforts â€“ no matter where we work â€“ to move things forward. Before discussing the points I have written down, I deem it necessary to thank our honorable people for their timely and highly effective presence in the parliamentary elections.
translation.ha: Ina ganin wajibi ne kafin in fadi abubuwan da nake son fadi, wadanda na rubuta su, in mika godiya da kuma jinjinawa ga al'ummarmu masu girma sakamakon wannan fitowar da suka yi a daidai lokacin da ake bukatar a lokacin zaben da aka gudanar.

translation.en: Anybody who knows what efforts the enemies made during the past few months in order to discourage the people from voting on the 12th of Esfand, anybody who knows how much money they spent, anybody who knows how many people they recruited, anybody who knows how many plots they designed, anybody who knows how hard they tried in their think tanks to influence our people’s thoughts and actions with their carefully prepared statements, should know how great the achievement of the people was and how great the popular movement was.
translation.ha: Kowa dai ya ga irin kokarin da makiya suka yi tsawon wadannan watanni wajen ganin sun dushe hasken ranar 12 ga watan Esfand (ranar da aka gudanar da zaben 'yan majalisa), ku dubi irin kudaden da suka kashe da kuma irin tsare-tsare da kulle-kulle da nufin isar da su zuwa ga mutane don su yi tasiri cikin zukatan su (da hana su fitowa zaben), don sun san irin girman da ke cikin ayyukan da mutane suke yi da kuma yunkurin da suke yi.

translation.en: First, it is necessary to be thankful to God because these things are the result of God’s will, mercy and grace.
translation.ha: Da farko dai wajibi ne in gode wa Allah, don kuwa hakan ya samo asali ne daga wajensa da kuma irin irada da karfi da rahama da falalarsa.

translation.en: Second, it is necessary to thank the people with all one’s heart and soul because divine blessings do not come to a particular country and its people without good reasons.
translation.ha: Sannan kuma wajibi ne in mutum ya gode wa mutane da dukkan karfinsa, don kuwa ba haka kawai Allah ya ke ba wa wani mutum ko wata al'umma ko wata kasa irin wannan rahama ta Ubangiji ba.

translation.en: We pray to God, “Dear God, I ask You for the requirements of Your mercy.”We should prepare the ground for divine blessings and then we will be showered with divine grace and blessings. Our people prepared the ground for divine blessings.
translation.ha: A cikin addu'a (Du'a Kumayl) muna karanta cewa: "Ya Allah ina rokonka abubuwan da suke saukar da rahamarka", a saboda haka wajibi ne mu samar da abubuwan da za su samar da rahamar Ubangiji, a irin wannan yanayi ne ruwan rahama da falalar Ubangiji za su sauko a kanmu.

translation.en: The presence of the people on the scene, their resistance in the face of the enemies’ attacks, their insight and other such characteristics prepared the ground for divine blessings.
translation.ha: Fitowar mutane cikin fage, irin tsayin dakan da suka yi a gaban makiya, irin basirarsu, dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne da suke saukar da rahamar Ubangiji.

translation.en: And we are truly grateful to our people and we hope that Allah the Exalted will fully reward them.
translation.ha: A saboda haka muna gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki, haka nan kuma muna gode wa al'ummarmu masu girma sannan kuma ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya ba su cikakkiyar ladar wannan aiki da suka yi.

translation.en: The first point that I would like to discuss is related to the issue of elections.
translation.ha: Abubuwan da nake son fadi, suna da alaka ne da wannan batu na zabe.

translation.en: First of all, elections are an important pillar of the Islamic system.
translation.ha: Da farko dai zabe wani rukuni ne mai muhimmanci na wannan tsari.

translation.en: Religious democracy is founded on elections.
translation.ha: Tsarin demokradiyya na addini ya dogara ne da zabe.

translation.en: Without elections, there will be no democracy.
translation.ha: Ba tare da zabe ba, ba za a taba samun demokradiyya ba.

translation.en: Elections are the standard of relying on the people: a concrete, tangible and measurable standard.
translation.ha: Mizanin dogaro da yardar mutane, wani mizani ne da ake ganinsa da kuma auna shi, shi ne kuwa wannan zaben.

translation.en: Therefore, anybody who firmly believes in the Islamic system considers taking part in the elections as his responsibility. Such a person takes part in the elections even though he might have objections about certain things, about a particular election or about a particular form of elections.
translation.ha: A saboda haka duk wani mutumin da ya yi imani da tsari Musulunci, sannan kuma da gaske yake, to kuwa yana ganin fitowa lokacin zabe a matsayin wani nauyi da ke wuyansa; ko da kuwa yana da wani korafi kan wani abu, yana da korafi kan wani bangare na zabe, to amma duk da irin wannan korafin ya kan shigo cikin zabe.

translation.en: This is a responsibility.
translation.ha: Wannan wani nauyi ne da ke wuyanmu.

translation.en: Therefore, all those who entered the arena of elections throughout the country fulfilled this obligatory responsibility. They carried out their duty. They showed their accurate understanding.
translation.ha: A saboda haka dukkanin mutanen da suka shigo wannan fagen a duk fadin kasar nan, sun yi aiki ne da wannan wajibin; sun sauke wannan nauyin da ke wuyansu, sun bayyanar da irin ingantacciyar fahimtar da suke da ita.

translation.en: This accurate understanding shows that the issue of elections is about a pillar of the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Irin wannan ingantacciyar fahimta lamari ne da ke nuni da cewa lamarin zabe, wani rukuni ne na wannan tsarin.

translation.en: We cannot stop voting simply because we have objections to certain individuals or certain things.
translation.ha: Babu yadda za mu iya kau da kai daga wannan lamarin kawai saboda muna da wani korafi kan Malam Zaidu ko Malam Amru ba, ko kuma saboda dalili kaza da dalili kaza ba.

translation.en: Such objections are not a good reason to stop voting. This is an essential point.
translation.ha: Lalle bai kamata wannan korafin ya hana mu shiga zabe ba; wannan shi ne lamari na asasi kuma na asali.

translation.en: Elections are like an awakening slap across the face of the individuals who wallow in their illusions and fantasies.
translation.ha: A saboda haka zabe yana a matsayin wani lamari ne mai farkawa da kuma jan kunnen mutanen da suke cikin irin wannan yanayi na mafarki da yaudara; mutanen da suke cikin yanayi na mafarki da mummunan zato dangane da makomar wannan tsari, dangane da asalin tsarin, dangane da mutane, dangane da kasar nan da kuma makiya.

translation.en: Two days ago, I heard the American President has said that they are not thinking of going to war with Iran.
translation.ha: Kwanaki biyun da suka gabata mun ji shugaban kasar Amurka yana fadin cewa mu dai ba ma tunanin yin yaki da Iran.

translation.en: This is an illusion. The exit from illusion in the case of not going to war is good, but remaining under an illusion regarding the sanctions will harm them.
translation.ha: To wannan fita daga cikin irin wannan mafarki a bangaren farko lamari ne mai kyau, to amma ci gaba da zama cikin wannan yanayin a bangare na biyu lamari ne da zai cutar da su.

translation.en: When a person builds his calculations on illusions rather than realities, it is obvious that he will fail in his plans that are based on these calculations. And this is what they are doing.
translation.ha: A lokacin da lissafin mutum ya kasance bisa irin wannan mafarki da zato, wato bai ginu bisa tushe na hakika ba, to kuwa za su sha kashi cikin dukkanin tsare-tsaren da aka gina su bisa wannan lissafin.

translation.en: They said the purpose of the so-called crippling sanctions was to separate the people from the Islamic system, but they saw that the people went to the ballot boxes and voted for the Islamic system.
translation.ha: Lalle haka lamarin yake. To yanzu dai shekara guda kenan suka sanya wannan takunkumi da suke kira mai ruguzawa da dai sauran maganganun da suke fadi - ko da yake shekaru talatin kenan da wannan takunkumin - suna fadin cewa manufar hakan ita ce raba mutane da wannan tsarin; to amma sai ga shi jama'a sun fito, sun kada kuri'arsu ga wannan tsari na Musulunci.

translation.en: Every vote for any candidate is a vote for the Islamic system. The people proved this.
translation.ha: Kada kuri'a ga duk wani dan takara, fitowa don kada kuri'a, kada kuri'a ne ga wannan tsari na Musulunci; wannan shi ne abin da mutane suka nuna.

translation.en: I described elections as a slap: there are different kinds of slaps. One of kind of slap is awakening â€“ it has an awakening effect. This parliamentary election was of this kind.
translation.ha: A baya na fadi cewa zabe dai wani bugu ne (ga makiya); to akwai nauoi daban-daban na wannan bugun. Daya daga cikin bugun, shi ne bugu mai farkawa, mai jan kunne.

translation.en: The second point â€“ which I mentioned in passing earlier â€“ is that elections show that the people trust the government.
translation.ha: Batu na biyu wanda kuma an yi ishara da shi, shi ne cewa zabe wata alama ce da ke nuni da yardar mutane ga wannan tsarin.

translation.en: After the controversial and eventful elections of the year 1388, certain people predicted that the people would lose their trust in the government and that they would no longer go to the ballot boxes to vote.
translation.ha: Bayan zaben da ke cike da kace-nace na shekara ta 2009 (zaben shugaban kasa na Iran) wasu sun fadi cewa an rasa irin wannan yardar da mutane suke da ita ga wannan tsarin; shi kenan mutane ba za su sake fitowa don kada kuri'unsu ba.

translation.en: This election was a decisive and clear response to this wrong assumption and inference.
translation.ha: To wannan zaben, wata amsa ce da take a fili ga wannan zato da ke cike da kuskure, ga wannan sakamako da aka cimma da ke cike da kuskure.

translation.en: They showed that they are committed to the Islamic system. They showed that they trust the Islamic system. They showed that they will enter the arena and respond to the government’s call which invites them to determine the plans through the ballot boxes.
translation.ha: Sun tabbatar musu da cewa lalle suna ci gaba da riko da wannan tsarin, sun yarda da shi, sun amsa kiransa na a fito a yi zabe, ku fito ku kada kuri'unku, sannan kuma sun fito din sun kada kuri'un na su.

translation.en: As I said, every vote is in fact a vote for the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda muka fadi, kowane guda daga cikin kuri'ar da za a kada, a hakikanin gaskiya kuri'ar yarda ce ga wannan tsarin na Musulunci.

translation.en: The vast majority of the people who stepped into the arena gave rise to one of the highest turnout rates over the past 33 years.
translation.ha: Wadannan jama'ar da suka fito, wanda hakan daya ne daga cikin zabubbukan da jama'a suka fi fitowa tsawon tarihin zabubbukan da muka gudanar cikin wadannan shekaru talatin da uku ne, shi din ma bayan gushewar shekaru talatin da uku, lalle hakan lamari ne da ke nuni da irin cikakkiyar yardar da suke da ita (ne ga wannan tsarin).

translation.en: The people entered the arena of elections after having analyzed the situation. They had their own analyses. You saw that whoever was asked why he or she had taken part in the election â€“ including the youth who were voting for the first time as well as old men and women â€“ he or she would present a reason and an analysis.
translation.ha: Ku din nan kun ga yadda mutane kama daga wadannan matasa ‘yan bana daya (wadanda wannan shi ne karon farko da suka kada kuri'arsu) har zuwa ga wadannan tsoffin maza da mata, kowane guda daga cikinsu da ka tambaya kan me yasa ya fito kada kuri'a, zai gaya maka tasa mahangar ce; kowa yana fadin nasa dalilin, ba wai kawai cewa shi kenan tun da dai ana zabe shi kenan ni ma zan fito in kada kuri'ar ta ba ne.

translation.en: No, they would explain why they were voting.
translation.ha: A'a, kowanensu yana fadin dalilin fitowarsa zaben: suna fadin cewa saboda makiyanmu sun dana mana tarko, suna nan tamkar kurar da take cikin yunwa tana jiran dako, wanda insha Allahu a wani lokacin na daban zan yi karin haske kan irin yadda suka dana tarko da kuma jiran dakon yin farauta da kama dabbar da suke so kamar yadda suke zato, ko da yake ba su san cewa zaki ne yake jiransu ba, wanda ba za a iya kama shi ba.

translation.en: This is a very important point.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu hakan lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: Another point that is related to this election is that the Majlis that has emerged out of this election has a heavy responsibility to shoulder.
translation.ha: Wani lamari kuma da ke tattare da wannan zaben, shi ne cewa majalisar da za a kafa sakamakon wannan zaben tana da gagarumin nauyi a wuyanta.

translation.en: This is always the case.
translation.ha: A koda yaushe haka lamarin ya ke.

translation.en: Any elected government official at any level has a responsibility that is as important as the election through which they were elected. The Majlis that will be formed will have to shoulder a heavy responsibility considering current conditions, the uproar that the enemy has cause and the presence of the people in this arena.
translation.ha: Shugabanninmu wadanda mutane ne suka zaban su, duk wani jami'i a ko ina yake wanda jama'a suka zaba, gwargwadon irin nauyin da zaben yake da shi gwargwadon irin nauyin da ke wuyansa. A irin wannan yanayin, da irin wannan ihu bayan harin da makiya suke yi ga kuma wannan fitowar da mutane suka yi wajen kada kuir'arsu, don haka majalisar da za a kafa a nan gaba, za ta kasance majalisa ce da take da gagarumin nauyi a wuyanta.

translation.en: The brothers and sisters who will come together to form this Majlis in the near future â€“ both the ones who have already been elected and the ones who will be elected during the second round â€“ should know what a heavy responsibility has been placed on their shoulders.
translation.ha: Saboda haka tun daga yanzu nake kiran wadannan ‘yan'uwa maza da mata wadanda za su shigo majalisar insha Allahu - wato wadanda ya zuwa yanzu aka zabe su da kuma wadanda za a zaba a zagaye na biyu na zaben - da cewa lalle ya kamata su fahimci irin nauyi mai girman da ke wuyansu.

translation.en: They should come and fulfill their responsibilities with wisdom and acumen.
translation.ha: Su zo su gudanar da ayyukansu cikin hikima da hangen nesa.

translation.en: The country is as important as the laws that are passed.
translation.ha: Muhimmancin kasa yana cikin irin dokokin da kasar take da su ne.

translation.en: In all areas, we need laws that can remove the obstacles.
translation.ha: Muna bukatar samar da dokoki masu bude hanya (masu magance matsaloli) a dukkan fagage.

translation.en: Members of the Majlis should look at the realities on the ground. They should identify the needs and on the basis of the needs they have identified, they should provide our government officials with the appropriate legal solutions.
translation.ha: ‘Yan majalisa su kalli hakikanin abin da ke gudana a kasa, su fahimci bukatar da ake da ita, sannan gwargwadon wannan bukatar su samar mata da irin maganin da take bukata ta bangaren dokoki.

translation.en: The laws that are passed should remove the obstacles. A law that creates obstacles and blocks the paths, a law that cannot be implemented, a law that creates many problems, a law that contradicts itself â€“ such laws are useless.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne doka ta zamanto mai bude hanya. Dokar da take rufe hanya, wacce take kara matsaloli ko kuma ta zamanto wacce ba za a iya gudanar da ita ba, ko kuma take kara matsalolin da ake da su ko kuma ta zamanto mai karo da juna, to irin wannan dokar ba ta da wani amfani.

translation.en: They should both be careful and just.
translation.ha: Su zamanto masu lura sosai sannan kuma su zamanto masu adalci.

translation.en: I do not advise them to be extremely careful at the cost of causing injustice in certain cases.
translation.ha: Mu dai ba wai za mu ba su shawarar su zamanto masu lura sosai ba ne, duk kuwa da cewa a wasu lokuta a kan ga irin wannan rashin lura da kuma rashin adalcin.

translation.en: They should be careful, but at the same time they should also observe justice.
translation.ha: Su lura sosai tare kuma da yin adalci.

translation.en: They should move forward in an intelligent and sincere way. Sincerity is indeed the basis.
translation.ha: Su gudanar da ayyukansu cikin hikima, tare da ikhlasi (tsarkin zuciya).

translation.en: Mr. Mahdavi rightly pointed out in his statements that the weight and influence of Imam Khomeini’s (r.a.) words and plans was mostly due to his sincerity.
translation.ha: Mai girma Sheikh Mahdawi (shugaban majalisar kwararrun) cikin jawabin da ya gabatar ya bayyana cewar irin tasirin da maganganun Imam suka yi da kuma samun nasarar aiwatar da abubuwan da Imam ya tsara sun samo asali ne saboda irin ikhlasin da yake da shi.

translation.en: Yes, he was a truly sincere man. He was the embodiment of sincerity.
translation.ha: Alal hakika haka lamarin yake; Lalle shi ya kasance mutum ne mai ikhlasi, samuwarsa cike take da ikhlasi.

translation.en: If there is sincerity, our duties will be carried out successfully.
translation.ha: Matukar dai muka zamanto muna da ikhlasi, to kuwa ayyukanmu za su ci gaba.

translation.en: The government officials in the judiciary and the Majlis, the clergy and those who are in the military or different other organizations should know that what is necessary is to identify our obligations and work hard to fulfill our obligations: we must not let other considerations affect our work.
translation.ha: Lalle haka lamarin yake. A hakikanin gaskiya a lokacin da mutum ya kalli irin yawan aikin da aka aikata daga kurkusa da kuma irin kayan aikin da ake da shi da kuma wahalar da ke cikin aikin, to ko shakka babu zai jinjinawa wadannan mutane daga cikin zuciyarsa.

translation.en: Of course, I would like to take this opportunity to thank the officials in charge of the elections. Mr. Yazdi pointed out that the Guardian Council has been thanked for its efforts.
translation.ha: A nan ina sanar da mai girma Sheikh Jannati (shugaban majalisar kula da kundin tsarin mulki) da sauran abokan aikinsa cewa a hakikanin gaskiya a duk lokacin da na tuna da irin girman aikin da kuke yi, lalle na kan girmama ku da kuma jinjina muku.

translation.en: I prayed many times to Allah the Exalted to give more strength to all those who are in charge the elections: members of Assembly of Experts, the government, the Ministry of Interior, the officials in charge of security matters who managed to ensure the security of the elections, the officials in charge of public relations, the IRIB and others.
translation.ha: A lokuta da dama na kan yi addu'ar cewa Allah ya ba su karfi da iyawa wajen gudanar da wannan aiki, su kansu haka nan kuma ga gwamnati da ma'aikatar cikin gida, haka nan jami'an tsaro wadanda suka sami damar tabbatar da tsaro a lokacin zaben, haka nan jami'an bangaren isar da sako, wato hukumar gidan radiyo da talabijin da sauransu.

translation.en: What they did was truly great and outstanding. They managed to carry out this great duty and this heavy and vital work in the best possible way.
translation.ha: A hakikanin gaskiya sun gudanar da ayyuka masu girma; sun sami nasarar aiwatar da wannan aiki mai girma da muhimmanci ta hanyar da tafi dacewa.

translation.en: Islamic democracy is our paradigm.
translation.ha: To wannan shi ne abin koyin mu; abin koyi na tsarin demokradiyya na Musulunci.

translation.en: In Islamic democracy, Islam is the essence and the soul. There must be no deviations from Islam.
translation.ha: A tsarin demokradiyya na Musulunci, tushe da asalin abubuwa daga Musulunci suke; bai kamata a yi kuskure cikin hakan ba.

translation.en: When drafting laws and when assigning individuals to different positions, our standard should be Islam.
translation.ha: A wajen kafa dokoki, wajen zaban mutane, Musulunci shi ne mizaninmu.

translation.en: The framework and the method of management is democracy.
translation.ha: Yanayin aiki, tsarin aikin da kuma yanayin gudanarwa, dukkaninku tsarin demokradiyya ne; wato mutane ne wadanda suke shigowa cikin fage; alhali suna masu riko da Musulunci da dukkan karfinsu, duk kuwa da cewa mai yiyuwa ne saboda irin shigarsu ta zahiri ba za a yi zaton cewa suna riko da Musulunci da kuma tsarin Musulunci ba; to amma a hakikanin gaskiya suna riko da shi, lalle suna son Musulunci.

translation.en: Islam is still the essence and content of the movement of our system and democracy is the form and the framework.
translation.ha: A ko da yaushe Musulunci ya kasance tushe sannan kuma mabubbuga ta asali ta yunkuri wannan tsari na mu; yanayinsa kuma yanayi ne na demokradiyya, ba kuma za a iya taba raba su ba.

translation.en: That is to say, democracy itself originates from Islam.
translation.ha: Wato shi kansa wannan tsari na demokradiyyar ya samo asali ne daga Musulunci.

translation.en: It is wrong to say that we have learnt democracy from westerners.
translation.ha: Abin da wasu suke fadi na cewa mun koyo tsarin demokradiyya ne daga wajen kasashen yammaci lalle hakan kuskure ne.

translation.en: The exterior form is the same, but our democracy has its roots in a different kind of religious understanding and a different world view.
translation.ha: Yanayinsu na zahiri daya ne; to amma tsarin demokradiyyarmu ya samo asali ne daga wani tushe da masaniya ta addini da kuma wata mahanga ta daban da abin da suke fadi.

translation.en: We believe that there must be respect for human beings.
translation.ha: Mu muna girmama dan'adam, muna girmama ra'ayinsu, muna ganin kasantuwarsu a fage a matsayin wata hanya ta cimma manufofi na Ubangiji ne, sannan ba za a iya cimma hakan ba in ba ta wannan hanyar ba.

translation.en: Westerners act in a different way. Of course, we have our own frameworks and they have their own frameworks, but their frameworks are oppressive.
translation.ha: Na'am muna da wasu tsare-tsare da wannan demokradiyyar ta mu ta ginu a kansu, haka nan su ma suna da na su, tushen na su kuwa tushe ne na zalunci.

translation.en: Even if we assume that the event is not fictitious, even if we assume that it is a true story, is it a crime to deny a true historical event?
translation.ha: Kai idan ma muka dauka hakan ba wani saci fadi ba ne, a'a wani lamari ne ma wanda ya faru cikin tarihi, to a ina inkarin wani lamari da ya faru cikin tarihi ya zamanto laifi?

translation.en: If a person is not convinced of the truth of the Holocaust and he denies the story or expresses doubt about it, he is thrown into prison.
translation.ha: Idan har lamarin bai tabbata wa wani ba don haka ne ya yi inkari ko kuma ya yi shakku kan hakan shi kenan sai a kai shi gidan yari!

translation.en: This is what they are doing in the European countries that claim to be civilized.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu haka lamarin ya ke a kasashen da suke ikirarin wayewa da ci gaba na Turai: idan wani mutum ya nuna rashin amincewa, ya yi shakku, ya ki amincewa shi kenan sai kotu ta daure shi; amma sai kuma ga shi a lokacin da aka ci mutumcin Manzon tsira, wannan fitaccen mutum tsawon tarihi a fili, a ci mutumcin wani abin girmamawa na wasu mutane musulmi biliyan guda, to amma babu wani da ya ke da hakkin ya fito ya nuna rashin amincewarsa ya ce me ya sa za ku aikata hakan.

translation.en: This is their framework: if somebody wears hijab to university or work, she becomes a criminal.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne tushensu.

translation.en: It goes against correct human understanding.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne tushen demokradiyyarsu, wanda tushe ne da ke cike da kuskure, wanda ya saba wa fidira ta dan'adam da kuma ingantacciyar fahimta ta dan'adam.

translation.en: We believe that it is necessary to stand up against these deviations.
translation.ha: Mu mun yi imani da cewa wajibi ne a yi fada da wadannan kauce wa hanya, wajibi ne a samo hanyar tafiyar da rayuwa daga Musulunci da Alkur'ani da koyarwa da wahayi na Ubangiji.

translation.en: This is religious democracy.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne demokradiyya ta addini.

translation.en: This is our paradigm.
translation.ha: Sannan kuma wannan shi ne abin koyin mu.

translation.en: If Muslim nations are interested in what the Islamic Republic has to say and what its claims are, they should know that we will not abandon Islam. We believe that it is obligatory to observe divine command and sharia in all of our daily life affairs and our efforts are focused on achieving this goal.
translation.ha: Idan har al'ummomin musulmi suna son sanin abin da Jamhuriyar Musulunci take fadi da kuma abin da take son cimmawa, su san cewa wadannan su ne abin da muke kira zuwa gare su: mu ba za mu taba yin watsi da Musulunci ba; za mu ci gaba da bin hukumce-hukumcen Ubangiji da shari'a ta Ubangiji wadda shari'a ce ta Musulunci cikin dukkanin lamurran rayuwarmu; dukkanin kokarin da muke yi shi ne mu kai ga Musulunci.

translation.en: And religious democracy is our framework in this arena.
translation.ha: Siga da kuma hanyar da muke bi wajen shiga wannan fage shi ne kuwa tsarin demokradiyya na addini.

translation.en: The people should step in and vote.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne mutane su fito su yi zabe.

translation.en: It is the people who should elect those who are supposed to implement the laws.
translation.ha: Mutane su ne za su zabi masu kafa doka.

translation.en: Everything is decided by the people with honor and dignity.
translation.ha: Masu gudanar da dokar ma wajibi ya zamana mutane ne za su zabe su.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted makes us successful in following this path and protecting ourselves against deviations.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba mu dacewar ci gaba da tafiya a kan wannan tafarki da kyau, ya kare mu daga kauce wa hanya, don mu sami damar isa ga wannan babbar manufa sannan kuma mu zamanto cikin addu'oin mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi).

translation.en: Leader’s Speech to Teachers and Graduates of Mahdaviat - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Malamai Da Marubuta Kan Akidar Mahdi

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on July 9, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with teachers and graduates of Mahdaviat [faith in the re-appearance of the last Shia Imam, Imam Mahdi (a.s.)].
translation.ha: Shimfida: Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya yi ne a ranar 9, Yulin 2011, a yayin ganawa da malamai da marubuta a fagen akidar Imam Mahdi (a.s):

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: First of all, I would like to thank all the brothers and sisters who are working on different areas - including daily prayers, zakat, exegesis, Mahdaviat and all the other areas that Mr. Qara'ati spoke about.
translation.ha: Da farko ina mika godiya ta ga dukkanin 'yan'uwa maza da mata da suke gudanar da ayyuka da kuma kokarin su a fagage daban-daban; shin bangaren da ya shafi salla ne ko zakka ko tafsiri ko akidar Imam Mahdi ko kuma sauran bangarorin da Sheikh Kara'ati ya yi bayaninsu.

translation.en: All these areas are important and necessary. By Allah's favor, working on these areas is indeed a genuine charitable act that will be accepted by Allah the Exalted.
translation.ha: Dukkanin wadannan ayyuka ne masu muhimmanci, ayyuka ne na wajibi sannan kuma alal hakika aiki a wadannan bangarori wata ciyarwa ce ta hakika sannan kuma sadaka ce abar karbuwa a wajen Allah Madaukakin Sarki, insha Allahu.

translation.en: I would also like to thank everybody who has attended this meeting, especially Mr. Qara'ati.
translation.ha: Ina mika godiya ta ga kowa da kowa, musamman ma ga mai girma Sheikh Kara'ati wanda wajibi ne in gode masa.

translation.en: We cannot really thank them because their efforts are for the sake of God and hopefully God will reward them for their efforts, but we should also appreciate their work.
translation.ha: Ba ma wai godiya ba, saboda aiki ne na Ubangiji, saboda Allah, da yardar Ubangiji, Allah zai gode masa shi da abokan aikinsa, to amma wajibi ne mu jinjina musu.

translation.en: Now I would like to make a few points in the company of you dear brothers and sisters.
translation.ha: Lalle akwai wadansu abubuwa da na ke son sanar da 'yan'uwa maza da mata, wadanda su ne cewa:

translation.en: Mr. Qara'ati is an exemplary person. First of all, the issues that he followed up were among the shortcomings that existed in the country.
translation.ha: Da farko dai irin ayyukan da yake gudanarwa da kansa, wadanda yake kokarin aiwatar da su, dukkaninsu cike gurbin gibin da ake da shi ne; wanda hakan lamari ne mai kimar gaske.

translation.en: If somebody manages to identify the needs and tries to fill the gaps, his efforts are highly valuable. This is how Mr. Qara'ati has acted.
translation.ha: Amma a lokacin da wani mutum ya sami damar gano bukatun da ake da su da kuma gibin da ake da shi sannan kuma ya yi gagarumar himma wajen ganin an cike wannan gibin, to kimar da ke cikin wannan aikin ya kan karu.

translation.en: Zakat was not really discussed in our society and the fact that it used to be sidelined was a weakness and a shortcoming. But he stepped into the arena and made determined efforts. He went to different places, spoke to different people, urged everybody to take action and worked tirelessly until he managed to address this problem.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu hakan wani gibi ne mai girman gaske - to shi kuwa ya ba da himma ne wajen cike wannan gibin, haka nan ma lamarin zakka wanda alal hakika an mance da shi cikin al'ummar nan wanda hakan wani rauni ne sosai, to amma haka ya fado cikin wannan fagen. Ya shiga ko ina, da gabatar da jawabai da kiran kowa da kowa, ba tare da nuna gajiya ba, wajen ganin an tabbatar da wannan aikin.

translation.en: The same is true of exegesis, Mahdaviat and the other areas that he is following up. This is one of the points that I wanted to raise about the work of our esteemed Mr. Qara'ati.
translation.ha: Haka ma lamarin tafsiri ya kasance, haka lamarin akidar Mahdi da sauran lamurran da yake kula da su suka kasance; wannan batun farko kenan cikin ayyukan mai girma Malam Kara'ati abin kaunarmu.

translation.en: The second point, which is even more important than the first point, is related to his sincerity.
translation.ha: Batu na biyu wanda kuma muhimmancinsa ya fi ma batu na farkon yawa, shi ne tsarkin zuciyar da yake da shi.

translation.en: Allah the Exalted supports pure intentions.
translation.ha: Lalle Allah Madaukakin Sarki yana tare da tsarkakkiyar niyya; tsarkin niyya yana da tasiri mai ban mamaki wanda irin wannan tsarkin niyyar ce take ciyar da ayyuka gaba.

translation.en: And this is another point which is very important. I am not saying these things to praise Mr. Qara'ati or exaggerate what he has done.
translation.ha: Hakan kuwa lamari ne mai muhimmanci. Ina fadin wadannan maganganu ne ba wai saboda ina son in jinjina wa wani mutum ko kuma in daukaka wani mutum ba ne.

translation.en: I just want his efforts to be a model for all of us, especially for our seminarians.
translation.ha: Muna so ne wadannan ayyuka su zamanto mana - dukkanin mu musamman ma dai mu dalibai - abin koyi; mu ma mu aikata hakan.

translation.en: This is the first point.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne batu na farko.

translation.en: The second point is related to persistence.
translation.ha: Na biyu shi ne ci gaba da gudanar da ayyuka da kuma bin sahunsu (ba tare da dakatawa ba), wanda a wannan wajen ina kiran Malam Kara'ati da abokan aikinsa da cewa kada su saki wannan aiki da suka faro shi; su ci gaba da bin diddigin sa.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted will help Mr. Qara'ati and all you dear brothers and sisters. I hope God will bestow health and a long life on all of you so that you can follow up what you have started.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a ci gaba da bin diddigin aiki. Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya taimake shi da kuma ku din nan gaba daya 'yan'uwa maza da mata masu girma, ya kara muku tsawon rai da kuma koshin lafiya ta yadda za ku ci gaba da gudanar da wannan aikin.

translation.en: These are important points. These days are close to the birthday anniversary of Imam Mahdi (a.s.), which is a great Eid for the Muslim world and even all of humanity.
translation.ha: Amma wannan lamari na akidar Mahdi, wanda gabatar da shi a cikin wadannan ranaku na kusa da ranar sha biyar ga watan Sha'aban da wannan idi mai girma na Musulunci kai na ma dukkanin bil'adama baki daya, lamari ne da ya dace a gabatar da shi sannan kuma wajibi ne a ba shi muhimmancin gaske kamar yadda ake ba wa sauran lamurra irin su annabci muhimmanci.

translation.en: Why?
translation.ha: Saboda me?

translation.en: Because Mahdaviat represents what all prophets were sent for - namely, building a monotheistic world on the basis of justice using all the capacities that Allah the Exalted has bestowed on humanity. This is the era that will come after the re-appearance of Imam Mahdi (God's greetings be upon him and may God hasten his re-appearance): the era in which monotheism and genuine spirituality will be dominant over the entire life of human beings, the era in which justice will be established in the real sense of the word.
translation.ha: Saboda kuwa abin da akidar Mahdi take bishara da shi, shi ne dai abin da aka turo dukkanin annabawa da manzanni da shi wanda shi ne samar da wata duniya ta tauhidi (kadaita Ubangiji) sannan kuma wacce aka gina ta bisa asasi na adalci da kuma amfanuwa da dukkanin dama da Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya arzurta dan'adam da shi. Shi ne dai irin wannan yanayi na lokacin bayyanar Imam Mahdi (amincin allah ya tabbata a gare shi sannan kuma allah ya gaggauta bayyanarsa).

translation.en: I have repeatedly said that the movement carried out over many centuries by humanity in the shade of the teachings of divine prophets is a movement towards the wide road which will be built after the re-appearance of Imam Mahdi (may God hasten his re-appearance), the road that will lead humanity to lofty goals.
translation.ha: A lokuta da dama dai mun sha fadin cewa dukkanin ayyukan da bil'adama suka aiwatar karkashin inuwar koyarwar annabi, wani yunkuri ne zuwa ga mikakkiyar titin da babu gargada a kanta wanda a lokacin Imam Mahdi (Allah ya gaggauta bayyanarsa) ne dan'adam zai kai ga kololuwar manufarsa da kuma tafiya a kan wannan hanyar.

translation.en: It is as if a group of people are guided by certain people through mountains, valleys, marshes and thorny bushes in order to reach the main road.
translation.ha: A lokacin da suka isa ga wannan hanya ta asali, to hanya a bude take a gare su; madaidaiciyar hanya a fili take; tafiya kuwa a kanta zai zamanto da sauki, mutum cikin sauki zai iya tafiya a kan wannan hanyar. To amma lamarin ba shi ne daga mutum ya isa ga asalin hanyar shi kenan sai ya dakatar da wanann tafiyar tasa ba; a'a, a nan ne ma mutum zai fara tafiyarsa zuwa ga manufa mai girma ta Ubangiji.

translation.en: Humanity has moved through difficult paths and has cleared various obstacles in order to reach this main road. This main road is the road that will be built after the re-appearance of the Imam of the Age (a.s.). It is the world that will be built after the re-appearance of Imam Mahdi (a.s.).
translation.ha: Tsawon wadannan karnoni masu yawa, dan'adam ya fuskanci matsaloli da hanyoyi masu tsananin wahala da abubuwa masu kawo masa cikas a kan hanya, a kokarin da ya ke yi na isa ga wannan hanya ta asali. Wannan hanya ta asali kuwa ita ce dai wannan hanya ta lokacin bayyanar Imam Mahdi; ita ce wannan duniya ta lokacin bayyanar Mahdi wanda alal hakika yunkurin bil'adama ta wani bangaren daga nan take farowa.

translation.en: In a sense, the movement of humanity will start from that point.
translation.ha: Idan har aka rasa akidar Mahdi, ma'anar hakan ita ce dukkanin kokarin annabawa, dukkanin wadannan kiraye-kiraye (na annabawa), dukkanin wadannan aiko manzanni da aka yi, dukkanin wannan kokari ba kama hannun yaro, dukkanin su za su zamanto ba su da fa'ida kenan, ba su da amfani. A saboda haka, batun akidar Mahdi wani lamari ne na asali; yana daga cikin tushen masaniya ta Ubangiji.
