translation.ha: Ba mutum ne da ya kasance yana neman yabo da jinjinawar wasu mutane ko kuma wata kungiya ta musamman ba.

translation.en: This was the characteristic of that great man.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce siffar wannan babban mutum.

translation.en: He was not after fame or a position in the university or Islamic seminary.
translation.ha: Ba mutum ne da yake neman suna da matsayin da aka sani na jami'a ko makarantar hauza ba.

translation.en: He stepped in as an intellectual soldier.
translation.ha: Ya shiga fagen tunani ne tamkar wani soja.

translation.en: He worked sincerely, and Allah the Exalted blessed his work.
translation.ha: Ya gudanar da aikinsa da dukkanin ikhlasi, sai Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya sanya albarka cikin ayyukansa.

translation.en: Today his ideas are still alive and novel even after the passage of 30 years since his martyrdom.
translation.ha: A yau din nan bayan shekaru talatin da shahadar wannan babban mutum, amma maganganunsa suna nan kamar na yau; kamar yau aka rubuta su.

translation.en: At that time, his thoughts and ideas provided answers for different people at various intellectual levels. Today many intellectual advances have been made and many intellectual problems have been resolved, but Shahid Motahhari's thoughts and ideas still provide answers to new questions.
translation.ha: A yau ma akwai mutane a bangarori daban-daban da suke amfanuwa da maganganunsa da kuma irin tunaninsa, wajen samun amsar tambayoyin da suke da su; a yau ma da tunani suka ci gaba, inda aka magance matsaloli daban-daban da suke cikin kwakwalan masu bincike, to amma duk da haka sun kasance masu amsa sabbin tambayoyin da ake da su.

translation.en: This is the characteristic of a profound thought that is accompanied by sincerity. Sincerity works miracles.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce siffar wani tunani da ke tare da ikhlasi. Ikhlasi wata mu'ujiza ce.

translation.en: When someone sets out on a path for the sake of God, He blesses their efforts. That is why a few decades of work by that esteemed martyr continues to be an inexhaustible resource for our society.
translation.ha: A lokacin da wani mutum ya sanya kafarsa a wani waje saboda Allah, Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai sanya albarka cikin wannan aiki na sa; a saboda haka ne wannan kokari na wasu shekaru na wannan babban mutum, wannan shahidi mai girma suka zamanto tamkar wata ajiya ga al'umma wacce ba ta karewa.

translation.en: Three decades have passed since the second greatest event in our country - that is to say, the establishment of the Islamic Republic which was the second most important event after the introduction of Islam. The Revolution awakened the world of Islam. It affected the political equations not just in the region, but in the entire world.
translation.ha: A yau kasar mu da al'ummar mu bayan gushewar shekaru talatin na faruwar wannan mafi girman lamari bayan shigowar Musulunci wannan kasa ta mu - wato tsayar da tsarin Musulunci, wanda ya kasance mafi girman lamari - sannan kuma ya janyo hankulan duniyar musulmi ba wai kawai a wannan yankin ba face dai a fagage na siyasa na duniya ya yi tasirinsa sannan kuma alhamdu lillahi al'ummar mu cikin wadannan shekaru talatin sun sami ci gaba masu yawa a bangarori daban-daban, a yau din nan ma akwai bukatar masananmu su sanya idanuwa zuwa ga goben wannan kasar don su ga me ake bukata, sannan kuma me suke so su aikata.

translation.en: The world of Islam is divided. In spite of the fact that Muslims have access to the Holy Quran and firm religious teachings, they are suffering from backwardness due to various reasons.
translation.ha: Duniyar musulmi, duniya ce da ta rarrabu. Al'ummar musulmi duk kuwa da Alkur'anin da suke da shi, duk da irin wadannan karfafa koyarwa da suke da su, to amma sakamakon wasu abubuwa sun kasance a baya.

translation.en: What are these reasons?
translation.ha: Mene ne wadannan abubuwa?

translation.en: We need to identify them. The Iranian nation should try to achieve a position that all its actions, moves, and intellectual output are referred to by the world of Islam and its intellectuals as authoritative.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne himmar al'ummar Iran ta zamanto cewa sun kai wani matsayi da dukkanin halaye, yunkuri da kuma tunaninsu za su zamanto wani abin koyi da riko a wajen musulmmi da kuma sauran al'ummomi; masanan sauran al'ummomi su sami hanya; wannan wani nauyi ne na tarihi da ke wuyan al'ummar Iran.

translation.en: And this is the path that lies ahead of us, and we should tread this path appropriately. We should move forward with self-confidence. We should make use of all our power, our human and intellectual capacities, and the talents that Allah the Exalted has bestowed on the Iranian nation.
translation.ha: Wannan kuma ita ce hanyar da a dabi'ance take gabanmu; wajibi ne mu bi wannan hanya da kyau; mu kama hanyar da dukkanin kwanciyar hankali; mu shigo da dukkanin karfi na dan'adam da tunani da Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya ba wa wannan al'umma cikin fage; to a irin wannan yanayi makomar duniyar musulmi za ta sauya, sannan kuma a bisa hakan makomar duniya ma za ta sauya.

translation.en: If this happens, the fate of the world of Islam will be changed, which will lead to changing the fate of the world. The modern world is moving in an inappropriate direction. It is in a bad situation.
translation.ha: Duniyar yau tana tafiya ne bisa mummunar hanya; tana cikin mummunan yanayi ne, an yi watsi da kyawawan halaye a duniya.

translation.en: Moral values have been trampled upon. People of the world are suffering from the consequences of this moral degeneration, and intellectuals living in different countries are aware of this great tragedy.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu al'ummomi suna cikin tsaka mai wuyan irin wannan mummunan yanayi na rashin kyawawan halaye, sannan kuma masu tunani da masanan al'ummomi suna ci gaba da sanya ido kan wannan gagarumar hasara, suna wahala, suna bayyana hakan; ana iya ganin hakan cikin maganganunsu.

translation.en: They are troubled, and they express their concerns. We can tread a path that will be a source of salvation for humanity.
translation.ha: Lalle suna iya tafiya bisa tafarkin da zai iya zama tafarkin tsira ga al'umma. Lalle ana iya sauya irin wannan mummunar makoma da take gaban bil'adama.

translation.en: The first step is to transform ourselves, which starts with education.
translation.ha: Mataki na farko shi ne mu samar da irin wannan yunkuri, irin wannan gagarumin sauyi a cikinmu.

translation.en: Thankfully, the appropriate infrastructures have been created on different fronts during the past 30 years.
translation.ha: Alhamdu lillahi tsawon wadannan shekaru talatin an gudanar da ayyuka na asasi a bangarori daban-daban.

translation.en: We can move ahead relying on these infrastructures.
translation.ha: Lalle ana iya tafiya bisa wadannan asasi da aka gina.

translation.en: Each achievement that the Iranian nation makes will disappoint certain people in the world.
translation.ha: A duk inda al'ummar Iran suka sami nasara, wasu 'yan tsiraru a duniya su kan ji cewa lalle sun gaza.

translation.en: Superpowers will naturally deploy their forces against the movements that are not in line with their interests. These things are not surprising and should be expected by any nation that enters great arenas of life.
translation.ha: A dabi'ance wadannan masu karfi suna ganin hakan a matsayin abin da bai dace da manufofinsu ba; don haka suke jan daga, wadannan dai ba abubuwa ne da daman ba a yi zaton ganinsu ba; wadannan abubuwa ne da duk wata al'umma da take a fagen gwagwarmaya mai girma ta rayuwa za ta yi zaton faruwarsa.

translation.en: Since the beginning of the Revolution, our nation has continued its path in the face of all these obstacles. Such problems are nothing.
translation.ha: Al'ummar mu tun daga farkon juyin juya halin Musulunci har zuwa yau din nan ta ci gaba da wannan yunkuri na fada da irin wadannan abubuwa da suke kawo cikas, wadannan ba wani abu ba ne.

translation.en: The experience of the Iranian nation has shown that their threats, statements, and opposition cannot at all slow down the speed of our nation's progress.
translation.ha: Wadannan barazana da (makiya) suke yi, maganganun da suke fadi, irin adawar da suke nunawa, to tarihin al'ummar Iran ya tabbatar da cewa babu wani tasiri da irin wadannan kiyayaya suka yi wajen dakatar da wannan yunkuri na al'ummar Iran.

translation.en: Our nation will continue its path.
translation.ha: Al'ummar Iran kuma za ta ci gaba da bin wannan tafarki.

translation.en: I hope the officials in charge of the Ministry of Education will pay attention to these important realities and heavy responsibilities and will pursue this great goal through intensified work and serious efforts.
translation.ha: Muna fatan jami'an ma'aikatar ilimi da tarbiyya, bisa la'akari da wadannan lamurra masu muhimmanci, bisa la'akari da wannan gagarumin nauyi da ke wuyansu, za su ci gaba da bin diddigin wannan aiki da dukkan karfinsu da kuma gagarumar himma da kokari.

translation.en: And I hope you dear teachers will further this goal optimistically by relying on Allah the Exalted and expecting divine reward, grace, and guidance.
translation.ha: Sannan ku kuma malamai masu girma a duk inda kuke a duk fadin kasar nan, ta hanyar fata da kuma dogaro da Allah Madaukakin Sarki da kuma rahama da shiriyarsa da lada ta Ubangiji za ku ci gaba da riko da wannan aiki.

translation.en: I hope God will reward you all and make the holy souls of our dear martyrs happy with us, the esteemed martyrs who prepared the ground for our nation to deal with these important matters.
translation.ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba ku lada sannan kuma ruhi mai tsarki na shahidanmu masu girma wadanda su ne suka samar da wannan yanayi ga al'umma za su kasance tare da ku wajen samun damar aiwatar da wannan aiki mai girma.

translation.en: May Allah the Exalted associate the immaculate soul of our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) - who opened up this path for our nation - with the holy souls of His saints. I hope all of you will benefit from the prayers of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake).
translation.ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya tayar da ruhin Imaminmu mai girma wanda shi ne ya share wannan hanya ga al'ummar mu tare da ruhin waliyansa sannan kuma dukkanin ku ku zamanto cikin addu'oin mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi). Wassalamu alaikum wa rahamatullah wa barakatuhu.

translation.en: Leader Meets with Basijis - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Ganawar Jagora Da Dubban Dakarun Basij A Ranar Idin Ghadir

translation.en: His Eminence said that the essence of Eid al-Ghadir belongs to all Muslims and all those who care about the welfare of humanity.
translation.ha: Yayin da yake isar da sakon tayar murnarsa dangane da wannan rana ta Ghadir ga dukkanin al'ummar Iran da sauran al'ummomi masu kaunar ganin an tabbatar da adalci da kuma ‘yanci, Jagoran ya bayyana cewar: Hakikanin abin da Ghadir ya kumsa lamari ne da shafi dukkanin musulmi da kuma dukkanin masu fatan alheri ga bil'adama.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that the Shia faith in the appointment of Imam Ali (a.s.) as the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) successor is based on strong and indisputable reasons.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana imanin da mabiya tafarkin Shi'a suka yi dangane da kasantuwar Amirul Muminin (a.s) a matsayin magaji kuma halifan Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) a bayansa da cewa lamari ne da ya ginu bisa karfafan dalilai da ba za a iya inkarinsu ba.

translation.en: Explaining the meaning of Imamate, Ayatollah Khamenei said: "Imamate means that a person or a group takes on the leadership of a society and specifies the direction of its movement in worldly and religious matters.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana nada magajin annabi da Allah ya yi da kuma batun imamanci a matsayin lamurra guda biyu da ake iya ganinsu cikin waki'ar Ghadir, sannan kuma yayin da yake karin haske kan ma'anar imamanci, Jagoran ya ce: Imamanci yana nufin wani mutum ko kuma wata jama'a ta riki wani shugaba wanda zai bayyanar mata da hanyar da ya kamata ta bi cikin lamurran da suka shafi duniya da lahirarta.

translation.en: Therefore, in this sense Imamate has been the main issue of all human communities throughout history."
translation.ha: A saboda haka ne imamanci da irin wannan ma'ana ya zamanto wani lamari na asali na dukkanin bil'adama tsawon tarihi.

translation.en: His Eminence cited verses from the Holy Quran and said that Imamate can be divided into two different categories. "In one kind of Imamate, a perfect example of which is the leadership of the divine prophets, just leaders lead the people towards the ultimate goal of human life. In the other kind of Imamate, which is exemplified by the leadership of the Pharaoh, the people are lead towards corruption, fire and destruction."
translation.ha: Har ila yau kuma yayin da yake Jagoran ta hanyar dogaro da ayoyin Alkur'ani mai girma ya raba imananci zuwa gida biyu yana mai cewa: A wani wajen annabawan Allah su ne alama ta wannan shugabanci da imamanci, shugabanni ne na adalci wadanda bisa umurni da shiryarwa ta Ubangiji suke shiryar da dan'adam zuwa ga tafarkin da ya dace ya rayu a kanta. A daya nau'in kuma Fir'auna shi ne alamar wannan shugabanci, wanda ya ke jan mutane zuwa ga fasadi da wuta da kuma halaka.

translation.en: Explaining the comprehensiveness of the meaning of Imamate, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution added: "Even in the most secular governments of the world, in spite of all the claims that political centers are separate from religious and spiritual centers, the life of the people both in this world and in the hereafter is in the hands of the rulers, and the positions adopted by the rulers shape the life of the people of those societies in this world and in the hereafter."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ci gaba da cewa: Hatta a cikin mafi girman hukumar da babu ruwanta da addini, duk kuwa da ikirarin da suke yi dangane da raba addini da siyasa, to amma duniya da lahirar mutane suna hannun masu mulki ne sannan kuma su ne suke tsara wa rayuwar mutane irin yadda za ta kasance.

translation.en: His Eminence said that big cultural organizations of the west and global bullies are among the leaders that act like the Pharaoh and lead the people towards corruption and destruction.
translation.ha: Don haka ne ma Jagoran ya bayyana cewar manyan cibiyoyin al'adu na kasashen yammaci da sauran masu takama da karfi na duniya suke ganin kansu a matsayin shugabanni wadanda kamar Fir'auna suke jan mutane zuwa ga wutar fasadi da lalata da halaka.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) establishment of an Islamic community as a proof of the fact that Islam is not limited to verbal admonishment and that it is after implementing divine rules in society. His Eminence said that appointing a successor for the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) in Ghadir Khumm was an effort to continue this path.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana kafa hukuma da Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) ya yi da kuma kokarin samar da wata al'umma wacce ta yi daidai da koyarwar Musulunci a matsayin abin da ke tabbatar da cewa Musulunci ba wai magana ta fatar baki ne kawai face dai wani kokari ne na tabbatar da hukumce-hukumcen Ubangiji a cikin al'umma wanda kuma ba za a iya samunsa ba in ba ta hanyar kafa hukuma ma'abociyar adalci ba.

translation.en: He added: "Although the history of Islam went off in a different direction, this standard and this auspicious thought remained in history until it was finally fulfilled in another part of the world thanks to the faith and resistance of Imam Khomeini (r.a.) and the Iranian nation. And by Allah's grace, it will be promoted in the entire world of Islam on a daily basis."
translation.ha: Jagoran ya bayyana nada magajin Annabi bisa umurnin Allah a waki'ar Ghadir a matsayin lamari ne da ke nuni da ci gaban wannan tafarki (na annabawa) yana mai cewa: Duk kuwa da cewa tarihin Musulunci ya kama wata hanyar ce ta daban to amma wannan tafarki da wannan tunani da ke cike da sa'ada ya ci gaba da wanzuwa tsawon tarihi har zuwa lokacin da ya tabbata a wannan yanki na duniya albarkacin imani da tsayin dakan Imam Khumaini da al'ummar Iran, sannan kuma cikin yardar Allah a ko da yaushe sai dada karuwa a duk fadin duniyar musulmi.

translation.en: His Eminence referred to the Basij as a prominent and brilliant truth and added that the presence of all Iranians from diverse ethnic and occupational backgrounds in the Basij is a sign that shows the inclusiveness of this impressive and unique organization.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya bayyana Basiji a matsayin wata hakika mai girma da haske sannan kuma maras tamka, sannan kuma yayin da yake ishara da kasantuwar mata da maza da tsofi da matasa a cikin dakarun na Basij, Jagoran ya ce: Kasantuwar dukkanin kabilu da bangarori na Iran da suka hada da malamai da daliban jami'a, daliban makarantun, malaman makarantu, malaman addini, ma'aikata da leburori da manoma da ‘yan kasuwa da sauransu cikin dakarun Basiji, lamari ne da ke nuni da irin abin da wannan cibiya ta Basij ta kumsa.

translation.en: His Eminence described as futile the efforts made by the enemies of the Iranian nation and their followers inside the country to humiliate and insult the Basij.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya bayyana cewar kokarin makiya da ‘yan amshin shatansu na cikin gida na kokarin kaskantar da Basiji ya ci kasa.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the Basij as a disciplined and systematic organization and reiterated: "There is no organization in the world that can match the Basij in terms of quantity, but the important point is that the Basij relies on beliefs, faith and emotions.
translation.ha: Har ila yau Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana dakarun Basij din a matsayin wasu gungun jama'a masu tsari, sannan kuma yayin da yake ishara da irin imanin da suke da shi ya bayyana cewar: A bangaren yawa kan babu wata kungiya a duniyar nan da za ta kama kafar dakarun Basiji to amma abin da ke da muhimmanci shi ne cewa Basij sun dogara ne bisa akida da imani da kuma tausayi.

translation.en: And this reality can help resolve the problems of the country and the nation during hard times."
translation.ha: Wannan lamari kuwa shi ne ya taimaka wajen magance matsalolin da aka shiga cikinsu a lokuta masu tsananin gaske.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei referred to sincerity and insight as the essential foundations of the Basij and added: "These two determining factors contribute to one another.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana ikhlasi da basira a matsayin wasu rukunai na asasi na Basiji yana mai cewa: Wadannan abubuwa masu ayyana makoma guda biyu lamurra ne wadanda tamkar suna tafiya tare da junansu ta yadda a duk lokacin da basirar mutum ta karu to ikhlasinsa ma za ta karu.

translation.en: That is to say, the more one's insight increases, the more one's sincerity will be.
translation.ha: Duk mutumin da ya zamanto mai ikhlasi Allah zai kara masa hasken basirarsa.

translation.en: And the more sincere a person is, the more God will increase the light of insight in him." The Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that passions are the most important obstacles to insight. He referred to the behavior of certain people in the fitna of the year 1388 and added: "During those events, certain elements of the fitna ignored the interests of the country in order to achieve power.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana son zuciya a matsayin mafi girman garkuwar da take shiga tsakanin mutum da basira, sannan kuma yayin da yake ishara da abubuwan da wadansu mutane suka aikata yayin fitinar da ta faru a shekarar 2009 bayan zaben shugaban kasar da aka yi a Iran, Jagoran ya ce: A cikin wannan fitinar, masu tayar da fitinar sun yi watsi da maslahar kasa don kawai su sami iko sannan kuma suka juya baya ga wani lamari da ya ke a fili ta yadda hatta manyan makiyan wannan al'umma suka shigo fage da goyon bayansu.

translation.en: But some people did not and do not see these clear truths.
translation.ha: To amma duk da haka wadansu mutane ba su ga wannan gaskiya ba.

translation.en: Of course in spite of the fact that some people understand these truths, they are not prepared to act on the basis of this understanding due to their passions and the darkness of their heart."
translation.ha: Ko da yake akwai wadansu mutane wadanda duk da cewa sun ga wannan hakika da kuma fahimtarta, to amma sakamakon duhun son zuciya ba a shirye suke su aiwatar da wannan fahimta ta su a kas ba.

translation.en: He added: "A large portion of the world's population has realized the essence of the auspicious Revolution of the Iranian nation, but global powers have deployed their forces against the awakening yell of the Iranian nation."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana juyin juya halin Musulunci na al'ummar Iran a matsayin wani kokari na sauya tafarkin da ya nitse cikin jahannamar abin duniya yana mai cewa: Wani adadi mai yawan na mutanen duniya sun fahimci hakikanin wannan juyi da kuma irin sa'adar da ke cikinsa, to amma duk da haka masu karfi na duniya sun tsaya kyam wajen fuskantar wannan murya mai farkarwa ta al'ummar Iran.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that the fulfillment of the divine promise of victory is the ultimate result of the Iranian nation's confrontation with the camp of global tyranny and arrogance.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana cewa cika alkawarin Allah da ba ya taba saba shi da kuma nasarar al'ummar Iran ta gaba daya shi ne kawo karshen kiyayyar da sansani ‘yan mulkin mallaka da ma'abota girman kan duniya yake yi da juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma shan kashinsa.

translation.en: He reiterated: "Until that bright future is achieved, the enemies will continue creating problems for our nation.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Har zuwa lokacin da za a kai ga wannan makoma mai cike da haske, makiya za su ci gaba da haifar da matsaloli ga wannan al'umma.

translation.en: Therefore, it is necessary to preserve and strengthen our preparedness."
translation.ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne a zamanto cikin shiri.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution met this morning with thousands of enthusiastic students.
translation.ha: Ganawar Jagora Da Dubban Dalibai Don Tunawa Da Ranar 13, Aban

translation.en: During this meeting, Ayatollah Khamenei described the 13th of Aban as a very important and meaningful symbol which represents numerous realities. His Eminence stated: "One of the events which happened on the 13th of Aban was Imam Khomeini's speech in the year 1343 which took place in the city of Qom. The speech was delivered in protest at the legislation - passed in the Majlis of that time - regarding the legal immunity of American citizens in Iran.
translation.ha: A yayin wannan ganawar Jagoran ya bayyana ranar 13 ga Aban a matsayin wata alama da ke nuni da kwadayin Amurka, dogaron da tsohuwar gwamnatin dagutu (ta Iran) take da shi (ga Amurka), tsayin dakan imani da ya dogara da basira, kasantuwar matasa a fage da kuma jaruntakar matasan lokacin nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci, daga nan sai ya ce: A yau al'ummar Iran tana da azama da karfi sama da dukkanin lokutan da suka gabata sannan kuma tana ci gaba da tafiya zuwa ga manufarta mai girma da kolin sa'ada. Matasa kuwa su ne suke kan gaban wannan gagarumin yunkuri.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that this event is indicative of the greed of the US and the oppressive attitude of the arrogant powers towards other nations, including the Iranian nation.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya bayyana hakan a matsayin abin da ke nuni da irin kwadayin da Amurka take da shi da kuma ruhin wuce gona da iri da ma'abota girman kai suke da shi kan al'ummomin duniya ciki kuwa har da al'ummar Iran.

translation.en: If nations do not resist the US, it will go as far as it can to trample the honor of other nations underfoot."
translation.ha: Wanda matukar dai ba a tsaya a gabanta ba, to kuwa za ta ci gaba da kokarin yin ta'annuti ga dukiya da mutumcin al'ummomi.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution further touched on the seemingly friendly discourse of American presidents during different eras and said: "Although their discourse is seemingly soft, it is in fact similar to the iron fist which is covered with a velvet glove."
translation.ha: Yayin da yake ishara da jawabai daban da shugabannin Amurka suka dinga yi wadanda a zahiri suke nuni da kaunar abokantaka da al'ummar Iran kuwa, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci cewa ya yi: Duk kuwa da cewa a zahiri irin wadannan jawabai masu taushi ne, amma a badininsu wasu maganganu ne da aka lullube da wani kyalle da ke cike da guba.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that faith should be accompanied by insight and added that this is one of the realities of the 13th of Aban.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana imani tare da basira a matsayin hakika ta biyu ta ranar 13 ga watan Aban yana mai cewa: Daga muryar da Imam Khumaini (r.a) ya yi a shekarar 1964 ita ce mafi tsarkin daga murya wacce kuma ta samo asali daga jin nauyi na addini, sannan kuma wanda ya dogara da goyon baya na al'umma, wanda sakamakon hakan ya fito fili shekaru goma sha hudu bayan hakan (wato nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci)

translation.en: He also referred to the actions of the mercenaries of the Pahlavi regime and the killing of students on the 13th of Aban in the year 1357, further adding: "Based on this fact, the 13th of Aban is the symbol of the pioneering role of the youth and their presence on the scene."
translation.ha: Har ila yau kuma yayin da yake ishara da kisan gillan da tsohuwar gwamnatin Iran ta yi wa daliban makarantun sakandare a ranar 13, Aban 1357 (4/11/1978), Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin cewa ya yi: Bisa la'akari da wadannan abubuwa, 13 ga watan Aban wata alama ce ta kasantuwar matasa a fage da kuma kasantuwarsu a sahun farko-farko.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution referred to the pioneering role of students during the Sacred Defense Era and said that this pioneering role is rooted in their commitment, revolutionary spirit and insight.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake ishara da yadda daliban makarantu suka kasance a sahun farko-farko a lokacin kallafaffen yakin da aka kallafa wa Iran na shekaru takwas kuwa, Jagoran ya bayyana hakan a matsayin cewa lamari ne da ya samo asali daga shu'urin jin sauke nauyi, ruhi na juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma basirarsu.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei further mentioned the capture of the American embassy on the 13th of Aban in the year 1358 and added: "This action was indicative of the courage and bravery of the revolutionary youth in the face of the impressive power of the US.
translation.ha: Har ila yau kuma yayin da yake ishara da jaruntakar da matasa daliban jami'a suka nuna wajen kame ofishin leken asiri (ofishin jakadanci) na Amurka da ke Iran a ranar 13, Aban 1358 (4/11/1979) suka yi, Ayatullah Khamenei cewa ya yi: Wannan lamari, wata alama ce ta jaruntaka da taran aradu na matasa masu riko da juyin juya halin Musulunci wajen fuskantar ikon Amurka.

translation.en: This is because capturing the US embassy undermined the power of the US which was very great at that time and brought the US to its knees."
translation.ha: Don kuwa kame wannan ofishin leken asiri ya yi wasan kura da karfin da Amurka take da shi wanda a wancan lokacin tana da karfin, sannan kuma ya dunkufar da Amurka a kan gwuiwoyinta.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei urged the youth to increase their insight and reflect upon realities, adding: "By Allah's favor, the youth of our country have an enthusiastic, influential and insightful presence in political, economic, scientific and technological arenas today."
translation.ha: Yayin da yake sake kiran matasa din da suka kara irin basira da tunanin da suke da su, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ce: Alhamdu lillahi a yau kasantuwar matasanmu a fagagen siyasa, tattalin arziki, ilimi da fasaha, kasantuwa ce da take cike da nishadi wacce kuma ta ke yin tasiri sannan kuma ta kasance tare da basira.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that the failure of the fitna of the year 1388 was a clear example of the vigilant and influential presence of the youth and reiterated: "The fitna which happened last year was a great finta. The dangerous plot which was hidden behind this fitna will be uncovered after many years. The fitna failed due to the pioneering presence of the youth on the scene."
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana shan kashin da fitinar da aka yi kokarin kunnawa a shekarar bara (bayan zaben shugaban kasa) a matsayin wata alama da take nuni da kasantuwa mai cike da tasiri ta matasan kasar Iran yana mai cewa: Fitinar shekarar da ta gabata wacce fitina ce mai girma sannan kuma a shekaru masu zuwa za a iya fahimtar irin gagarumin makircin da aka kulla, ta sha kashi ne sakamakon kasantuwar matasa a fage.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that the ringleaders of the fitna of the year 1388 sought to capture Iran through their complex plots and added: "Throughout the process, the elements of the fitna, the majority of whom had entered this event unknowingly, moved in the direction which helped promote the goals of the ringleaders of this fitna.
translation.ha: Yayin da yake ishara da cewa wadanda suka shirya wannan fitinar ta shekara ta 2009 suna su ne su sake kama Iran, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya kara da cewa: A wancan lokacin wadanda suka tayar da fitinar wadanda mafiya yawansu sun shiga wannan fage ne ba tare da masaniyar makircin da aka kulla ba, ba tare da sun san inda aka sa gaba ba suka ci gaba da bin wannan tafarkin da aka tsara din.

translation.en: This is an issue which requires accurate psychological analysis in order to figure out how some individuals unknowingly helped the enemies."
translation.ha: Wannan wani lamari ne da ke bukatar a yi sharhi da dubi cikinsa sosai kan yadda aka yi wadansu mutane suka shigo fage ba tare da sun san cewa suna taimakon makiya ba ne.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the prominent scientific, technological and political achievements made in the country, the reconstruction projects which are being carried out in the country, and the accelerated movement of the Iranian nation towards the peaks of progress and said that the Iranian nation has become independent in many arenas by relying on its rich and talented human resources and its efficient and sympathetic managers.
translation.ha: Har ila yau kuma yayin da yake ishara da irin ci gaba mai ban mamaki da Iran take samu a fagagen ilimi, fasaha, siyasa da sake gina kasa da kuma yunkurin al'ummar Iran zuwa ga kololuwar manufar da suke da ita, Ayatullah Khamenei cewa ya yi: A yau dukkanin kasar nan ya zamanto waje ne na aiki da kokari da hidima ga mutane, sannan kuma al'ummar Iran a bangarori daban-daban sun kai ga matsayin dogaro da kansu sakamakon irin kwarewar da suke da ita da kuma jami'ai masu aiki da kishi.

translation.en: Leader’s Address to Instructors and Reciters of Holy Quran - Khamenei.ir  The following is the full text of the speech delivered on August 2, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Republic in a meeting with a group of reciters and instructors of the Holy Quran.
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Makaranta, Mahaddata Da Kuma Malaman Alkur'ani Shimfida: A ranar talata 2, Augustan 2011 wacce ta yi daidai da ranar farko na watan Ramalana shekara ta 1432 ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da masu karatu, mahaddata da kuma malaman Alkur'ani mai girma.

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai.

translation.en: I would like to thank the dear brothers who recited verses from the Holy Quran in a beautiful voice and enlightened our hearts with the light of the divine Book.
translation.ha: Ina mika godiya ta ga ‘yan'uwa masu girma wadanda a yau din nan suka yi mana karatun Alkur'ani mai girma da sautinsu mai dadi sannan kuma suka haskaka mana zukatanmu da hasken tilawar ayoyin Littafin Allah mai girma.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted will increase the familiarity of our people, especially our youth, with the Holy Quran as much as possible.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya kara wa al'ummar mu musamman ma matasanmu masaniyar Alkur'ani mai girma.

translation.en: All the shortcomings in the world of Islam are the result of having strayed away from divine and Quranic teachings.
translation.ha: Dukkanin wata nakasa da kuma rashi da muke da shi a duniyar musulmi, hakan ya faru ne sakamakon nesantar ilmummuka na Ubangiji da kuma na Alkur'ani da muka yi ne.

translation.en: The Holy Quran is the Book of wisdom, knowledge and life.
translation.ha: Alkur'ani littafin hikima ne, littafi ne na ilimi, sannan kuma littafi ne na rayuwa.

translation.en: The life of nations depends on familiarity with Quranic teachings, acting according to the requirements of these teachings and practicing Quranic ahkaam [Islamic rules extracted from religious texts through Islamic jurisprudence].
translation.ha: Rayuwar al'ummomi tana cikin masaniyar da suke da ita ne da Alkur'ani da kuma aiki da wadannan masaniya da ilmummuka da kuma hukumce-hukumce na Alkur'ani.

translation.en: If human beings like justice and if they hate oppression, they should learn the ways of fighting oppression from the Holy Quran.
translation.ha: Idan har mutane suka zamanto masu neman tabbatar da adalci sannan kuma suna kyamar zalunci, to wajibi ne su koyi hanyar fada da zaluncin cikin Alkur'ani.

translation.en: If human beings are determined to acquire knowledge and if they want to use their knowledge to improve their life and bring about comfort and welfare for themselves, they can learn how to do so from the Holy Quran.
translation.ha: Idan har mutane suna neman ilimi ne sannan kuma su na son kyautata rayuwarsu ta hanyar ilimi da masaniya sannan kuma su samar da jin dadi da kwanciyar hankali ga rayuwarsa, to kuwa Alkur'ani ya nuna mana hanyar isa ga hakan.

translation.en: If human beings are after spiritual purity, closeness to Allah the Exalted and establishing a relationship with Him, the Holy Quran is the solution.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma mutanen da suke neman samun alaka da Ubangiji Madaukakin Sarki da kuma kyautata ruhinsu, to kuwa Alkur'ani shi ne hanyar cimma hakan.

translation.en: The weakness of the Islamic Ummah, our backwardness, our wrong behaviors, our moral deviations - all of these things are the result of having strayed away from the Holy Quran.
translation.ha: Dukkanin raunin da kuma irin koma bayan da mu musulmi muke fuskanta, haka nan da kuma munanan halaye da jirkitacciyar fahimtar lamurra na kyawawan halaye da kuma rayuwa da muke fuskanta, dukkanin wadannan abubuwa sun samo asali ne sakamakon nesantar Alkur'ani.

translation.en: Muslim nations turned their back on their own culture and they accepted the materialistic culture.
translation.ha: Al'ummar musulmi sun juya wa al'adun su baya, suka riki al'adun masu akidar son duniya.

translation.en: On the face of it, we were shouting "there is no god but God" and we remained Muslims, but western culture and western teachings affected our hearts and made us stray away from the truths.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa a fili muna fadin kalmar ‘La'ilaha illallah" sannan kuma tsawon lokaci mun kasance musulmi ne, to amma al'adun kasashen yammaci sun yi tasiri cikin zukatan mu sannan kuma sun nesanta mu daga gaskiya da kuma hakika.

translation.en: Then we lost not only our economic privilege and material dignity, but also our morality and ethical principles.
translation.ha: A irin wannan yanayin ba wai ma kawai tattalin arziki da daukakar mu ta duniya ce muka rasa ba, face ma dai kyawawan halayen mu ma mun rasa su.

translation.en: If we are suffering from laziness and weakness, if our hearts are not close to each other, if there is malevolence among us - these are the results of the non-Islamic and anti-Islamic culture that has been imposed on us.
translation.ha: Idan har muka zamnato muna fama ragwantaka, idan muka zamanto masu fuskantar rauni da rashin tabuka komai, idan har zukatan mu suka zamanto ba sa dasawa da juna, idan har aka sami yanayi na fatan sharri ga junanmu, to dukkanin wadannan abubuwa sun samo asali ne sakamakon al'adun da aka shigo mana da su da kuma tilasta mana su wadanda suka saba wa Musulunci.

translation.en: The role of the Holy Quran is to improve us materially and spiritually and the Holy Quran does this.
translation.ha: Rawar da Alkur'ani mai girma ya ke takawa shi ne ya kan ba mu daukaka a bangare na abin duniya da kuma kuma na lahira; wannan kuwa shi ne aikin da Alkur'ani ya ke yi.

translation.en: One of the examples is the Iranian nation.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin alamun hakan, ku din nan ne al'ummar Iran masu girma.

translation.en: It is wrong to think that the Iranian nation had the slightest credibility on international fronts during the time of satanic regimes - both during the time of the Pahlavi regime and during the time of the Qajar regime.
translation.ha: Bai kamata ku yi zaton cewa a zamunnan gwamnatocin dagutu - shin gwamnatin Pahlawi ne ko kuma kafin hakan a lokacin Kajar - al'ummar Iran tana da komai kashin wani matsayi da mutumci ba ne; a'a ba su da shi.

translation.en: The enormous talent that our nation enjoys had been buried like a forgotten treasure. Proving one's talent was a matter of chance and it did not really happen.
translation.ha: Irin wannan kwarewa da al'ummar mu take da ita, ta kasance tamkar wata ajiya ce wacce aka mance da ita, tamkar wata ajiya ce wacce aka bisne ta; sai dai kawai a dan wasu lokuta da ake samun wani mutum guda ya bayyanar da kansa.

translation.en: There are so many active, dynamic and innovative youth who are interested in the progress of the country and bring about honor and fame for our country in different areas. There were similar youth in the country at that time as well, but they could not do anything due to the hegemony of satanic governments.
translation.ha: Dukkanin irin wadannan matasa masu kumaji da suke da son ganin an ci gaba a wannan kasar da a yau kuke ganinsu, wadanda suke samar da ababen ban mamaki a fagage daban-daban, suna samar da daukaka da kuma samar da abin alfahari ga kasar su; to a wancan lokacin ma akwai irin wadannan matasan, to amma sakamakon irin ayyuka da mulkin kama-karya na dawagitai, ya sanya ba a ma ganin irin wadannan abubuwa.

translation.en: We took a step towards the Holy Quran and Quranic teachings - and what we have done is not more than a step - and Allah the Exalted bestowed dignity on us. He bestowed awareness and insight on us. He bestowed power on us.
translation.ha: Gwargwadon yadda muka sanya kafa guda a tafarkin kusatar Alkur'ani da kuma tafarkin masaniya ta Alkur'ani - duk kuwa da cewa abin da muka yi na kusatar Alkur'ani wani dan karamin abu ne - to amma Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya ba mu daukaka, ya ba mu rayuwa, ya ba mu masaniya da kuma basira haka nan kuma ya ba mu karfi da daukaka.

translation.en: Today our nation is one of the most responsive and most powerful nations in the world.
translation.ha: A yau al'ummar mu ta kasance daga cikin rayayyun al'ummomi sannan kuma daga cikin masu karfi na duniya.

translation.en: There is potential and enormous talent in different areas and we see numerous advances on different fronts: this is the situation of our country today.
translation.ha: A yau dai yanayin kasar mu yanayi ne da za a iya ganin irin kwarewa da kuma shirin da ake da shi haka nan da ci gaba a bangarori daban-daban.

translation.en: Moreover, other nations praise our nation. Fortunately Islamic slogans that would provoke Muslim nations into action have been witnessed in different countries, just as you see and hear today.
translation.ha: A yau abin farin cikin shi ne cewa a tsakanin al'ummomin musulmi, ana iya ganin take na Musulunci wanda abu ne da ke motsa al'umma da yunkurar da su, ana iya ganin hakan a kasashe daban-daban, sannan ku kuma din nan kuna gani da kuma jin labaran hakan.

translation.en: This is the case in places where there is more activity and dynamism, where there is more efficiency and influence, where there is little susceptibility to the enemies and hypocrites and where there are Islamic slogans, Islamic demands and Islamic determination. This is the characteristic of Quranic teachings.
translation.ha: A duk inda irin wannan yunkuri da motsawa suka yi girma da kuma karfafa da kuma samun karbuwa sannan kuma makiya da munafukai da ‘yan amshin shata suka ki amincewa da shi, to za ku ga cewa waje ne da aka daga take da bukatu na Musulunci; to wannan dai wata siffa ce da masaniya ta Alkur'ani ta kebanta da ita.

translation.en: It is necessary to become familiar with the Holy Quran.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne a samu masaniya da fahimta ta Alkur'ani.

translation.en: Of course today is not comparable with the past.
translation.ha: To amma dai ba za a iya kwatanta yanayin yau da na shekarun da suka gabata ba.

translation.en: I remember that a prominent Egyptian qari - the late Abul Ayneyn Shaisha - had travelled to Mashhad and was reciting the Holy Quran in Goharshad Mosque. His recitation was very good.
translation.ha: Ni dai ina iya tunawa daya daga cikin fitattun masu karatun Alkur'ani dan kasar Masar - wato marigayi Abul Ainain Sha'isha'a - ya zo Mashhad sannan ya yi karatun Alkur'ani a masallacin Goharshad, kuma karatu mai kyau da dadi.

translation.en: The meeting had been arranged by the organization in charge of religious endowments. Unlike today's endowments organization, which is thankfully an honorable organization, the organization in charge of endowments was a notorious organization at that time. Although I was very eager to listen to the recitation by that qari, I was reluctant to go to that meeting.
translation.ha: To da ya ke hukumar wakafi ta wancan lokacin ce ta shirya taron sannan kuma hukumar sabanin ta yanzu wacce take da kyakkyawar suna, ta wancan lokacin kan ba a ganinta da mutumci, to saboda irin wannan yanayin ne ya sanya ni na ki tafiya wajen don sauraren karatun duk kuwa da cewa ina son in saurari karatun Alkur'anin.

translation.en: I listened to his recitation from a distance.
translation.ha: Daga nesa na ke kallo da kuma sauraren sautin.

translation.en: There were not more than 50-60 people in that meeting.
translation.ha: Dukkanin mutanen da suka kasance a wancan majalisin, ina ganin ba su wuce mutane hamsin zuwa sittin ba.

translation.en: Some of them were government agents and some others were famous qura from the city of Mashhad.
translation.ha: Wasu jami'an gwamnati ne, sannan sai kuma wasu daga cikin fitattun masu karatun Alkur'ani na garin Mashhad.

translation.en: Today it is necessary to increase the interest in the Holy Quran, the interest which is prevalent everywhere. It is necessary to increase this interest on a daily basis.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne a kara irin kaunar da ake yi wa Alkur'ani a dukkanin wajaje; wajibi ne a kowace rana a dinga kara hakan.

translation.en: Memorizing the Holy Quran is one of the things that can teach us to reflect on the Holy Quran.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin abubuwan da za su saukaka mana yin tunani cikin Alkur'ani shi ne haddace Alkur'anin.

translation.en: We have a shortage of memorizers.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu dai muna da karancin mahaddata Alkur'ani.

translation.en: Previously I said that we should have at least one million memorizers of the Holy Quran in the country. Compared to our population, one million is not a big number. Now that our friends have made preparations and plans in order to promote memorization of the Holy Quran, I have become more hopeful and I would say we should have ten million memorizers in the country, not just one million.
translation.ha: A baya na taba fadin cewa a kasar nan ta mu muna bukatar kimanin mahaddata miliyan guda, duk kuwa da cewa wannan miliyan gudan ma sun kasa ga al'ummar kasar idan aka kwatanta da irin yawan da ake da shi, to amma da yake alhamdu lillahi ‘yan'uwa sun samar da wani share fage, sun shagaltu da ayyuka da kuma tsara shirye-shiryen da cikin ikon Allah za a bude hanyar haddace Alkur'ani, to fatan da muke da shi dai ya karu maimakon miliyan guda, muna cewa ne da yardar Allah za a sami mutane miliyan goma.

translation.en: Of course you should note that memorizing the Holy Quran is the first step.
translation.ha: To amma yana da kyau a fahimci cewa haddar Alkur'ani wani mataki ne na farko.

translation.en: First of all, it is necessary to remember what one has memorized.
translation.ha: Da farko dai wajibi ne a kiyaye haddar Alkur'anin.

translation.en: As a memorizer, when you have to recite the Holy Quran repeatedly, you will have the opportunity to reflect on Quranic verses.
translation.ha: A yayin da kuke ci gaba da nanata Alkur'ani, to kuwa za ka sami damar yin tunani cikin ayoyin Alkur'ani.

translation.en: Of course it is necessary to become familiar with the interpretation of Quranic verses as well. When a person has memorized the Holy Quran, when he is familiar with the interpretation of Quranic verses and when he reflects on the verses, what will happen will be the same thing that our society expects: Quranic blossoming.
translation.ha: Ko da yake kaunar tafsiri ma wanda ya ke bayanin ma'anonin Alkur'anin, shi ma lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske. A lokacin da mutum ya zamanto mahaddaci sannan kuma aka sami irin wannan kaunar tafsiri da kuma tunani, wato wannan lamarin da ake fatan ganinsa cikin al'ummar mu, to kuwa za a sami ci gaban Alkur'ani.

translation.en: Fortunately the ground is prepared for this to happen. Today our nation enjoys steely determination.
translation.ha: Abin farin cikin shi ne cewa an samar da fagen hakan. A yau ma azama da kuma iradar al'ummar mu wata azama ce tsayayyiya.

translation.en: But building such a Quranic society will only be possible in those conditions and I hope the conditions will be created.
translation.ha: Sannan kuma ta hakan ne za a samar da yanayi da al'umma ta Alkur'ani da irin wannan yanayi insha Allahu.

translation.en: As the people who are familiar with the Holy Quran, who recite the Holy Quran and who are interested in listening to recitations by qura with pleasant voices, you dear youth should appreciate your value. By Allah's favor, you will be rewarded by God.
translation.ha: Ku din nan matasa wadanda kuke masu kaunar Alkur'ani, ma'abota Alkur'ani, ma'abota tilawar Alkur'ani, haka nan kuma abin farin ciki ku din nan masu kaunar Alkur'ani ne, wadanda ku din nan wani bangare ne na wannan abin farin ciki, lalle ku fahimci irin karfin da kuke da shi. Da yardar Allah, Allah zai ba ku lada.

translation.en: You are in fact at the vanguard of this general movement in society.
translation.ha: Alal hakika ku din nan ku ne a kan gaban wannan yunkuri na al'umma.

translation.en: You may be faced with more hardships, but you will be rewarded more by Allah the Exalted.
translation.ha: Mai yiyuwa ne ya zamanto wahalar da ke cikinsa ta kasance tana da yawa, to amma lada da sakamakonsa yana da yawa a wajen Allah Madaukakin Sarki.

translation.en: Dear God, make us be accompanied by the Holy Quran throughout our life.
translation.ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka tayar da mu da Alkur'ani cikin dukkanin rayuwar mu.

translation.en: Dear God, do not separate us from the Holy Quran neither in this world nor in the next.
translation.ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Kada ka raba mu da Alkur'ani a nan duniya da kuma lahira.

translation.en: Dear God, put us in the shade of the Holy Quran in the hereafter.
translation.ha: Ka sanya mu karkashin inuwar Alkur'ani a ranar lahira.

translation.en: Dear God, bestow a Quranic, divine and Islamic life on us.
translation.ha: Ka arzurta mu da rayuwa ta Alkur'ani, rayuwa irin ta Ubangiji da kuma Musulunci.

translation.en: Dear God, by the blessedness of Muhammad (s.w.a.) and his household, make the holy heart of the Imam of the Age satisfied with us.
translation.ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Don Muhammadu da Alayen Muhammadu, ka sanya zuciyar mai girma Waliyul Asr ta zamanto ta yarda mu da kuma yin farin ciki da mu.

translation.en: Do not separate us from the Holy Quran and the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) household.
translation.ha: Kada ka raba mu da Alkur'ani da kuma Ahlulbaiti. Wassalamu alaikum wa rahamatullah wa barakatuhu.

translation.en: Leader Appoints Members for the New Term of the Expediency Council - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Ya Nada Membobin Majalisar Fayyace Maslahar Tsarin Musulunci Na Iran

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I am thankful to Allah the Exalted that with Allah's grace, the Expediency Council managed to finish another 5-year term with an acceptable record and hopefully the outcomes and benefits of the legal measures of the council will produce good results in managerial areas of the country â€“ the three branches of government, the Armed Forces and other organizations â€“ and everybody will see the outcomes.
translation.ha: Ina gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya ba wa majalisar fayyace maslahar tsarin Musulunci dacewar share wasu shekaru biyar na daban na ayyukanta cikin yardar Allah sannan kuma sun gudanar da ayyuka abin yabo, wanda fatan da ake da shi shi ne za a shaidi da kuma ganin tasirin ayyukan majalisar fayyace maslahar wadanda suka dace da doka cikin tushen gudanarwar wannan kasar - wato bangarori uku na gwamnati da dakaru masu makamai da sauran cibiyoyin gwamnati -.

translation.en: I would like to thank all of the esteemed members, the chairman and the secretariat of the council and for the new 5-year term, I hereby assign the following legal and natural persons under the chairmanship of Hojjatoleslam wal-Muslemin Hashemi Rafsanjani:
translation.ha: A daidai lokacin da na ke mika godiya ta ga dukkanin malamai membobin wannan majalisa masu girma, shugaban majalisar da babban sakatarenta, har ila yau kuma ina sanar da sunayen wadannan mutanen a matsayin sabbin membobin majalisarsa karkashin jagorancin Hujjatul Islam wal muslimin Sheikh Hashemi Rafsanjani:

translation.en: The legal persons are as follows: Heads of the three branches of government
translation.ha: Shugabannin bangarori uku na gwamnati (shugaban kasa, shugaban majalisa da shugaban ma'aikatar shari'a).

translation.en: Jurisprudents of the Guardian Council
translation.ha: Masanan fikihu (fukaha') na majalisar kare kundin tsarin mulki.

translation.en: The secretary of the National Security Council
translation.ha: Babban sakataren majalisar koli ta tsaron kasa.

translation.en: The minister or chairperson of the relevant organization
translation.ha: Minista ko kuma shugaban cibiyar da bahasin da ake yi ya shafa.

translation.en: The chairperson of the relevant parliamentary commissions
translation.ha: 2- Membobin majalisar na hakika su ne:

translation.en: Mr. Hashemi Rafsanjani, Mr. Hajj Sheikh Ahmad Jannati, Mr. Vaez Tabasi, Mr. Amini Najafabadi, Mr. Seyyed Mahmoud Hashemi Shahroudi, Mr. Movahedi Kermani, Mr. Ali-Akbar Nategh-Nuri, Mr. Hajj Sheikh Hasan Sanei, Mr. Hasan Rouhani, Mr. Dorri Najafabadi, Mr. Gholam-Hossein Mohseni, Mr. Mahmoud Mohammadi Eraghi, Mr. Gholam-Reza Mesbahi Moghaddam, Mr. Majid Ansari, Mr. Gholam-Reza Aghazadeh, Mr. Ali Agha-Mohammadi, Mr. Mohammad-Javad Iravani, Mr. Mohammad-Reza Bahonar, Mr. Gholam-Ali Haddad Adel, Mr. Hasan Habibi, Mr. Davoud Danesh-Jafari, Mr. Parviz Davoudi, Mr. Mohsen Rezaei, Mr. Mohammad-Hossein Saffar Harandi, Mr. Habibollah Asgar-Oladi, Mr. Mohammad-Reza Aref, Mr. Mohammad Foruzandeh, Mr. Seyyed Hasan Firouzabadi, Mr. Ali Larijani, Mr. Hossein Mozzafar, Mr. Hossein Mohammadi, Mr. Seyyed Mostafa Mirsalim, Mr. Seyyed Morteza Nabavi, Mr. Ali-Akbar Velayati, Mr. Sadegh Vaezzadeh and Mr. Ahmad Vahidi.
translation.ha: Malamai: Sheikh Hashemi Rafsanjani, Hajj Sheikh Ahmad Jannati, Sheikh Wa'iz Tabasi, Malam Amini Najaf Abadi, Sayyid Mahmud Hashemi Shahrudi, Malam Mawahhidi Kermani, Sheikh Ali Akbar Natiq Nuri, Hajj Sheikh Hasan Sani'i, Sheikh Hasan Ruhani, Sheikh Dori Najaf Abadi, Malam Gholam Husain Muhsini, Sheikh Mahmud Muhammadi Araki, Malam Gholam Ridha Misbahi Moqaddam, Sheikh Majid Ansari. Sai kuma Malam Gholam Ridha Aghazadeh, Malam Ali Agha Muhammadi, Malam Muhammad Jawad Irawani, Malam Muhammad Ridha Bahonar, Malam Gholam Ali Haddad Adel, Malam Hasan Habibi, Malam Dawud Danesh Ja'afari, Malam Parvez Dawudi, Malam Muhsin Ridhayi, Malam Muhammad Husain Safarharandi, Malam Habibullah Asghar Awladi, Malam Muhammad Ridha Aref, Malam Muhammad Furuzande, Sayyid Hasan Firuz'abadi, Malam Ali Larijani, Malam Husain Muzaffar, Malam Husain Muhammadi, Malam Sayyid Mustafa Mirsalim, Malam Sayyid Murtadha Nabawi, Malam Ali Akbar Wilayati, Malam Sadiq Wa'iz Zadeh da kuma Malam Ahmad Wahidi.

translation.en: When discussing the bills that the Majlis and the Guardian Council cannot agree on, the meetings of the council will consist of all the above-mentioned members.
translation.ha: Ina sake jaddadawa kan bin dukkanin umurnin da aka bayar a baya da kuma sauransu wadanda aka yi bayaninsu cikin takardar da take tare da wannan.

translation.en: Besides stressing full implementation of the recommendations announced during the previous terms, other points will be attached to this hukm and announced subsequently. I deem it necessary to express my gratitude for the efforts of the esteemed previous members of the council.
translation.ha: Lalle ina ganin wajibi ne a kaina in gode da kuma jinjinawa ‘yan'uwa masu girma da suka kasance membobin wannan majalisa a karon da ya gabata sannan a halin yanzu kuma ba sa cikin wannan majalisar saboda irin kokari da wahalar da suka sha.

translation.en: In closing, I advise the esteemed members of this term to truly observe expedience, righteousness, steadfastness, justice, comprehensiveness and interests of the system and to have an active presence in the meetings of the council and the relevant commissions.
translation.ha: Daga karshe ina kiran membobin wannan majalisa na wannan karon da su ba da muhimmanci ga adalci, abubuwan da aka yi tarayyar cikinsu da kuma lura da maslahar wannan tsari da dukkanin ma'anar kalma sannan kuma su zamanto masu halartar dukkanin zaman majalisar da kwamitocinta.

translation.en: And I pray to God to make the gentlemen successful in fulfilling the important responsibility that they have taken on in the new term.
translation.ha: Sannan kuma ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya ba su dukkanin dacewa wajen sauke wannan aiki mai nauyin gake da ke wuyansu.

translation.en: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Khamenei

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da sunan Allah mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai.

translation.en: Today is the seventh day of the martyrdom of a group of our faithful and sincere fellow countrymen in Zahedan by bloodthirsty murderers and terrorists.
translation.ha: Mako guda ya cika daga yin shahadar mutane muminai kuma masu tsarkin niyya na Zahidan ta hannun masu laifi kuma 'yan ta'adda.

translation.en: In this bloody event, the evil and criminal hand of prejudiced and misguided Wahhabis - who were supported by foreign espionage organizations - left families and hearts bereaved, hearts that had been enlightened by the light of love and respect for the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) household and purified by the light of pure knowledge and monotheism.
translation.ha: A cikin wannan zubar da jinin, hannuwan mabarnata masu laifi, karkatattun masu bakar gaba na wahabiyanci ya fito fili tare kuma da samun taimakon masu son haddasa fitina na kungiyoyin leken asirin kasashen waje. Zukata sun girgiza kuma iyalai sun fada cikin alhini da kuma tafasar zukatansu a cikin kaunar ahlul-Baiti amincin Allah a gare su, kuma zukatan su ka tsarkaka da hasken ilimi da tsarkakken tauhidi.

translation.en: Blind, ignorant and criminal bigots put their misguided heart and dark nature at the service of the corrupt powers who have proven their enmity towards Islam and Muslims on numerous occasions, and they have shown their enmity and spite towards Muslims and have struck blows whenever and wherever they could.
translation.ha: Masu makauniyar kiyayya, jahilai sannan kuma masu kisa wadanda su ke da karkatacciyar zuciya da bakar aniya, sun mika kansu ga gurbatattun manyan kasashe wadanda a lokuta da dama sun nuna kiyayyar da su ke yi wa Musulunci kuma a duk inda su ka sami dama sun nuna dagawa da kiyayyarsu ga musulmi a fili sun kuma yi yaki.

translation.en: Their enmity towards the Islamic Republic is because of the flag of Islam that has been raised in this country and the Islamic Republic's constant call to unity and Islamic power and glory.
translation.ha: Kiyayyar da su ke nunawa jamhuriyar Musulunci saboda daga tutar Musulunci ne a cikin wannan kasa da kuma kiran da ta ke yi na hadin kai a tsakanin musulmi da karfafa Musulunci da kuma daukaka shi.

translation.en: In this bloody event and similar events, one of the goals of the enemies is to foment discord among Muslims.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin manufofin makiya na kai wannan harin da aka zubar da jini da makamancinsa shi ne haddasa sabani a tsakanin musulmi.

translation.en: The Islamic Republic that has been the biggest and the most reliable supporter of oppressed Muslims in Gaza, Palestine, Afghanistan, Kashmir and other Muslim areas is now the target of this evil plot hatched by the espionage organizations of America, the Zionist regime and England which wrongly believe they will involve Iran in religious fitna and Shia-Sunni confrontation.
translation.ha: Jamhuriyar Musulunci wacce a cikin tsawon shekaru goma ta ke a matsayin mai bada kariya mafi girma ga al'ummar musulmin Gaza da Palasdinu da ake zalunta da kuma Afghanistan da Kashmir da sauran wuraren musulmi, haka ta kasance kuma haka ta ke a wannan lokacin. A wannan lokacin kungiyoyin leken asirin Amerika da haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila da Ingila sun nuste cikin shirya mata makirce-makirce saboda a tunaninsu ta za fada cikin fitinar mazhaba da rikici tsakanin shi'a da sunni.

translation.en: They are unaware of the fact that Sunni Muslims in Islamic Iran have frequently proven their loyalty to this sacred Islamic system just like their Shia brothers, and they have bravely and faithfully stood up against the arrogant powers and their mercenaries to defend the Islamic Republic and their dear homeland.
translation.ha: Sun mance da cewa ahlusunna na Iran tamkar yan'uwansu 'yan shi'a suna riko da wannan tsarin musuluncin mai tsarki sun kuma tabbatar da hakan sun kuma yi tsayin daka irin na masu imani wajen kalubalantar masu girman kai na duniya da 'yan korensu wajen kare jamhuriyar Musulunci da kasar Iran mai girma.

translation.en: Basically, the emergence and spread of brutal and blind terrorism in our region is the result of the evil policies of the US, Britain and their governmental and non-governmental mercenaries. All Muslims must oppose and fight against this sinister phenomenon which is a clear manifestation of corruption on earth and war against God.
translation.ha: Bayyanar ayyukan ta'addanci na dabbanci wanda ake yinsa ido rufe da kuma bunkasarsa a cikin wannan yankin namu tushenwa shi ne bakar siyasar Amerika da Ingila da 'yan korensu na gwamnatoci da kuma kungiyoyin da ba na gwamnati ba wanda ya zama wajibi ga dukkan musulmi su kalubalanci wannan bakin hali wanda yayi daidai da barna a bayan kasa da kuma fada da Ubangiji.

translation.en: All Sunni denominations of Iran as well as those of the neighboring countries - particularly Sunni religious scholars, intellectuals and academics - whose Islamic reputation has been targeted by these evil policies shoulder a heavier responsibility in this regard.
translation.ha: Dukkanin kungiyoyin ahlusunna a cikin Iran da kasashen makwabta wadanda wannan bakar siyasar ta ke shafar mutuncinsu, musamman ma dai malaman addini da masana da malaman jami'o'i, suna da nauyi mai girma akansu.

translation.en: Shia and Sunni scholars of Islamic and Arab countries should clarify for everyone the evil intentions which the enemies pursue through establishing and supporting sectarian terrorism.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne ga 'yan shi'a da sunni a cikin dukkan kasashen musulmi da na larabawa su zama masu yin bayani akan bakar siyasar makiya wacce ta ke son karfafa ayyukan ta'addanci da kuma sabani na mazhaba.

translation.en: And they should warn them against the great danger of creating religious fitnas, which is what the enemies desire.
translation.ha: Su kuma ja kunnen mutane akan hatsari mai girma da ya ke tattare da fitinar mazhana da shi ne babban fatan makiyan Musulunci.

translation.en: By Allah's permission, the Islamic Republic will not allow the elements of the global arrogance to create discord among Muslim brothers under such names as Wahhabism.
translation.ha: Da yardar Allah, Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran ba za ta bada dama ba manyan kasashen duniya masu girman kai su haifar da fitina a tsakanin 'yan'uwa musulmi ta hanyar fakewa da wahabiyanci da makamancinsa ba.

translation.en: The organizations in charge in all the three government branches must seriously oppose these enemies of security and unity of the country and penalize those who are behind these fitnas.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne ga dukkan cibiyoyi da jami'an gwamnati acikin kowane bangare uku na iko su yi aiki da nauyin da ya rataya a wuyansu wajen fuskantar masu adawa da tsaro da kuma hadin kan kasa su kuma hukunta masu haddasa fitina.

translation.en: And they should help the officials of the country fulfill their duties.
translation.ha: Su kuma mutane muminai su ci gaba da zama cikin kwanciyar hankali da kuma aiki da basira sannan kuma su sanar da jami'an kasa akan duk wani yunkuri mara tsari.

translation.en: I send my regards to the souls of the dear martyrs of the bloody event in Zahedan, who were martyred on the birth anniversary of Imam Hussein (a.s.).
translation.ha: Ina mai yin jinjina ga ruhin wadanda su ka yi shahida lokacin wannan harin da aka zubar da jini a Zahidan wadanda su ka koma ga Allah a daidai lokacin tunawa da ranar haihuwar shugaban shahidai amincin Allah a gare shi da kuma yabo.

translation.en: I also extend my sympathy to the dear and honorable families of these martyrs and pray to God to bestow patience, forbearance and rewards on the families of these martyrs.
translation.ha: Ina kuma taya iyalansu bakin ciki ina kuma rokon Allah akan ya basu hakuri da nutsuwa da kuma lada da sakamako da kuma rokon samun sauki ga wadanda su ka jikkata.

translation.en: Greetings be upon Allah's pious servants
translation.ha: Amincin Allah ya tabbata ga bayinsa salihai da rahamarsa da kuma albarkatunsu.

translation.en: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Khamnei.

translation.en: Leader Attends Graduation Ceremony at Shahid Sattari University - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Ya Halarci Bukin Yaye Daliban Jami'oin Soji

translation.en: Speaking at the ceremony, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that the Islamic Republic's model of power is based on faith, trust in God and sincere efforts to achieve lofty ideals.
translation.ha: A safiyar yau laraba (10-11-2010) ne Jagoran Juyin Juya Halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya halarci bukin yaye daliban jami'oin sojin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran da aka gudanar da shi a jami'ar sojin sama na Shahid Sattari.

translation.en: He reiterated: "Relying on religious faith, the Armed Forces, including the Islamic Republic of Iran's Army, have managed to achieve notable advances in producing military equipment, and the Air Force has been a pioneer in this regard."
translation.ha: A lokacin da yake gabatar da jawabinsa, Jagoran Juyin Juya Halin Musulunci ya bayyana cewa tsayin dakan tsarin Musulunci na Iran ya ginu ne bisa asasin imani, dogaro da Allah da kuma kokari cikin tsarkin zuciya a kan tafarkin isa da manyan manufofi na Juyin Juya Halin Musulunci yana mai cewa: Dakarun kasar Iran ciki kuwa har da sojojin jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran sakamakon dogara da Allah (imani) sun sami nasarar kera makamai na soji na zamani wanda sojojin sama sun kasance a sahun farko-farko na wannan nasara da aka samu.

translation.en: The Commander-in-Chief of the Iranian Armed Forces said that having a divine and human goal and a heartfelt bond with the people are two characteristics of the Islamic Republic of Iran's Army.
translation.ha: Babban kwamandan sojojin na Iran ya bayyana manufa ta Ubangiji da ta dan'adam da kuma samun matsayi cikin zukatan mutane a matsayin wadansu siffofi guda biyu da dakarun sojin jamhuriyar Musulunci suka kebanta da su.

translation.en: He added: "In the Islamic Republic's model of power, discipline, military equipment and training have an important role, but the divine sense of responsibility and reliance on Allah the Exalted are the spirit of all these means."
translation.ha: Daga nan sai ya ce: A fagen karfi da tsayin daka na tsarin Musulunci na Iran, tsari da makamai na soji da kuma samun horarwa ta soji suna da muhimmanci, to amma ruhin dukkanin wadannan abubuwa shi ne jin cewa akwai wani takalifi na Ubangiji da kuma dogaro da shi Madaukakin Sarki.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei stressed that material powers whose model of power is based solely on military equipment and material calculations are not able to defeat a nation that has an Islamic model of power. "The victory of the Islamic Revolution was a clear example of superiority of spiritual power over material power. By relying on religious faith, the Iranian nation managed to defeat the Shah's satanic regime with empty hands."
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana cewar ko shakka babu ma'abota karfi na duniya wadanda suka dogara da karfi na makami da sauran abubuwa na duniya ba za su iya samun nasara a kan al'ummar da ta dogara da karfi na Musulunci ba. Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: babban misalin da ke nuni da irin nasarar da karfi na Ubangiji yake da ita a kan karfi na duniya ita ce nasarar da Juyin Juya Halin Musulunci ya samu (a kasar Iran) yayin da al'ummar Iran hannun rabbana amma tare da dogaro da imani su ka kawar da gwamnatin dagutu ta Shah.

translation.en: His Eminence referred to the victory of the Iranian nation in the imposed war as another example of superiority of spiritual power over material power and added: "Amid comprehensive sanctions during the Sacred Defense Era, the Iranian nation managed to defeat the corrupt Ba'ath Party - which was receiving full support from the east and the west - by relying on the faith and courage of its youth and Armed Forces."
translation.ha: Jagoran ya bayyana nasarar da al'ummar Iran suka samu a lokacin kallafaffen yaki a matsayin wani misali da ke nuni da wannan lamari yana mai cewa: A lokacin kallafaffen yaki, duk kuwa da irin takunkumin da aka dankara mata, amma al'ummar Iran ta sami nasara a kan lalatacciyar gwamnatin Ba'athawa ta Iraki da take samun dukkanin goyon bayan kasashen yammaci da gabashi sakamakon dogaro da imanin da suke da shi da kuma jaruntakar matasa da dakarunsu masu makami.

translation.en: The Commander-in-Chief of the Iranian Armed Forces said that strengthening self-reliance and helping talents blossom are one of the characteristics of Islamic power.
translation.ha: Babban kwamandan sojin na Iran ya bayyana cewar daya daga siffofin da tsayin daka na Musulunci ya kebanta da ita ita ce karfafa irin karfin da yake da shi.

translation.en: He stressed: "According to the Islamic model of power, one can be independent of the arrogant powers of the world and build Armed Forces that are equipped with intellectual products of Iranian minds."
translation.ha: Daga nan sai ya ce: A bisa tsarin tsayin daka na Musulunci ana iya wadatuwa daga ma'abota girman kai na duniya.

translation.en: His Eminence stressed that the path of perfection and prosperity is endless and reiterated: "Military academies of the Armed Forces are among the most promising scientific centers of the country."
translation.ha: Jagoran ya kirayi daliban jami'an na jami'an sojin da su ci gaba da riko da tafarkin shahidai da kuma ba da himma wajen ci gaban kasa.

translation.en: Leader's Message to Union of Islamic Students Associations in Europe - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Ya Aike Da Sako Ga Taron Hadin Gwuiwan Kungiyoyi Musulunci Na Daliban Iran A Turai

translation.en: The following is the full text of the message by Ayatollah Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution, to the participants of the 48th annual meeting of the Union of the Islamic Students Associations in Europe.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei, cikin wani sako da ya aike wa mahalarta taron shekara shekara na hadin gwiwan kungiyoyin Musulunci na daliban Iran a jami'oin kasashen Turai karo na 48, ya bayyana cewar: ‘Ya'yan al'ummar Iran da a halin yanzu suke karatu a jami'oi daban-daban na duniya, tamkar wata bishiya ce da ta kama kasa wacce kuma da yardar Allah za ta ba da ‘ya'yanta masu amfani da kima ga al'ummar wannan kasar.

translation.en: The message was read out on January 18, 2014 by Hojjatolislam wal-Muslemin Javad Ejeyi - the Leader's representative in charge of academic affairs in Europe - in Imam Ali Islamic Center in Vienna.
translation.ha: Abin da ke biye fassarar sakon Jagoran ne wanda wakilin Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin kan harkokin daliban Iran da suke karatu a jami'oin kasashen Turai Hujjatul Islam wal muslimin Jawad Ejai ya karanta a wajen wannan taro da aka gudanar a Cibiyar Musulunci ta Imam Ali (a.s) da ke birnin Vienna, babban birnin Austria:

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: The youth and children of the Iranian nation who are acquiring knowledge in different universities throughout the world are valuable saplings which have their roots in fertile soil of their own country. Like their brothers and sisters in the dynamic and active universities of the country, they will provide their country and their people with valuable fruits.
translation.ha: Matasa da ‘ya'yan al'ummar Iran da a halin yanzu suke karatu a jami'oi daban-daban na duniya, haka nan sauran ‘yan'uwansu maza da mata da suke karatu a rayayyun jami'oin cikin gida, tamkar wata bishiya ce da ta kama kasa wacce kuma da yardar Allah za ta ba da ‘ya'yanta masu amfani da kima ga al'ummar wannan kasar.

translation.en: This is the idea that Iranian students, anywhere in the world, should always bear in mind.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne abin da ya kamata ya zamanto abin tunani da kuma ba da himmar daliban Iran da suke karatu a bangarori daban-daban na duniya.

translation.en: The quality of your learning, the field of study that you choose to study and the spirit which shapes your identity during your education should be based on this idea.
translation.ha: Yadda kuke karatu da kuma bangaren ilimin da kuka zaba da kuma irin halayenku yayin karatun su ne za su bayyanar da yanayinku.

translation.en: It is this idea which should determine your path.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne ku yi riko da wannan tunani da tafarki mai haske da kuma tsara hanyar daga shi.

translation.en: In the exciting process of changing from a student into a manager and an outstanding personality in the future, reliance on God and asking for His kindness and mercy will help you more than everything else.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne, sama da komai, ku dogara da Allah da neman taimako da rahamarSa tsawon wannan lokaci mai cike da kumaji na sauyi daga dalibta a yau, zuwa ga jami'ai da fitattun mutane a gobe.

translation.en: This is what cultivates your talents, solidifies your steps and comforts your hearts.
translation.ha: Hakan shi ne abin da zai fadada kwarewarku da karfafa kokarinku sannan da kuma kwantar muku da zukatanku.

translation.en: I entrust all of you to Allah the Great and I will pray for you.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya tabbatar da makoma mai kyau a gare ku da kuma wannan kasa (ta mu).

translation.en: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Khamenei

translation.en: Leader's Speech to Exemplary Laborers - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Dubban Ma'aikatan Kasar Iran

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on April 28, 2010 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution to a large group of laborers in Tehran.
translation.ha: Shimfida: A ranar laraba 28, Aprilun 2010 ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da dubban ma'aikatan kasar Iran da suka fito daga bangarori daban-daban na kasar don tunawa da ranar ma'aikata.

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: Laborers' Week does not just belong to our esteemed laborers - it belongs to all Iranians. This is because the working class is in fact one of the leaders of the public efforts to built the future of the country.
translation.ha: Ranakun makon ma'aikata ba wai kawai sun ta'allaka ne da ma'aikatanmu masu girma ba ne; sun ta'allaka ne da dukkanin iraniyawa; don kuwa alal hakika gungun ma'aikata suna daga cikin sahun farko-farko na kokari na gaba dayan al'ummar Iran wajen gina gobe.

translation.en: What Islam says about laborers - in the general sense of the word - is not simply a ceremonial gesture to make them feel happy.
translation.ha: Abin da Musulunci ya fadi dangane da ma'aikata - a ma'ana ta gaba daya - ba wai fulako ba ne; ba wai don faranta rai ba ne.

translation.en: The fact that the Holy Prophet of Islam (s.w.a.) bowed to kiss the hand of a laborer cannot be interpreted as a ceremonial gesture. That was an effort to create a cultural norm. That was a lesson which was intended to make the Islamic Ummah appreciate laborers and their efforts throughout history.
translation.ha: Yayin da Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a.) yake sunkuyar da kai da kuma sumbantar hannun wani ma'aikaci (lebura), babu yadda za a iya fassara hakan da cewa wani lamari ne na fulako kawai; samar da wata al'ada ce; darasi ne; hakan saboda a girmama da kuma jinjinawa gagarumin aikin ma'aikata a cikin al'ummar musulmi tsawon tarihi ne.

translation.en: And that is how I think of the working class.
translation.ha: Dukkanin ma'aikata, kanana ne ko kuma kwararru, injiniyoyi, masu tsare-tsare da dukkanin wadanda suke kokari a fagen samar da aiki da abubuwan da ake bukata, sun shiga cikin wannan girmamawa da kuma jinjinawa ta Musulunci. Bukata ta ma'aikaci - wadda bukata ce ta abin duniya - tana nan a inda take; wajibi ne kowa da kowa ya ba da himma wajen tabbatar da wadannan bukatu wadanda suke hakkinsu ne; to sai dai kuma akwai wata bukatar wacce ta ruhi da lahira ce, wanda shi ne matsayi na ma'aikaci; muhimmantar da kokari da ayyukan ma'aikata; a fahimci cewa hakan jihadi ne; wannan shi ne yake da muhimmanci.

translation.en: This is an important point.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne abin da Musulunci yake so.

translation.en: That is the Islamic view of labor, and it is my heartfelt belief.
translation.ha: Wannan, shi ne imanin da muke da shi.

translation.en: There is a great difference between this view of labor and materialistic views, including those of the capitalist and socialist camps where laborers are viewed as tools.
translation.ha: Akwai gagarumar tazara tsakanin wannan mahangar da kuma mahanga irin ta abin duniya, shin ta duniyar 'yan jari hujja ko ce kuma ta 'yan gurguzu wadanda suke ganin ma'aikaci a matsayin wani kayan aiki.

translation.en: There is a great difference between this view of labor and the view that considers laborers as mujahids fighting on the path of God.
translation.ha: Akwai gagarumar tazara a tsakaninsu; wannan lamari ne da ya zama wajibi, wannan ita ce bukata ta hakika da ake da ita.

translation.en: This is the genuine need in this regard. In the Islamic Republic the working class has emerged victorious out of different tests since the beginning of the Revolution.
translation.ha: A tsarin Musulunci, a Jamhuriyar Musulunci mai girma ta kasar mu, tun farko nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci har zuwa yau, ma'aikata sun ba da gagarumar gudummawa.

translation.en: During the Sacred Defense Era everybody was witness to the presence of laborers from agricultural, industrial, and service sectors of the country and from urban and rural areas. Everybody was witness to their presence on military and logistic fronts. Everybody saw that our laborers played a role during the 8 years of defense.
translation.ha: A lokacin kallafaffen yaki, dukkanin mutanen da suka kasance a lokacin sun shaida da kuma ganin irin kasantuwar ma'aikata, ma'aikatan garuruwa da kauyuka, ma'aikatan masana'antu da bangaren aikin gona, ma'aikata masu hidima da wasunsu; kowa ya ga irin kasantuwarsu a fagagen soji ko kuma ba da kariya ta soji, kowa ya ga irin gagarumar gudummawar da ma'aikatanmu suka bayar tsawon wadannan shekaru takwas na kariya.

translation.en: Apart from this, since the Revolution laborers have been among the most successful people in the Islamic Republic in different tests.
translation.ha: Baya ga hakan, tun daga farkon nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci har zuwa yau, ma'aikata a tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci sun ba da daya daga cikin gagarumar jarrabawa.

translation.en: As you know, the working class and the slogans that are prepared for this social class throughout the world have always been used as a lever to pressure governments.
translation.ha: Kun san irin take na siyasa da ake rerawa dangane da abin da ya shafi ma'aikata a duniya, shi ne yadda aka mai da ma'aikata suka zamanto daya daga cikin hanyar matsin lamba wa hukumomi.

translation.en: Since the beginning of the Revolution, some enemies tried to deploy the working class against the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: A tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci, tun daga ranar farko makiya sun yi iyakacin kokarinsu wajen ganin sun yi amfani da ma'aikata wajen matsin lamba a kan Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

translation.en: On Bahman 20-22, 1357, I visited one of the factories on Karaj Highway several times because I had received some troubling news. I received the news from the laborers who were working for the factory.
translation.ha: Ni din nan na shaidi cewa a ranar sha tara da ashirin da ashirin da daya da ashirin da biyu na watan Bahman 1357 (8-11, Fabrairun 1979 wato ranakun da aka samu nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci) labarai daban-daban suna ta zuwa mana na faruwar 'yan wasu abubuwa, na tafi daya daga cikin kamfanonin da suke garin Karaj.

translation.en: I decided to go there.
translation.ha: Na tafi wajen.

translation.en: That is to say, there were other people who were not working for the factory.
translation.ha: Amma mutanen da suka taru a wajen dakin taron sun kai mutane dari bakwai zuwa dari takwas; wato wasu ma wadanda ba ma'aikatan ba sun zo.

translation.en: For several days I went to that factory early in the morning and came back late in the evening. One day I stood at a podium and spoke to them for nearly 7 hours! One of them came up and started reasoning and shouting slogans.
