translation.ha: Kwanaki na yi ina zuwa wannan kamfani da safe in dawo da yamma, in tafi da safiya in dawo da dare; akwai wata ranar da na yi awanni bakwai ina magana; wasu su zo su yi magana ni kuma in ba da amsa da kuma karin bayani.

translation.en: Eventually, the laborers themselves forced those disruptive elements to leave the factory. Ever since that day inventing political slogans and using laborers as political levers against the Islamic Republic have been among the plots of the enemies of Islam and the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Tun daga wancan lokacin har zuwa yanzu, samar da yanayi na siyasa da amfani da lamurra na siyasa da kuma amfani da ma'aikata wajen fada da Musulunci da tsarin Musulunci suna daga cikin shirye-shiryen makiya Musulunci da makiya Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

translation.en: For 30 years they have been trying to use such levers against the Islamic Republic, and our laborers have made them disappointed each time.
translation.ha: Shekaru talatin kenan suke ta kokari wajen amfani da wannan hanya a kan Jamhuriyar Musulunci, sannan kuma shekaru talatin kenan ma'aikatan suke bada musu kasa a idanuwansu.

translation.en: This shows the close relationship between our working class and the Islamic Republic, a relationship that is based on religious faith and the firm foundations on which the Islamic Republic has been established.
translation.ha: Wannan so da kauna da take tsakanin ma'aikata da tsarin Musulunci ta ginu ne bisa asasi na imani; ta dogara ne da wannan tushe mai karfi da tsarin Musulunci ya kafu sakamakonsa.

translation.en: Let us have a look at the nature of this matter.
translation.ha: To yanzu bari mu yi dubi cikin asalin lamarin.

translation.en: First and foremost, the material progress of the country is based on two factors.
translation.ha: Matukar babu ilimi, to kuwa abubuwan da ake samarwa za su fuskanci matsala; kasa tana ci gaba ne ta hanyar ilimi.

translation.en: Production will be thwarted in the absence of knowledge. A country can make progress only if it has access to knowledge. If knowledge is available, but production is not based on this knowledge, the country will make no progress.
translation.ha: Matukar aka sami ilimi, amma sai ya zamana ba a samu sauyi irin na abubuwan da ake samarwa da kuma samun kamala sakamakon wannan ilimin da kuma tushe na ilimi ba, to duk da haka kasa za ta samu makin yabo.

translation.en: During the reign of taghut the problem was that we did not have knowledge, and our production was not knowledge-based and thriving.
translation.ha: Aibin da ke cikin aikin mu a lokacin mulkin dagutu (mulkin Shah) shi ne cewa ba ma da ilimin, sakamakon rashin ilimi hakan sai ya sanya ba mu da kere-keren da suka ginu bisa asasi na ilimi.

translation.en: But due to the reign of taghut and different other factors, we fell behind. If we are determined to compensate for this backwardness, we must pay attention to knowledge and production. We want to make up for the backwardness, and our nation has started its movement and has made considerable progress already.
translation.ha: Idan har muna son mu cike gurbin (irin wannan koma bayan da aka samu) - wanda kuma muna son hakan, sannan kuma al'ummarmu ma sun yunkura kuma ya zuwa wani haddi sun sami ci gaba - wajibi ne mu ba da muhimmanci ga ilimi da samar da abubuwan da ake bukata; wajibi ne a bi wannan lamari a cibiyoyi na ilimi da kuma na bincike.

translation.en: I have repeatedly emphasized the issue of knowledge for several years, and scientific progress and generation of knowledge are thankfully well under way in the country. Of course this process should be accelerated.
translation.ha: Shekara da shekaru kenan nake jaddadawa dangane da batun ilimi, alhamdu lillahi yunkurin ilimi da samar da ilimi a kasar nan yana ci gaba da tafiya; to sai dai duk da haka wajibi ne ya kara irin saurin da yake da shi.

translation.en: Both in industrial and agricultural areas, production is of primary importance. A country that fails to engage in production will inevitably become dependant.
translation.ha: Kasar da ba ta samar da wasu abubuwa na bukata, tana so ko ba ta so za ta zamanto mai dogaro da wasu.

translation.en: Even if all the oil and gas resources of the world were ours, they would not be of much use to us. As you know, there are some countries that are very rich in terms of their mineral and natural resources - including energy resources as well as precious and rare metals - but they are living an absolutely miserable life in abject poverty.
translation.ha: Idan da a ce dukkanin man fetur da iskar gas na duniya an tara su ne a karkashin kasar mu da kuma rijiyoyinmu, da ba za su amfane mu ba; kamar yadda kuke ganin akwai wadansu kasashe wadanda a bangaren albarkatun kasa - shin albarkatu ne na makamashi ko kuma karafa masu tsananin kima - suna da dukiya mai yawa; to amma suna rayuwa mai wahala da tada hankali duk kuwa da suna rayuwa ne a saman wannan dukiyar.

translation.en: Production must be stepped up in the country, especially knowledge-based production - production that is based on knowledge and scientific findings.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne irin abubuwan da ake samarwa a kasa - musamman samar da ilimi na asasi wanda ya dogara bisa tushe na masaniya da kwarewa - su ci gaba.

translation.en: This is in the hands of labor and management.
translation.ha: Hakan kuwa yana hannun ma'aikata da wadanda suke daukansu aiki ne.

translation.en: And the government has a duty to organize labor and management.
translation.ha: Wannan siyasa ta 44 (da take magana kan mayar da hannun jari zuwa ga bangarorin da ba na gwamnati ba) da a cikin 'yan shekarun nan muka gabatar wa gwamnati da masu yin doka, za ta iya taka gagarumar rawa (a wannan bangaren); wajibi ne kowa da kowa ya ba da himma da sanya ido sosai.

translation.en: It is necessary to implement all of them, but government officials should be careful not to let them become a satanic trap.
translation.ha: An yi hakan; don haka wajibi ne kowa da kowa ya zamanto cikin fadaka.

translation.en: The next point that I would like to discuss is the relationship between labor and management.
translation.ha: Wani batun kuma na daban dangane da abin da ya shafi aiki, shi ne alaka ta ma'aikaci da wanda yake masa aikin.

translation.en: Both of the views that are common in the modern world - that is, socialist and capitalist views of labor - are wrong.
translation.ha: Dukkanin hanyoyi biyun da a halin yanzu ake da su a duniya kuma aka sansu - wato tafarkin 'yan gurguzu da na 'yan jari hujja - dukkaninsu kuskure ne.

translation.en: From a socialist point of view, labor and management are considered enemies of one another. Labor and management are two enemies that are thirsty for one another's blood. This was how they interpreted the relationship.
translation.ha: A bisa tunani da mahangar 'yan gurguzu, ma'aikaci da wadanda suka dauke shi aiki abokan gaban juna ne, suna fuskantar junansu ne; makiya ne guda biyu, suna kishirwar jinin junansu; haka suke ganin lamarin.

translation.en: And the solution they suggested - that is to say, state ownership of all production resources and tools - was also problematic and wrong. Their solution resulted in that disgrace in just a few decades.
translation.ha: Mafitar da suka bayyana, mafita ce ta bata kuma ta kuskure: dukkanin mallaka a kan dukkanin abubuwan da ake samarwa ta gwamnati ce; sakamakon hakan bayan gushewar wasu gomomin shekaru, shi ne irin wadannan munanan abubuwa.

translation.en: The socialist view that considers labor and management as enemies is one view of labor. According to another view, which is completely western, management is considered to be in full control of labor, and labor is seen as a simple tool in the hands of management.
translation.ha: Wannan wata mahanga ce, wadda mahanga ce ta gaba da kuma kiyayya tsakanin ma'aikata da wadanda suka dauke su aiki. Mahanga ta daban kuma ita ce mahangar kasashen yammaci wato wanda ma'aikata suke wa aiki, sarki ne a kan ma'aikatansu, shi ne yake da iko a kansu, ma'aikaci wani kayan aiki ne kawai a hannun wadanda suka duke shi aikin.

translation.en: Both views of labor are wrong.
translation.ha: Hakan kaskantar da mutum ne; dukkanin wadannan mahanga guda biyu kuskure ne.

translation.en: Islam has a different view of labor.
translation.ha: Wannan ba ita ce mahangar Musulunci ba.

translation.en: From an Islamic point of view, the relationship between labor and management is one of cooperation.
translation.ha: Mahangar Musulunci, mahanga ce ta aiki kafada da kafada.

translation.en: Labor and management are two elements that produce results when they work in conjunction. Contrary to the Marxist view according to which everything is based on opposition, the Islamic view of labor is one of compassion and cooperation. Thankfully, the Marxist view has disappeared from the philosophical schools of thought in the world.
translation.ha: Wadannan mutane biyu (ma'aikaci da wanda ya dauke shi aiki) abokan juna ne; a lokacin da suka hadu waje guda, sai a samar da aiki. Sabanin mahanga ta markisanci da suke ganin komai a matsayin kishiya - alhamdu lillahi an riga da an shafe hakan daga shafin tunani da falsafar duniya - mahangar Musulunci, mahanga ce ta magani; mahanga ce ta aiki kafada da kafada.

translation.en: This is the Islamic view, which is in line with the laws of nature.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce mahangar Musulunci; mahanga ta dabi'a, mahangar ta sunnar Ubangiji da kuma saukakkun dokoki.

translation.en: This is true of everything else in the world, including natural phenomena as well as political, historical, and economic matters.
translation.ha: Haka lamarin ya kasance cikin dukkanin lamurran da suka shafi duniya; kama daga lamurra na dabi'a, har zuwa ga na siyasa, zuwa ga lamurra na tarihi, tattalin arziki da ma wadanda ba na tattalin arizikin ba.

translation.en: In contrast with the Marxist view which is based on opposition, the Islamic view is generally based on compassion, cooperation, and common goals. This is true of labor and management as well - labor and management are seen as two elements that have to work shoulder to shoulder in order to give rise to production.
translation.ha: Mahangar Musulunci a gaban irin wannan mahangar da kiyayya ta markisanci, mahanga ce ta samar da magani da hadin gwuiwa da kuma tafiya kafada da kafada. A cikin lamarin ma'aikaci da wadanda suka dauke su aiki haka lamarin yake; wasu bangarori biyu ne, wajibi ne su hada hannuwansu waje guda don samar da aiki, don a samar da abin da ake bukata.

translation.en: In addition to material progress, there will be spirituality as well.
translation.ha: Baya ga ci gaba na abin duniya, za a kuma samar da abubuwa da suke karfafa ruhi.

translation.en: That is our view of labor and management.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce mahangar mu.

translation.en: This is the foundation.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne tushen aiki.

translation.en: Everybody must channel their efforts in this direction. Policy-makers, politicians, and executive officials should all move in this direction.
translation.ha: Masu tsara shirye-shirye, masu tsara siyasa, 'yan siyasa da kuma mutanen da suke matakin gudanarwa, wajibi ne su gudanar ayyukansu bisa wannan tafarkin.

translation.en: Labor and management should make efforts in a truly sincere manner in order to help the country make progress as a result of their work.
translation.ha: A irin wannan lokacin, wajibi ne ma'aikata da kuma masu daukan ma'aikata su gudanar da ayyukansu cikin ikhlasi sannan kuma su yi kokari wajen ganin sakamakon aikinsu ya zamanto ciyar da kasa gaba ne.

translation.en: My dear people, we have fallen behind.
translation.ha: Ya ku masoyana! An bar mu a baya.

translation.en: Of course we have made a lot of progress compared to the time of taghut.
translation.ha: Ko da yake idan kuka kwatanta hakan da lokacin dagutu, mun ci gaba sosai.

translation.en: During the reign of taghut, we had to depend on foreigners even for the smallest elements of production and machinery.
translation.ha: A lokacin dagutu, don samar da komai kashin abubuwan da ake bukata a masana'antu da injuna sai mun bukaci ‘yan kasashen waje.

translation.en: And the factories that had been built in the country were used to assemble products imported in parts, and they were purely dependant on foreigners.
translation.ha: Kamfanonin da ma suke kera abubuwa, kamfanoni ne da suka damfara da ‘yan kasashen waje dari bisa dari.

translation.en: We did not know how to design or develop what we needed. Neither did we know how to identify the necessary elements.
translation.ha: Ba yadda ake tsare-tsare suka sani ba, haka nan ba su san yadda ake kera abubuwa ba.

translation.en: Today the Iranian nation is exporting technical services.
translation.ha: A yau al'ummar Iran suna ba wasu ne ma kwarewa ta kere-kere.

translation.en: Today your country is one of the most advanced and prominent countries in the field of manufacturing dams and power plants.
translation.ha: A yau kasarku tana daga cikin fitattun kasashen da suka yi fice a bangaren gina madatsar ruwa da cibiyoyin wutan lantarki a duk fadin duniya.

translation.en: You are in the process of establishing production lines in many countries of the world.
translation.ha: A da dama daga cikin kasashen duniya ana nan ana ta gina kamfanoni.

translation.en: These things were scoffed at during the reign of taghut.
translation.ha: Irin wadannan maganganu ma dai ba su da wata ma'ana a lokacin mulkin dagutu.

translation.en: At that time it would be absurd if you said our country had to go and establish production lines in a highly populated, wealthy, and oil-rich country. Industrial production and other such things were rejected as absurd. But today we have already achieved these things.
translation.ha: Mu je wata kasa, ma'abociyar al'umma da yawa, a wasu lokuta ma tana da man fetur, tana da dukiya, mu je mu kafa musu kamfani?! Mu kafa musu masana'antu?! Ba a ma irin wadannan maganganu a wancan lokacin, to amma a yau kan hakan ta tabbata.

translation.en: Therefore, we have made a lot of progress compared with the past. But we have fallen behind compared with what the Iranian nation and its historical legacy deserve and the position our country deserves among the countries of the world.
translation.ha: A saboda haka mun ci gaba sosai idan aka kwatanta hakan da shekarun bayanmu; to sai dai dangane da irin matsayin da al'ummar Iran suke da shi, dangane da abin da yayi daidai da irin tarihinmu, dangane da abin da ya kamata Iran ta dinga nema a tsakankanin sauran kasashe na duniya; to lalle muna baya, wajibi ne mu ci gaba.

translation.en: There are a lot of things to be done.
translation.ha: Akwai ayyuka masu yawa da wajibi ne a aikata su.

translation.en: That was why I named this year as "The Year of Intensified Effort and Labor ".
translation.ha: Abin da ya sanya na yi maganar ‘rubanya himma' saboda hakan ne.

translation.en: Our efforts should not just be focused on removing the immediate obstacles from our path - this is not a great achievement. We must focus our efforts on reaching the peaks.
translation.ha: Bai kamata himmar ku ta zamanto kawai cewa mu din nan mun sami damar daga wannan dutsen ba - wannan ba wani abu ba ne - wajibi ne himmar mu ta zamanto mun kai ga koluluwa.

translation.en: That is the meaning of "intensified labor".
translation.ha: Hakan kuwa abu ne mai yiyuwa.

translation.en: My dear people, our capabilities are far beyond our current performance.
translation.ha: Irin damar da muke da ita ta fi hakan nesa ba kusa ba, Ya ku abin kaunata!

translation.en: Sometimes one may be asked to do something that is beyond one's capabilities. This would not be a wise demand.
translation.ha: A wani lokacin a kan samu wani ya gabatar wa wani mutum da wata shawarar aikata wani abu wanda ya ketare irin karfin da yake da shi; to wannan dai ya saba wa hankali.

translation.en: This is different from asking the same thing of a physically weak person who has no chance of becoming a good wrestler or gymnast even if he spends 20 years on it.
translation.ha: Akwai bambanci cikin hakan idan aka kwatanta shi da wani mutum mai rauni wanda ko da shekaru ashirin ya yi yana wasan motsa jiki ba zai iya zama wani dan kokawa na kwarai ba.

translation.en: The Iranian nation is like a talented and well-built youth who can become a world-renowned champion if he tries hard enough. The Iranian nation is like that, and it has proven this.
translation.ha: To al'ummar Iran tamkar wannan matashi mai manyan damatsa ne da kuma shiri wanda idan har ya yi kokarin da ya kamata, to kuwa zai isa ga wannan koli, zai iya zama zakara. Haka al'ummar Iran take, ta kuma nuna hakan.

translation.en: These are not just empty claims. These realities are based on objective findings.
translation.ha: Wadannan ba wai ikirari ba ne; wadannan abubuwa ne na hakika wadanda suka fito mana fili ta hanyar bincike.

translation.en: And the experience of the past 30 years made it completely clear that the Iranian nation is capable of achieving these things.
translation.ha: Kwarewar da muka samu cikin wadannan shekaru talatin din sun tabbatar mana da hakan tamkar hasken rana.

translation.en: A nation that was helped by no one, a nation that was refused industrial products and technological advances managed to manufacture the second, third, and fourth generation centrifuges. All the countries that enjoy nuclear power and technology were left astonished.
translation.ha: Al'ummar da babu wani mutumin da ya ke taimaka mata, al'ummar da aka rufe mata dukkanin kofofin na masana'antu da kere-kere da kuma ci gaba na fasaha, to amma sai ga shi ta samu nasarar kera bututun tace sinadarin uranium da kanta; hakan ya ba wa dukkanin kasashen da suka mallaki fasahar nukiliya a duniya mamaki.

translation.en: They were asking themselves, "Who did they learn these things from?"
translation.ha: To a wajen wa suka koyi wannan?

translation.en: How many countries have access to this kind of technology in the world?
translation.ha: Kasashe nawa suke da irin wannan a duniya? Kasashe bakwai, takwas zuwa tara ne?

translation.en: Among all those countries that make extravagant claims regarding their stem cell technology, the Iranian nation suddenly managed to jump to the 8th position in the world.
translation.ha: Tsakanin dukkanin wadannan kasashen, dukkanin wadannan masu ikirari, kwatsam daga matsayi na ashirin - a matsayin misali - zuwa ga matsayi na takwas.

translation.en: What does this suggest?
translation.ha: Me wannan yake nunawa?

translation.en: The same is true of all other areas.
translation.ha: A dukkanin bangarori ma haka lamarin yake.

translation.en: What do these things mean?
translation.ha: To mene ne ma'anar hakan?

translation.en: Yes, we can.
translation.ha: A saboda haka lalle za mu iya.

translation.en: Intensified labor means that we should realize these potentials. The world that has deployed its forces against Iran is the world of arrogance. It is the world that is speaking to us through clenched teeth, the world that parades its bloody claws, the world that tries to create problems whenever it can.
translation.ha: Kasashen duniyar da suka shata daga a gaban al'ummar Iran da bude bakunansu da mike faratunsu da aikata munanan ayyuka sannan kuma a duk inda karfin su zai kai za su so haifar da matsala, su ne ma'abota girman kan duniya; duniyar nan tana karkashin tasiri da zaluncin tsarin ‘yan jari hujja ne.

translation.en: They could not do anything, and I assure you that they will not be able to do anything in the future either.
translation.ha: Sun gagara aikata komai, a nan gaba ma, ku san cewa, babu wani abin da za su iya.

translation.en: When one relies on these things and makes serious efforts, one becomes a manifestation of "those who believe and do good deeds" [a phrase frequently repeated in the Holy Quran]. You have faith and engage in good deeds.
translation.ha: A duk lokacin da aka samu wannan tabbaci sannan kuma mutum ya shigo da irin kokari da karfin da yake da shi fagen aiki, to hakan yana iya zama "hakika wadanda suka yi imani sannan kuma suka aikata ayyuka na kwarai"; wannan imani na ku da kuma wadannan ayyuka na kwarai na ku.

translation.en: In the Holy Quran, faithful people who engage in good deeds have been promised numerous rewards - success in this world, salvation in the hereafter, closeness to Allah the Exalted, honor, and dignity. These are all the result of faith and good deeds.
translation.ha: Irin wadannan alkawari da Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya yi wa muminan da suka aikata ayyuka na kwarai - nasara ta duniya da kuma sa'ada a lahira, kusaci da Allah Madaukakin Sarki, daukaka da nasara a duniya da lahira - wadannan su ne sakamako na wannan imani da kuma ayyuka na kwarai.

translation.en: We should continue treading this path.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne mu ci gaba da bin wannan tafarkin.

translation.en: May God bestow His grace and blessings on our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) who showed this path to us. He was the one who encouraged us to tread this path. He was the one who helped us.
translation.ha: Rahama da amincin Allah Madaukakin Sarki su tabbata ga Imaminmu mai girma wanda shi ne ya nuna mana wannan tafarki; shi ne ya sanya mu a bisa wannan tafarki; shi ne ya kama hannayenmu; shi ne wanda da irin wannan matsayi na Ubangiji da yake da shi ya farkar da mu sannan kuma ya kai mu zuwa ga wannan fagen.

translation.en: The more progress our nation makes, the more Allah the Exalted will increase his virtues.
translation.ha: Duk irin ci gaban da wannan kasar ta samu, to kuwa Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai kara irin ladan da wannan ma'abocin girma yake da su.

translation.en: Allah's grace and greetings be upon our martyrs, mujahids, those who made sacrifices on this path, and those who laid down their lives and entered the arena. God's grace be upon those who were martyred or disabled and their families.
translation.ha: Aminci da rahamar Allah su tabbata ga shahidanmu, ga mujahidanmu da kuma wadanda suka yi sadaukarwa a bisa wannan tafarkin, suka dauki rayukansu a kan tafin hannayensu, suka shigo tsakiyan fage; shin su kansu ne, ko kuma iyalansu, ko kuma wadanda suka yi shahada, ko kuma wadanda suka sami raunuka na jiki, ko kuma wadanda alhamdu lillahi suka saura ga al'ummar mu.

translation.en: I hope all of you will benefit from God's blessings and the prayers of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake).
translation.ha: Muna fatan dukkaninku za ku zamanto cikin dacewa ta Ubangiji da kuma kasantuwa cikin addu'oin mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi).

translation.en: Imam Khamenei issued message of condolences on passing of Afghanistan’s Marja’ - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Imam Khamenei Ya Aike Da Sakon Ta'aziyyar Rasuwar Ayatullah Zanjani

translation.en: In the name of Allah, the Most Beneficent, the Most Merciful,
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I would like to express my condolences on the passing away of the mujahid scholar, late Ayatollah Hajj Sheikh Muhammad Asef Mohseni, to all his enthusiasts in Afghanistan and in Iran, and to his honourable family.
translation.ha: Ina isar da sakon ta'aziyyar rasuwar babban malami marigayi Ayatullah Hajj Agha Izzuddeen Husaini Zanjani (yardar Allah ta tabbata a gare shi) ga dukkanin masoyansa a garuruwan Masshad da Zanjan haka nan kuma ga manyan malamai da makaranta Hauza sannan kuma musamman ga ‘ya'yansa da kuma iyalansa masu girma.

translation.en: Decades of fighting for the cause of God in the political, cultural, scientific and social areas in the Islamic country of Afghanistan, alongside the brave and zealous people of that land, reflects the proud record of this noble clergyman whose enduring blessings are a valuable spiritual legacy. I ask Allah to grant him mercy and paradise.
translation.ha: Tsawon lokaci marigayin wanda ya kasance daga cikin fitattun malamai masana ya kasance abin komawar masana kama daga garin Zanjan har zuwa tsawon lokacin da ya shafe a garin Masshad mai tsarki, sannan kuma ya kasance mai shiryar da al'umma daban-daban. Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya kara masa girman matsayi sannan kuma ya albarkaci abubuwan da ya bari.

translation.en: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Khamenei

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of all sentient beings, and greetings be upon our Master, Muhammad Al-Mustafa, and upon his immaculate household and select companions.
translation.ha: Dukkan godiya ta tabbata ga Allah Ubangijin talikai. Tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata ga shugabanmu Muhammadu al-Mustafa tare da Alayensa tsarkaka da kuma zababbun sahabbansa.

translation.en: The Ka’bah, the secret behind unity and dignity and the symbol of monotheism and spirituality, is host to enthusiastic and hopeful hearts in the hajj season who have responded to and accepted the call of Allah the Exalted and have rushed towards the birthplace of Islam.
translation.ha: A yayin aiki hajji, Dakin Ka’aba, wanda alama ce ta hadin kai da daukaka, haka nan kuma alama ce ta tauhidi da ababen da suke kyautata ruhi, masaukin baki ne na zukatan da suke cike da kauna da kyakkyawan fata da suka fito daga bangarori daban-daban na duniya da taruwa a mahaifar Musulunci suna masu amsa kiran Ubangiji Madaukakin Sarki.

translation.en: The Islamic Ummah can now see a condensed picture of its vastness and variety and the depth of religious faith that rules the hearts of this righteous religion with the eyes of its representatives who have gathered here from the four corners of the world.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu al’ummar musulmi za su iya ganin irin girma da yawan da suke da shi da kuma imanin da ya sami gindin zama a cikin zukatan mabiya wannan addini na gaskiya da suka fito daga dukkanin kusurwoyi hudu na wannan duniya da idanuwansu, sannan kuma su fahimci irin wannan gagarumin jari mai girma da suke da shi.

translation.en: This re-acquaintance with ourselves helps us Muslims to realize the position we deserve in today’s and tomorrow’s world and helps us move towards it.
translation.ha: Irin wannan masaniya za ta taimaka wa musulmi su kai ga matsayin da ya dace da su a wannan duniya ta yau da kuma gobe sannan kuma su yunkura a bisa wannan tafarkin.

translation.en: The spread of the wave of Islamic Awakening in today’s world is a fact that promises a good future for the Islamic Ummah.
translation.ha: A yau irin farkawar da ake samu a duniyar musulmi wani lamari ne na hakika wanda yake bushara da makoma mai kyau ga al’ummar musulmin.

translation.en: Since three decades ago when this powerful movement started with the victory of the Islamic Revolution and the establishment of the Islamic Republic, our great Ummah has moved forward steadily, removed obstacles from its path and conquered certain strongholds.
translation.ha: Wannan farkawa wacce ta samo asali daga shekaru talatin din da suka gabata bayan nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci da kafa tsarin jamhuriyar Musulunci, tun daga wancan lokacin al’ummarmu mai girma ta ke samun ci gaba, da kuma kawar da matsalolin da suke kan hanyarta da kuma samun nasarori a fagage daban-daban.

translation.en: The increased complexity of the methods through which the arrogant powers show their enmity and the costly efforts that they make to oppose Islam are also due to these advances.
translation.ha: Kara kaimi da kokari ba kama hannun yaro da makiya ma’abota girman kai suka yi wajen fada da Musulunci, ya samo asali ne sakamakon irin wannan ci gaban da aka samu.

translation.en: The widespread propaganda of the enemy to promote fear of Islam, the hasty efforts that it makes to foment discord among Islamic sects and provoke sectarian prejudice, its efforts to make Shia and Sunni appear to be enemies of each other, fomenting discord among Muslim governments, making efforts to exacerbate disagreements and turn them into irremediable enmities and disputes, using intelligence and espionage organizations in order to promote corruption and prostitution among the youth – these are all frantic and confused reactions to the steady movement and firm progress of the Islamic Ummah towards awakening, dignity and liberation. Unlike 30 years ago, today the Zionist regime is no longer an invincible monster.
translation.ha: Gagarumar farfagandar da makiya suke yi wajen sanya tsoron Musulunci (cikin zukatan wadanda ba musulmi ba) da kuma kokari dare da rana (da suke yi) wajen haifar da sabani da rarrabuwa tsakanin mazhabobin Musulunci da haifar da tsaurin ra’ayin kabilanci, haifar da kiyayya da razanarwa ta karya cikin zukatan ’yan Shi’a dangane da ’yan Sunna da kuma razanar da’yan Sunna dangane da ’yan Shi’a, haifar da sabani tsakanin gwamnatocin musulmi da kokari wajen mayar da hakan zuwa kiyayya da adawa mai tsanani, amfani da kungiyoyin leken asiri wajen yada fasadi da alfasha tsakanin matasa, dukkanin wadannan abubuwa wani kokari ne na fada da irin wannan gagarumin yunkuri na farkawa da ci gaban da kuma tabbatar da ’yanci da al’ummar musulmi suka sa a gaba.

translation.en: Today the Palestinian nation is the champion of resistance. The Lebanese nation broke the phony awe of the Zionist regime on its own and won the 33-day war.
translation.ha: A yau al’ummar Palastinu sun zamanto gwarazan gwagwarmaya, al’ummar Labanon su kadai din sun dunkufar da gwamnatin yahudawan sahyoniya sannan kuma suka yi nasara a yakin kwanaki 33; sannan al’ummar Iran kuma ta zamanto mai daga tuta da kuma jagorar tafarkin ci gaba.

translation.en: And the Iranian nation is the standard-bearer and vanguard of the movement which is moving towards the peaks.
translation.ha: A yau Amurka ma’abociyar girman kai wacce ta ke ganin kanta a matsayin uwargijiyar kasashen musulmi sannan kuma garkuwa ta asali ta haramtacciyar kasar Isra’ila tana cikin tsaka mai wuyan yanayin da ita da kanta ta samar da shi a kasar Afghanistan; a kasar Iraki kuwa duk da irin danyen aikin da ta ke yi a kan al’ummar wannan kasar, ta zama saniyar ware; a kasar Pakistan kuma da take fama da bala’oi ta zamanto abar kyama sama da shekarun baya.

translation.en: Conversely, the Islamic Awakening is spreading and deepening on a daily basis.
translation.ha: A bangare guda kuma yunkurin farkawa ta Musulunci a ko da yaushe sai kara ci gaba yake yi.

translation.en: This promising situation which bears good news should on the one hand, push us Muslim nations towards a favorable future more steadily than before and on the other hand, teach us to maintain our vigilance more than ever before.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne musulmi mu sanya irin wannan yanayi mai cike da fata wanda kuma yake dauke da bishara a bangare guda: ya zamanto abin da zai tabbatar musu da makoma mai kyau, sannan a gefe guda kuma su sanya darussan da suke cikin hakan su zamanto abubuwan da za su kara musu yin taka tsantsan sama da yadda suka kasance.

translation.en: This public call undoubtedly makes religious scholars, political leaders, intellectuals and youth more committed than others and demands selfless efforts and a pioneering role from them.
translation.ha: Wannan magana dai ko shakka babu ta fi shafar malaman addini da jagorori na siyasa da masana da matasan al’ummar musulmi da kuma sanya su jin cewa lalle akwai wani nauyi a wuyansu da kuma bukatar da suke da ita ta yin kokari da tsayin daka.

translation.en: The Holy Quran addresses us in a resonating and dynamic manner, “You are the best of the nations raised up for (the benefit of) men. You enjoin what is right and forbid the wrong and believe in Allah.” [Sura Al-e Imran, ayah 110] According to this dignified ayah, the Islamic Ummah is created for humanity.
translation.ha: Alkur’ani mai girma yana kiranmu da cewa: “Kun kasance al’umma mafi alheri da aka fitar da mutane: kuna umurni da (aikata) alheri, kuma kuna hani da munanan aiki, kuma kuna bada gaskiya da Allah“ (Suratu Ali Imrana :110) A cikin wannan kira mai daraja an bayyana al’ummar musulmi a matsayin mafi alherin bil’adama.

translation.en: The purpose behind the creation of this Ummah is to save and benefit humanity.
translation.ha: Manufar samar da wannan al’umma ita ce ‘yantar da bil’adama da maida su su zama mafiya alherin mutane.

translation.en: And the great duty is counseling people to do good, advising them against evil and having firm faith in God.
translation.ha: Nauyi mai girman da ke wuya shi ne umurni da alheri da kuma hani daga aikata munanan ayyuka da kuma imani mai karfi da Allah Madaukakin Sarki.

translation.en: No good deed is better than delivering nations from the evil claws of the arrogant powers, and no evil is more unacceptable than dependence on the arrogant powers and serving them.
translation.ha: Babu wani aikin alherin da ya fi ’yantar da al’umma daga zaluncin ma’abota girman kai, sannan kuma babu wani mummunan abin da ya fi damfara zuciya da kuma yin hidima wa ma’abota girman kai.

translation.en: Helping the Palestinian nation and the besieged people of Gaza, sympathy toward and cooperation with the people of Afghanistan, Pakistan, Iraq and Kashmir, selfless efforts and resistance against the aggression of America and the Zionist regime, safeguarding the unity of Muslims, fighting evil hands and mercenary tongues that undermine this unity, and spreading awakening and sense of commitment and responsibility among Muslim youth in all Islamic lands – these are great responsibilities that currently lie on the shoulders of prominent figures of the Islamic Ummah.
translation.ha: A yau taimakon al’ummar Palastinu da mutanen Gaza da aka killace, nuna goyon baya ga al’ummomin Afghanistan da Pakistan da Iraki da Kashmir, gwagwarmaya da tsayin daka wajen fuskantar wuce gona da irin Amurka da haramtacciyar kasar Isra’ila, riko da hadin kan musulmi da kuma fada da ’yan amshin shatan da suke kokarin cutar da wannan hadin kan, da kuma kokari wajen fadada irin farkawa ta Musulunci da sauke nauyi a tsakanin matasan musulmi a duk fadin duniyar musulmi wani gagarumin nauyi ne da ke wuyan masana da zababbun cikin al’ummar musulmi.

translation.en: The magnificent hajj ceremony shows us the appropriate grounds for fulfilling these responsibilities and it calls us to intensified effort and labor.
translation.ha: Fagen aikin hajji wani fage ne mai kyau wajen sauke wannan nauyi sannan kuma da kiranmu zuwa ga kara himma da kokari.

translation.en: Sayyid Ali Hosseini Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Husaini Khamenei

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei, the Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution, met Tuesday morning with Borut Pahor, the President of Slovenia.
translation.ha: Jagora Imam Khamenei Ya Gana Da Shugaban Kasar Slovenia Borut Pahor

translation.en: Speaking at the meeting, His Eminence referred to the bitter and painful events in the region and the role of some powers in imposing instability and war on nations and reiterated: “The Islamic Republic has always called on independent countries to play an active role in confronting the issue of imposing pressure on nations and it has always asked them to avoid being silent and mere spectators.”
translation.ha: A yammacin yau Talata (22-11-2016) ce Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da shugaban kasar Slovenia Borut Pahor da 'yan tawagarsa da suka kawo masa ziyarar ban kwana, inda yayin da yake ishara da abubuwa masu sosa rai da suke faruwa a yankin Gabas ta tsakiya da irin rawar da wasu manyan kasashen duniya suka taka wajen tabbatar da rashin tsaro da yakukuwa tsakanin al'ummomi ya bayyana cewar: A koda yaushe Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran ta kasance tana kiran 'yantattun kasashe zuwa ga taka gagaruwar rawa wajen rage irin matsin lambar da ake yi wa al'ummomi sannan kuma kada su zamanto 'yan kallo cikin hakan.

translation.en: The Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution stated that the existence of violent conflicts in countries located in West Asia and the creation of terrorist groups such as DAESH is the result of the interference and imposition of some powers.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana irin rikice-rikice da zubar da jinin da ke faruwa a kasashen yankin yammacin Asiya da samar da kungiyoyin ta'addanci irin su Da'esh da aka yi a matsayin sakamako na tsoma bakin wasu manyan kasashen duniya inda ya ce: Nauyin dake wuyan dukkanin kasashe shi ne kokari wajen kashe wutar wannan rikici, sannan kuma Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran sabanin irin bakar farfagandar 'yan mulkin mallaka, ta kasance mai tasirin gaske wajen cimma wannan manufa, to sai dai ba ta tsoma baki cikin lamurran sauran kasashe.

translation.en: Describing the Americans’ anti-DAESH coalition as unsuccessful, Ayatollah Khamenei referred to two viewpoints in explaining the reasons behind this failure: “On the basis of the first viewpoint, the Americans do not have a plan for uprooting DAESH. Like the English who have kept the wound of Kashmir open since the era of colonialism in the Indian subcontinent and which has resulted in two neighboring countries, India and Pakistan, to have discord on this matter until the present time- the Americans too want to act on the issue of DAESH in a way that this problem continues to exist in Iraq without ever being resolved.”
translation.ha: Hakan nan kuma yayin da yake bayanin dalilan wannan rashin nasarar, Jagoran yayi ishara da wasu mahanga guda biyu da ake da su inda ya ce: Mahangar farko tana cewa ne Amurkawa ba su da wani tsari na ganin bayan kungiyar Da'esh, suna son su ci gaba da rikewa da kuma tabbatar da Da'esh a kasashen Iraki da Siriya, kamar yadda turawan Ingila suka yi a lokacin da suke mulkin mallaka wa kasar Indiya inda suka ci gaba da rike Kashmir a matsayin wani makami na cimma manufofinsu na haifar da rikici da sabani tsakanin kasashen Indiya da Pakistan.

translation.en: His Eminence said: “On the basis of the second viewpoint, the Americans are willing to resolve the issue of DAESH, but the situation has developed in a way that they are not able to do so.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: A mahanga ta biyu kuwa, ana cewa ne Amurkawa suna son magance matsalar Da'esh, to sai dai ba su da karfin hakan.

translation.en: Of course, the result of both viewpoints has been the same until today. In the present time, Iraq and Syria in particular are in a very bitter and difficult situation.”
translation.ha: To sakamakon dukkanin mahanga biyun ya zuwa yanzu dai daya ne ta yadda a halin yanzu Iraki da ma musamman kasar Siriya suna cikin mawuyacin hali mai sosa rai.

translation.en: The Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution pointed to the consequences of creating instability in West Asian countries such as the problems related to refugees, saying: “While the European countries failed to offer refuge to at most a few ten-thousands of refugees, it has been many years that Iran has been hosting about three million people from Afghanistan. Iran has prepared the ground for them to have education and to live a good life and it has behaved towards them in a humanitarian manner with complete patience.” Ayatollah Khamenei stated that one year and eight months of bombarding the people of Yemen and destroying the infrastructure of that country by the Saudi government is another bitter event occurring in the region in the present time.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake ishara da sakamako mai muni na rashin tsaro da tabbas din da kasashen yammacin Asiya suke ciki ciki kuwa har da matsalar 'yan gudun hijira, Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana cewar: A daidai lokacin da kasashen Turai suka gaza wajen ba wa wasu dubban 'yan gudun hijira mafaka, Iran kuwa shekara da shekaru kenan take daukan bakuncin kimanin 'yan gudun hijiran Afghanistan miliyan uku da kuma samar musu da hanyoyi da dama na karatu da rayuwa cikin kwanciyar hankali. Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana irin ruwan bama-baman na tsawon shekara guda da watanni takwas da Saudiyya take ci gaba da yi a kan al'ummar kasar Yemen da lalata kasar a matsayin daya daga cikin abubuwa masu sosa rai da suke faruwa a halin yanzu a yankin nan inda ya ce: Wajibi ne 'yantattun kasashe su yi fada da wannan yanayin; don kuwa matsin lamba da cutar da wata al'umma, cutarwa ce ga dukkanin bil'adama.

translation.en: His Eminence stressed that there are many resources and capacities for Iran and Slovenia to increase their cooperation: “I hope that the future will prove to be firm evidence of present-day negotiations.”
translation.ha: A ci gaba da jawabin nasa, Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana cewar akwai fagage da dama da kasashen Iran da Slovenia za su iya fadada alakar da ke tsakaninsu don haka sai ya ce: Muna fatan tattaunawar da za a yi za ta haifar da da mai ido.

translation.en: Stating that Iran has completely fulfilled its commitments of the nuclear agreement, the Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution criticized the other sides for wriggling out of their commitments.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake ishara da cewa Iran ta aikata dukkanin nauyin dake wuyanta dangane da yarjejeniyar nukiliya da aka cimma, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci yayi kakkausar suka ga rashin cika alkawurran da daya bangaren yarjejeniya suke yi.

translation.en: Borut Pahor described his talks with the Iranian officials as very good and said: “We are after deepening our relations with Iran in all areas.”
translation.ha: Shi ma a nasa bangaren shugaban kasar Sloveniyan Borut Pahor, wanda shugaban kasar Iran Dakta Hasan Ruhani yake wa jagoranci, ya bayyana tattaunawar da yayi da jami'an Iran da cewa wata tattaunawa ce mai kyaun gaske inda ya ce: Mu dai muna fatan ganin alakarmu da Iran ta dukkanin bangarori ta karfafa.

translation.en: The President of Slovenia referred to Iran as the main pillar of stability and security in the region and a country that deserves respect.
translation.ha: Mr. Borut Pahor ya bayyana Iran a matsayin wani tushen zaman lafiya da kwanciyar hankalin yankin Gabas ta tsakiya kana kuma abar girmama.

translation.en: Praising Iran’s performance during the nuclear negotiations and the astonishing achievements of the country in recent years, Pahor stated: “Slovenia and Iran have many common experiences and numerous areas for cooperation.”
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake jinjinawa irin abubuwan da Iran ta aikata yayin tattaunawar nukiliya da kuma irin ci gaba da Iran ta samu cikin shekarun baya-bayan nan, shugaban ya bayyana cewar: Iran da Slovenia suna da fagagen da suka yi tarayya cikinsa da za su iya aiki tare.

translation.en: Imam Ayatollah Seyed Ruhollah Musavi Khomeini (May 17, 1900 – June 3, 1989) was a Muslim cleric and Marja, and the political leader of the 1979 Islamic Revolution of Iran which overthrew Mohammad Reza Pahlavi, the last Shah of Iran.
translation.ha: A ranar ashirin ga watan Jimada al-Thani 1320 hijira Kamariyya, wadda ta yi daidai da 30 ga watan Shahribar 1281 hijira shamsiyya (24 ga Satumba 1902 miladiyya) aka haifi wani jariri a garin Khumain, wani gari da ke lardin tsakiyana Iran.

translation.en: Following the Revolution, Imam Khomeini became Grand Leader of Iran — the paramount figure in the political system of the new Islamic Republic — until his demise.
translation.ha: A lokacin Imam yana shekara biyar mahaifinsa ya yi shahada sakamakon harin da aka kai masa a hanyarsa ta zuwa garin Arak saboda irin nuna rashin amicewar da yake yi da zaluncin mahukunta na wancan lokacin.

translation.en: Imam Khomeini was also a highly-influential and innovative Islamic political theorist, most noted for his development of the theory of velayat-e faqih, the "guardianship of the jurisconsult."
translation.ha: A daidai wannan lokaci kuwa ana ganin Imam Khumainin a matsayin daya daga cikin manyan malaman da ake iya komawa gare su a bangaren fikihu, Usul, falsafa, irfani da akhlak.

translation.en: Later, when he was 15, his mother and aunt died in the same year.
translation.ha: IMAM KHUMAINI (R.A) A FAGEN GWAGWARMAYA

translation.en: Arrangements were made for him to study at the Islamic seminary in Esfahan, but he was attracted, instead, to the seminary in Arak, which was renowned for its scholastic brilliance under the leadership of Ayatollah Sheikh Abdol-Karim Haeri-Yazdi (himself a pupil of some of the greatest scholars of Najaf and Karbala in Iraq). In 1921, Imam Khomeini commenced his studies in Arak.
translation.ha: Yayin da yake bayani kan abubuwan da ya tuna dangane da yakin duniya na farko, duk da cewa lokacin da aka yi yakin yana da shekaru 12 ne a duniya, Imam Khumaini yana cewa: "Lalle ina iya tuna abubuwan da suka faru a yakukuwan duniya guda biyu…a lokacin ina karami ne amma dai na kan je makaranta kuma ina ganin sojojin tarayyar Sobiyeti a sansanin da muke da shi a nan (garin) Khumain.

translation.en: The following year, Ayatollah Haeri-Yazdi transferred the Islamic seminary to the holy city of Qom, and invited his students to follow. Imam Khomeini accepted the invitation, moved, and took up residence at the Dar al-Shafa school in Qom before being exiled to the holy city of Najaf in Iraq.
translation.ha: A wannan lokaci, bisa gayyatar da malaman Kum suka yi masa, Ayatullah Hajj Shaikh Abdulkarim Ha'iri ya yi hijira daga garin Arak zuwa Kum. Bayan wani lokaci kuma sai Imam Khumaini, sakamakon irin kokarin da yake da shi da kuma gama karatunsa na share fage a garuruwan Arak da Khumain, yayi hijira zuwa birnin Kum don ba da tasa gudummawar wajen karfafa sabuwar makarantar Hawzar garin.

translation.en: He was keenly interested in philosophy and ethics.
translation.ha: Daga baya ya yi fice wajen karantar da ilmummukan fikihu, falsafa da sufanci.

translation.en: Imam Khomeini became a Marja in 1963, following the death of Grand Ayatollah Seyyed Hossein Borujerdi.
translation.ha: Wannan hukumci na nada Ayatullah Burujerdi ya samu goyon bayan daliban Ayatullah Ha'iri ciki kuwa har da Imam Khumaini.

translation.en: Early Political Activity In this time he could represent his religious-political ideas openly. Because the deaths of the leading, although quiescent, Shia religious leader, Ayatollah Seyyed Mohammad Borujerdi (1961), and of the activist cleric Ayatollah Abol-Ghasem Kashani (1962) left the arena of leadership open to Imam Khomeini, who had attained a prominent religious standing by the age of 60.
translation.ha: Imam Khumaini, sanadiyyar irin sanya ido kan yanayin da al'umma da makarantar Hawzar take ciki, da kuma karance-karance litattafa, jaridu da mujallu da kuma ziyarar da yake kai wa Tehran da ganawa da manyan malamai irin su Ayatullah Mudarris, ya fahimci cewa hanya guda ta magance mummunan yanayin da ake ciki bayan rashin nasarar yunkurin tsarin mulki musamman bayan darewar mulkin Ridha Khan ita ce taka tsantsan din makarantar Hawza, da tabbatar da alaka ta ruhi tsakanin malamai da al'umma.

translation.en: When the White Revolution proclaimed by the Shah's government in Iran called for land reform, nationalization of the forests, the sale of state-owned enterprises to private interests, electoral changes to enfranchise women, profit sharing in industry, and an anti-illiteracy campaign in the nation's schools.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda muka nuna a baya, taimako da goyon bayan haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila da fadada alakar Iran da ita na daga cikin sharuddan da Amurka ta kafa wa gwamnatin Shah matukar tana son goyon bayanta.

translation.en: In January 1963, the Shah announced a six-point program of reform called the White Revolution, an American-inspired package of measures designed to give his regime a liberal and progressive facade. Imam Khomeini summoned a meeting of his colleagues (other Ayatollahs) in Qom to press upon them the necessity of opposing the Shah's plans. Imam Khomeini persuaded the other senior Marjas of Qom to decree a boycott of the referendum that the Shah had planned to obtain the appearance of popular approval for his White Revolution.
translation.ha: Jin kadan bayan watsa wannan labari, Imam Khumaini da wasu manyan malaman biranen Kum da Tehran, bayan wata tattaunawa, suka sanar da rashin amincewarsu da dokar. Imam Khumaini ya ba da gagarumar gudummawa wajen fallasa asiri da manufofin gwamnatin Shah da kuma bayyana hakikanin nauyin da ya hau kan malamai da makarantun Hawza cikin halin da ake ciki. Hakan ne ya sa aka samu wasu malamai suka aike da wasu wasiku na nuna rashin amincewa ga Shah da priminista Alam, hakan ya faranta wa al'umma rai.

translation.en: Imam Khomeini issued on January 22, 1963 a strongly worded declaration denouncing the Shah and his plans.
translation.ha: Amma wasikun da Imam ya aike wa Shah da priministansa sun fi na sauran malaman tsauri da kuma jan kunne.

translation.en: Imam Khomeini continued his denunciation of the Shah's programs, issuing a manifesto that also bore the signatures of eight other senior scholars.
translation.ha: Har ila yau Imam Khumaini ya sake bukatar maraja'ai da manyan malaman garin Kum da su zauna don tattaunawa kan halin da ake ciki da kuma yiyuwar sake kaddamar da wani sabon yunkuri.

translation.en: He also decreed that the Nowruz celebrations for the Iranian year 1342 (March 21, 1963) be cancelled as a sign of protest against government policies.
translation.ha: A ci gaba da goyon bayan da mutane suke nuna wa Imam, al'umma sun kaurace wa bukukuwan "Nuruz" (sabuwar shekara) don nuna rashin amincewa da ayyukan gwamnati.

translation.en: In the afternoon of Ashura (June 3, 1963), Imam Khomeini delivered a speech at the Feiziyeh Madreseh seminary in which he drew parallels between Yazid and the Shah and warned the Shah that if he did not change his ways, the day would come when the people would offer up thanks for his departure from the country.
translation.ha: A bangare guda, Shah ya dage sai ya aiwatar da shirinsa na kawo canjin da Amurka ta ke bukata, a bangare guda kuma Imam Khumaini ya dage wajen wayar da kan al'umma wajen tsayawa da fuskantar tsoma bakin Amurka cikin al'amurran cikin gidan Iran da kuma ha'incin Shah.

translation.en: Following Imam Khomeini's public denunciation of Shah Mohammad Reza Pahlavi as a "wretched miserable man" and his arrest, on June 5, 1963 (Khordad 15, on the Iranian calendar), three days of major riots erupted throughout Iran with nearly 400 killed.
translation.ha: A yammacin ranar Ashuran ta shekara ta 1383 hijiriyya (3 ga Yunin 1963) Imam ya gabatar da wani jawabi mai cike da tarihi a makarantar Fa'iziyya wanda shi ne matakin farko na yunkurinsa na 15 ga watan Khordad (5 Yuni).

translation.en: Opposition to capitulation During November of 1964, Imam Khomeini made a denunciation of both the Shah and the United States, this time in response to the "capitulations" or diplomatic immunity granted to American military personnel in Iran by the Shah.
translation.ha: A wannan rana (ta 4 ga Aban), Imam Khumaini ya fitar da wata sanarwa inda yake cewa: "Ya kamata al'ummar duniya ta san cewa dukkan wata wahala da matsalolin da al'ummar Iran da na musulmi suke ciki daga Amurka ne, daga baki 'yan kasashen waje ne.

translation.en: Life in exile Imam Khomeini spent over 14 years in exile, mostly in the holy city of Najaf in Iraq.
translation.ha: Da hantsin wannan rana, jami'an tsaron SABAK, cikin jaridun kasar, sun sanar da koran Imam saboda zargin barazana ga tsaron kasa.

translation.en: Initially, he was sent to Turkey on 4 November 1964, where he stayed in the city of Bursa for less than a year.
translation.ha: Duk da irin halin dar-dar da ake ciki sai da al'ummar birnin Tehran suka fito don yi zanga-zanga a kasuwar birni don nuna rashin amincewarsu da wannan aiki, sannan kuma aka rufe makarantun Hawza na wani tsawon lokaci kana kuma aka aike da wasiku ga kungiyoyin kasa da kasa da kuma maraja'ai.

translation.en: He was hosted by a Turkish Colonel named Ali Cetiner in his own residence, who couldn't find another accommodation alternative for his stay at the time. Later in October 1965 he was allowed to move to Najaf, Iraq, where he stayed until being forced to leave in 1978, after then-Vice President Saddam Hossein forced him out (the two countries would fight a bitter eight year war 1980-1988 only a year after the beginning of Imam Khomeini’s leadership in Iran and the start of Saddam Hussein’s term in Iraq) after which he went to Neauphle le Château in France.
translation.ha: Bayan isarsa birnin Bagadaza, Imam Khumaini ya kai ziyara zuwa hubbarorin tsarkakan Imamai (a.s) da suke garuruwan Kazimain, Samarra da Karbala, daga nan kuma bayan mako guda, Imam ya wuce zuwa sabon masaukinsa da ke birnin Najaf mai tsarki. Shekaru sha ukun da Imam ya yi a garin Najaf (Iraki), duk da cewa babu matsin lamba na kai tsaye kamar yadda ya fuskanta a Iran da Turkiyya, sun fara ne cikin wani irin yanayi na nuna adawa da cutarwa mai tsanani daga wajen wasu malaman jeka na yi ka da ma'abuta son duniya da suka sanya tufafin ma'abuta addini da har ta kai ma, duk da irin hakurin da aka san shi da shi, a wasu lokuta ya kan fito ya yi magana kan irin wahalar jihadi da gwagwarmaya a wancan lokaci.

translation.en: He believed that the government was an un-Islamic and illegitimate institution usurping the legitimate authority of the supreme religious leader (Faqih), who should rule as both the spiritual and temporal guardian of the Muslim community (Umma).
translation.ha: A ranar 19 ga watan Mehr, 1347 (9 ga Oktoba 1968) a wata ganawa da ya yi da wakilin kungiyar Fatah mai fafutukan 'yanto kasar Palastinu, Imam Khumaini ya bayyana mahangarsa kan matsalolin da duniyar musulmi ke ciki da kuma yunkurin al'ummar Palastinu.

translation.en: A modified form of this Velayat-e Faqih system was adopted after Imam Khomeini and his followers took power, and he became the Islamic Republic's first "Guardian" or Grand Leader. In the meantime, however, Imam Khomeini was careful not to publicize his ideas for clerical rule outside of his Islamic network of opposition to the Shah which he worked to build and strengthen over the next decade.
translation.ha: A yayin wannan ganawa, Imam ya ba da fatawar wajibcin kebance wani sashi na zakka da ba da shi ga 'yan gwagwarmayar Palastinu. A farko-farkon shekarar 1969 rikicin da ke tsakanin gwamnatin Shah da gwamnatin Ba'athawa ta Iraki kan iyakan kasashen biyu na ruwa ya tsananta. Hakan ya sanya gwamnatin Iraki korar adadi mai yawa na Iraniyawa da ke zaune a kasar, kamar yadda kuma gwamnatin ta yi kokarin amfani da irin adawan da Imam yake yi wa gwamnatin Shah don cimma manufarta.

translation.en: Cassette copies of his lectures fiercely denouncing the Shah as, for example, "the Jewish agent, the American snake whose head must be smashed with a stone," became common items on the markets of Iran, helped to demythologize the power and dignity of the Shah and his reign.
translation.ha: A yayin bukukuwan zagayowar shekarar yunkurin 15 ga watan Khordad a shekarar 1975, dalibai a makatantar Fa'iziyya ta Kum sun gudanar da zanga-zangogi na kawanki biyu cikin makarantar suna masu rera taken "Aminci ya tabbata ga Khumaini", "Mutuwa a kan gidan sarautar Pahlawi".

translation.en: Subsequent elections were held to approve of the newly-drafted Constitution. Along with the position of the Grand Leader, the constitution also requires that a president be elected every four years, but only those candidates approved indirectly by the Council of Guardians may run for the office. Imam Khomeini himself became instituted as the Grand Leader for life, and officially decreed as the "Leader of the Revolution."
translation.ha: A ci gaba da ayyukansa na kiyayya da Musulunci, a watan Esfand 1354 (Fabrairun 1975), Shah ya canza kalandar (kwanakin wata) da hukuma take amfani da ita da ta fara daga hijiran Ma'aikin Allah (s.a.w.a) ya zuwa farkon mulkin mulukiyya Hakhamanshiyyawa. Imam Khumaini ya mayar da kakkausar martini ta hanyar fitar da fatawar haramcin amfani da wannan kalanda. Kamar dai yadda al'umma suka karbi fatawar haramcin shiga jam'iyyar Rastakhiz da Imam ya bayar, haka ma a wannan karon suka karbi wannan fatawa da hannu bibbiyu.

translation.en: The invasion rallied Iranians behind the new regime, enhancing Imam Khomeini's stature and allowed him to consolidate and stabilize his leadership.
translation.ha: Hakan ya tilasta masa janye wannan sabuwar kalanda tasa a shekarar 1357 (1977).

translation.en: The war continued for another six years, with 450,000 to 950,000 casualties on the Iranian side and the use of chemical weaponry by the Iraqi military.
translation.ha: Shahadar Ayatullah Sayyid Mustafa Khumaini a ranar 1 ga watan Aban 1356 (1977) da kuma irin tarurrukan zaman makokin da aka shirya a Iran sun kasance abubuwan da suka sake motsa makatantun Hawza da al'ummar Iran wajen sake fitowa don fuskantar hukuma.

translation.en: As the costs of the eight-year war mounted, Imam Khomeini, in his words, "drank the cup of poison" and accepted a truce mediated by the United Nations.
translation.ha: Shi kuwa a nasa bangaren, Imam Khumaini ya bayyana wannan lamari (na shahadar Sayyid Mustafa) a matsayin wata boyayyiyar ni'imar Ubangiji, wanda hakan ya zamanto abin ban al'ajabi ainun.

translation.en: As the war ended, the struggles among the clergy resumed and Imam Khomeini’s health began to decline.
translation.ha: Duk da irin ayyukan zalunci da wuce gona da iri da gwamnatin Shah take yi a kan 'yan gwagwarmaya, sai dai duk da hakan hukumar ta gagara kashe wutan wannan bore.

translation.en: Though Rushdie publicly apologized, the fatwa was not revoked, Imam Khomeini explaining that "even if Salman Rushdie repents and becomes the most pious man of all time, it is incumbent on every Muslim to employ everything he has got, his life and wealth, to send him to Hell."
translation.ha: Imam Khumaini ya mayar da kakkausar martini ga wannan bukata ta su yana mai cewa hakan ya saba wa ikirarin riko da tsarin demokradiyyar da Faransan take yi, yana mai karawa da cewa ko da lamarin zai kai ne ya dinga yawo daga wannan filin jirgi zuwa wancan, ba fa zai bar wannan tafarki nasa ba.

translation.en: In December 1988 (before the fall of the Berlin Wall), Ayatollah Imam Khomeini sent a letter to USSR President Mikhail Gorbachev predicting the fall of Communism and inviting him to study and research Islam.
translation.ha: Imam Khumaini, a watan Dey 1357 (Disambar 1978), ya kafa majalisar juyin juya halin Musulunci don share fagen kafa hukuma ta Musulunci da kuma dawowarsa gida.

translation.en: In his historical letter he wrote: "It is clear to everyone that Communism should henceforth be sought in world museums of political history." Life under Imam Khomeini Under Imam Khomeini's rule, Sharia (Islamic law) was introduced, with the Islamic dress code enforced for both men and women.
translation.ha: Imam Khumaini ya riga da ya dauki matsaya ta karshe, don haka sai ya sanar da al'ummar Iran, cikin wani sako da ya aike musu, cewa yana son ya kasance tare da su a wadannan ranaku masu muhimmanci. Hakan ya sanya gwamnatin Bakhtiyar, bisa hadin gwuiwan Janar Haizer, suka rufe filin jirgin saman birnin Tehran sashin zirga-zirgan waje.

translation.en: Life for religious minorities has been mixed under Imam Khomeini and his successors.
translation.ha: Hakika Imam Khumaini ya isar da abin da yake son fadi da kuma cimma abin da yake son cimmawa tsawon rayuwarsa a aikace.

translation.en: By law, several seats in the Parliament are reserved for minority religions.
translation.ha: Ni kuwa ina sauraron nasara a tsakiyan Khordad

translation.en: After eleven days in a hospital for an operation to stop internal bleeding, Imam Khomeini died of cancer on Saturday, June 3, 1989, at the age of 89.
translation.ha: Daidai karfe sha daya da minti ashirin na dare ranar asabar 13 ga watan Khordad 1368 (3 ga Yuni 1989) lokacin saduwa da abin kauna ya yi.

translation.en: Many Iranians mourned Imam Khomeini's death and poured out into the cities and streets.
translation.ha: Lokacin da aka watsa labarin rasuwar Imam, kai ka ce wata gagarumar girgizar kasa ce ta faru, ko ina sai bakin ciki idanuwa kuwa a cikin Iran da sauran wuraren da aka san Imam kana kuma shiriyarsa ta shiga sai zubar da hawaye suke.

translation.en: Imam Khomeini led an ascetic lifestyle, being deeply interested in mysticism, and was against the accumulation of land and wealth by the clergy.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda kuma ya jagoranci yakin kariya na shekaru takwas yana fuskantar makiyan da suke samun goyon bayan gwamnatocin gabashi da yammaci ma'abuta girman kai.

translation.en: Family and descendants In 1929, Imam Khomeini married Batol Saqafi Khomeini, the daughter of a cleric in Tehran.
translation.ha: Hakika al'umma sun rasa jagoransu abin kauna sannan kuma makomarsu na addini kana kuma mai kira zuwa ga Musulunci na hakika.

translation.en: The elder son, Mostafa, was murdered in 1977 while in exile with his father in Najaf, Iraq and SAVAK (the Imperial-era secret police) was accused of his death by Imam Khomeini. Ahmad Khomeini, the younger son, died in 1995. Imam Khomeini's grandson Seyyed Hassan Khomeini, son of the late Seyyed Ahmad Khomeini, is also a cleric and the trustee of Imam Khomeini's shrine.
translation.ha: Taken "Ya Husain" da masu juyayin suke rerawa alhali suna dukan kirji da kawunansu ya mai da yanayin wajen tamkar yanayin Ranar Ashurar da Imam Husaini (a.s) ya yi shahada. Bisa la'akari da cewa al'umma ba za su sake jin sautin Imam Khumaini dake cike da yanayin tunasar da mutum Ubangiji a Husaniyyar Jamaran ba, hakan ya kasance abin tashin hankali ga al'umma.

translation.en: Leader Announces General Employment Policies - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Ya Sanar Da Siyasar Gwamnati A Bangaren Samar Da Aikin Yi

translation.en: After consulting with the Expediency Council, Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution announced general employment policies to the heads of the three braches of the government, the head of the Assembly of Experts and the chairman of the Guardian Council. The following is the full text of these policies:
translation.ha: Abin da ke biye fassarar matanin wannan siyasar ne wanda Jagoran ya gabatar da ita ga shugabannin bangarori uku na gwamnati (majalisar ministoci, majalisar dokoki da kuma ma'aikatar shari'a), shugaban majalisar fayyace maslahar tsarin Musulunci da kuma shugaban majalisar kare tsarin mulki na kasar Iran:

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: 1. Promoting and strengthening the culture of hard work, production and entrepreneurship. Promoting and strengthening consumption of domestic products as an Islamic and national value by utilizing the educational system and the domestic public relations system.
translation.ha: 1- Kwadaitarwa da kuma karfafa al'adar aiki, samar da abubuwan da ake bukata, ruhin kirkiro sabbin abubuwa da kuma amfani da kayayyakin da ake samar wa a cikin gida a matsayin ababe masu kima na Musulunci da kuma na kasa ta hanyar amfani da tsarin koyarwa da kuma hanyoyin sadarwa na kasa.

translation.en: 2. Training expert, skilled and efficient manpower according to the needs of the current and future labor market.
translation.ha: 2- Horar da kwararrun mutane masu amfani daidai da manyan bukatun da ake da su a fagen aiki (a halin yanzu da kuma a nan gaba) da kuma karfafa irin karfi da kwarewar kirkiro sabbin abubuwa karkashin sanya idon tsarin koyarwa na kasa (wato ilimi da tarbiyya, ilimi da fasaha da kuma ilimi mai zurfi) da kuma hada koyarwa da kwarewa tare da kuma janyo cibiyoyin tattalin arziki don amfanuwa da irin kwarewar da suke da ita.

translation.en: 4. Creating a comprehensive database for the labor market.
translation.ha: 4- Samar da cikakken tsarin tattaro bayanai a fagen aiki.

translation.en: Improving business environments and the indices related to these environments (political, cultural and judiciary environments, the macro economic environment, the labor market, taxation and infrastructure). Supporting private and cooperative sectors. Encouraging competition by reforming the related laws and regulations within the framework of the Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Iran.
translation.ha: 5- Kyautata fagen aiki da kuma karfafa bangarorinsa (da suka hada da fage na siyasa, al'adu da shari'a da kuma fagen tattalin arziki, fagen aiki, haraji da sauransu) bugu da kari kan goyon baya da taimakawa bangaren 'yan kasuwa da kuma gasa a fagen gyara dokoki karkashin inuwar kundin tsarin mulki na Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran.

translation.en: 6. Attracting technology, capital and financial resources, exchanging manpower and gaining access to foreign product and service markets through effective and constructive interaction with countries and organizations of the region and the world.
translation.ha: 6- Janyo hankali wajen amfani da fasaha, zuba jari da hanyoyin samun kudade, musayen kwararru, samun kutsawa cikin kasuwannin kasashen waje da gudanar da ayyuka ta hanyar mu'amaloli masu amfani da kasashen (duniya), kungiyoyi da cibiyoyi na wannan yankin da kuma na duniya baki daya.

translation.en: Coordinating and stabilizing monetary, financial, currency and trade policies and regulating economic markets with the aim of reducing the unemployment rate as well as improving efficiency of production elements and increasing production. 8. Paying increased attention to supporting investment, production and productive employment in private and cooperative sectors when distributing cash subsidies.
translation.ha: 7- Daidaitawa da kuma karfafa siyasar kudi, dukiya, kudaden waje da kuma kasuwanci, sannan da kuma tsara kasuwanni wajen rage rashin aikin yi tare da karfafa hanyoyin samar da abubuwan da ake bukata. 8- Lura sosai da irin rangwamin (da gwamnati take bayarwa) da goyon bayan bangaren zuba jari, samar da abubuwan da ake bukata da samar da aikin yi a bangaren 'yan kasuwa.

translation.en: 9. Expansion and optimal use of economic capacities that enjoy an advantage, such as tourism and transportation.
translation.ha: 9- Karfafawa da kuma amfani na koli da irin dama na tattalin arziki da ake da su irin su: yawon shakatawa da hakkin (kudaden) ya da zango (transit).

translation.en: 10. Supporting the establishment and development of partnership funds in order to commercialize ideas.
translation.ha: 10- Goyon bayan kafawa da kuma fadada asusun hadin gwuiwa a fagen zuba jari na kasuwanci da kuma taimakawa kanana da matsakaitan kamfanoni.

translation.en: Offering effective support for the unemployed in order to increase their capabilities with the aim of helping them achieve stable employment.
translation.ha: 11- Samar da hanyoyin goyon bayan mai tasiri ga marasa aikin yi don karfafa irin kwarewar da suke da ita don sama musu tsayayyun ayyukan yi.

translation.en: Paying special attention to reducing the unemployment rate in provinces with above-average unemployment.
translation.ha: 12- Ba da muhimmanci na musamman ga batun rage rashin aikin yi da ake fama da su a jihohi.

translation.en: 13. Creating a balance between wage increase and improving manpower productivity.
translation.ha: 13- Kula da daidaito tsakanin karin albashi da kuma irin aikin da ake yi.

translation.en: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
28 ga watan Tir, 1390

translation.en: And give good news to the humble."
translation.ha: SAKON JAGORA GA MANIYYATAN HAJJIN BANA (1430 = 2009)

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: It is hajj time, the spring of spirituality and brilliance of monotheism on world horizons. The hajj ceremony is a transparent spring that can purge hajjis of their sins and negligence and restore the brightness of their God-given nature to their heart and soul.
translation.ha: Aikin hajji, wani lokaci ne mai kyau na ababen da suke kusata mutum da Allah da kuma hasken tauhidi a fadin duniya; bukin hajji, wani idon ruwa ne da yake a fili da zai iya wanke alhaji daga daudar zunubi da gafala sannan kuma ya bude haske na fidira irin ta Ubangiji ga rai da zuciyarsa.

translation.en: Removing the clothes of ostentation and distinction during the hajj and putting on the identical, white clothes of Ihram symbolize the sincerity of the Islamic Ummah and call Muslims throughout the world to unity and unanimity.
translation.ha: Watsi da tufafin alfahari da son nuna kai a mikatin hajji da kuma sanya tufafi iri guda mai launi guda na harami, wata alama ce da ke nuni da daidaituwa da kala guda na al'ummar musulmi da kuma nuni da hadin kai da kaunar juna da ke tsakanin musulmi a duk inda suke a duniya.

translation.en: On the one hand, the hajj represents the ayah "So your God is One God, therefore to Him should you submit.
translation.ha: Taken aikin hajj a wani bangare (daidai ya ke da fadin Allah Madaukakin Sarki cewa): Sa'an nan kuma abin bautawarku, Abin bautawa ne guda, sai ku sallama Masa.

translation.en: And give good news to the humble." [The Holy Quran, Sura al-Hajj (22), Ayah 34] On the other hand, it represents the ayah "... the Sacred Mosque, which We have made equally for all men, (for) the dweller therein and the visitor."
translation.ha: Kuma ka yi bushara ga masu kankantar da kai ne, a wani bangaren kuma (daidai ya ke da fadin Allah Madaukakin Sarki cewa): "Da masallaci mai alfarma wanda Muka sanya shi ga mutane alhali kuwa mazauni a ciki da bakauye daidai suke".

translation.en: [The Holy Quran, Sura al-Hajj (22), Ayah 25] Thus, in addition to being the symbol of monotheism, Ka'bah is the symbol of Islamic solidarity, brotherhood, and equality.
translation.ha: Haka lamarin yake cewa Dakin Ka'aba, baya ga kasantuwarsa wakilin kalmar tauhid, haka nan kuma alama ce ta hadin kan kalmomi da ‘yan'uwantaka da kuma daidaito na Musulunci.

translation.en: Muslims who have come together from different parts of the world - filled with enthusiasm of making tawaf and visiting the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) shrine - should make the best of this opportunity to strengthen the bonds of brotherhood among themselves, which is the remedy for many great maladies of the Islamic Ummah.
translation.ha: Musulman da suka taru a wannan wajen daga kusurwoyi hudu na duniya da shaukin yin dawafin Dakin Ka'aba da kuma ziyartar haramin Manzo mai girma, tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi da Alayensa, wajibi ne su yi kokarin amfanuwa da wannan damar wajen karfafa irin alaka ta ‘yan'uwantaka da take tsakaninsu wanda magani ne ga da dama daga cikin manyan matsalolin da al'ummar musulmi suke fuskanta.

translation.en: Today we can see clearly that the hand of the ill-wishers of the world of Islam is fomenting discord among Muslims more than ever before.
translation.ha: A yau, a fili muke ganin yadda hannuwan masu fatan sharri ga duniyar musulmi, sama da shekarun da suka gabata, suke gudanar da ayyukan haifar da rarrabuwa tsakanin al'ummar musulmi.

translation.en: This is while the Islamic Ummah needs solidarity and unanimity more than any other time.
translation.ha: Hakan kuwa a daidai lokacin da al'ummar musulmi, sama da shekarun da suka gabata, suke bukatar hadin kai da kaunar juna a tsakaninsu.

translation.en: Muslims should figure out where and how the recent fitnas, wars, explosions, assassinations, and indiscriminate killings in Iraq, Afghanistan, and Pakistan are being planned.
translation.ha: Kamata ya yi al'ummar musulmi a duk fadin duniya su yi tunanin cewa ya ya aka yi irin wadannan fitinu da yakukuwa, fashe-fashen bama-bamai da ayyukan ta'addanci da kisan gillan da suke faruwa a shekarun baya-bayan nan a kasashen Iraki, Afghanistan da Pakistan suke faruwa, sannan kuma daga ina ake tsara su da gudanar da su?

translation.en: Why did the regional nations not experience so many hardships and tragic events before the western armies- led by America- domineeringly entered this region as if they had proprietary rights to it? On the one hand, the occupiers label as terrorist the resistance movements of the people of Palestine, Lebanon, and other countries of the world.
translation.ha: Me ya sa a baya kafin shigowar sojojin mamaya na kasashen yammaci karkashin jagorancin Amurka wannan yankin al'umma ba sa ganin irin wadannan musibobi da matsaloli ba? A wani bangaren kuma ‘yan mamaya suna kiran kungiyoyin gwagwarmaya ta al'umma a kasashen Palastinu da Labanon da sauran yankuna daban-daban a matsayin kungiyoyin ta'addanci, sannan kuma a bangare guda suna tsarawa da kuma jagorantar ayyukan ta'addanci masu tsananin tada da hankali na kabilanci a tsakanin al'ummomin wannan yankin.

translation.en: On the other hand, they mastermind and lead brutal sectarian and ethnic terrorism among the nations of this region. The Middle East and North Africa were colonized, occupied, and humiliated for more than a century by western governments, including the British and French governments, and subsequently by the American government.
translation.ha: Yankunan Gabas ta tsakiya da arewacin Afirka a lokaci mai tsawo sama da karni guda sun kasance cikin mulkin mallaka da mamaya da kwace musu albarkatun da suke da su da kuma wulakansu ta hannun gwamnatocin yammaci na Ingila da Faransa da sauransu kana kuma daga baya ta hannun gwamnatin Amurka; suna kwace musu albarkatun kasar da suke da su sannan kuma suka kawar da irin ruhin neman ‘yanci daga wajensu sannan kuma al'ummomin wadannan kasashe suka zamanto wadanda wadannan ‘yan kasashen waje suka yi garkuwa da su.

translation.en: Their natural resources were plundered and their spirit of freedom-seeking was suppressed. Their people were the hostages of the foreign aggressors' greed. And when the Islamic Awakening and national resistance movements made it impossible for international oppressors to continue their oppression, and the issue of martyrdom and ascension to God reappeared as a unique factor in Islamic jihad, the disgraced aggressors resorted to hypocrisy and replaced their old method with new methods of colonialism.
translation.ha: Bayan da farkawa ta Musulunci da kuma irin gwagwarmayar al'ummomi suka bayyana, sai ya zamana ci gaban irin wannan yanayi (na mulkin mallaka) ya zamanto mai wahala ga azzaluman kasa da kasa sannan kuma batun shahada da tafiya zuwa ga Allah kuma saboda Allah har ila ya sake bayyana da kuma zama wani dalili wanda ba shi da makwafi a fagen jihadi na Musulunci, don haka masu wuce gona da iri sai suka koma ga wata hanyar ta daban da shigo da wani sabon tsari na mulkin mallaka don maye gurbin tsohon.

translation.en: In order to bring Islam to its knees, the hypocritical fiend of colonialism is currently making use of all its capabilities - anything ranging from military coercion, iron-hand policy, and outright occupation to the evil chain of propaganda and to utilization of thousands of slandering centers; from organizing terrorist groups and brutal murders to preparing the ground for corruption, to distributing and promoting drugs, and to destroying the determination, spirits, and morality of the youth; and from all-out political attacks against the centers of resistance to provoking ethnic conceit and sectarian prejudice as well as enmity among brothers.
translation.ha: Amma a yau fuskar shaidanci na mulkin mallaka, sun shigo fage da dukkan karfinsu domin dunkufar da Musulunci; kama daga amfani da karfin soji da bugu mai karfi da mamaya ta fili har zuwa ga bakaken hanyoyin farfagandarsu da kuma sauran dubban hanyoyi na yada kararraki da jita-jita, haka nan kuma kama daga shirya ayyukan ta'addanci da kisan gillan rashin imani har zuwa ga yada kayayyakin aiki na yada fasadi da yadawa da kwadaitar da (amfani) da muggan kwayoyi da lalata azama da ruhin kyawawan halaye na matasa, haka kuma kama daga kai hare-hare daga dukkan bangarori na siyasa a kan ciboyoyin gwagwarmaya har zuwa ga takalo fushi na kabilanci da kuma tsaurin ra'ayi na kungiyanci da haifar da kiyayya tsakanin ‘yan'uwa.

translation.en: If suspicion - which is what enemies desire - is replaced with kindness, trust, and unanimity among Muslim nations and Islamic denominations and ethnicities, a large part of the ill-wishers' plots will be foiled and their evil plot of establishing domination over the Islamic Ummah will be thwarted.
translation.ha: Matukar dai a tsakanin al'ummar musulmi da kuma tsakanin kungiyoyi da mazhabobi na Musulunci da kabilun musulmi suka samar da yanayin kauna da kyakkyawan zato da hadin kai a tsakaninsu da maye gurbin mummunan zato da mugun kallo wanda shi ne abin da makiya suke son gani da wadannan abubuwa, to kuwa za a iya magance wani bangare mai yawa na makirce-makirce da mummunan kulli (na makiya) sannan kuma mummunan makirci da kullinsu na gudanar da mulkin mallaka a kan al'ummar musulmi zai zamanto da mara ido.

translation.en: The hajj is one of the best opportunities to achieve this lofty goal.
translation.ha: Aikin hajji daya ne daga cikin mafi girman dama wajen cimma wannan manufa mai girma.

translation.en: Through cooperation and relying on the common principles discussed in the Quran and Sunnah, Muslims will be able to stand against this hypocritical fiend and defeat it through their willpower and determination.
translation.ha: Al'ummar musulmi ta hanyar hadin kai da dogaro da tushe da asasin da suka yi tarayya a kansu da suka fito daga cikin Alkur'ani da sunnar (Ma'aiki) za su iya samun karfin da za su iya tsayin daka a gaban irin wannan shaidanci mai fuskoki daban-daban sannan su yi nasara a kansa da kuma tabbatar da imaninsu.

translation.en: By following the lessons of the great Imam Khomeini, Islamic Iran has become a prime example of this successful resistance.
translation.ha: Kasar Musulunci ta Iran ta hanyar koyi da darussan (Imam) Khumaini mai girma, (ta kasance) babbar misali ce da take a fili na irin wannan gwagwarmaya da ta yi nasara.

translation.en: They have been defeated in Iran.
translation.ha: Wadancan mutane sun sha kashi a kasar Musulunci ta Iran.

translation.en: Thirty years of machinations, conspiracy, and enmity - anything ranging from staging a coup d'état and causing the eight-year imposed war to imposing sanctions and freezing our assets; from psychological and propaganda warfare and media confrontation to efforts to thwart our scientific growth and acquisition of knowledge- especially nuclear knowledge- to engaging in open provocation and interference in the impressive and significant presidential election - all these turned into scenes of the enemy's defeat, disgrace, and confusion. And the ayah "surely the machinations of the devil is weak" [the Holy Quran, Sura al-Nisa (4), Ayah 76] was once again realized in front of the eyes of the Iranian people.
translation.ha: Shekaru talatin na kafar ungulu da makirce-makirce da kiyayya kama daga kokarin juyin mulki da kallafaffen yaki na shekaru takwas, har zuwa ga takunkumi da kwace dukiya, haka nan kuma kama daga yaki irin na kwakwalwa da bakar farfaganda da amfani da kafafen watsa labarai (wajen yada kararraki) har zuwa ga kokari wajen hana ci gaba na ilimi da kuma samun ilmummuka na zamani ciki kuwa har da ilimi da fasahar nukiliya, kai hatta ma da tunzurawa da tsoma baki na fili cikin gagarumin zaben (shugaban kasa) na baya-bayan nan da aka gudanar, amma dukkanin wadannan abubuwa sun zamanto wani fage ne na shan kashin makiya, sannan kuma a wani karon ma wannan aya ta "Hakika kaidin Shaidan ya kasance mai rauni" ta sake bayyana a gaban idanun al'ummar Iran.

translation.en: In any other part of the world, where resistance that was rooted in determination and religious faith deployed the people against the boastful arrogant powers, the ultimate victory was for Muslims and the oppressors were doomed to suffer defeat and disgrace.
