Har ila yau yayin da yake ishara da rawar da zabe ya ke takawa wajen sayar rayar da kasa da kuma tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci, Ayatullah Khamenei cewa ya yi: Fitowar al'umma a lokacin zabubbukan da aka gudanar tsawon shekaru 34 da suka gabata (a Iran), a koda yaushe sun kasance masu kore wasu bala'oi daga kasar Iran da kuma kara karfin gwuiwa ga kasa, al'umma da kuma wannan juyi na Musulunci ne.

translation.en: He said that the elections on the 24th of Khordad are more important, in certain ways, than previous elections, stating: "Holding the presidential elections and city and village councils elections at the same time is one of the reasons why the upcoming elections are very significant."
translation.ha: Jagoran ya kara da cewa a wasu bangarorin zaben shugaban kasar Iran da za a gudanar nan gaba kadan ya dara irin wadanda suka gabace shi a fagen muhimmanci inda ya ce: Gudanar da zabubbuka guda biyu na shugaban kasa da kuma na kananan hukumomi a lokaci guda yana daga cikin abubuwan da ya kara wa wannan zaben irin muhimmancin da ya ke da shi.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution described the establishment of councils in all cities and villages throughout the country as the manifestation of the constant presence of the people in the arena of making decisions for the country. Addressing officials, the people and outstanding personalities, he said: "Paying attention to presidential elections should not make you ignore the significance of city and village council elections."
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana kafa majalisar kananan hukumomi a dukkanin kauyuka da birane a matsayin wani abu da ke nuni da irin rawar da mutane suke takawa wajen gudanar da kasarsu, don haka sai ya kirayi jami'an gwamnati da sauran al'ummar kasar Iran da cewa: kada su bari muhimmancin da zaben shugaban kasa yake da shi ya dushe haske zaben ‘yan majalisar kananan hukumomin da za a gudanar tare.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution described the presence of the people on the scene as the main reason for the strength of the Islamic Republic, stating: "In the Islamic Republic, if the people are not present on the scene, The Islamic Republic means nothing.
translation.ha: Har ila yau kuma yayin da ya ke karin bayani dangane da wani bangare na muhimmancin da zabe mai zuwa yake da shi, jagoran ya yi ishara da irin karfi da ikon da shugaban kasa yake da shi cikin kundin tsarin mulkin kasa da kuma sauran dokoki inda ya ce: irin wannan matsayin lamari ne da ke nuni da irin muhimmancin da zaben shugaban kasa yake da shi ne.

translation.en: The Islamic Republic means the widespread presence of the people of Iran and their movement towards ideals and great and practical goals.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana fitowar jama'a yayin zaben a matsayin abin da zai karfafa Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran inda ya ce: Jamhuriyar Musulunci tana nufin kasantuwar mutane a lokacin da ya dace da kuma yunkurin mutane wajen cimma manyan manufofin da aka sanya su a gaba.

translation.en: This is the meaning of the Islamic Republic." Ayatollah Khamenei added: "The Islamic Republic and its power rely on the hearts, emotions and feelings of the people.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya ci gaba da cewa: Karfin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ya damfara ne da zukata, so da kuana, hikima da hangen nesa, basira da kuma kasantuwar mutane a fage.

translation.en: If, over these 30-something years, the enemies have not managed to undermine the Islamic Republic, the reason is this.
translation.ha: Matukar aka rasa wannan gagarumar garkuwa, to kuwa lalatattun ‘yan mulkin mallaka na duniya za su sami hanyar cutar da wannan tsari na Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

translation.en: His Eminence stressed: "By Allah's favor and grace, the upcoming election will be one of our best and most enthusiastic elections."
translation.ha: Daga nan sai Jagoran ya ce: Tabbas, cikin yardar Allah da kuma himmar mutanenmu masu girma, insha Allahu za a gudanar da wannan zabe da ke gabanmu cikin dukkan karfi da kuma fitowar jama'a.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution referred to a number of events which took place in the year 1388, saying: "In that year, if those individuals who inflicted a loss on the country and the people and those who imposed unnecessary expenses on the country had observed the law, that situation would not have been brought about.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya yi ishara da wasu ayyuka da aka yi wajen fayyace shakkun da wasu suka gabatar dangane da sakamakon zaben shekara ta 2009 inda ya ce: Mutanen da suka cutar da kasar nan da kuma al'ummar Iran (bayan zaben), sun yi hakan ne saboda rashin yarda da doka da kuma bin hanyar da doka ta tanadar ne, koda ya ke tsarin Musulunci yayi nasara sakamakon irin yadda ya fahimci yanayin al'ummar kasar nan.

translation.en: If we enter the arena for the sake of God and for carrying out our responsibilities, then winning and losing are meaningless.
translation.ha: Don haka ne Jagoran ya yi kiran da a girmama dokokin kasa a yayin zaben.

translation.en: Elsewhere in his statements, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution described destroying the tomb of Hujr ibn Adi, the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) companion, and insulting his body as a tragic event, further adding: "Another reason why this is a tragic event is that there are some people among Muslims and the Islamic Ummah who have backward, superstitious and malevolent ideas and who consider commemorating outstanding and enlightened personalities of the early Islamic era as a polytheistic and blasphemous move.
translation.ha: Bayan magana kan zaben kuma, Ayatullah Khamenei ya yi karin haske kan batun keta hurumin kabarin sahabin Ma'aikin Allah (s.a.w.a), wato Hijr bn Adi da sauran manyan Musulunci da masu ‘yan ta'addan kasar Siriya suka yi inda ya ce: Abin da ya ke kara bakanta rai cikin wannan abin da ya farun shi ne samuwar wasu mutane masu mummunan tunani sannan kuma wadanda aka bar su a baya a tsakankanin al'ummar musulmi, wadanda suke ganin girmama fitattun mutanen da suka yi hidima wa Musulunci a farko-farkon bayyanarsa a matsayin shirka da kuma kafirci.

translation.en: This is really a disaster." Ayatollah Khamenei added: "These are the people whose forefathers destroyed the tombs of the Imams (a.s.) in al-Baqi.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana samuwar irin wannan mummunan tunani a matsayi wata musiba da ta fada wa Musulunci da kuma musulmi, inda ya ce: Wadannan mutanen dai su ne wadanda magabatansu suka rusa kaburburan Imamai tsarkaka a makabartar Baqi'a.

translation.en: The day when Muslims throughout the world of Islam - from the Indian Subcontinent to Africa - rose up against them, they would have completely annihilated the pure tomb of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) if they had had the courage."
translation.ha: Idan da ba don tinkararsu da al'ummar musulmi suka yi ba, da kabarin Annabi (s.a.w.a) ma sai sun rusa shi.

translation.en: His Eminence reiterated: "They make these evil moves under the pretext that commemorating such people is a kind of worship.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Wani irin tunani ne wannan a ce biyayya da kaskantar da kai a gaban rayayyun dawagitai ba shirk aba ne, amma girmama magabata ya zamanto shirka?

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution stated that the reaction of Sunni Muslims to this event is indicative of their deep understanding, further stressing: "If these moves are not vigorously condemned by Muslims and if academic, intellectual and political personalities do not carry out their responsibilities in the face of these people, such fitna will not end in this. A disaster will befall the Islamic community and the fire of this fitna will spread on a daily basis.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma Jagoran ya bayyana irin matakan da bangaren ‘yan Ahlusunna suka dauka wajen Allah wadai da wannan danyen aikin a matsayin wani lamari da ke nuni da irin hangen nesan da su ma suke da shi yana mai cewa: Wajibi ne a ci gaba da yin Allah wadai da wannan danyen aiki. Don kuwa matukar malamai, masana da sauran ‘yan siyasar kasashen musulmi ba su sauke wannan nauyi da ke wuyansu ba, to kuwa wannan fitinar ba za ta tsaya haka nan kawai ba.

translation.en: Muslims should prevent such fitnas through political actions, fatwas and articles which should be written by intellectuals and outstanding and political personalities in the world."
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya kara da cewa: Wajibi ne ta hanyar amfani da hanyoyi na siysa, fatawoyi na addini da kuma rubuce-rubuce a kawo karshen wutar wannan fitinar.

translation.en: He stressed: "They use tricks, but divine tricks will definitely outwit their tricks and will block the path of the movement which wants to create obstacles in the way of the Islamic Ummah and its progress."
translation.ha: Jagoran ya bayyana cewar ko shakka babu akwai hannun makiya cikin wannan lamari inda ya ce: Cibiyoyi da jami'an kasa da kasa da sauran ‘yan siyasar da suke ta tada jijiyoyin wuya saboda an rusa wani waje na tarihi, amma sai ga shi sun yi gum da bakunansu kan wannan babban cin mutumcin.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei, the Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution, met Sunday afternoon with navy commanders and officials of the Islamic Republic of Iran Army on the occasion of Navy Day.
translation.ha: Da hantsin yau Lahadi (27-11-2016) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da manyan kwamandoji da jami'an sojin ruwa na kasar Iran inda ya bayyana jin dadinsa dangane da irin gagarumin ci gaban da sojin ruwan suka samu a bangarori daban-daban.

translation.en: Describing the achievements and capabilities of the Navy in the areas of manpower, command and technical affairs as noteworthy and praiseworthy, His Eminence stressed the importance of finalizing projects, preserving strength, and avoiding hastiness in carrying out tasks, reiterating: “The requirement for eliminating shortcomings is having firm determination and refusing to give in to limitations and restrictions.”
translation.ha: Har ila yau kuma yayin da yake jaddada muhimmancin yin aiki a lokacin da ya dace da kuma kara karfafa irin karfin da ake da shi ya bayyana cewar: wajibin magance irin rashin da ake fuskanta shi ne gagarumar himma da kuma rashin mika wuya ga takunkumi da kan iyakar da aka sanya.

translation.en: The Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution highlighted the importance of the seafaring industry in the progress of some countries and added: “Our country enjoys vast sea borders and a long history in seafaring. Therefore, the power and capability of the Navy of the Islamic Republic should befit the status of our Islamic government and the history of this country.”
translation.ha: A yayin wannan ganawar wacce ake gudanar da ita don tunawa da ranar sojin ruwan na Iran, Ayatullah Khamenei yayi ishara da muhimmancin karfafa masana'antar samar da kayan aiki na sojojin ruwa da kuma irin ci gaban da wasu kasashe suka samu a wannan fagen, Jagoranya ce: Bisa la'akari da irin girman kan iyaka na ruwa da kasarmu take da shi hakan kuma da tsohon tarihi na abin da ya shafi lamurran teku da muke da shi, don haka wajibi ne irin karfin da sojojin ruwa na Iran suke da shi ya zamanto yayi daidai da irin matsayin tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci da kuma tarihin wannan kasar.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei stated that the powerful presence of the Navy in international waters will increase the power and capability of the country. He said: “The depth of presence in international waters should increase.”
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana kasantuwar sojojin ruwan Iran a ruwaye na kasa da kasa wani lamari ne da zai kara irin karfi da kwarewar Iran, don haka sai ya ce: wajibi ne a ci gaba da karfafa irin wannan kasantuwar a ruwaye na kasa da kasa.

translation.en: His Eminence stressed the necessity of pursuing projects and tasks until the desired results are produced, saying: “Leaving tasks unfinished will raise certain questions and it will be problematic. Unfortunately in the present time, this situation is witnessed in some areas of the country, an example of which is the issue of the extraordinary high salaries.
translation.ha: A ci gaba da jawabin nasa Jagoran ya jaddada wajibci ci gaba da gudanar da ayyukan da aka sa a gaba har sai an kai ga manufar da aka sa a gaba yana mai cewa: Barin aiki ba tare da an gama ba, hakan yana sanya alamun tambaya, koda yake abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa har ya zuwa yanzu ana samu hakan na faruwa a wasu bangarori na kasar, wanda daga cikinsu kuwa abin bakin cikin shi ne irin albashi na fitar hankali da wasu jami'ai suka sanya wa kansu.

translation.en: This issue is one of the important issues whose result was not clarified for the people and they still have some questions about it in their minds.”
translation.ha: Wannan lamari yana daga cikin batutuwan da har yanzu ba a yi wa mutane bayanin da ya dace kansu ba, alamun tambaya suna nan cikin kwakwalan mutane.

translation.en: The necessity to preserve strength and to avoid hastiness and carelessness in affairs was another point that the Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution raised: “Every task should be started in a powerful way because hastiness in affairs will be problematic. Unfortunately, there are certain examples in this regard as well.”
translation.ha: Wajibcin kula da karfafa aiki da kuma nesantar ayyukan cikin gaggawa ba tare da sanya hankali cikin aikin ba na daga cikin batutuwan masu muhimmanci da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci yayi ishara da su yayin wannan ganawar, inda ya ce: Duk wani aiki wajibi ne a fara shi da dukkan karfi, don kuwa gaggawa cikin yana iya haifar da matsala, wanda abin bakin cikin ana iya ganin misalan hakan cikin wasu ayyukan.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei pointed to the issue of the nuclear negotiations and added: “In those negotiations, there were many discussions about sanctions, but in the present time, the U.S. Congress is bringing up the issue of renewing sanctions and they claim that this is not a new set of sanctions, but that it is a renewal of them!”
translation.ha: Yayin da yake ishara da lamurran da suka shafin tattaunawar nukiliya kuwa, Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana cewa: A wannan tattaunawar an yi bahasi da dama dangane da abin da ya shafi takunkumi, to amma sai ga shi a halin yanzu majalisar Amurka ta sake sabunta wadannan takunkumi, suna ikirarin cewa wadannan ai ba sabbin takunkumi ba ne, face dai sabunta takunkumin da daman yake nan ne.

translation.en: His Eminence mentioned: “There is not any difference between imposing new sanctions and re-imposing the old ones again after the end of their term.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya ci gaba da cewa: Babu wani bambanci da fara sanya wani takunkumi da kuma sake dawo da shi bayan wa'adinsa ya kare, don haka wannan na biyun takunkumi ne sannan kuma karya yarjejeniyar da aka cimma ne.

translation.en: The Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution reiterated that the emergence of such problems is due to hastiness in carrying out tasks: “When we are in a rush to finish tasks soon and to get some results, we ignore the details.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya bayyana bayyanar wannan matsalar da cewa lamari ne da ya samo asali daga gaggawa cikin aiki inda ya ce: A lokacin da muke cikin gaggawar cewa wajibi ne a gama wannan aiki cikin gaggawa, sannan mu ka gafala daga 'yan wasu abubuwa, wanda a wasu lokuta gafala daga wani karamin aiki yana iya haifar da gagarumin gibi cikin wannan aikin.

translation.en: Therefore, we should be careful so that tasks are carried out in a sound and firm manner and at appropriate speed.”
translation.ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne a lura sosai wajen ganin an gudanar da ayyuka da kyau sannan cikin saurin da ya kamata.

translation.en: Leader Meets Police Officials - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Ganawar Jagora Da Ministan Cikin Gida Da Kwamandojin ‘Yan Sanda

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution met this afternoon with the Interior Minister and a group of police officials and commanders.
translation.ha: A yammacin yau lahadi (24-4-2011) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da ministan cikin gida da wasu daga cikin manyan kwamandoji da jami'an hukumar ‘yan sanda ta kasar Iran.

translation.en: Speaking at the meeting, His Eminence said that one of the most important duties of the police force is to establish moral and psychological security in society. Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the remarks he made yesterday about the recent events and added: "Unfortunately the attitude that certain newspapers adopted towards these remarks caused discord instead of a sense of peace."
translation.ha: A yayin wannan ganawar ya bayyana tabbatar da tsaro musamman ma tsaro na kyawawan halaye da kwanciyar hankali na al'umma a matsayin daya daga cikin muhimman ayyukan ‘yan sanda, sannnan kuma yayin da ya ke ishara da gagarumin nauyin da ke wuyan kafafen watsa labarai, jaridu, kungiyoyi da mutane masu fadi a ji cikin al'umma wajen tabbatar da kwanciyar hankalin al'umma Jagoran ya bayyana cewar bai kamata kafafen watsa labarai, jaridu da sauran manyan mutane su fadi wasu abubuwan da za su cutar da zaman lafiya da kwanciyar hankali na al'umma ba.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution reiterated that it is necessary to avoid provoking tension in society through the mass media.
translation.ha: Don haka ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya kirayi marubuta da masu jawabai da cewa: Bai kamata a yi magana da kuma a rubuta wani abu da zai haifar da rikici da fada a cikin al'umma ba, don kuwa hakan lamari ne da ya saba wa maslahar kasar nan.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei reminded the audience of the disagreements among government officials and political activists during the leadership of Imam Khomeini (r.a.) and added that Imam Khomeini (r.a.) would repeatedly tell government officials to say whatever they liked in their meetings, but avoid making their disagreements public.
translation.ha: Har ila yau Ayatullah Khamenei ya yi ishara da sabanin da aka samu tsakanin jami'an gwamnati a lokacin marigayi Imam Khumaini (r.a) inda ya ce: A wancan lokacin a lokuta da dama Imam mai girma ya sha bayyana wa wadannan jami'an da cewa: "a zaman da za ku yi a tsakaninku ku fadi duk abin da kuke son fadi, to sai dai kada ku shigo da shi cikin mutane. Don kuwa su mutane ba su da wani laifi cikin hakan".

translation.en: His Eminence referred to the efforts made by foreign media to magnify certain disagreements among Iran's government officials and stressed that the statements of government officials must not suggest that there is discord among them. He added that if there are any disagreements, government officials must not reveal their dissatisfaction to the people and give foreign media a pretext to broadcast negative propaganda against the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake ishara da kokarin kafafen watsa labaran kasashen waje wajen kambama wasu daga cikin sabanin ra'ayi da ake samu tsakanin jami'ai, Jagoran cewa ya yi: Bai kamata a fahimci sabani da rikici cikin maganganu da rubuce-rubucenmu ba, idan ma har akwai sabanin ra'ayin, to bai kamata a gabatar da shi a gaban mutane ba don kada a ba wa kafafen watsa labaran kasashen waje dama.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that the people have a high morale and added: "The peace in society and the firm and conscious movement of the people towards the ideals is nothing but a divine blessing, and it is necessary to appreciate this blessing."
translation.ha: Har ila yau kuma yayin da yake ishara da irin karfin gwuiwan da al'umma suke da shi kuwa, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana cewar: Kwanciyar hankali da ke tattare da al'umma da kuma irin tsayin dakan da suka yi wajen ci gaba da tafiya a tafarkin kiyaye ababe masu tsarki da kuma nuna sanin ya kamata lamari ne da ke nuni da taimako da kuma tausayawa ta Ubangiji Madaukakin Sarki. A saboda haka wajibi ne a girmama wannan gagarumar ni'imar.

translation.en: Elsewhere in his speech, Ayatollah Khamenei expressed his gratitude for the efforts made by police officials and commanders during the New Year holidays and throughout last year. He reiterated: "The people can see these efforts and services, and they appreciate them."
translation.ha: A wani bangare na jawabin nasa, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya jinjina wa kwamandoji da manyan jami'an ‘yan sandan sakamakon irin kokarin da suka yi musamman a lokacin hutun sabuwar shekara da kuma tsawon shekarar da ta gabata, inda ya ce mutane suna ganin wannan kokari da kuma hidima, sannan kuma suna jinjina musu.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that one of the necessities of establishing moral security in society is to make the police force invulnerable.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ce daya daga cikin mafiya muhimmancin nauyi da kuma aikin da ke wuyan ‘yan sanda shi ne samar da tsaro da kwanciyar hankali a cikin al'umma da kuma tabbatar da kyawawan dabi'u.

translation.en: He added that the police cannot be made invulnerable except through adhering to religious principles. Ayatollah Khamenei said that the situation of the police has improved a lot since last year and added: "Our police officials and commanders should not be satisfied with the current level of success, rather they should make efforts to reach the peak."
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya kara da cewa yanayin ‘yan sanda a halin yanzu nesa ba kusa ba ya fi na shekarun da suka gabata don haka ne ya kirayi ‘yan sandan da cewa: Bai kamata kwamandoji da sauran jami'an ‘yan sanda su takaita da wannan ci gaban da aka samu din ba, wajibi ne su ci gaba da himma don samun damar isa ga kololuwar da ake son isa gare ta.

translation.en: His Eminence said that he is satisfied with the existing harmony between the Ministry of Interior and the police force, and he urged them to increase this harmony.
translation.ha: Har ila yau kuma Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana jin dadinsa dangane da irin fahimtar juna da aiki tare da ake samu tsakanin ma'aikatar cikin gida da hukumar ‘yan sanda yana mai bukatar da a kara irin wannan fahimtar junan.
